1b1(dkar chag_a): pa rdzogs langs mtshan ma su dpyad 'ad sa myos pa'i yig 'phrog mkhan// gnyis med gsung ba'i ston pa bla med pa// stobs bcu
1b2(dkar chag_a): mnga' ba de la phyag 'tshal lo// da' rgyal tshab mi bam mgon// blo gros rgya mtsho'i mdzod mngar 'jam pa'i dbyangs// rgyal ba nyan kog tshul 'dzin 'phags mche gzung // sras dang slob ma'i mchog der
1b3(dkar chag_a): gus pag 'tshal// rgyal bas legs gsungs shes rab pha rol phyin// zab cing rgya che'i khur 'dzin shing rta che// ma lus zhing du 'dren mkhas kha lo pa// klu grub thogs med zhabs pad spyi bor mchod// d+ha na ke sha'i chu gter
1b4(dkar chag_a): las 'thon pa'i// rgyal ba'i thugs rje'i sgyu 'phrul pad+ma'i tshal// skal bzang sbrang rtsi 'thung ba'i nyer 'tsho mchog/ bka' drin mnyam med pad+ma 'byung gnas rgyal// mun pa'i dmag rum 'thibs pa'i gangs can pa// sngon
1b5(dkar chag_a): med legs bshad 'od kyis gsal mdzad pa'i// smra ba'i nyi ma bai ro tsa na sogs// 'jig rten mig po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// kai la shas mtshan tha gru yangs pa'i khyen// yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i bdud rtsis rab gang na/
1b6(dkar chag_a): dga' ldan chos kyi mdun sa ltar mdzad pa// mar ma mdzad dpal ye shes der phyag 'tshal// pha rol phyin 'di byang nas byang du ni// der bar 'gyur zhes rgyal bas lung bstan pa'i// blta dpyod rnam par dag pa'i bstan
1b7(dkar chag_a): pa 'dzin// bka' bsdam skyes bu dam pa rnams la 'dud// gangs ra'i ljongs 'dir khrims kyis 'bengs pa yis// mtha' yas 'gro la legs gsungs 'dul ba'i nor// thabs mkhas 'gro la legs gsungs
1b8(dkar chag_a): 'dul ba'i nor// thabs mkhas rtse bas snyom par sbyin mdzad pa// rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa la phyag 'tshal// dge legs yon tan ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// dri med blo bzang bstan pa'i khang bzang rtser//
1b9(dkar chag_a): chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i pad yon can// dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// blo bzang rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rje yi// gcig tu bsdus pa yon tan rgya mtsho'i dpal// lhun grub 'phrin las bzang
1b10(dkar chag_a): po'i mdzad pa can// rje btsun bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros yangs pa'i skal bzang gdul bya'i tshogs// gtsug na bsod nams ye shes 'bras bu yis// legs bsdud rlung gi rgyal mtshan ltar bkra ba//
1b11(dkar chag_a): dpal ldan bra ma dam par phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas smon lam stobs kyi byang phyogs 'dir// bstan pa'i nyin byed khur chen 'degs pa la// lta ljang lta bur drag po'i stobs ldan pa// maM dbang mchod yon zung
1b12(dkar chag_a): 'brel rgyal gyur cig// zhes mchod par brjod nas dkar chag cha tsam gleng gyur na// / rgyal bas sngon che byang chub sems bskyed nas// rgya bu rgya mtsho'i bstan la tshogs gnyis kyi// rgyal sras spyod pa rlabs chen
1b13(dkar chag_a): spad pa'i mthar// rgyal ba'i go 'phangs dam pa mngon du mdzad// bsod nams min dang bdag tu lta ba dang // lta ba kun las rab tu bzlog pa'i phyir// bdag yod zhes dang bdag med zhes bya dang // bdag me 'ga' med zhes bya
2a1(dkar chag_a): rim bzhin gsungs// khyad par bya rgod phung po'i ri bo cher// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' yi// rigs can rgya mtsho'i rdul rnyed gdul bya la// zab mo shes rab pha rol byin pa gsungs/
2a2(dkar chag_a): de la yus drug sras ni bcu gcig ste// zab mo'i mdo sde bcu 'dur bzhugs pa la// yongs su grags rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum ste// rgyas pa chegasu bcad pa stong zag brgya// 'bring po chags su bcang pa'i bu lnga/
2a3(dkar chag_a): bsdus pa tshigs su bcad pa stong phrag brgyad// dang po la ni 'bum zhes grags pa ste// gnyis pa la ni nyis khri zhes byar grags// gsum pa la ni 'phags pa brgyad stong pa// sangs rgyas gsung la drang don
2a4(dkar chag_a): nges don gyi// rim pa mang bas 'ga' zhig bka' yin kyang // mtha' gcig yid gtan gnas su byar mi rung // 'di ni nges pa'i don du gsungs pa ste// de'i phyir mdo sde gzhan las khyad par 'phags// 'dod chags
2a5(dkar chag_a): zhe sdang la sogs gzhom pa'i phyir// rgyal bas mdo gzhan gsungs pa don chen min// gti mug gzhom phyir pha rol phyin gsungs pa// shin tu don chen yin zhes zla grags gsungs// de slad mkhas pa rnams
2a6(dkar chag_a): kyang thos pa dang // bsam dang bsgom pa'i gtso bo 'di la mdzad// shAkya seng ge mya ngan 'das 'og tu// blo gros che ldan 'phags pa kun dga' bos// dpag med 'dus pa rgya mtsho'i dbus su ni// thub pa'i
2a7(dkar chag_a): gsung rnams ma nor legs par bsdus// de tshe lha klu dri zar bcas pa yis// rang rang gnas su spyan drangs mi yul 'dir// re zhig pa phyin glegs pam mi bzhugs kyang // klu grub zhabs kyis klu yi yul nas
2a8(dkar chag_a): ni// spyan drangs sa stengs 'dir ni rgyas par mdzad// dbu ma rig pa'i tshogs drug sgo nas ni// dngos bstan stong nyid lta ba gtan la phab// thogs med zhabs kyi dga' ldan lha yul du// mi pham byams pa
2a9(dkar chag_a): mgon po la gsan nas// sbas don mngon rtogs rim pa gsal bar mdzad// dbyig snyen dang ni phyogs kyi glang po dang // rnam grol sde dang seng ge bzang po sogs// slob dpon mkhas pa rnams kyi 'phags
2a10(dkar chag_a): yul du// pha rol phyin pa nyin mo lta bur mdzad// phyogs 'dir kun tu bzang po'i sprul pa ni// chos rgyal tho tho ri'i sku ring la// dkon mchog sprin dang spang bskong phyag brgya pa'i// glegs bam mkha'
2a11(dkar chag_a): las mngon sum babs gyur nas// chos rgyal dam pas dges shing legs par bkur// dam pa ches kyi dbu brnyengs zhes su grags// spyan ras gzigs sbrul srong btsan skam po'i dus// 'jig rten
2a12(dkar chag_a): mig gyur thon mi la sogs pas// mdo sde du ma bsgyur zhing legs par bshad// rnam dkar dge ba bcu'i khrims bcas nas// dam pa chos kyi bka' srol legs par gtod// 'jam dbyangs sprul
2b1(dkar chag_a): pa khri srong lde btsan dus// pad+ma 'byung gnas slob dpon zhi ba mtsho// dri med bshes gnyen zhi ba snying po sogs// 'phags yul mkhas pa mang po spyan drangs shing // bai ro tsa na dka' ba dpal rtsegs dang // cog
2b2(dkar chag_a): ro klu'i rgyal mtshan ye shes sde// rin chen mchog sogs lo chen mang po yi// mdo sngags dpag tu med pa rab bsgyur zhing // khyad par shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdo// zab mo 'di yang de yi tshe na 'gyur// slar
2b3(dkar chag_a): yang lo chen blo ldan shes rab kyis// bsgyur shing bcos nas shin tu brgyas par mdzad// de ltar mkhas pa rnams la yongs grags pa'i// zab mo mdo 'di bzhengs pa'i phan yon ni// stong gsum rin po che'i rab bkang
2b4(dkar chag_a): nas// grangs med rgyal ba rnams la phul ba bas// nges don pha rol phyin pa'i tshig bcad gcig/ yi ger 'bri dang 'chang ngam klog pa dang // 'dzin dang kun chub bsod nams che bar gsungs// rdzogs ldan dus su gsungs
2b5(dkar chag_a): rab grangs med pa// bsam pa thag pas yi ger 'bri ba bas// gang gi snyigs ma'i dus 'dir nyung ngu yang // legs par bris pa che cher don dang ldan// ma lus skye rgu'i phan bde ji snyed pa// rgyal ba'i bstan la rag las de yang
2b6(dkar chag_a): ni// gsung bzhin legs par 'chad pa nyid la rag/ de yang yi ger 'bri la rag pa'i phyir// glegs bam 'bri ba bde ba kun gyi rgyu// gang du rgyal ba'i yum mchog 'bri ba las// legs par klog dang bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs der//
2b7(dkar chag_a): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis// rims dang yams dang dus min 'chi ba sogs// nye bar 'che ba thams cad legs bsrung zhing // tshe dang bsod nams dpal dang 'byor pa
2b8(dkar chag_a): sogs// dge legs thams cad myur du ster bar 'gyur// mdor na rgya mtsho'i gos can rdul snyed kyis// bde bar gshegs pas bskal pa du ma ru// rgyun mi 'chad par gsung kyang mi rdzogs na// so so skye bo'i brjod
2b9(dkar chag_a): kyang ngal bar zad// de sogs grangs yas yon tan ldan pa yi// legs byas 'di ni gang du grub pa'i yul// 'das dang ma 'das zhing khams rnam gnyis las// 'jig rten ma 'das srid pa gsum las ni// sa steng
2b10(dkar chag_a): srid pa zhes bya khaMs gsum las// 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams su grags pa yin// de la'ang lha dang lha min mi dang ni// ngan 'gro rnams kyi gnas kyi dbye ba yis// bye brag mang na'ang 'di lta mi gnas// mi yi nang nas gling bzhi
2b11(dkar chag_a): gling phran brgyad// de yi nang nas mchog gyur 'dzam bu'i gling // de las sangs rgyas byon pa'i zhing gi phyogs// rdo rje gdan gyi byang phyogs kha ba can// pad dkar 'dzin pa'i zhing khams bod kyi yul// de'i nang nas 'breg ru
2b12(dkar chag_a): sme bstod cha// gangs can lte ba ti se gangs kyi shar// yan lag brgyad ldan chu 'bab pak+Sha'i byang // yul 'di'i yon tan cung zad brjod pa na// kun kyang cung zhig snyan gsan 'tshal/ de la bstod phreng tshig gi spro spel ni//
2b13(dkar chag_a): shar nas dza dang gos nor char war 'bab// lho nas 'bru sman zangs lpags ras 'dod dgu 'byung // nub nas gsum nang sel bzang drug 'byung // byang nas ro mchog ldan pa'i shel cha 'byung // rgyab ri rgyal po gdan la
3a1(dkar chag_a): bzhugs 'dra la// lha shing sA shug dri dang rab ldan dang // lha bya gong mo gsung dbyangs rgyun mar sgrogs// mdun ri seng ge gnam la 'byor 'dra la// se le 'bri mo ngur sbra dus kun sgrogs// na swa
3a2(dkar chag_a): gzhung gsum maN+Dal bkod 'dra dang // mtsho dang lteng ka rdzing bus brgyan pa la// ngang pa khrung khrung ngur pa thing ri la sogs// chu bya rnams ni snyan pa'i mdo gar bsgyur// de ltar dpal 'byor ma 'dus med pa'i yul// skye 'gro
3a3(dkar chag_a): kun gyi mthong na smon pa'i sa// sa la g.yang chags thabs kha chen po ru// sa der smin pa'i mi la grags gtam// rigs rus khyad 'phags 'bru rje lha'i brgyad// rgyud pa dri med btso ma'i gser dang 'dra// lung
3a4(dkar chag_a): rig smra ba dag dbang chos grags bstod// gnas lugs rab 'byams blo bzang bstan 'dzin bstod// dbyangs can rnam 'phrul blo bzang dbang mor bstod// shes rig kun tshangs rnam rgyal sri 'dul bstod// rgyu
3a5(dkar chag_a): rtsal kun ldan nam mkha' 'bum dar bstod// kai la'i mdangs ldan tshe brtan rnam rgyal bstod// khams gsum zil gnon khro bo rnam rgyal bstod// mdzangs 'phrul ldan pa'i tshe rings dpal mo bstod// rgyas la 'dran
3a6(dkar chag_a): bkra shis mtsho mo bstod// dge la mos ldan khro mo dpal 'jom bstod// bu nor kun 'byung nam mkha' dpal 'dzom sogs// gong 'khod yon bdag pho mo thams cad kyis// bka' gros ma nor dam chos bzhengs la
3a7(dkar chag_a): mthun// / khyad par 'dir mos sbyin bdag gtso bo ni// nyi zla zung 'brel lta bu'i cha 'dzin pa// yar mchod mar sbyin dge ba'i snying stobs can// 'dzam+b+ha la 'dra na mkha' 'bum dar dang // rnam sras 'dra ba'i khro bo
3a8(dkar chag_a): rnam rgyal dang // 'di la mos pa'i yon gyi bdag mo ni// bud med lus la mkha' 'gro'i mtshan mnga' ma// skyon gyi dri mas dben pa'i ngang tshul can// rnam dkar las brtson bkra shis mtsho mo dang // DA ki'i rnam 'phrul
3a9(dkar chag_a): nam mkha' dpal 'dzom bzhis// sangs rgyas bstan pa dar bya phyir dang // bstan 'dzin rnams kyi zhabs pad rten phyir dang // drin can pha ma'i drin lan gsab phyir dang // yul khams kun du bde skyid 'byung phyir dang //
3a10(dkar chag_a): zhal bzhugs rnams kyi nyer 'tshe zhi phyir dang // lhag don sgyu ma'i nor la snying po len phyir du// bka'i snying po gzungs mdo mang pos mtshan// brgya dang sum cu so lnga bzhugs pa bzhengs// gsung rabs de dag
3a11(dkar chag_a): bzhengs pa'i dge stobs kyis// gnas skabs 'gal rkyen bar chad kun zhi zhing // mi mthun phyogs las rnam par rgyal gyur nas// zhabs pad ri dbang lta bur brtan gyur cig/ gang gi rgyud 'dzin na mkha'i khyon yangs
3a12(dkar chag_a): la// thabs shes rab ldan pa'i nyi zla 'char// rgyu rkyen rten 'brel 'dzem pas gza' skar 'khrungs// gcig las gcig 'phel nam mkha' gang bar shog// zhwa dag rab gnas mnga' gsol mkhan po ni// rnam
3a13(dkar chag_a): dag slab pa gsum gyi nor gyi phyug/ bshad sgrub gnyis la mi 'jigs spobs pa mtho// lugs gnyis bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa yis// lung rig smra ba dag dbang chos grags dang // blo bzang dang rgyas 'phrin las
3b1(dkar chag_a): rgya mtsho dang // ngag dbang legs bshad sems kyi mnga' gsol bkra shis mdzad// dga' ldan gnas nas me tog char pa phab// lha mi 'gro ba yongs kyi legs so 'byin// khri gdugs mkha' la 'ja' chen dkyil
3b2(dkar chag_a): 'khor rgyas// yon mchod kun la sbrid pa'i nyi ma shar// dga' bde rgyas pa'i snyan pa'i dung chen 'bud// ma dag dag byed zhu dag tshar gnyis mdzad// // yi ge'i 'du byed gnas pa ku ma ri'i// slob bu chos
3b3(dkar chag_a): mdzad kyi gog dang // pad+ma skyabs dang nor bu dar rgyas sogs// ring ba sbyangs nas sum b+ha'i lugs su bkod// 'di la lhag chad nor 'khrul ci bgyis pa// de dag thams cad sa sor bshags su gsal//
3b4(dkar chag_a): e ma ha/ de ltar shes rab par phye mdo gzangs mchog/ dad pas bzhengs pa'i dge ba dri med des// shugs drag rgyun mi chad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// brlabs chen tshogs gnyis dge ba rab bsgrub nas/
3b5(dkar chag_a): bde blag nyid du thams cad mkhyen pa yis// go 'phangs zab mo de ni thob par shog/ de nas gang+gA'i snyed 'bre ba la// rang rang skal pa ji bzhin chos bstan nas// snying gi mun pa stug por ye shes kyis// nyi 'od rab tu rgyas pa 'char bar
3b6(dkar chag_a): shog/ bstan pa'i sbyin bdag sku tshe rdo rje ltar// rab tu brtan zhing nye bar 'tshe ba kun// legs par zhi ba'i spyod yul bla na med// tshe dpag med mgon lta bu thob par shog/ yid la sim pa rab ster longs spyod kun// sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i/
3b7(dkar chag_a): mdun sa bzhin// kun nas phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal dang ldan// mi zad nam mkha'i mdzod la dbang bsgyur shog/ rdul brtsegs dbang po lta bur mtho ba yis// bsod nams rab tu brtan pas rab bzung nas// lha dang mi ma yin rnams thos/
3b8(dkar chag_a): cad kyi// nye bar smon pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar shog/ spyod yul 'di dang 'jig rten dpag med du// dus min 'chi sogs nyer 'tshe kun zhi nas// kha na ma tho rab spangs bde skyid la// lus can thams cad snyoms par spyod par shog/ zab
3b9(dkar chag_a): bzhi spos bral 'dus ma byas pa yis// gsung rabs don zab bden pa gang yin des// bdag gi 'dir ni smon ci btab pa// de dag 'gro ba'i don du 'grub par shog/ sngon tshe yangs pa can gyi grong khyer du// zas gtsang sras kyi ji skad
3b10(dkar chag_a): gsungs pa bzhin// dpal dang bkra shis bde legs thams cad kyis// deng 'dir sbyin bdag rnams la stsal du gsol// / ces pa'i mdo ma glegs paM po ti chen po 'di nyid/ spre'u le hor gyi zla ba brgyad
3b11(dkar chag_a): pa'i tshes bcu gsum nyin gza' phur bu dar ba'i dus ches dge bar rab tu gnas par mdzad pa'o// de'i tshe bzo bo bkon skyon mnyes byed ston mo'i mchod// skye bo rnams la tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// snyan pa'i glu len dga' ba'i bro khrab
3b12(dkar chag_a): shing // bde ba'i gar khyug skyid pa'i nyi ma shar// dga' bde skyid pa'i dpal khang gru bzhi 'dir// yon mchod mi 'bral yang yang mjal gyur cig/ de ltar dge rtsa rgya mtsho'i byin gyis rlabs pa'i mthus// gtsor spos
3b13(dkar chag_a): sprir bdag chen po rnams kyi tshogs gnyis bsags// sgrib gnyis sbyangs nas sku che'i zla dang mnyam par gyur cig/ sku srog lhun po ltar brtan par gyur cig/ gdung 'dzin sin d+hu ltar rings par gyur cig/ longs spyod
4a1(dkar chag_a): mdzad ri shes pa nam mkha'i gter la dbang bar gyur zhig/ 'khor 'bangs spen gyi phung po ltar ngar shing rgyas par gyur cig/ rten 'di la lus dang longs spyod kyi sgo nas zang cig lung
4a2(dkar chag_a): tsam mam chu thig tsam maM/ til gyi 'bru gcig gi 'brel pa thob pa rnams kyang chung mi bas na zhing zla ba yar gyi tshes bzhin du/ gong nas gong du 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig/ bsngo ba dang smon lam thams cad yongs
4a3(dkar chag_a): su 'grub pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM tad+ya thA pany+tsa kr-i la a la b+ho d+ha Na ya swA hA/ sa nu me drung na mkha'i dngas ma dang // bcud dang nus pa ji snyed yod pa dang // 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshe dang srog/ dpal
4a4(dkar chag_a): dang gzi brjid kun 'dus bkra shis shog/ mdor na gnas skabs mtho ris yon tan ni// rnam pa bdun las nam yang 'gyur med cing // mthar thug zag med bde ba chen po las// gzhan du g.yo ba med pa'i bkra shis shog/
4a5(dkar chag_a): mi 'gyur lhun po sku yi bkra shis shog/ yan lag drug cu gsung gi bkra shis shog/ mtha' bral don rtogs thugs kyi bkra shis shog/ rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi bkra shis shog/ sarba mang+ga laM//

1b1(dkar chag_b): oM swAs+t+rI/ kun khyab bde chen bgrang yas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mgon// dga'
1b2(dkar chag_b): chen stong nyid mtha' yas dam chos bdud rtsi'i mdzod// snying por zung 'jug dpag yas 'gro rnams rab tu sgrol// bkra
1b3(dkar chag_b): shis rgyal mtshan lha mi'i mgon la rtag tu 'dud// rgyal bas gdul bya'i bsam pa ltar// gnas skabs mthar zug don gyi
1b4(dkar chag_b): phyir// bla med gzung mdo bsam yas las// nyer mkho ma lus bsdus pa yi// glegs bam yid bzhin nor bu 'di// gnas
1b5(dkar chag_b): gzhi rgya mtsho'i gtsug rgyan 'dir// mi zad par du bsgrub pa la// srid gsum lha mis yi rangs mdzod// ces mchod par brjod
1b6(dkar chag_b): nas// dpal dge ldan phun tshogs gling des don dga' ba'i tshal gyi chos grwa chen po 'dir// gzungs dang mdo phran nye bar mkhob
1b7(dkar chag_b): bsdus pa'i glegs bam mi zad pa 'byung ba bar du 'khod pa la// dang por rgyud du gtogs pa'i gzungs mdo skor la// ke
2a1(dkar chag_b): la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ kha pa la 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/
2a2(dkar chag_b): ge pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ nga pa la ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gtsug tor rnam rgyal/
2a3(dkar chag_b): ca pa la gtsug tor gdugs dkar mchog tu grub pa dang / gtsug tor 'bar ba/ cha ba la bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
2a4(dkar chag_b): ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ byams pas dam bcas shes rab blo 'phel/ dza pa la 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
2a5(dkar chag_b): pa sgrol ma/ nya ba la 'phags ma ri khrod ma lo mgyon ma'i gzungs mdo// ta pa li 'phags ma 'od zer can ma'i gzungs/ za ba la 'phags pa rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i
2a6(dkar chag_b): dpung rgyan da pa la dpal rdo rje sder mo// na pa la 'phags pa stobs po che/ pa pa la mi rgod rnam 'joms dang / bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba/ pa pa/
2a7(dkar chag_b): la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi gzungs dang / 'phags pa seng ge sgra'i gzungs/ don yod zhags pa'i gzungs/ ba pa la kun tu bzang po'i gzungs/
2a8(dkar chag_b): ma pa la lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po// sme brtsegs bstod sngags/ tsa pa la rdo rje mi pham ma me lar 'bar ba/ tsha ba la rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo dbugs chen me
2b1(dkar chag_b): dza ba la 'phags pa bu mang po ston pa so sor 'brang ba/ wa ba la 'bigs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ srong 'gyur gyi gzungs/ zhab la
2b2(dkar chag_b): 'phags pa phyir bzlog rnam rgyal/ za ba la phyir bzlog stobs chen/ las sgrib rnam sbyongs/ 'phags pa g.yul las rgyal ba/ 'apa la lus ngag yid gsu
2b3(dkar chag_b): bcings pa las grol ba/ ya pa la rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can/ rab la dpal chen me'i mdo// la pa la dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs/ 'phags pa
2b4(dkar chag_b): dug sel ba/ 'phags pa sor mo can/ chos thams cad kyi gum/ 'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu/ 'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags/ sha pa la 'phags/
2b5(dkar chag_b): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bzung bar 'gyur ba/ stong phrag brgya pa bzung bar 'gyur ba/ brgyad stong pa bzung bar 'gyur ba/ par phyin drug
2b6(dkar chag_b): bzung bar 'gyur ba gnyis/ par phyin bcu thob par 'gyur ba/ tshad med bzhi thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bzung bar
2b7(dkar chag_b): 'gyur ba/ 'phags pa phal po che bzung bar 'gyur ba/ 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i mdo bklags par 'gyur ba/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdo
2b8(dkar chag_b): bzungs par 'gyur ba/ 'phags ma so sor 'brang ma bzung bar 'gyur ba/ 'phags pa la drar gshegs pa'i mdo bklags par 'gyur ba/ sa pa la 'phags pa
3a1(dkar chag_b): rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi snying po// 'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags/ ha pa la 'phags pa sprin chen po las klung gi dkyil 'khor rab
3a2(dkar chag_b): tu dbab pa a pa la gza' yum/ ki pa la skar yum/ ku ba la 'phags pa rdo rje'i mchu/ ke pa la rdo rje gnam lcags mchu/ ko pa la 'phags pa lcags mchu/
3a3(dkar chag_b): khi pa la 'phags pa lcags mchu nag po// khu ba la 'phags pazangs mchu dmar po// khe pa la 'phags pa kha mchu nag po zhi bar byed pa/ kho ba la 'phags pa mig
3a4(dkar chag_b): rnam par sbyong ba/ mig nang rab tu zhi ba/ kA ya'i nad rab tu zhi ba/ gzhang 'brum zhi ba/ nad thams cad zhi ba/ rims nad zhi ba'i gzungs gnyis/ rma bya chen mo'i snying
3a5(dkar chag_b): po/ sho lo ka brgya lobs pa/ gi ba la 'phags pa gegs sel ba/ gu pa la bar du gcod pa thams cad sbyong ba/ ge pa la gser 'od nor lha/ gser 'od dbyangs
3a6(dkar chag_b): skyabs/ du rung // mu shi ka'i bshags mdo// go pa la 'phags pa nor rgyun ma'i gzungs mdo// di pa la 'phags pa nor bu bzang po'i gzungs/ du pa la
3a7(dkar chag_b): a ba ra yang dag shes kyi gzungs/ de ba la ku be ra nor spel ba'i gzungs/ ngo ba la tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzungs/ ci pa la tshogs bdag gi 'bru spel ba'i
3a8(dkar chag_b): gzungs/ cu pa la lug nad zhi ba'i gzungs gnyis/ ce pa la 'phags pa re ma na sogs rta gzungs rnam grangs drug/ tso pa la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i
3b1(dkar chag_b): gzungs/ de nas mdo phran skor la/ chi ba la shes rab snying po// 'bum chung / ke'u shi ka'i bshags mdo// chu ba la mda' ka ye shes/ che ba la
3b2(dkar chag_b): byang chub ltung bshags/ tshe ba la 'phags bzang po spyod pa/ ji pa la byams pa'i smon lam/ dzu pa la 'phags pa mdo sdud pa/ je pa la 'phags pa shes rab
3b3(dkar chag_b): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa/ jo ba la nam mkha'i snying po'i mdo// nye ba la sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya/ zhu ba la sa'i mdo// nye ba la khang bu rtsegs pa/
3b4(dkar chag_b): pa la byams zhus chos brgyad pa/ klu'i dbang po rgya mtshos zhus pa/ ti pa la dkon mchog gsum skyabs su 'gro ba/ dkon mchog rjes dran/ tu ba la nyi ma'i
3b5(dkar chag_b): mdo// zla ba'i mdo// te pa la khye'u rin chen zla bas zhus pa/ to pa la bgres mos zhus pa/ thi pa la stag mos zhus pa/ thu pa la dbang bkod phyag rgya ba/
3b6(dkar chag_b): ze ba la 'phags pa glang ru lung bstan/ tho ba la 'phags pa phyogs bcu mun sel/ di pa la sdong pos brgyan pa/ du pa la tshe'i dbang bskur ba/ rin po/
3b7(dkar chag_b): che che'i sgrub pa/ tshe dpag med thams cad kyi snying po// de la gtsug tor nag mo// do pa la gtsug tor lha mo rol pa/ gtsug tor dkar me'i bzlog bsgyur/
3b8(dkar chag_b): ni pa la phyir bzlog ngan sngags kyi 'khor lo// nu pa la dag pa gser gyi mdo thig/ ne pa la klu'i dbang bkong / no pa la gza'i yab gzungs
4a1(dkar chag_b): bi pa la 'phags pa ljon shing / sri bzlog/ rgyal po'i cho 'phrul phyir bzlog pa/ pu pa la sde bdun skar ma'i mdo// rgya nag skrag bzlog/
4a2(dkar chag_b): sdig sgrib kun 'joms/ pe pa la nyes pa kun sel byin rlabs sgron me/ po pa la gnam sa snang brgyad/ pi pa la bkra shis brtsegs pa chen po// ga gon dang bzang
4a3(dkar chag_b): po la gnang ba'i bkra shis/ pu pa la yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa/ phe pa la rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi bsngo ba/ bo pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bcu'i
4a4(dkar chag_b): bkra shis/ sangs rgyas dpa' bo bdun gyi bkra shis sogs te mdor na gzungs mdo shin tu nye bar mkho zhing byin rlabs che ba brgya dang sum cu rtsa lnga tsam bzhugs shing /
4a5(dkar chag_b): de dag las rgya nag dang gter nas byon pa sogs re re tsam yang bar chad bzlog pa la bsngags shing / mkho ba'i phyir glegs bim gyi mjug gi cha la bzhugs so// de ltar
4a6(dkar chag_b): byin rlabs gzi 'od 'phro ba'i gsung rab rin chen gter// skal ldan skye bo'i bsod nams dpal du mi zad kha bye nas// rang gzhan phan bde'i dga' ston spel ba'i
4a7(dkar chag_b): lhag bsam phun tshogs can// kun dga' ba'i bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan rab tu brtan gyur cig/ gzhan yang bar chad mi mthun kun zhi nas// dpal 'byor dbang zang
4a8(dkar chag_b): dge legs rab rgyas shing // nges don bstan pa yun ring gnas pa dang // bstan 'dzin skyes bu zhabs pad brtan pa dang // 'di la 'brel can rnams kyi gtso byas pa'i//
4b1(dkar chag_b): 'gro kun dang byung sangs rgyas mngon pang shedage legs 'phel/
5a1(dkar chag_b): ma dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bzhugs
5b1(dkar chag_b): xxx
1a1(1 ka): Ar+ya many+dzu shrI na ma saM gi ti/ bod skad
1a2(1 ka): 'i kau
1a3(1 ka): du/ 'phags pa 'jam pa pal gyi don dam pa'i mtshan
1a4(1 ka): yang dag par brjod pa/ 'dzom dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
1b1(1 ka): la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / gdul dka' 'dul ba
1b2(1 ka): rnams kyi mchog/ dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/ rdo rje dbang phyug
1b3(1 ka): gsang ba'i rgyal// pad ma dkar po rgyas 'dra'i spyan// pad ma rgyas 'dra
1b4(1 ka): zhal mnga' ba// rang gi lag gis rdo rje mchog/ yang dang yang du gsor byed pa//
3a1(1 ka): khro gnyer rim pa ldan la sogs// lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa/
3a2(1 ka): dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po// 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byed can// rdorje
3a3(1 ka): rtse mo rab 'phro ba// rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa// snying rje che dang shes rab dang /
3a4(1 ka): zabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog/ dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can//
3b1(1 ka): khriba'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa// sangs rgyas 'phrin las byed pa'i mtshan
3b2(1 ka): lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das//
3b3(1 ka): rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// bal mo snar babyas napa ni/
3b4(1 ka): sngar 'dra ste 'di skad gsol// khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang // bdag don
4a1(1 ka): bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i//
4a2(1 ka): byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod// nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing // mi shes
4a3(1 ka): 'dam du bying ba yi// sems can kun la sman pa dang // bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir//
4a4(1 ka): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po// dam tshig chen po
4a5(1 ka): de nyid mkhyen// dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis// bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku//
4b1(1 ka): gtsug tor chen po tshig gi bdag/ ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dang/
4b2(1 ka): yi// ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog/ don zab don ni rgya che zhing // don chen mtshungs med
4b3(1 ka): rab zhi ba// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// ma 'ong
4b4(1 ka): rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la// da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// yang dang yang du gsungs pa
4b5(1 ka): gang // rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang // dpag med rnams
5a1(1 ka): kyis bka' bzhin du// glu blangs gang lags bshad du gsol// mgon po/
5a2(1 ka): rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi// gsang 'dzin ci nas bdag 'gyur phyir// nges par 'byung gi bar du 'di//
5a3(1 ka): bdag gis bsam pa brtan pos bzung // nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang // mi shes ma lus spang bI
5a4(1 ka): phyir// bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du// sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal// gsang dbang lag
5a5(1 ka): na rdo rje yis// de bzhin gshegs la de skad du// gsol nas thal mo sbyar byas te// lus btud nas ni spyan
5a6(1 ka): sngar 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ nyid kyi zhal nas
5b1(1 ka): ljags bzang ba// ring zhing yangs pa brkyangs mdzad de// 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing // bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams
5b2(1 ka): 'dul byed pa// sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum// sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas// tshangs pa'i gsung ni
5b3(1 ka): snyan pa yis// 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang ste// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa/
5b4(1 ka): snying rje che dang ldan gyur pas// 'gro la phan pa'i don du khyod// ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gyi// ming brjod pas ni don
5b5(1 ka): che ba// dag par byed cing sdig sel ba// nga las nyan par brtson pa ni// legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // lag na rdo
5b6(1 ka): rje khyod legs so// gsang ba'i bdag po de phyir ngas// khyod la legs par bstan par bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon//
5b7(1 ka): bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang // gsang /
6a1(1 ka): sngags rigs sngags 'chang ba'i rigs// rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten 'jig
6a2(1 ka): rten 'das pa'i rigs// 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang // rigs chen gtsug tor
6a3(1 ka): cher gzigs nas// tshig gi bdag pam chogasu bcad // gas sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing // gnyis su med pa
6a4(1 ka): 'byung ba dang // mi skye chos can 'di gsungs pa// a A i I u U e ai o au aM aHs+thi to hri di dz+nyA na mur+t+ti ra
6a5(1 ka): bud d+ho bud d+ha naM/ t+yA d+hA brti nAM/ oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na duHkhats+tshed/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUr+N+Na ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ wA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa na ya te na maH/
6a6(1 ka): 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung // a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen yi
6a7(1 ka): ge dam pa yi// khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med// tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ tshig kun rab
6b1(1 ka): tu gsal bar byed// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba//
6b2(1 ka): mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// mchod pa chen po khro ba che// khro ba chen po dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po chags pa che// chags
6b3(1 ka): pa thams cad sel bar byed// 'dod pa chen po bde ba che// dga' ba chen po mgu ba che// gzugs chen lus kyang che ba ste// kha dog che zhing lus bong che// ming
6b4(1 ka): yang che zhing rgya che ba// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste// nyon mongs chen po lcags kyu'i mchog/ grags chen snyan grags
6b5(1 ka): chen po ste// snang ba chen po gsal ba che// mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang // sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa// sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'//
6b6(1 ka): sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can// sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste// tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog/ bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po// brtson 'grus
6b7(1 ka): chen po brtul ba yin// bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas// shes rab chen po'i lus 'chang ba// stobs po che la thabs che ba// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsha
6b8(1 ka): ste// byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med// snying rje chen po blo yi mchog/ shes rab chen po blo chen ldan// mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba// rdzu 'phrul chen
7a1(1 ka): po stobs dang ldan// shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste// rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po// srid
7a2(1 ka): pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms// mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang // drag po chen po drag shul che// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po// mgon po rigs mchog
7a3(1 ka): chen po ste// bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog/ theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/
7a4(1 ka): thub pa chen po thub chen ldan// gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba// gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu
7a5(1 ka): la gnas// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul// mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste// sa bcu la ni gnas pa po// shes bcu rnam dag
7a6(1 ka): bdag nyid can// shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po// rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don// thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag/ kun gyi don ni ma lus byed// rnam
7a7(1 ka): bcu dbang ldan che ba po// thog ma med pa spros med bdag/ de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag/ bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur// ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed//
7a8(1 ka): gnyis su med dang gnyis med ston// yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas// bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan// mu stegs ri dwags ngan 'jigs byed// kun du
7b1(1 ka): 'gre 'dzin yod grongs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid lhar mgyogs// rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal// 'khor lo bsgyur ba stobs pare// tshogs
7b2(1 ka): kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog/ tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa ste// tshul chen gzhan gyi dri mi 'jog/ rlig rje tshig
7b3(1 ka): bdag smra mkhas pa// tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas// tshig bden pa dang bden par smra// bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po// phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong // 'dren
7b4(1 ka): pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul// nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba// 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig pu// dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad// 'dod chags bral bas
7b5(1 ka): dbang po thul// bde ba rnyed pas 'jigs med thob// bsil bar gyur pa rnyog pa med// rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan// bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog
7b6(1 ka): bdag gir mi 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa// bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas// shes pa 'ba' zhig dri
7b7(1 ka): gsal ba// shes rab mtshon chas rnam 'joms pa// dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan// 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog/ chos kyi dbang phyug chos
7b8(1 ka): kyi rgyal// legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po// don grub bsam pa grub pa ste// kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad// chos
8a1(1 ka): dbyings dam pa zad mi shes// bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs// ye shes ye shes 'byung gnas che// ye shes ldan pa yod
8a2(1 ka): med shes// tshogs gnyis cho gas ni bsags pa po// rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can// bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan mchog/ so so rang rig mi g.yo ba//
8a3(1 ka): mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang // sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga'i bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can// spyan lnga
8a4(1 ka): chags pa med pa 'chang // sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po// sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog/ shes pas srid 'byung skye gnas med// chos las 'byung
8a5(1 ka): ba srid pa sel// gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag skyes ma thag tu 'gro ba'i bdag/ nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba// shes rab ye shes me bo che// 'od
8a6(1 ka): chen rnam par snang bar byed// ye shes snang ba lam me ba// 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron// gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba// sngags mchog mnga' bdag
8a7(1 ka): rig sngags rgyal// gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed// gtsug tor chen po rmang byung gtsug/ nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston// sangs rgyas kun
8a8(1 ka): bdag dngos po mchog/ 'gre kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan// sna tshogs gzugs chen bskyed pa po// mchod cing brjod pa drang srong che// rigs gsum 'am
8b1(1 ka): ba gsang sngags 'chang // dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin// gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa// theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po// don
8b2(1 ka): yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal// 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po ga
8b3(1 ka): drug 'jigs// mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan// keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po// ha la ha la gdong rgya pa// gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal/
8b4(1 ka): rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje grags pa rdo rje'i snying // sgyu 'phrul rdo rje bsus po che// rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdeg/ rdo rje snying po mkha'
8b5(1 ka): 'dra ba// mi g.yo ral pa gcig gis bsgyings// glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon// grags chen ha ha zhes sgrogs pa// hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs
8b6(1 ka): par byed// gang mo chen mo gad rgyangs can// rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje
8b7(1 ka): drag po dga' ba che// rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes sgrogs// mtshon du rdo rje mda' thogs pa// rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod// rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can// rdo rje
8b8(1 ka): gcig pu g.yul sel ba// rdo rje 'bar bla mi bzang // skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste// rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che// mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig/ lus ni/
9a1(1 ka): rdo rje'i baspu can// rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu'i lus// sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse// rdo rje'i snying po lpags pa mkhregs// rdo rje
9a2(1 ka): 'breng thogs dpal dang ldan// rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// gad rgyangs ha ha nges par sgrogs// yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra// 'jam dbyangs chen po'i sgra che ba
9a3(1 ka): 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa// nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid// yang dag
9a4(1 ka): mtha' ste yi ge med// stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste// zab cing rgya chen sgra sgrogs pa// chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan// chos kyi gaN+DI sgra bo che// mi gnas mya ngan
9a5(1 ka): 'das pa po// phyogs bcu'i chos kyi rnga bo che// gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste// sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes// gzugs rnams thams cad
9a6(1 ka): snang ba'i dpal// gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po// tshugs pa med cing che bar grags// khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste// 'phags lam shin tu mthol
9a7(1 ka): gnas// dar pa chen po chos kyi rtog/ 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig/ gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ sum cucu gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// sdug
9a8(1 ka): gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te// 'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med// mgon skyob 'jig rten ming gcugs pa// skyangs
9b1(1 ka): dang skyob pa bla na med// nam mkha'i mtha' klas longs spyod pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// srid pa'i dra ba 'dzes
9b2(1 ka): pa po// nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol byin// ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyan du thogs// sdug
9b3(1 ka): bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi// gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob// sgrib pa kun las nges par grol// mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas//
9b4(1 ka): nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po// sems can kun gyi blo chen po// yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod// nyon mongs kun
9b5(1 ka): las rnam grol ba// nam mkha'i mtha' la rab gnas pa// yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang // khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi bdag/ dpag bsam shing chen rgyas
9b6(1 ka): pa ste/ bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog byed pa sems can kun don byed// phan 'dod sems can mnyes gshin pa// bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la/
9b7(1 ka): khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan// dus shes sems can dbang po shes// rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po// yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes// chos shes
9b8(1 ka): bkra shis bkra shis 'byung // bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// grags pa'i bkra shis sran grags dge/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che// dga' chen rol mo
10a1(1 ka): chen po ste// bkur bsti rim gro phun sum tshogs// mchog tu dga' bri grags bdag dpal// mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste/
10a2(1 ka): skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os// 'jigs chen dgra ste rab kyi mchog/ 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po// gtsug phung phung bu lcang lo can// ral pa mun dza cod
10a3(1 ka): pan thogs// gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan// zur phud lnga pa me tog thod// mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po pa// tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog/
10a4(1 ka): dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che// gtsang gnas dam pa go'u tam// bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes// mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob// grol ba thar
10a5(1 ka): pa rnam grol lus// rnam grol zhi ba zhi pa nyid// mya ngan 'das zhi mya ngan 'das// legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye// bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa// chags
10a6(1 ka): bral lus las 'das pa po// thub pa med pa dpe med pa// mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min// mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po// phra zhing zag med sa bon bral//
10a7(1 ka): rdul med rdul bral dri ma med// nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa// shin tu sad pa sad pa'i bdag/ kun shes kun rig dam pa po// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid
10a8(1 ka): 'das// ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa// sangs rgyas thog ma mtha' ma med//
10b1(1 ka): dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi dbang phyug smrab che// smra ba'i skyes
10b2(1 ka): mchog smra ba'i rgyal// smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas// smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med// kun tu lta ba mchog tu dga'// gzi brjid 'phreng ba lta na sdug
10b3(1 ka): 'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u// lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po// sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste// zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med// sman rnams ma lus ljon po'i shing /
10b4(1 ka): nad do cog gi sgra che ba// sdug gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog/ dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par// chos kyi
10b5(1 ka): rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs// 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste// byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan pad ma gar gyi bdag/ khyab
10b6(1 ka): bdag chen po rin chen gdugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan
10b7(1 ka): pa gcig/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal// rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste// 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje// sangs rgyas kun
10b8(1 ka): gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin// rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri
11a1(1 ka): med 'od// chags bral la sogs chags pa che// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs/
11a2(1 ka): rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa// dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad ma skyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa// rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang // che ba sangs
11a3(1 ka): rgyas rig sngags rgyal// rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag/ theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod// mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos// rdo rje zab
11a4(1 ka): mo 'dzin 'jig/ rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig/ pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa// sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan// rnam par dag pa bdag med chos// yang dag ye/
11a5(1 ka): shes zla 'od bzang // brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog/ rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan// ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang // kun tu/
11a6(1 ka): bzang po blo gros bzang // sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang // dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin
11a7(1 ka): mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin// skye med chos te sna tshogs don// chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba// shes rab chen pos skacig la// chos kun khong du chud/
11a8(1 ka): pa 'chang // chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste// thub pa blo mchog 'byung ba'i mtha'// mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang /
11b1(1 ka): sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa// ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal// 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba// mgon po sems/
11b2(1 ka): can kun gyi mchog/ sems can thams cad rab grol byed// nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba// mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms// blo ldan sgeg
11b3(1 ka): 'chang dpal dang ldan// brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba// lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing // goms pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa// dpal ldan lag pa
11b4(1 ka): brgyas gang la// nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa// sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi yi khyon// rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon// rkang mtheb sen me'i khyon gyis
11b5(1 ka): kyang // tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon// don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don// dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med// rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can// sems
11b6(1 ka): dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan// dngos don ma lus rnams la dga'// stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo// srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs spangs pa// srid gsum
11b7(1 ka): dga' ba chen po pa// sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar// 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od// nyi ma 'char ga'i dkyil ltar mdzes// sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dam
11b8(1 ka): cod pan bzang po mthon ga'i rtse// sku mchog mthon ga chen po can// nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan// 'jig rten kham/
12a1(1 ka): brgya kun bskyod pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan// de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang // dran pa bzhi po'i ting 'dzin rgyal// byang
12a2(1 ka): chub yan lag me tog spos// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho// lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig/ yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa// sems can
12a3(1 ka): kun la shas cher chags// nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med// sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug/ sems can gyi yid ltar mgyogs// sems can
12a4(1 ka): kun gyi dbang don shes// sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa// phung po lnga don de nyid shes// rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba// nges 'byung kun gyi mtha'
12a5(1 ka): la gnas// nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas// nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas// nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa// yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa
12a6(1 ka): bton// dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang // bden bzhi tshul gyi rnam pa can// shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang // bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis
12a7(1 ka): ldan// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig/ rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa// rnam pa sangs rgyas kun rig mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku// bye ba
12a8(1 ka): dpag med 'gyed pa po// skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs// sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// 'gro
12b1(1 ka): ba'i don la rtogs pa po// theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// nyon mongs khams dag pa'i bdag/ las kyi
12b2(1 ka): khams rnams zad byed pa// chu bo rgya mtsho kun las brgal// sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba// nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs// bag chags bcas pa gtan
12b3(1 ka): spangs pa// snying rje chen po'i shes rab thabs// don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa// 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing // rnam shes don ni 'gag par byed// sems ca/
12b4(1 ka): kun yid yul dang ldan// sems can kun gyi yid rig pa// sems can kun gyi yid la gnas// de dag sems dang mthun par byed// sems can kun yid tshim par/
12b5(1 ka): byed// sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba// grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul pa med// nor pa thams cad rnam par spangs// don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo// kun don yon
12b6(1 ka): tan gsum gyi bdag phung po lnga don dus gsum du// skad cig thams cad bye brag byed// skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin
12b7(1 ka): 'chang // lus med lus de lus kyi mchog/ lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa po// gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun tu ston// nor bu chen po rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas kun
12b8(1 ka): gyi rtogs bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// gsang sngags las byung yi ge med// gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa// gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po//
13a1(1 ka): thig le chen po yi ge med// stong pa chen po yi ge lnga// thig le stong pa yi ge brgya// rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med// bcu drug phyed phyed
13a2(1 ka): thig le 'chang // yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo can// bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing // ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rigs
13a3(1 ka): pa ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog/ longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal// sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba// phyogs
13a4(1 ka): bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed// ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa// lha dang lha dbang lha yi lha// lha yi dbang po lha min bdag/ 'chi med dbang po lha yi bla// 'joms
13a5(1 ka): byed 'joms byed dbang phyug po// srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba// ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla// 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa// chos kyi sbyin bdag
13a6(1 ka): che ba po// byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste// snying rje yi ni ya lang bgos// shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel// dpa' bo
13a7(1 ka): bdud dgra bdud btul ba// bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed// bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren// mchod
13a8(1 ka): 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas// rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os// bkur 'os bstod pa bya ba'i mchog/ phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab// 'jig rten gsum po gom
13b1(1 ka): gcig bgrod// mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon// gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste// mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
13b2(1 ka): dpa' che// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// shes rab kyi ni de nyid thob// bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa// kun la
13b3(1 ka): phan pa'i gang zag mchog/ dper bya kun las 'das pa ste// shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog/ gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste// phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa//
13b4(1 ka): 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog/ nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi// don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal// 'jig rten gsum na skal bzang che// dpal
13b5(1 ka): ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud// stong nyid las byung
13b6(1 ka): khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas dges pa khyod
13b7(1 ka): la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas bzhad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod
13b8(1 ka): la 'dud// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// med pa las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dug/
14a1(1 ka): ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol sngon khyod la 'dud// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud//
14a2(1 ka): ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ oM sarba d+harmA a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud d+ha badz+ra tsak+Shu a A aM aHpra kr-i ti pa ri shud d+ha/ sarba d+harmA ya tu ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA/
14a3(1 ka): ya many+dzu shrI pa ri shud d+hi ta mu pA dA ye ti/ a AHsarba ta thA ga ta hrid ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na mur ti bA gI shwa ra ma hA pA tsa sarba d+harmA ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud
14a4(1 ka): d+ha/ d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a/ de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar// mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdzogs sa
14a5(1 ka): rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// de nas mgon po gsang ba'i bdag/ lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal// sna tshogs gzhan dang lhan cig tu// gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol/
14a6(1 ka): mgon po bdag cag yi rang ngo // legs so legs so legs par gsungs// rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi// 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni// bdag cag yang
14a7(1 ka): dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa// 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam// zab cing yang la rgya che ste// don chen 'gro/
14a8(1 ka): ba'i don byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don
14b1(1 ka): dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsungs pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrid+d+ha ka ra warma dang /
14b2(1 ka): ka ma la gu p+ta dang / chu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos sgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa'o// /
14b3(1 ka): xxx
14b4(1 ka): dam pa'i mtshan yang da/
14b5(1 ka): rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na na ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/
14b6(1 ka): ka ma la gup+ta dang /
14b7(1 ka): pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
14b8(1 ka): mas cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
14b9(1 ka): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
14b10(1 ka): ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom
14b11(1 ka): des kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten
1a1(2 kha): la ston paphyi zlog pa zhes bya ba zag pa me pa tshan chu 'azhugs so//
1b1(2 kha): gzhon sri dang / dar ma'i sri de/ zla ba'i snyi dang / zhag sri dang / zluma'i skye dang / skag 'dun zur dang /
1b2(2 kha): 'phag dang / rkyen bzhi khri chig stong dang / ltos ngan pa brgyad bcu rtsa gcig gi gnod pa thams cad dang / ma rungs pa dang
1b3(2 kha): dpa' 'gyur cig/ zlog par gyur cig/ sbyar bar gyur cig srung bar gyur cig/ phub par gyur cig / de ltar brjod pa'i yon tan bsamarmi
1b4(2 kha): yod nad las grol bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/
1b5(2 kha): byang du mngan par 'ashad do// kra tsu gsum pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// ma
2a1(2 kha): gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
2a2(2 kha): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa gzi
2a3(2 kha): brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// tshe 'dzin cing che mthar phyin par bzhed de/ sems can rnams la chos
2a4(2 kha): kyang ston to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams ni che thung ba lo
2a5(2 kha): brgya thub pa sha stag ste/ de dag las kyang phal cher ni dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan to// 'jam dpal sems
2a6(2 kha): can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags par gyur pa yongs su
2b1(2 kha): brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ ming tsam nyan tam/ klog pa nas
2b2(2 kha): glegs bam la bris te/ khyim na 'chang gi bar du byed dam/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma rnams
2b3(2 kha): kyis mchod par 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa las slar yang tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal sems can
2b4(2 kha): gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa thos par gyur pa de
2b5(2 kha): dag gi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag tshe yongs su zad kar mtshan 'chang bar gyur pa de dag gi tshe
2b6(2 kha): yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag tshe ring por 'dod pas
2b7(2 kha): tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan nam/ yi ger 'bre 'bri 'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/
3a1(2 kha): klog par gyur pa de dag gi yon tan dang legs par gyur pa ni 'di dag go// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/
3a2(2 kha): a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+dza na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myak+kha bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA bu
3a3(2 kha): t+ye/ a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye dA na sam+b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba sa skAr pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi
3a4(2 kha): shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhig gi yi
3a5(2 kha): ger 'bri 'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang ngam// klog par gyur na tshe zad pa las tshe lo
3a6(2 kha): brgya thub par 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten
3a7(2 kha): gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyAn su'i ni
3b1(2 kha): tate dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+Sha bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye buN+ye ma hA puH/ a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri me ta praN+ye dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba sa swA
3b2(2 kha): ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis
3b3(2 kha): tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni ts+yai ta te dzo dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te samyak+ka bud+d+has
3b4(2 kha): tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye/ a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+ha wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa raM
3b5(2 kha): wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so//
3b6(2 kha): oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+d+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye/ a pa ri mi ta puN+ye
3b7(2 kha): a pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ro ba tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ yang de'i tshe sangs
3b8(2 kha): rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so// oM na mo/
4a1(2 kha): b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta a yur+d+ha na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye pur+g+ha
4a2(2 kha): ma hA puN+ye/ a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ro be tsi te/ oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wI shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re
4a3(2 kha): swA hA/ yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsung so//
4a4(2 kha): oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye/ a pa ri ta puN+ye
4a5(2 kha): a pa ri ma puN+ye d+hA na sam+b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba si skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga
4a6(2 kha): bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi
4a7(2 kha): nish+tsi ta te dze rA dza ya/ te thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM praN+ye puN+ye ma hA pud+d+he/ a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta praN+ye dz+nyA na sam b+hA ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba sa~M skAr
4a8(2 kha): pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA la bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis
4b1(2 kha): tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyAn su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tra ya/ aH te samyak+Sha bud+d+ha ya/
4b2(2 kha): tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye/ a ra mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/
4b3(2 kha): yang da sa sangs rgyas bye ba phragasum cun drug gling gongs pa gcig dang dbye sa gcig gis tshe dang mi shes dpag tu med pa'i mang sde 'di gsungs so/ yon mo gags
4b4(2 kha): pa ri mi ta A yur+d+han su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze ra dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM praN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye/ a pa ri mi ta pra N+ye sa pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyAnasaM b+hA ro pa tsi te/
4b5(2 kha): oM sarba saM skAr pa ri shud+d+had+harma te ga ga nas mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA ri swAhA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs
4b6(2 kha): gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta a yudz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyaH
4b7(2 kha): sam bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye/ a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta praN+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM ske ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he many+dza
4b8(2 kha): na ya pa ri wA re sahA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gang ga'i bye ma krung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med
5a1(2 kha): pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze ra dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arba te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/
5a2(2 kha): tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pe ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri
5a3(2 kha): wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri 'am/ yi ge re 'brir 'jug gam/ 'chang na tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par
5a4(2 kha): 'gyur ro// tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze ra dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/
5a5(2 kha): oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he mahA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/
5a6(2 kha): gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri 'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin
5a7(2 kha): rje'i 'jig rten du nam du yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// nam du yang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur te/ gang dang gang du skyes pa'i skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur
5a8(2 kha): ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta a yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dza ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta
5b1(2 kha): bu N+yes pa ri mi ta praN+ye dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shun+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ganyeswa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA ri swAhA/ gang lA la zhig gis tshe dang
5b2(2 kha): ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri 'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'brir 'acug par 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/
5b3(2 kha): a ri mi ta a yur+dz+nyA na su bi niSh+Thi ta te dze dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arba te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye praN+ye ma hA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta pur+the a pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyAn saM b+ha ro pa tsiH
5b4(2 kha): oM sarba saM skAr pa ri shun+ta d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/
5b5(2 kha): yi ger 'brir 'jug na des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong byed du bcug pa dang / rab tu gnas pa byas pa yin no// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi
5b6(2 kha): ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri
5b7(2 kha): shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri 'am/ 'brir 'jug na/ de'i/
5b8(2 kha): mtshams med pa lnga yang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni b+hi ta te dzo ra dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te samyak+saM bud+d+ha
6a1(2 kha): tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye.a pa ri mi ta pu N+yes pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud te sa
6a2(2 kha): b+ha wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri 'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de'i sdig pa'i phung po
6a3(2 kha): ri rab tsam yang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yud+d+ha su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM
6a4(2 kha): puN+ye buN+ye ma hA buN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye sa pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te oM sarba saM skAr pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/
6a5(2 kha): gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri 'am/ yi ger 'gror 'jug na/ de la bdud dang bdud kyi ros kyi lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin pos
6a6(2 kha): glags btsal kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/
6a7(2 kha): tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye a ri mi ta praN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA/
6a8(2 kha): re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri 'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa
6b1(2 kha): dgus mngon sum du lung ston par mdzad de/ sangs rgyas stong gis de la phyag rkyong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad
6b2(2 kha): par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang / som nyi dang / yid gnyis ma byed cig/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyAn su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/
6b3(2 kha): ar+tha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puHma hA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta praN+ye dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/ oM sarbaM sa skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa/
6b4(2 kha): b+hA b+hi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri 'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi
6b5(2 kha): de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbab byed par 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyAn su bI sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga
6b6(2 kha): tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye mahA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa muH/
6b7(2 kha): te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri 'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de de bzhin gshegs
6b8(2 kha): pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo raH
7a1(2 kha): ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aH te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puHdz+nyA na sa~M b+hA ro pa tsi te/ oM
7a2(2 kha): sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA we bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ sa phyogs gang du mdo sde dkon mchog 'di 'bri ba'i sa phyogs de yang mchod
7a3(2 kha): rten du 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i bya dang / ri dgas gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pas
7a4(2 kha): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/
7a5(2 kha): tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye mahA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puHa pa ri ma ta puN+ye dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skAr pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri
7a6(2 kha): wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri 'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de bud med kyi lus su nam du yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// /
7a7(2 kha): oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+d+ha na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a
7a8(2 kha): pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mun te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu
7b1(2 kha): med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir kar sha pa ni gcig sbyin pa byin na/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs
7b2(2 kha): su bkang ste sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ra mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+tha te sa mak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+yathA/
7b3(2 kha): oM pra N+ye bu rtse mad puN+ye a pa ri mi ta pu skyes pa ri mi ta prah+yed+hA na sa b+hA ro ba tsi te/ oM sarba sa skAr pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma theg gnas mun+ta te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he mahA na ya~M pa ri
7b4(2 kha): re swA hA/ gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba des/ dam pa'i chos mtha' dag la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// oM na mo d+ha
7b5(2 kha): ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+dza na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+Na te sa mak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye mahA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri
7b6(2 kha): mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
7b7(2 kha): pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad bskyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs dang / shAkya thub pa la sogs pa la/
7b8(2 kha): rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang
8a1(2 kha): bar mi nus so// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta a yudz+nyAn su bi ni shrI ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyakr-i bud+d+hA ya/
8a2(2 kha): tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye prad+d+he mahA pud+d+he a ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta pud+d+he dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA te ga ga~M na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri lI re
8a3(2 kha): swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rin po che'i phung po ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam spungs te/ sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ che dang ye shes
8a4(2 kha): dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta a yudz+nyA na su bi ni Sh+Thi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+tha te
8a5(2 kha): samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pun+d+he puN+ye ma hA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he
8a6(2 kha): ma hA na ya pe ri wA re swAhA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi chus yongs su gang ba'i thigs pa re re nas bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i
8a7(2 kha): bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so// oM na mo b+ha ga la te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyAn su bi ni b+hi ta te dzer dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an+ta te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/
8a8(2 kha): tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+yes pa ri mi ta pu sa pa ri mi ta puN+yedz+ra na saM b+ha ro la tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya/
8b1(2 kha): pa ri wA re swAhA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdze rje 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ sti stang du byas te/ mchod pa byas par/
8b2(2 kha): 'gyur ba des phyogs bcu'i zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa yin no// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a
8b3(2 kha): pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye mahA puN+ye a ri mi ta puN+ye a pa ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na sa
8b4(2 kha): b+hA ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/
8b5(2 kha): mi yi steng sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// tshul khrims stobs kyi sangs rgyas
8b6(2 kha): yang dag 'phags// mi yi seng ge tshul khrims stobs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// bzod pa'i
8b7(2 kha): stobs kyi sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi yi seng ge bzod pa'i stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grag
8b8(2 kha): par 'gyur// brtson 'grus stobs kyi sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi yi seng ge brtson 'grus stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa/
9a1(2 kha): brtson 'grus stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// bsam gtan stobs kyi sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi yi seng ge bsam/
9a2(2 kha): gtan stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// bsam gtan stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// shes rab stobs kyi sangs rgyas yang
9a3(2 kha): dag 'phags// mi yi seng ge shes rab stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ oM na
9a4(2 kha): mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ra mi ta a yudz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya// ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye a pa ri ma ta puN+ye a pa
9a5(2 kha): ri mi ta puN+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM serba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
9a6(2 kha): bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
9a7(2 kha): rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la bangon par bstod do// 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs
9a8(2 kha): so// / 'di la 'gyur khyad 'phran du yong gi 'dug na'ang / 'dir rje btsun thams cad mkhyen pa ta ra nA tha'i zhal snga nas/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i
9b1(2 kha): pa TI ka mdzan dgongs pa dang mthun pa nyid dga' ldan phun che shes gling du bar du sgrubs pa lags so// 'di la brten nas bdag gzhan skye dgu mtha' dag 'chi ba med
9b2(2 kha): pa che'i dpal la dbang thob par gyur cig// zhus dag/ sarba mang+ga /
1a1(3 kha): 'chi med rnga smra zhes bya ba'i gzungs mdo bzhug so//
1b1(3 kha): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na hri da ya na ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags
1b2(3 kha): pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
1b3(3 kha): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang+ga tas bskor ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na/
1b4(3 kha): dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/
1b5(3 kha): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
1b6(3 kha): bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di nas nub kyi phyogs rol na/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten
1b7(3 kha): khams// de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med// su zhig de yi mtshan brjod na// de/
2a1(3 kha): ni de ru skye bar 'gyur// 'chi ba'i dus su ston pa ni// dge slong dge 'dun bcas te mthong // de na bud
2a2(3 kha): med yod pa min// mngal na gnas pa yod ma yin// rin chen rnams kyi pad+mo las// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'byung bar 'gyur//
2a3(3 kha): zas dang gos dang sman rnams dang // chos gos mal cha lhung bzed rnams// sems kyis bsam ma thag tu ni// de dag mod la
2a4(3 kha): 'byung bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// bde ba can gyi bsngags pa brjod// de ltar sangs rgyas bas
2a5(3 kha): mi khyab// sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsam mi khyab// bsam mi khyab la dang byas nas/
2a6(3 kha): rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab// rnam dag zhing du skye bar 'gyur// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
2a7(3 kha): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi pho brang 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i rgyar dpag tshad khri yod pa zhig yod de/ rgyal
2b1(3 kha): rigs su skyes so// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che dpag med kyi yab ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang
2b2(3 kha): po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to// de'i yum ni gzi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i btsun mo ni rgyal rigs bzang skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bzhin
2b3(3 kha): gshegs pa che dpag med kyi sras ni zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to// rim gro pa snyan pa dri ma med ces bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med kyi
2b4(3 kha): shes rab can gyi mchog tu gyur pa ni/ bzang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to// rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog ni bkod pa
2b5(3 kha): chen po zhes bya'o// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi bdud ni mchod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to// lha sbyin gyi ming ni dang ba zhes bya bar gyur to//
2b6(3 kha): dge slong de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po ni nyan thos chen po drug khri yod do// dge slong dag sems can thams cad kyis legs par bsams
2b7(3 kha): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mtshan legs par bzung la/ zhag bcur sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la ma yengs par bsgom zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde
2b8(3 kha): ba can na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med rgyun du yid la bya'o// dpal 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang rtag tu bzlas brjod bya'o// nyin lan
3a1(3 kha): gsum mtshan lan gsum yan lag lngas phyag byas la/ sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag byA sa mra na/ zhag bcu 'das
3a2(3 kha): pa'i dus pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcun bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//
3a3(3 kha): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du yongs su bsngos na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mdun na bzhugs par 'gyuraro//
3a4(3 kha): de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ sha ba
3a5(3 kha): le/ a ba le/ sa ma dza le/ ni rde she/ nir dza te/ nir ruk+te/ nir mu khe/ dz+wa la pa rats+tshe da ni/ su kha ba ti nir de she/ a mr-i te/ a yur gar+b+ha nir hA ni/ a mr-i te/ A yur pra sA d+ha ni/ nir
3a6(3 kha): bud+d+ha A kA sha nir dza te/ A kA sha nir de she/ A kA sha nir ku sha le/ A kA sha nir dar sha ne/ A kA sha a d+hiSh+Tha ne/ rU pa nir de she/ tsa tA ri d+har+m+ma pra sA d+ha ne/ tsa tA ri Ar+ya sat+ya pra sA d+ha ne/
3a7(3 kha): tsa tA ri mAn b+ha ba na pra sA d+ha ne/ ba la bIr+ya pra sA d+ha ni/ d+har+m+ma ts+tshed ne/ ku sha le/ ku sha le nir de she/ ku sha la pra tiSh+Tha ne/ bud+d+ha ku sha le/ bi bud+d+ha pra b+hA sa/ d+har+m+ma ka ra Ne/ nir dza te/ nir bud+d+he
3a8(3 kha): bi ma le/ bir dze/ rA dza sen/ ra sa rba/ ras gra ba la/ ra swa rba/ a d+hiShAn/ ku le pra te ku le/ bi ku le/ da te su de ta tsita te/ su pra shan+ta tsiT+Ti/ su pra tiSh+Tha taM/ su le su mu'i/ d+har+theH
3b1(3 kha): me ba le ba le/ a nu sha a ba le/ a nu sha a ba le/ bud+d+ha A kA sha gu Ne bud+d+ha/ A kA sha nir gu Ne/ a mr-i ta dun du b+hiHsa re sA hA/ dge slong dag dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigra
3b2(3 kha): kyi bu mo gang la la 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skad bsten pa de bzhin du kha bton byed pa des/ gos gtsang ma bgos te sa phyogs gtsang zhing dri med phra
3b3(3 kha): de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la me tog dang spos kyis mchod par bya'o// byang chub kyi snying po pad+ma'i gnas dang / byang chub kyi shing phun sum tshogs pa yang yid la/
3b4(3 kha): bya'o// de la yang 'dod pa bskyed par byas te/ 'dod pa dang dad pa byas na de bzhin gshegs che dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// dge slong
3b5(3 kha): dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shing gi rgyal po ni rin po che'i pad+ma rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba shing de me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'o// pad+ma'i
3b6(3 kha): gdan ni dag cing gsal la bzang zhing bkra ba'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba ste/ rin po che du mas bskor ba la de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med bzhugs so// g.yas
3b7(3 kha): na ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// g.yon na ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tsho gas grangs med pa
3b8(3 kha): bskor to// dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mos pa dang dad pa dang gus pa mang ba der skye bar 'gyur te/ gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la rin po che
4a1(3 kha): sna bdun gyi pad+ma chen po dag la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma gang la
4a2(3 kha): la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i mtshan yang dag par 'dzin pa de la/ me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / chu'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / dug gi 'jin
