3b4(28 za): yang mchod ston gsol nas yon yang phul te legs par mchod nas che ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig/ 'di kho nas bde 'gro mtho ras kyi 'ji
3b5(28 za): rten du skye bar gyur cig/ ces kyang shes par byas na/ de kho na bzhin du skyes nas lus kyang ston cing legs so zhes bya ba yang byin nas mi snang bar
3b6(28 za): gyur to// 'tshams med pa lnga byed byed pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ 'phags pa la bskur pa btab pa yang rung ste 'chi kar rtsig pa
3b7(28 za): la gzungs sngags 'di bris pa mthong na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur na/ 'don pa dang bzlas brjod byas na lta ci smos/ de bzhin
3b8(28 za): gshegs pa de nyid byon nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu tshur nga'i gan du shog ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
4a1(28 za): rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
4a2(28 za): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kany+tsan ba ti na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa g.yul las rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bcwa
4a3(28 za): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lhas ma lta bu
4a4(28 za): na/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
4a5(28 za): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
4a6(28 za): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das g.yul ngor mchis te g.yul 'gyed na/ lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang / rig sngags rnams dang / gsang sngags dang /
4a7(28 za): sman dag gis pham par gyur na/ mkhyen legs sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rjes su gzung ba dang / bdag cag la thugs brtse ba dang / lnga
4a8(28 za): ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rab tu gzhom pa dang / rab tu gzhig pa'i slad du rnam par rgyal ba'i gsang
4b1(28 za): sngags chen po legs par bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smra so// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no//
4b2(28 za): lha ma yin dang g.yul sprad pa na/ rig sngags rnams dang / gsang sngags rnams dang / sman rnams kyis pham pa de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka snying brtse ba'i
4b3(28 za): phyir rig sngags brjod par bya ste/ sgyu thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad bzlog pa/ gsang sngags thams cad rengs par byed pa/
4b4(28 za): 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'tshangs 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ gsang sngags dang / sman thams
4b5(28 za): cad gcod pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can bka' stsal pa/ gang bskal pa grangs
4b6(28 za): med pa gsum du/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu dang gcer bu pa rnams kyis ngan song du bsams shing / bar chad du byas pa las/
4b7(28 za): de tshun chad sgyu dang ldan pa rnams kyis rig sngags 'chang thams cad bzlog nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ gzhan mu
4b8(28 za): stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tshe ba rnams kyi sgyu dang / rig sngags dang / sman dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rang
5a1(28 za): tu 'joms pa'i rig pa chen po de ngas bshad par bya ste/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/
5a2(28 za): gsang sngags chen mo rnam par rgyal ba chen mo gzung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan
5a3(28 za): 'das kyis ltar mnyan pa dang / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa de'i tshe/ rig sngags chen mo gser can 'di dag bka' stsal to//
5a4(28 za): tad+ya thA/ o tsaM li hri li ni/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ hi ni d+hI ni/ ni ti bi ni/ kAn tsi ba ti/ lo ka mA ti/ b+hA te b+h+ya
5a5(28 za): gu ta man tra/ a ti kri ti be de be de/ da ta man tra/ a d+hi kri te/ ha na ha na/ ha sa ha sa/ tshin+ta tshin+ta/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dza ye bi dza ye/ dza ma b+ha ni/ stama?/
5a6(28 za): b+ha ni/ ban+d+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ oM mo g+ha sha ka ti d+ha nA ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kA TA ma ma na si/ dzam+b+ha ya/ dzam+b+ha ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ b+hAny+dza ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ ban+d+ha/
5a7(28 za): ban+d+ha/ mo ha ya/ mo ha ya/ lha'i sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgyu dang / srin pa'i sgra dang / nam mkha' lding gi skye dang / dri za'i sgyu dang / lha ma yin/
5a8(28 za): gyi sgra dang / mi 'am ci'i sgyu dang / sto 'phye chen po'i sgyu dang / rig sngags kyi sku dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i rgyal po'i sgyu dang / drang song gi sku/
5b1(28 za): dang / sems can rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi sku dang / 'byung po'i sgyu dang / sgyu thams cad/ ra la dza la/ rang dza rad dza/ d+hu ma d+hA ma/
5b2(28 za): d+hu ma/ rA ba rA ba/ ra ba Na tsakra nA ma/ grA na tha ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba bi d+ya/ shA dru'u nAn/ stam b+ha ya/ b+ha yuM stam b+ha ya/ ru r+yaM stam b+ha ya/ sau nan snyam/
5b3(28 za): b+ha ya/ bu ru Nan/ stam b+ha ya/ a ga na ni stam b+ha ya/ ud kan d+hi/ tid+hi ro/ d+ha ra Ni/ ba sha ha ste/ bi sh+tsa ya na ba she na/ gang dag bdag la phyir rgol/
5b4(28 za): ba rnams dang / dgra rnams dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'thab pa dang / rab tu 'thab pa dang / mi phan par
5b5(28 za): 'dod pa thams cad/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+han dza ya b+han dza ya/ stam b+ha ya/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ ma hA mo ha ni/ b+ha ga wa ti
5b6(28 za): sAhA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig/ ko 'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rgyal po 'am/
5b7(28 za): rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig gser can gyi rig sngags 'di rjes su dran par byed na/ de la pha rol gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / de'i sde de la pha rol
5b8(28 za): gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshug so// lhas ma yin/ klus ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/ srin pos ma yin/ dri zas ma yin/ lha ma yin gyis
6a1(28 za): ma yin/ nam mkha' lding gis ma yin/ mi 'am cis ma yin/ rig sngags 'chang gis ma yin/ mkha' 'gro mas ma
6a2(28 za): yin/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi
6a3(28 za): mi tshugs so// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyuraro// lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ lus la me dang / chu dang /
6a4(28 za): dug dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis mi tshugs so// gang gis sdig pa byas pa dang / byed du bcug pa dang / rjes su
6a5(28 za): yi rang ba de nyid la slar 'babs par 'gyur/ de nyid slar 'gro bar 'gyuraro// ko'u shi ka de ltar bas na dad pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
6a6(28 za): nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos rig sngags 'di chu la lan bdun bzlas te/ bdag gi lus la blugs na/ bdag gi lus
6a7(28 za): ma lus par bsrung bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / rig
6a8(28 za): sngags thams cad dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thams cad dang / byad thams cad las shin du 'das par 'dod pas/ gser can gyi rig sngags
6b1(28 za): 'di dran par bya'o// rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po pha rol gyi dpag tshogs gzhom pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'dul bar 'dod pas/ gser
6b2(28 za): can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par lan bdun bzlas te/ mdud pa bdun bor ba'i srad bu gdags par bya 'am/ chu la lan bdun bzlas pas bsrung bya'o//
6b3(28 za): 'jigs pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i gzungs 'di yi ger bris te/ 'chang bar mgul du gdags par bya'o// yi ger bris nas rgyal mtshan
6b4(28 za): gyi rtse mor bdags par bya'o// g.yul du zhugs pa na dge ba dang / bde bar thar par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'di'i stobs kyis nang mi dang /
6b5(28 za): g.yog 'khor dang / sde dang bcas te dge ba dang bde bar rgal bar 'gyuraro// ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par 'gyu ro// rig sngags rengs par byed
6b6(28 za): pas/ srad bu dkar po la lan bdun nga bzlas te/ mdud pa bdun bor na/ bcing ba dang rengs par byas par 'gyur ro// skya rengs par byed 'dod pas/
6b7(28 za): dur khrod kyi sa la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na skya rengs par byed par 'gyur ro// 'gyed pa'i tshe kha lkugs par byed pas theg le la lan bdun du bzlas te/
6b8(28 za): 'chos na/ sba ba thams cad la lan thebs par 'gyur ro// bklag par bya/ kha ton du bya/ brjod par bya ste/ chus bdag bsrungs/ brjod pa tsam gyis
7a1(28 za): sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gang gis byas par gyur pa dang / gang gis bsams par gyur pa nyid la
7a2(28 za): slar 'gro'o// srad bu la btags sam/ chus bdag bsrungs par byas nas de'i lus la rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thams
7a3(28 za): cad kyis mi tshugs so// ma grub pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// de thams cad kyang mthun par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
7a4(28 za): bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
7a5(28 za): 'phags pa g.yul las rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// nus dag
1a1(29 'a): !// lus ngag yid gsum bcings pa las grol bar byed pa'i gzungs bzhug so// /
1b1(29 'a): rgya gar skad du/ ka ya ba ki tsi pri tastam+b+ha na bi dza yA d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ lus ngag yid gsum
1b2(29 'a): bcings pa las rab tu rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
1b3(29 'a): rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i gnas su/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ kye btsun pa bcom ldan
1b4(29 'a): 'das khyed ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gtso'o// lha ma yin gyis bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum bcings pa las dgrol du gsol/
1b5(29 'a): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brgya byin khyod kyis ngal gang dag zhu ba de legs so// de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid
1b6(29 'a): la gzungs te/ 'di nyid la nan tan du gyis shig/ gang dag lus ngag yid gsum mnan pa dang bcings pa de la ni nam yang bde ba'i skabs
1b7(29 'a): mi 'byung bas/ rig sngags 'di'i mthu dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi nus pa dang las tshogs gnyis las byung ba'i 'bras bu thams cad
2a1(29 'a): nyams par bya ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi yon tan dang / bsod nams dang / bde ba'i 'bras bu nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur
2a2(29 'a): te/ 'di ltar nyi ma'i 'od zer phun sum tshogs par gyur kyang / sprin gyi dbang du byas pa bzhin no// de bas na lus ngag yid gsum bcings pa las grol bar byed
2a3(29 'a): pa'i thabs la brtson par bya'o// de ltar byas na bcings pa 'am mnan pa las grol bar 'gyur te/ sgron me'i 'od kyis mun pa sel ba 'am/ me lce'i nus pas nas
2a4(29 'a): thams cad sreg pa 'am/ seng ge'i skad kyis ri dgas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa bzhin du/ rig sngags chen mo 'di'i byin rlabs kyis bcings pa thams cad las
2a5(29 'a): grol bar byed do// de'i go rim ni 'di yin no// oM hrIHbadz+ra dz+wa la sarba karma/ bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum byad du bcug pa dang / bcings pa dang / mnan pa dang /
2a6(29 'a): nus pa bshig pa thams cad khrol bar gyur cig/ oM badz+ra ts+tshin+d+rA ya ha he hUM phaT/ gzhan gyi sbyor ba ngan pa thams cad las bdag rgyal bar gyur cig/ oM ma ma sarba b+hi d+ha b+hing+ga/
2a7(29 'a): dza ye dza ye/ bi dza ye bi dza ye/ a dzi ta a pa ra dzi ta ye ma ma b+he s+t+ra pra mar+d+ha/ ha ye mam hUM phaT/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig sngags chen mo 'di gang dag bdag la sdang ba dang /
2a8(29 'a): log par sems pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ oM shan+ting+ka ri ni sem ma badz+ra/ dz+nyA na pra yats+tsha yaM/ ma ma b+hi d+ha ra ya/ ha ha he he hi bi hUh+na/ pra kar nas rba tsa la sarba badz+ra rak+Sha k+Sha
2a9(29 'a): phaT swA hA/ brgya byin gang dag rig sngags chen mo 'di'i phan yon ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo gang gis lus la 'chang ba de'i lus ngag yid gsum bcings pa las grol cing
2b1(29 'a): nus pa dang mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'di lus la 'chang ba de'i grib ma gang la phog pa 'am/ rlung gi rdzi phog pas kyang de'i lus ngag yid gsum bcings pa las grol
2b2(29 'a): bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo 'di grong khyer chen po'i dbus su rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ mthon po'i dbusu phyar na de'i grib ma phog pa 'am/ ser bu'i rdzi phog pa de'i
2b3(29 'a): bcings pa yang grol bar 'gyur ro// khron pa 'am/ chu mig gam/ lu ma 'am/ 'bab chu 'am/ lteng ka 'am/ mtshe'u'i chu nang du yi ge 'am/ 'khor lo'i gzugs 'chang bar bya/
2b4(29 'a): la/ chu de dag 'thung ba rnaMs kyang bcing pa thams cad las grol bar byed// sgo khang gi ya them la btag pa 'am/ bsil gdugs kyi 'og gam/ zhwa'i nang ngam/ gos kyi gong pa la
2b5(29 'a): btag pa de'i 'og tu 'dug na yang bcing pa las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ro// de'i phyir rig sngags chen mo 'di khyod kyis gzung bar bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kye ston
2b6(29 'a): pa bcom ldan 'das// rig pa'i rgyal po gzi brjid can// kun la phan phyir leg par gsung // rig sngag mchog la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhes bstod // brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor
2b7(29 'a): thas cad yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// lus ngag yid gsum bcing pa las grol bar byed pa zhe bya ba'i gzung rdzogs so//
2b8(29 'a): rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba shAkya ye shes kyis mang yul byam sprin gyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// // mang+ga laM/ zhus da/
1a1(30 ya): 'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba bzhugs so// /
1b1(30 ya): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dza ya ba ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes
1b2(30 ya): bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
1b3(30 ya): pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
1b4(30 ya): chen po dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la
1b5(30 ya): der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
1b6(30 ya): gsol to// sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / mi'i rgyal po rnams
1b7(30 ya): la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
2a1(30 ya): rgyas kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom/
2a2(30 ya): ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba
2a3(30 ya): can bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
2a4(30 ya): 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang snying brtse ba'i
2a5(30 ya): phyir nga yang da ltar 'chad pa 'di zung zhig/ tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ya ba ti ye/ b+hUd ya a d+hiSh+Thi te d+harma a pa
2a6(30 ya): b+ha sa ni bud d+ha a d+hi ka me/ dz+nyA na a ba b+ha se swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur
2a7(30 ya): ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams te/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur po'i tshig 'di dag gang
2b1(30 ya): gi lus la btags sam/ glegs bam la bris pa de'i lus dpag tshad stong tshun chad du phyir rgol ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshon dang /
2b2(30 ya): dug dang / dbyig dug gis mi tshugs so// rgyal po de'i yul der pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo // phyir rgol ba dag yul 'khor der mthus gnod par mi
2b3(30 ya): 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di yi ger bris te 'chang ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de'i
2b4(30 ya): lus la mtshon dang / dug dang / chu dang / rims dang / dug sbyar ma gzhan gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang mtho mtshas
2b5(30 ya): pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / 'thab mo'i nang du song yang de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi
2b6(30 ya): phog/ thams cad du yang nga rgyal ba smra bar 'gyur/ gnod pa med cing ma snang la ma smras par rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i mthu dang / gzi brjid
2b7(30 ya): dang / stobs dang / byin gyis brlabs kyis rgyal bar 'gyuraro// tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza yod ta mi/ d+harma a ba ba b+ha sa ni/ bud d+hA bud d+ha bud d+ha/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bo d+ha
2b8(30 ya): ni bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a ba ro ha ni/ oM ro bya ni/ dza ya ku su ma sA res rab ti/ driHdri b+he dri r+Ne/ dri d+ha pa shwa ra bi d+he/ oM ha ni ma nyan/
3a1(30 ya): dzam+b+ha ni/ staM \u0f7f ni/ sta~M b+hi ta/ sarba a hi teShi Nan/ na mo b+ha ga wa ti/ bud d+ha s+ya/ ma hA ka ru NaM/ sid d+h+yan+ta man+ta pa dai swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan
3a2(30 ya): 'das la gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis//
3a3(30 ya): bdag gis rig sngags kyis rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya dza ya/ pa Ta pa Ta bkra/
3a4(30 ya): dza la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ badz+ra prA ha ra/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra hA ra ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/ dza ya ku su me/ ba la ba la/ tsakra tsakra/ pI Da ya pI Sha
3a5(30 ya): a kra ma/ a kra ma/ bi kra me/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ kha ga tsa ri nI/ ni la ba ti/ badz+ra pra hA ra Ni/ badz+ra saM b+ha be/ badz+ra ka ya/ bud d+ha a d+hi a d+hiSh+Thi te/ bud d+ha raSh+mi
3a6(30 ya): ma hA pra d+he/ ud tsa gan+d+he/ mahA te dza ba ti/ ma tsa le/ ba tsa le/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/ ka ka kang re/ kA si ni/ sa mA hi te/ d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ g+ha g+ha De/ badz+ra
3a7(30 ya): mA lA d+ha ri/ sa ra sa ra/ ka la ba Da ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa ste/ su zhig rig
3a8(30 ya): sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'khus par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ lha 'am/ gnod sbyin
3b1(30 ya): nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ shaM za 'am/ rjed byed dam/ gsod byed dam/ byad dam/ ro langs sam/ bkra mi shis pa 'am/ ma mo'i gdon tam/ []
3b2(30 ya): skem byed dam/ skem byed kyi gdon ta pa/ za ba'i gdon de dag thams cad rmugs par bgyi'o// rengs par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ badz+re badz+re badz+re ha na badz+re/ ni han
3b3(30 ya): badz+re/ Shad khAd/ badz+ra Ni/ swaT ya s+pha Ta ya s+phA rba ya/ badz+ra Ni/ hA ma hA ma dAm/ phaT phaT phaT/ gras gras gra sa/ pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bdag dang /
3b4(30 ya): sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las srungs shig/
3b5(30 ya): dza ya ka rI/ dza yaM ku ru/ tA ra ta ra ta ra/ ma hA ta ra Ni/ ku Te ku Te ku Te/ badz+ra ku Te swAh+la/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na
3b6(30 ya): rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// lag na rdo rje sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir zhus pa
3b7(30 ya): yang legs so// lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i lag tu song ste/ lus la btags sam/ glegs bam du bris sam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer
3b8(30 ya): ram/ grong rdal laM/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang ngam/ 'chag sa na sprod par 'gyur ba der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas par
4a1(30 ya): grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul der bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gnod par mi
4a2(30 ya): 'gyur ro/ sa phyogs mi ngas mi 'byung ngo // dgra mi 'byung ngo // rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang
4a3(30 ya): lan cig der bsrung ngo // yongs su skyob po// yongs su 'dzin to// zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byed do// chad pa spong ngo // mtshon cha spong ngo // dug
4a4(30 ya): gsod do// mi 'dza' ba 'gog go// mtshams gcod do// sa bcing ngo // tad+ya thA/ ta pa ni ta pa ni/ pra ta pa ni/ d+hu ru me d+hu ru me/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu Sha
4a5(30 ya): su mu khe/ su mu khe/ swa la pra te/ sa mA hi te/ sa ma d+hi garbe/ ma na si/ phu ru pu ru pu ru/ d+hu ru bud d+ha/ mA na si ka swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshes
4a6(30 ya): pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o// gsang ba'i gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis
4a7(30 ya): brlabs pa'o// lag na rdo rje mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te/ 'chang ngam/ lus la btag
4a8(30 ya): te 'chang zhing de la spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/
4b1(30 ya): mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin phyi bzhin 'brang ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro//
4b2(30 ya): mi'i rgyal po de la phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do// mthus yul der 'jug pa dang / bge
4b3(30 ya): 'jug na yang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs sna tshogs brgya dang / bgegs sna tshogs stong byed par mi 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po gang
4b4(30 ya): dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du bskur bar bya'o// gang du g.yul ngong
4b5(30 ya): 'jug gam/ dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di mgul du btags te/ g.yul ngor zhugs na der rgyal po chen
4b6(30 ya): po rnam thos kyi bus pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de pham par byed par 'gyu ro// der ni rgyal bar byed par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal
4b7(30 ya): ba can 'odi su'i mgul du btags pa de rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i
4b8(30 ya): pho brang 'khor gang du gal te nad 'gro ba sna tshogs byung na/ cho ga dang / gtor ma dang / bum pa btung ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhi phyogs bzhir
5a1(30 ya): bzhag ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di klags na de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog
5a2(30 ya): dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'gro ba dang / mi ngas de rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
5a3(30 ya): la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di las lhag pa'i rig sngags ches stobs dang ldan pa 'am/ gzi brjid che ba
5a4(30 ya): 'am/ rdzu 'phrul che ba 'am/ mthu che ba gang yang ma mchis so// rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yul gang
5a5(30 ya): dag tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// tad+ya ba/ brjo brje brje/ a mr-i ta badz+re/ hu tA sha ni/ b+han dza b+han dza b+hen dza/
5a6(30 ya): b+han dza b+han dza/ staM b+ha ya/ sarba sa gra ha Na/ hu ma hu ma hu ma/ phaT pAT phaT/ g+hA sa g+has g+ha sa/ pa Ta paT pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ b+ha TA/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/
5a7(30 ya): d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/ dza la dza la dza la/ khu khru me/ khu khu me/ g+hi ri g+hi ri g+hi ri/ badz+ra ma nA si/ badz+re hu ti/ hu ti ru/ phu ru pu ru/ gra sa gras/ sarba a hi te/
5a8(30 ya): Shanan/ na b+hu ru Ne/ mu mu le/ badz+ra pra dI pa ni/ tsam le pra sAhA/ a yu pA la ni Tu tsu re swAt+ma/ dza ya~M dza ye dza ya/ dza ya sa~M b+ha b+ha swAhA/ dza yod ta me satwa/ dza
5b1(30 ya): ba re de swAhA/ dza ya la d+ha ne swAhA/ dza ya mA na si swAhA/ dza ya bi dza swA hA/ dza ya ta badz+ra ya swAhA/ badz+ra huta sha na ya swAhA/ a mo g+ha badz+ra ha sta ya swA hA/ de nas rgyal
5b2(30 ya): po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
5b3(30 ya): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsrung ba stsal bar bgyi/ yongs su sgrub pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / chad
5b4(30 ya): pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug dgum pa dang / mi 'dza' ba dgag pa dang / dus ma yin par 'gum pa dgag pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang /
5b5(30 ya): rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag 'khrug dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o// mtshams dgum par bgyi'o// tad+yaShA/
5b6(30 ya): dza ye dza ye dza/ mat+na dza ye/ mI lI mA na si/ d+he d+he dz+ye mu ru mu/ tu Tu tu Tu/ mu mu le/ mArga pa ti/ d+hu d+ha me/ be ga pre ga d+ha rit+ti/ ti dza ba ti/ bdag dang sems
5b7(30 ya): can thams cad 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das
5b8(30 ya): gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa byin gyis brlabs pa lags so// tad+ya thA/ bud d+he bung
6a1(30 ya): d+he bud d+he/ bud d+ha ba ti/ bud d+ha a ba b+ha sa ni/ d+ha ma ba ti/ sa mA hI te/ sa bA d+hi gar+b+he/ bud d+ha a ba b+he sa ni/ bud d+ha pa ri hi ra/ d+ha ra
6a2(30 ya): a ba b+ha sa ni swA hA/ su la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid pa de'i mgo sid d+ha ka'i 'bras bu bzhin du tshal ba bdun
6a3(30 ya): du 'gas so// su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod par bgyid dam/ yi ger 'dra 'am/ glegs bam la bris te
6a4(30 ya): grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor tam/ gtsug lag khang du 'jog na der bdag tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcwa
6a5(30 ya): shing / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'dzin pa de'i srad bzhin du 'brangs te bsrung bar bgyi'o// dpag tshad
6a6(30 ya): brgyad stong tshun chad mtshams dgum par bgyi'o// slar rgol ba dang / dgra dang g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'tshang 'bru ba dang / 'thab mo dang /
6a7(30 ya): 'gyed pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o// slar bzlog par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la legs so zhes bya
6a8(30 ya): ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so// sems can chen po khyod 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la bde ba dang /
6b1(30 ya): sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir zhus pa yang legs so// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di gang
6b2(30 ya): yongs su sgrub pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon dang / dug dang / byad dang / gsod byed dang / rims dang /
6b3(30 ya): gdon thams cad kyi mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o// lag na
6b4(30 ya): rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bzung zhig/ chongs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos
6b5(30 ya): rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na/ sems can drag shul can dang ldan pa/ shin tu mi bzad pa mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams dang / chos
6b6(30 ya): ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas yul 'khor skyong ba 'byung ba de'i tshe/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'dri
6b7(30 ya): sems can mi mnyam pa dang / sems can mi bzad pa de dag dang / spang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gyur/ tshar gcod par 'gyur/
6b8(30 ya): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas
7a1(30 ya): gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ phyag rgyas btab bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di ni lha thams cad kyis
7a2(30 ya): phyag byas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs
7a3(30 ya): 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod kyis de bzhin
7a4(30 ya): gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa rgyal ba can zhes bya bar yang zung
7a5(30 ya): zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu
7a6(30 ya): dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
7a7(30 ya): 'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// gsu sangamadal/
1a1(31 ra): dpal chen mo mdo bzhugs
1b1(31 ra): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA sh+tsa swA tra/ bod skad du/ dpal chen mo'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang /
1b2(31 ra): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhugs so// de
1b3(31 ra): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
1b4(31 ra): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug
1b5(31 ra): go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas/ 'phags pa spyan rasma dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka'
1b6(31 ra): stsal to// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang yang rung bas dpal chen mo'i ming bcu gnyis
1b7(31 ra): bo shes pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa de ni dbul ba bor te phyug por 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor
2a1(31 ra): 'dus pa thams cad kyis de ltar gyur cig ces kun nas gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen me'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
2a2(31 ra): po bka' stsal pa/ dpal ldan ma/ dpal dkris ma/ pad+ma'i 'phreng ba can/ nor gyi bdag mo// dkar mo// grags pa chen mo// pad+ma'i spyan/ byed pa mo// 'od chen
2a3(31 ra): mo// zas sbyin ma/ rin po che rab sbyin mo// dpal chen mo// snang ya ze na/ dzi ni gri ni/ sha shi na a lag shi ma na/ nA sha ya/ sid d+han tu man+ta pa de swA hA/ oM bigu
2a4(31 ra): ni ba ra su b+ha ge swA hA/ gang la la zhig dus gsum du 'don par byed na mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// skal pa bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur
2a5(31 ra): ro// 'byor pa zad mi shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de la thams cad kyis bu lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed de dga' bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro//
2a6(31 ra): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bklags na/ tshangs pas drag shul gyi las byas kyang mi tshugs la/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro// bcom
2a7(31 ra): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
2a8(31 ra): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dpal chen mo'i mdo rdzogs so// sangs rgyas phal po che la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo bud d+hA ya/ oM na mo bud d+ha sa/
2b1(31 ra): oM d+hun d+hun/ oM d+hun d+hun ma sAb ri ye swAhA/ pal chen gsung sngags pa dang mnyam par 'gyur ro// shungs
1a1(32 la): // 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa bzhug so// /
1b1(32 la): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya hi ra N+ya ba tI nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes
1b2(32 la): bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
1b3(32 la): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan na lwa ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma thams cad
1b4(32 la): kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thang
1b5(32 la): gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas la bka'
1b6(32 la): stsal pa/ legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin par mi 'dod
1b7(32 la): pa des/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ngo // ma thos so// ma myong ngo // gang
2a1(32 la): gis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / myong ba des gzungs
2a2(32 la): thob po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gis bsod
2a3(32 la): nams byas so zhes mi 'dzin/ bdag gis bsod nams ma yin pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba byas so zhes mi 'dzin to//
2a4(32 la): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs 'dzin par mi rtog
2a5(32 la): rnam par mi rtog go// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
2a6(32 la): byung ba'i rnams la dngos por ram/ mtshan nyid du mi rtog/ yongs su mi rtog ste/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyen med par ma yin/
2a7(32 la): 'gro bar ma yin/ 'gro ba med par ma yin/ 'chi 'phor ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ stong par ma yin/ mi stong par ma
2b1(32 la): yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma med par ma yin/ smon par ma yin/ smon pa med par ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ 'gag par ma yin no// legs
2b2(32 la): par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mtha' 'dis spyod pa de ni ye shes la gnas pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe ye shes la gnas par
2b3(32 la): gyur pa de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs len cing kun chub par
2b4(32 la): byed la 'dzin te don dang tshig 'bru yang yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro// yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshul khrims can yang yin te/ bden pa'i tshul
2b5(32 la): khrims dang / rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims can no// ma brtags bri chos can yin te/ bden pa'i chos dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos can no// gzhan gyis dri
2b6(32 la): la mi 'dzeg cing rang gi chos la zhugs so// sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba byas pa'o// rigs pa'i cho ga la zhugs pa'o// legs par gnas de ltar
2b7(32 la): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags so// mi 'chang ngo // mi 'grol lo// legs par gnas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
2b8(32 la): dpa' chen po mi chags mi 'chang / mi 'grol ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
3a1(32 la): ldan 'das rnams kyis rig sngags kyi ming gzhan gyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams kyis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'thob po// tad+ya thA/
3a2(32 la): ku Ti ku Ti ku tsa la/ e lA oM mi ri to/ ko thA la/ e re ri/ e mi ri Ni/ legs par gnas 'di dag ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming
3a3(32 la): gzhan no// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no// legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan
3a4(32 la): pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yum mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i don la mi
3a5(32 la): gnas/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i don la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dbyig dang ldan
3a6(32 la): pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs
3a7(32 la): med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin no// legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des byang chub
3a8(32 la): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes brnyes par byas/
3b1(32 la): bsnyen bkur byas/ mchod par byas so// bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do snyam du shes par bya'o// su zhig bsam pa gang gis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs
3b2(32 la): 'di 'dzin pa de la nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ shes rab 'dod pa la shes rab dang / gzungs 'dod pa la gzungs dang / dbyig 'dod pa la dbyig dang / zos
3b3(32 la): pa 'dod pa la thos pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la nyi ma shar kar 'bras sa lu'i chan dang 'o mar sbags te bza' /
3b4(32 la): sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ming gzhan dag rgyun du yid la bya'o// 'on kyang gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gi
3b5(32 la): mthus gang dag gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
3b6(32 la): gnod sbyin nam/ yi dgas sam/ grul bum maM/ sha za 'am/ mi 'am mi ma yin pa de dag de la sems dga' bar 'gyur ro// bar chad byed par mi 'gyur/ rtag
3b7(32 la): tu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bzang dang / yangs pa chen po dang /
3b8(32 la): lag na rdo rje dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / ri dben pa la gnas pa dang / gangs ri la gnas pas kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyuraro// 'og min gyi bar gyi byang/
4a1(32 la): chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste/ dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi mthus 'jigs pa 'am/ dgon par de la byin gyis rlob par
4a2(32 la): 'gyur/ de la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs shing / de skad ces bka' stsal
4a3(32 la): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
4a4(32 la): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod/ 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
4a5(32 la): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la
4a6(32 la): phab pa'o// zhus dag/ @##// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dzaM gu li nA ma 'di/ bod skad du/ 'phags
4a7(32 la): pa drug sel ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
4a8(32 la): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams
4b1(32 la): la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ gangs kyi ri'i byang ngos na// spos dad ldan pa'i ri bo la// ri rgyal de yi sul
4b2(32 la): gnas tshe// gzhon nu bsod nams brgya yi mtshan// e na ya yi pags gyon la// sbrul gyis brgyan pa'i ska rags can// gdug pa'i sbrul gyis mgo brgyan byas/
4b3(32 la): mthong na gdug pa'i rna rgyan can// drug gi me tog rnams za zhing // ma lu ta yi lcug khu 'thung // nga la de 'phong 'bod du 'jug/ bu khyod chur shog nga la nyon// ngas
4b4(32 la): dug sel ces bya ba// dug 'jig rig sngags dam pa yod// dug rnams gang yin de kun ni// nga yi ming gis 'jig par 'gyur// 'di lta ste/ oM e li mi t+te/
4b5(32 la): i li ti li mit+te/ dum+be/ dum+ba lI ye/ du se du sa la ye/ takle ta ka kar+Ne/ marme marmer te/ ka shwa re/ ka shwa ra mu ka te/ a g+ha na/ i li/ a li ye/ a khA
4b6(32 la): I li/ a ba aM ye/ shwe te she ta/ tun+te/ a na mu/ rak+te swA hA/ dge slong dag nga'i dug sel gyi rig sngags 'di ni/ sbyin pa thams cad dkar po ste/ sus rig
4b7(32 la): sngags 'di lan cig thos pa de la lo bdun gyi bar du sbrul gyis mi za'o// de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs so// sbrul gang zhig de la 'dzin pa des
4b8(32 la): mgo shing a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas so// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di sbrul gyi mdun du brjod par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
5a1(32 la): sbrul de 'chi ba'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste/ i la lA/ tsi la lI/ tsakra/ bsgo/ ko ta/ ko Te ta/ kur Takur Te ti/ s+phoT/ s+pho Te ti/
5a2(32 la): sarba ha re/ sarbaT TAn/ Tha ra te/ sAtsI/ Ats+tsha le/ cha le/ cha le/ bi ne/ shAt+te/ shIta/ ba ra ta le/ mA ta le/ ha le he le/ ha la ha la ha le/ i la la/
5a3(32 la): ke pa tsa le/ mi la laM/ tan Ti tan Ti/ taT ta Ta/ sU ta sU ta/ phaT phaT/ ha ra bi Sha swA hA/ dge slong dag de ltar na/ dug sel gyi 'byung po 'dus pa thams
5a4(32 la): cad la rig sngags gang brjod cing bsnyad pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin no// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin no// yang dag pa'o// bden pa'o// ma nor
5a5(32 la): ba'o// phyin ci ma log pa'o// dug 'di mi 'dug par gyur cig/ sbyin pa byed pa'i gan du song zhig/ 'dzin pa'i gan du song zhig/ me'i nang du song
5a6(32 la): zhig/ chu'i nang du song zhig/ thang la song zhig/ ka ba'i nang du song zhig/ rtsig pa'i gan du song zhig/ nam mkha' la song zhig/ sa'i nang du song zhig/ zhi
5a7(32 la): bar gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
5b1(32 la): bstod do// 'phags pa dug sel ces bya ba'i rig sngags rdzog/ @##// rgya kar skad du// sid+d+hi pI ti b+ha ga ban Ar+ya aM ku/
5b2(32 la): li nA ma bid+yA rI dz+nye/ bod skad du/ bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das pa 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal/
5b3(32 la): lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar dge slong rnams ri dri rgyal na gnas te/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
5b4(32 la): phyug kyang de na bzhugs te/ des bdag la smras pa/ bu sngags kyi tshig 'di nyon cig/ klu'i dbang po rnams kyi dug med par byed/ sbrul gyi dug med par byed// g.yon
5b5(32 la): rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / sems can stobs po che rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / sems can phra po rnams
5b6(32 la): dang / 'phra men pa dang / 'phra men ma dang / chu srin dang / stag dang / grul bumar can dang / mche ba can gyis de ltar sngags kyi tshig drag shul chen po aM ku li yang
5b7(32 la): dag par thos na sngags kyi gtso bo sems can gdug par bya 'jil bar byed pa ste/ sngags can gang gis de shes na lha rnams kyi gdug pa yang dag par med par byed/
5b8(32 la): do// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te Ar+ya aM gu li/ tad+ya thA/ oM klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ sbrul lam/ sbrul mo 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin po 'am/ 'byung po 'am/
6a1(32 la): 'byung mo 'am/ 'phra min pa'am/ 'phra men ma 'am/ gdug pas ma zin pa yang rung ste/ pha pha pa/ ta re he re ha re/ re dza re be shig
6a2(32 la): rmA ga re/ sarba re/ 1ra6 pa/ ma ra ma ra/ d+ha rad+har/ bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/ mar ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ mthum Ta/ moH ma/ mo rba ya/ ma Ta sa/
6a3(32 la): shI g+h+raM/ la g+hu la g+hu/ A na ya A na ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ban d+ha ban d+ha banaH/ g+hur+Na g+hur+Na/ g+hu pa ya g+hur+Na pa ya/ dpag tshad stong brgyad cun gnas pa'i klu rnas
6a4(32 la): kyi gdug pa med par mdzod cig/ klu thams cad chings shig/ gsod cig/ thar par mdzod cig/ oM hu lu hu lu/ ha la ha la/ ha la bi shaM/ bcom ldan 'das
6a5(32 la): ma grub ma'i rgyal mo oM gu la si bka' stsal pa/ ta ka ke Ta ka ke/ ta ka ke ni rbaka ke ni/ shi ra shi ra/ tsaN+Da ke sha ro hi ni/ bgegs thams cad sel bar mdzad pa
6a6(32 la): can/ las stong can/ bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa oM gu la ta thA bi ga ta/ klu mo'i tshogs sum cus mchod pa/ dza ya dza ya sid d+hi/ rgyal bar mdzad pa/ mi yi mgo
6a7(32 la): yi thod kyi 'phreng ba can/ hUM k+Sha skad cig thang cig yud tsam nyin par gyi bar du dug sel ba/ a su su ra de'i ta dang / ngan pa'i stobs 'joms par byed pa can/ bgegs
6a8(32 la): 'joms par byed pa can/ lha'i yum khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod swA hA/ sngags kyi tshig drag shul can sbrul gyi mdun du bklag par mi bya ste/ 'ching ba dang / klad pa bags
6b1(32 la): ging chal pa brgyar 'gyur ro// sngags kyi drag shul can chen mo sbrul gyis thos nas thams cad tshig par byed do// ma~M ka li ki li/ ma hA ki li/ kA la rU bi ni/
6b2(32 la): bgegs thams cad bzlog cig/ pa pham pha rol pham par mdzod cig swA hA/ bklags pas 'grub pa a gu la'i snying po dang bcas pa'o// tad+ya thA/ oM d+hu ne d+hu ne/
6b3(32 la): d+hu ni d+ha ni/ sat+ya/ sat+ya/ thA ha sa ni d+hu d+ha ni/ ban d+ha banad+ha/ rdo rje'i gzungs mang pos bka' stsal pa/ 'jog pa'i drug 'dor du 'jug la/ dza ya dza ya/ mu dza su dza/ mr-id
6b4(32 la): mr-i dza/ zong zhig/ grog dang rlung zhes bya ba mgyogs pa'i shugs can ro langs chen po bcom ldan 'das ma shAkya thub pa'i shal nas 'byung / mu ya mu tsi mu tsa swA hA/
6b5(32 la): bklags pas 'grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzogs so//
6b6(32 la): #/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba d+harma mA tr-i ka na ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs/
6b7(32 la): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/
6b8(32 la): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i gzungs/ nad
7a1(32 la): thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs te/ nga yang da ltar 'chad pa gzung zhig/ tad+yaH/
7a2(32 la): a brte/ a bar+Ne/ bi brti/ bi brte/ b+ha gA ma/ shud+d+he/ pra b+hA sa re/ ta ra Ne/ ug kha le/ mug kha le/ sarbad+har+m+mAHpA sha ba n+ye swAhA/ de nas gnas
7a3(32 la): ma'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang 'di'i snying po brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ a ts+tshe/
7a4(32 la): a na le/ e lu le/ a lu phe/ mur+Na a nu ga te/ sarba d+harma a d+hi pa ti ya prab+he/ dzA sA ka ra/ a d+hi ga ta dz+nyA ne/ bi shud+d+he pa ti swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de
7a5(32 la): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
7a6(32 la): par bstod do// chos thams cad kyi yu ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @##// rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya tsu DA ma Ni nA ma d+ha ra Ni/
7a7(32 la): bod skad du/ 'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs
7a8(32 la): rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
7b1(32 la): sangs rgyas zhes bya ba mtha' yas pa ma lus par khyab pa mchog tu rmad du byung zhing rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
7b2(32 la): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ phongs pa thams cad las yo
7b3(32 la): su skyob par mdzad pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar par mdzad pa/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa/ mi mthun pa dang /
7b4(32 la): rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / gshis ngan
7b5(32 la): du 'chi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / mu ge dang / mya ngan gyis 'jigs
7b6(32 la): pa thams cad bzlog par mdzad pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
7b7(32 la): chen po thams cad 'dun par mdzad pa/ dug dang / 'brum phran dang / thor bu dang / gshed byed dang / byad dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jig
7b8(32 la): par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gshed byed thams cad sel mdzad pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa nyid// nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel mdzad pa// bdag
8a1(32 la): gi bu dang tsha bo dang // g.yog 'khor rtag tu mang gyur pa// phyir bzlog pa ni brjod par bya// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed tshe//
8a2(32 la): brgya byin lha min rnams las pam// de nas ring pa khe nar ni// 'jig rten dbang gi drang song ste// de nas spong ni rab skrag nas// 'di skad kyis ni tshis
8a3(32 la): gsol to// lha min bdag pham 'jig rten dbang // ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi// 'jig rten dbang po bdag la ni// lha yis gzigs pas/
8a4(32 la): rtag tu gzigs// brgya byin gyi ni tshig gsan nas// dbang phyug gi ni 'di skad gsungs// lha yi dbang po nga la nyon// khyod la ngas ni bsrung ba byin//
8a5(32 la): lha'i dbang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten gyis rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag
8a6(32 la): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las/ ngas gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir bzlog pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye bas gsungs
8a7(32 la): pa'i gzungs so// mkhas pa gang gis rig sngags 'di// bris nas spyi bor 'dogs pa 'am// 'don tam 'on te klog na yang // de yi 'jigs pa kun med/
8a8(32 la): de rtag tu bsrung zhing sba ba dang // g.yul 'gyed pa ni rgyal bar byed// sdig dang rmi lam zhi ba dang // bsod nams bkra shis rab tu 'phel// lha yi dbang
8b1(32 la): po de bas na// gang zhig rgyal bar 'gyur 'dod pas// zis te spyi bor gdags par bya// yid la rtag tu dran par gyis// g.yul 'gyed 'ba' zhig ma
8b2(32 la): yin te// 'di ni rtag tu sdig pa 'phrog/ bud med rnams la bu pho bskyed// mngal na gnas pa yongs su skyong // phun sun tshogs pa thams cad byed//
8b3(32 la): sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig/ 'di ming phyir bzlog byed ces bya// yan lag rnams la phyir 'bab byed// lha'i dbang po phyir bzlog pa zhes bya ba/
8b4(32 la): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ lha ma yin thams cad pham par byed pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad
8b5(32 la): rab tu zhi bar byed pa gzung zhig sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
8b6(32 la): sangs rgyas bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM dza ya ka ri/ yud+d+ho ta
8b7(32 la): tA ra Ni bi tsa tra mu khi/ sarba mang+ga la d+ha ra Ni/ dza mu te sa ha sra b+hA dze/ sa ha sa ne twe/ sa ha sra shi re/ nA na laM ka ra/ bi b+hu Shi te/ ma Ni kuN+Da la san nA ha san nA da ngi
8b8(32 la): tsi tra mau/ li d+ha re/ tsan+d+ra sur+ya/ a ta re ke/ A kI sha ga na tsA ro Ni/ maM ga la shi re dzi mo de/ ba ba tri kri ta maM ga le/ b+hu ri mi d+hI ka ra Ne/ tsu ru tsu ru/ shwe ta pa ste/
9a1(32 la): mu ru mu ru/ shwe ta/ a ba na te/ hu ru hu ru/ pa bid tra mu khi/ mu ku ru ku ru/ tsan+d+ra mu khi/ A di t+ya ba sha brte ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ maM ga la
9a2(32 la): d+ha ra Ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ sarba bid+ya d+ha ra mA te/ mo hA ni/ a me g+ha pA sha ha ste/ sarba b+ha ya bi mo tsa ni/ ra dza tsau re/ ag+ni bi Sha/ u da ka b+ha ya pra sha ma na/ ka khorda ni
9a3(32 la): ra Ni/ oM hi r-i hi ri/ dza ya ka ri/ pa la ka ri/ d+ha na ka ri/ te dzaska ri bi bad/ pra sha ma ni/ yud d+ha ni/ bA ra ni/ pa ra kra pra sha ma ni/ pa ra saMn+yA bi nA sha ni/ ur+N+Na/
9a4(32 la): ra gi pra b+ha da be la/ maN+Di ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ ma Nin d+ha ri/ tri lo ka A lo ka ka ri/ tri pu ra na ga ra bi d+h+wad+han sa ni/ pa ra sain+na bi dra ba ni/ sarba mi t+yA karma ni su daMn/
9a5(32 la): sarba bya rti ni ma pra sha ma ni/ oM tsi le mi li swA hA/ tsi le me le swahA/ mi li mi li swA hA/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ tsi khi li/ tsi khi li swA hA/ tsaN+Da li mi Ti ni swA hA/ ur+d+ha
9a6(32 la): ke shi baM gi le/ pi ga la k+She d+ha mu khi swAhA/ oM ka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ muny+tsa/ pa ya/ pra sha ma ya/ pra sha na ya/
9a7(32 la): yud d+hod tA ra Ni phaT/ tsit+ta ni rim la ka ri phaT/ a su ra ni ra g+hA ta ni/ phaT dza ya ka ri phaT/ pri ti ka ri baT/ sa hasra shi re phaT/ sa ha swa b+hu dze phaT/ san swa ne tre baT/
9a8(32 la): sarba dri tang byar nas m+bi 9 Ta/ sarbag tsun+da ga ni pas sarba b+ha la bi mo kA ni phaT/ par bamani ba ni laT/ pa ra sai n+ya'i dra ba ni paT/ sa tsar ta/ gzas da ni paT/
9b1(32 la): sarba bi d+hi pra shA mi ni phaT/ sarba gra ho da sA da ni phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAn/ saM twA mi hri nAn/ so bsta ya ka nAn/ sa pa ri bA ra nAn/ te dza sa ma ma
9b2(32 la): shi ra ran/ sarba b+ha yo pa dra be b+h+yaHsarba u d+he b+h+yaHsarba bya d+hi b+h+yaHsarba tus+thita b+h+yaHsarba kri t+ya ka kho rde b+h+yaHsarba'i She b+h+yaHsarba kA ya tsit+ta pi dI bA b+h+yash+tsa/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ra/
9b3(32 la): mAM swA hA/ gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir bzlog pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ thams cad du zhi bar
9b4(32 la): byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad gsog par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par ston par byed pa/ rnam pa thos
9b5(32 la): cad du dpal du byed pa ste/ yi ger bris pa dang / ston pa dang / bklag pa dang / bzung bas bdag dang / gzhan bsrung ba'o// de bzhin du khrus byas pa dang /
9b6(32 la): sbyin sreg gis yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// 'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// /
9b7(32 la): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
9b8(32 la): #/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA Sha Ta k+Sha ra bid+ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
10a1(32 la): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na
10a2(32 la): bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags gang yang dag par rdzogs
10a3(32 la): pa'i sangs rgyas drug dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa/ yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
10a4(32 la): 'di kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzung zhig/ 'tshong zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ tad+ya thA/ dan+ti le/ kan+ti le/ dan+da mi ti/ ma d+h+ya ma ma te/ ma d+hu ma ti/ ka rIn+te te/
10a5(32 la): ko raN+Da drA bi ti/ ko shA bI/ tsha Ta dza/ du du ma te/ ke tu ma hi/ tsu dun d+he/ ku Ta dan+te/ ta ru hu re/ en ni ge/ hu hra ba hu ni/ kun dga' bo 'di ni yi ge drug pa'i
10a6(32 la): rig sngags so// klad pa na ba dang / mig na ba dang / rna ba na pa dang / son pa dang / snun pa dang / lcen pa dang / snying na ba dang / lto ba na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang /
10a7(32 la): rtsib logs na ba dang / chu so na pa dang / byin pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba dang / zas ma zhu ba dang / lbos pa dang / mngal du
10a8(32 la): thogs pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / rims drag po dang / nyin gcig pa
10b1(32 la): dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rims yud tsam pa dang / nyin mo'i rims dang / mtshan mo'i rims kyis btab pa la/ yi ge
10b2(32 la): drag pa'i rig sngags 'dis srung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su srung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad
10b3(32 la): pi spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / chus gtor ba dang / srad bus bcings pa byas pa las gang zhig 'gal bar byed na/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i
10b4(32 la): dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du mi 'gas pa ni/ kun dga' bo ngas lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcwa
10b5(32 la): pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nam mthong ngo // tad+ya thA/ aN+Da re/ bat+pa re/ ka ra Ta/ ke yu re/ b+hu ta gra he/ b+hu ta gra he/ b+hU ta pra k+Shi te/ d+hu
10b6(32 la): ta ya s+phA ya ni/ pra ya ba ti/ te dza ba ti/ ya sho ba ti/ gi ri Ni ni/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan
10b7(32 la): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
10b8(32 la): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so//
1a1(33 sha): sh+lo ka brgya lob pa sogs gzungs sna tshogs bzhug so//
1b1(33 sha): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan
1b2(33 sha): pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ kha li kha li ba li te swAhA/ gdong 'khru ba'i che chu khyor gang la snga
1b3(33 sha): 'di lan gsum me bdun bzlas te 'thung na/ nyin gcig la yi ge sh+lo ka brgya lobs par 'gyur te/ sngon longs pa rnams kyang brjed
1b4(33 sha): par mi 'gyu ro// sh+lo ka brgya lozla pa rdzog so// 6/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs/ bcom
1b5(33 sha): ldan 'das ma yuM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM pradz+nyA pradz+nye/ pradz+nyA ya ba b+ha se/ pradz+nyA ba lo ka ti/ sarba d+harma
1b6(33 sha): an+ta kA ra bi d+ha ma ni/ sid+d+he su sid+d+he/ sid+d+han+t+ra mAM b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba dz+nyA na san+d+ha ri/ b+ha ga be ti bad chel/ pra sa ra te haste mI ma su ka ra/ sid+d+hi/
1b7(33 sha): sid+d+hi/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ kaM pa kaM pa/ pA la pA la/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ga dza ga dza/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga ba ti/ mA bi laM ba sAH/ 'di gzung
2a1(33 sha): bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa gzung bar 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro//
2a2(33 sha): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
2a3(33 sha): rgya gar skad du/ AR+Sha pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta sha ta sa ha sra d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzung /
2a4(33 sha): bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM mu ni d+harme/ saM gra ha d+harme a nu graha d+harme/ bi muk+Shi d+harme/ sA ra a nu gra
2a5(33 sha): d+harme/ be shra baN pa ri brta na d+harme/ sarba kar+ya pa raM pra ma Na d+harme/ sa man+ta a nu pa ri brtan d+harme swA hA/ 'di gzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
2a6(33 sha): brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhung par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// shes rab
2a7(33 sha): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// bab shis// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad
2a8(33 sha): stong pa'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM hrIHshru ti s+thi ti bi dza ye saH/ pradz+nyA pa ra mi
2a9(33 sha): oM pradz+nyA sh+ma ti sI ti ma ti bi dza ye swAtra/
2b1(33 sha): tA yai/ sarba dun ti sho d+ha ya/ rA dzA ya/ swAhA// 'di gzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa gzung bar 'gyur ro// ltas ngan pa sna tshogs kyang
2b2(33 sha): bzlog go/ las kyi sgrib pa dang / ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs
2b3(33 sha): rdzogs so// / @#/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs/ 'phags pa yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
2b4(33 sha): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// na moHrmaka ya/ saM b+ho ga ka ya/ nir ma na ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ dA na par mi
2b5(33 sha): ta/ shIl pA ra mi ta/ kAn+ti pa ra mi ta/ bir+ya pa ra mi ta/ d+ha na par mi ta/ pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta/ sarba d+harma shun tA swA hA/ 'di gzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gzung bar bkrun
2b6(33 sha): ro// stong pa nyid yid la byas par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro// 'tshams med pa
2b7(33 sha): lnga byang bar 'gyur ro// ltas ngan pa thams cad kyang bzlog go// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs rdzogs so// /
2b8(33 sha): // dkon ma tshag gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin pa'i snying po 'di lan gcig thos pas sbyin pa thob par 'gyuraro// oM na ma s+t+rai b+ha ga ba ti danaH
3a1(33 sha): pa ta ye swA hA/ tshul khrims kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ ma hA
3a2(33 sha): kA na ma kA naM/ na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai/ shI la pa ri pur+Na sha ri yaM shi laM mi/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ kin tiSh+Tha sam bud+d+ho b+ha ga ban/ d+harma s+ya/ sa ma dz+nyA pa ti swa hAM/ bzod/
3a3(33 sha): pa'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas bzod pa thob par 'gyuraro// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/ a tsin+ya go ta ya/ na ma kIn+ta yai ba hu b+hi/ ta thA ga tAn b+hU ta ke Ti bi ba
3a4(33 sha): ri brti ta yaM rak+Sha ku ru tu ku ru tra sa ma ya ma nu s+phu ra/ shAkya mu ni sarba ta thA ga tA nAM a ba ri mi tA dz+nyA na mo tsa ro dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ brtson 'grus kyi snying po 'di lan
3a5(33 sha): cig thos pas brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA na mA tsi na t+ya bi sha ya nA~M/ na mo stu ti b+ha ga ba te bir+ya pA ra mi tA/ b+hir+ya na ku ru b+hi r+ye b+hir+ye/
3a6(33 sha): ma hA bIr+ya ta thA ga tA/ sarba dz+nyA na pa ya ti swA hA/ bsam gtan gyi sde po 'di lan cig thos pas bsam gtan thob par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA
3a7(33 sha): nAM/ oM bi ma le ni rma la/ d+ha ne d+hA ne/ d+h+ya na pri ye hUM phaT/ shes rab kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas shes rab thob par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba/
3a8(33 sha): tA thA ga tA ya/ a pa ra mi tA dz+nyA na go tsa rA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ dz+nyA na pA ra mi tA yai/ dz+nyA naM me ku ru ku ru bi ga na ta thA ga tA s+ya/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/
3b1(33 sha): hi hi hi hi/ dzA dzA d+hA dzA/ hUM hUM phaT/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // pha ro tu
3b2(33 sha): phyin pa bcu'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas phas rol tu phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur ro// na maHsad+ha naM/ ta thA ga tA naM/ da shaM pA ra mi tA pa ri pu ra ka na
3b3(33 sha): pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / 'di lan cig brjod pas byams pa thob par 'gyu ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ tsu
3b4(33 sha): Tu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ ka ru Ne/ kA ru N+ye tsit+ta mat+pA dA ya b+ha ga ba ti sarba b+ha yo me na sha ya swA hA/ 'di lan cig brjed pas snying rje thob par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thAg
3b5(33 sha): tA nAM/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti sarba saT pri ye hUM mu di ti swAhA/ 'di lan cig brjod pas dga' ba thob par 'gyuraro// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ me tsin t+ya bi sha nA/ oM tu rma
3b6(33 sha): tu ru traM/ hu lu hu lu/ mu lu mu lu swA hA/ 'di lan cig brjod pas btang snyems thob par 'gyu ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA hri da ya/ a nu ga taM oM ku ru
3b7(33 sha): gai ni swAhA/ tshad med pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag
3b8(33 sha): 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM mu ni d+harme/ saM gra ha d+harme/ a nu gra haHrme/ bi muk+ti d+harme/ sad sAn gra haHrme bai tha ba Na pa ri bti taHrme sarba kar pa ri pramaH
4a1(33 sha): d+harme sa ma tA pa ri ban d+harme swAhA/ oM pra dzI shru ti s+thi ti bi dza ye d+hIHd+hA ra Ni ye swA hA/ 'di gzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
4a2(33 sha): brgya pa gzung bar 'gyu ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
4a3(33 sha): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// oM n+d+ran maHsarba prar+d+hanAM/ oM mAM/ b+h+rUM/ mu tad+yAH/ oM b+hUM/ 'di gzung bas 'phags pa bal po che gzung bar
4a4(33 sha): 'gyur ro// 'dri ba klog pa yang de dang 'dra'o// 'phags pa phal po che gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// /
4a5(33 sha): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// na maHsan+ta bud+d+hA na/ a pra ti ha ta shA sA na nAM/ oM ki Ni ki Ni ta thA ga tA/ ud b+ha ba shan+te ba ra de/ ut+t+ra
4a6(33 sha): ma ut+ta ma/ ta thA ga tA ud b+ha ba hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di gzung bas 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i mdo thams cad rdzogs par bklags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyuraro//
4a7(33 sha): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya rnams kyang shes par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa
4a8(33 sha): sdong po bkod pa'i snying po rdzogs so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// nam a man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra hi ha ta shA sa na no//
4b1(33 sha): oM d+hu na d+hu na hUM hUM phaT phaT paT swA hA/ 'di gzung na 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo gzung bar 'gyuro// 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i
4b2(33 sha): mdo gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ a dra
4b3(33 sha): ta sha sa na nAM/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri 'adz+ra Ni ma ta pra ti sa re ts+tsha hU~M phaT swAhA/ 'di gzung bas 'phags ma rig pa'i rgyal me so sor 'brang ma chen mo gzung bar 'gyuraro//
4b4(33 sha): 'phags ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// #/ 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa la phyag 'tsha
4b5(33 sha): lo/ blo gros chen po sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ oM pad+me badre bai/ hi ne hi ne hi ne/ tsu lu tsu lu tsu lu/ hu le hu le hu le/ yu le su le
4b6(33 sha): su le ba le ba le ba le/ mu snad na de/ b+hin d+he b+han dze/ man d+he pra ma d+he/ dai na ka re swA hA/ blo gros chen po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags
4b7(33 sha): kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed na// lha 'am/ lha mo 'am/ klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo/
4b8(33 sha): 'am lha ma yin nam/ lha ma yin mo 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngas/ nam mkha' lding mo 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ mi 'am ci mo 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/
5a1(33 sha): lto 'phye chen po 'am/ dri za'am/ dri za mo 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ 'byung po mo 'am/ glal bum mo/ grul bum mo 'am/ shaH
5a2(33 sha): 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ gnan po 'am/ gnon po me 'am/ brjed byed dam/ brjed byed mo 'am/ srin po 'am/ srin po mo 'am/ 'phra men po 'am/
5a3(33 sha): chen po bas/ mdangs 'thog pa 'am/ mdangs 'phrog mo 'am/ lus srul po'am/ lus skul mo 'am/ me'am mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis smrags
5a4(33 sha): mi rnyed do// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag klog par byed pa des lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di
5a5(33 sha): dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis srin po la sogs pa rnams bzlog pa'i phyir gsung so// // 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i
5a6(33 sha): mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags rdzogs so// bus dag / mang+ga laM/
1a1(34 sa): rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs bzhugs so//
1b1(34 sa): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra b+hai ra ba d+hA ra Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi
1b2(34 sa): gzungs zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa/
1b3(34 sa): dri ma med pa/ dri ma sel ba/ mtha' yas pa/ mu thug pa med pa/ dam pa sbyin pa/ shin tu rgya che ba/ thams cad bdag la/
1b4(34 sa): mthun par rtag tu mtha' yas pa'i dam pa'i mchog stsol bar gyur cig/ de la nga'i rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag go/ a ra ra/ a sam
1b5(34 sa): sa man+ta nan+ta d+harma tre/ kha N+Da kha N+Da/ ma hA bi re/ tsa le sa ma ma/ A sa ha/ ma hA ba le/ ka Na ka Na/ ma hA ba lasmai he/
1b6(34 sa): badz+ra/ badz+rA hA ye/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hUM hUM maN+Da la sa ma ba ra ak+ka bi ka me/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tA ru/ sarbaM thA/ sarba hi/ dz+wa la
1b7(34 sa): dz+wa la/ ak+ki Ni/ phaT swA hA/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan
2a1(34 sa): sngar lan stong zlas brjod byas na/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags thams cad lan 'dre
2a2(34 sa): bzlas brjod byas par 'gyur ro// las gzhan thams cad kyang don yod cing thogs pa med par byed de/ dam tshig
2a3(34 sa): gsum pa'i cho ga las 'byung ba'i rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / gzungs thams cad kyi nang na las
2a4(34 sa): thams cad byed pa yin no// de nas cho ga mi bzad pa// rdo rje gtams pa 'dra ba ni// klu dang lha min srin bcas pa'i// sum
2a5(34 sa): cu gsum lhas mi shigs pa// de khros pas ni lhas mchod pa'i// brgya byin nyid kyang 'dar bar 'gyur// 'byung po kun
2a6(34 sa): gyis ma smad pa// de ni srung bar byed pa'i mchog/ ji ltar ltar bcas 'jig rten na// sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med//
2a7(34 sa): bden pa'i tshig ni de yis ni// skye bo kun la srung gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra pra kar badz+ra pra ka ra/ badz+ra daMSh+Ta b+ha yA pa hA/ tsu ru
2b1(34 sa): tsu ru/ pa ri tsu ma bi ke/ tsu lu te le/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo badz+ra b+hi ra ba s+ya/ ma hA ga Na ba ti s+ya/ badz+ra shak+ti/ paR+YA/ pA sha/ hastA ya/ badz+ra ka na ka/ 2
2b2(34 sa): bai DUr+yA laM kr-i ta/ shi rA rA ya/ badz+ra pA Ni ra nu pA lA ya/ tad+ya thA/ b+hu ru b+hu ru san yA a na yA/ ma hA gaN+Da pa ti la g+hu laM g+hu/ e h+ya hi/ Ak+Sha ma/ Ak+kha ma/
2b3(34 sa): sha r-i ro/ gr-i hi ta ma gri hi tam/ driSh+Ta ma/ driSh+Ta mA bA/ at+ma biM sha tu sha rI raM/ kin+d+hA ra ya si/ bi d+hA na/ ba d+ha na/ pa Ta phaT/ kam+ba kas+dza/ rang+ga rang+ga/ mod mod/
2b4(34 sa): d+ha ma d+ha ma/ bidz+ri mA bidz+re mA/ pu ra pu ra/ b+hur+N+Na g+huH/ a bi shaM a bi sha/ shiSh+Na shig+h+ra~M/ ma hA badz+ra b+hai ra bo/ ga Na pa ti rAdz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ cho ga la dgra thams cad re
2b5(34 sa): par bya ba dang / byang stems thams cad bcad pa la ni ba'i lci ba la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ sems khros pas mtshon cha la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas
2b6(34 sa): te/ sa la btsugs na de ma thag tu byed stems thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshegs bzlog par 'dod pas ni dbyug pa la lan bdun bzlas
2b7(34 sa): brjod byas te/ de phyogs su 'phangs na dgra thams cad myos par 'gyuraro// klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na khros te rdo rje la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te bsnun na klu rnams
2b8(34 sa): dbang du 'gyur ro// ser ba bzlog par 'dod pas ni rdo rje ha cang mi drag par bskor zhing / snga ha cang gsang mi mtho bar brjod na klu rnams ser ba mi 'bebs par 'gyur/
3a1(34 sa): chang bsrung bar 'dod pas ni chang gi rdzas rnams yungs kar la lan bdun bsngags na thub par 'gyur ro// nad zhi bar 'dod pa/
3a2(34 sa): la ni nad dang mthun pa'i sman nam chu la lan bdun bsngags te/ 'thungs sam/ byugs na nad las grol bar 'gyur ro// las gang byed pa de thams
3a3(34 sa): cad la'ang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na bsam pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba/ ma rungs pa phyir
3a4(34 sa): bzlog pa rdzogs so// // 'phags pas gsungs pa'i gzungs rnams rnam mang yang // rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal nas gsungs
3a5(34 sa): pa'i gzungs// bsrung bya'i las bdun ldan pa'i gzungs mchog 'di// kun gyis thun mongs ma yin rnal 'byor dam pa'i gzungs// rnal
3a6(34 sa): 'byor gyi rnal 'byor chen po don yong rdo rje'i zhal snga nas bsgyur nas bod kyi ban d+he skyo 'od 'byung la gnang ngo // /
3a7(34 sa): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya drA bi Da bid+ya ra dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po// sangs rgyas dang /
3a8(34 sa): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na smig ma'i myug gu'i/
3b1(34 sa): kun dga' bo nus phyogs na 'od ces pa zhes bya ba'i rlon dang/
3b2(34 sa): 'khor gyi 'khyams na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis klog
3b3(34 sa): thams cad bzlog pa/ so sor 'brang ba'i/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs par yang da ltar 'chad kyis gzung zhig/
3b4(34 sa): kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo lho phyogs na slad brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na
3b5(34 sa): rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod de/ kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang / phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la glog
3b6(34 sa): gis 'jigs pa thams cad du mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o// glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bres te/ gnas gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu glog
3b7(34 sa): thams cad mi 'bab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'gro lding pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni mi ni ni
3b8(34 sa): mi ni ni min d+ha re/ 'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog thams cad las bdag la srungs shig/ srungs shis
3b9(34 sa): swA hA/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des
4a1(34 sa): bcom lda 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'gro lding ba'i
4a2(34 sa): gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ha te bi ha te/ ni ha te/ pra t+yar+thi ke/ pra ta mi tre/ shud+d+he/ muk+te/ bi ma le/ pra
4a3(34 sa): b+ha swa re/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ she te/ paN+Da/ ra bA si ni/ ha ri ka ra di/ piM ga lA kI da d+hi mu khi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag
4a4(34 sa): la srungs shig/ srungs shig/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis bdag dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong
4a5(34 sa): bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ de nas gsang pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom
4a6(34 sa): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o//
4a7(34 sa): tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu ni mu ni/ re ri/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ hA hA hA hA/ khyod la sdig pa med kyis/ ma 'jigs shig ces lag na
4a8(34 sa): rdo rjes smras kyis/ dri Da swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi srung pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying la 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris na de la bdag gis
4b1(34 sa): rtag par rgyun du 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar bar bgyi'o// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag
4b2(34 sa): po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang /
4b3(34 sa): bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li
4b4(34 sa): swAhA/ brah+ma sA re sA re swA hA/ brah+ma gar+b+ha puSh+pa saM sta re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi srung ba tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lags
4b5(34 sa): par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin/ bcom ldan 'das
4b6(34 sa): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/
4b7(34 sa): la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ni bA ra Ni/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ mA dan d+he/ ma ti ma ti/ ti Ta/ gau rI/ gan+d+ha ri/
4b8(34 sa): tsaN+Da lI/ ma taM gi/ bar la ni/ hi na ma mA ri NI ma la ni/ da la ma t+te/ tsakra bkra/ sha ba ri sha ba ri swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi rig
5a1(34 sa): sngags rdo rje 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar par bgyid pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thos
5a2(34 sa): cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam
5a3(34 sa): thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
5a4(34 sa): bdag gis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang/
5a5(34 sa): sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe puSh+pe/ d+harma ba ri ha ri/ Ar+ya pra sha ste/ shir muk+She/ mang+ga le/ stu ste/ swAtsi he swAhA/ btsun pa bcom
5a6(34 sa): ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag gi srung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bya ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad la mi 'jig par bgyid pa/ tshe skyong ba dus
5a7(34 sa): ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa
5a8(34 sa): dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud de/ bcom ldan 'das
5b1(34 sa): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi srung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba glog thams cad bzlog pa/ dus ma lag
5b2(34 sa): par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/ dug rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed bye dang / byad dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa 'jigs par
5b3(34 sa): bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang / ser sna spang ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te gzhes
5b4(34 sa): su gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni sems ser sna can te/ sems ser snas kun nas dkris pa lags pa'i
5b5(34 sa): srad du'o// tad+ya thA/ a ra dze/ a ma re/ a mr-i te/ ak+Sha ye/ pu N+ya par+ya ba te/ sarba pa pa pra sha ma na ya swA hA/ Ar+ya pu N+ya so pa ki ye swA hA/ btsun pa
5b6(34 sa): bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la'i lce la 'don tam/ yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad
5b7(34 sa): ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyig dug gam gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gri/
5b8(34 sa): de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan/
6a1(34 sa): sa kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i rgyal po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin/ bzhin bzang
6a2(34 sa): dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su gzung ba'i phyir 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags
6a3(34 sa): bas so legs so// phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rnams srung bar 'gyuraro// bcom
6a4(34 sa): la nas/ dge slong de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / klu'i dbang po de
6a5(34 sa): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
6a6(34 sa): kas so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tA dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba pa/
6a7(34 sa): kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// / nor su ron po chen
6b1(34 sa): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
6b2(34 sa): par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/
6b3(34 sa): bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom
6b4(34 sa): su gsol/ de ni
6b5(34 sa): srad du'o//
6b6(34 sa): bcom ldan
6b7(34 sa): ma mchis
6b8(34 sa): de 'gum
1a1(35 ha): 'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo bzhugs so// /
1b1(35 ha): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pa hA me g+ha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
1b2(35 ha): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
1b3(35 ha): nye dga'i gnas na/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun
1b4(35 ha): chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
1b5(35 ha): nye dga' bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / gzi can dang / chu lga dang / 'jog po dang / yul 'khor srung dang / nor
1b6(35 ha): rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po btang zung dang / sa srung gi bu dang / mdongs bu dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / dpal bzang dang /
1b7(35 ha): glog gi 'phreng ba dang / gtsug na nor bu rin po che dang / gtsug na nor bu thogs dang / snang ldan gtsug phud can dang / gtsug phud
2a1(35 ha): 'ja' can dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong dang / 'dzam bu'i
2a2(35 ha): rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis ldan dang / dkyil 'khor chen po can dang / lag gis 'gro chen po dang / skar mdog dang / zla rig
2a3(35 ha): gzi brjid dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang / bla mgong dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / shin tu brtan dang / mgul na nor bu
2a4(35 ha): dang / sprin byung ba dang / chang rgyun dang / rab 'joms dang / rnam par 'joms dang / mthu bsgyings dang / gdengs ka chen po dang /
2a5(35 ha): dbyangs zab dang / klu'i rgyal po cher sgrogs dang / rnam par sgra 'byin dang / ut+pa la dang / rtsal chen dang / gshol mda' 'dzin
2a6(35 ha): dang / sna tshogs sde dang / zhags pa chen po dang / klu rgyal po e li'i 'dab ma can dang / kun tu snang dang / rna rngub dang / dung dang /
2a7(35 ha): dang da ra dang / klu'i rgyal po u pa dang ngar dang / bde byed dang / lag 'gro dang / lag 'gro chen po dang / dri ma chen po dang / 'phur lding /
2b1(35 ha): dang / sog ma med dang / 'phyang ba dang / srin bu gnas dang / nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i sde dang / 'dam bu dang / nye ba'i 'dam bu dang / dung thogs dang / gro
2b2(35 ha): lding dang / rab mdzes dang / glang chen sna dang / rnon po dang / ser skya dang / glog 'babs dang / glog 'od chen po dang / stobs lnga dang / chu stobs dang / klu'i rgyal po
2b3(35 ha): dam pa 'gebs sa dang / bdud rtsi can dang / mu stegs can dang / bai DUr+ya'i 'od can dang / gser mdog snga dang / gser 'o dang zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang / nyi 'od dang /
