2b4(35 ha): 'char 'od dang / ba glang mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang / nag po dang / gshin rje dang / dge tshul dang sbal pa dang / dang ba'i gzi brjid dang / mu khyud 'dzin dang /
2b5(35 ha): sa 'dzin dan/ mgo stong can dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong dang / sprin chen po dang / sde bzang dang / sa skyong dang / mis byin dang / rnam par dul
2b6(35 ha): dang / rga ba 'byung dang / chu srin kum+b+hi ra dang / chu srin kum+b+hi ra'i gdong dang / rmugs 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po myur gdug dang / pad+ma ka dang / mjug ma dang / rab 'phyang dang /
2b7(35 ha): 'jigs byed dang / gzi brjid mdzes dang / mgo lnga pa dang / pa la li ra dang / shing rtas rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang / klu'i rgyal po mjug rings dang / mgo bo che
2b8(35 ha): ba dang / bi ma pi ka dang / bi ta ra dang / mgyogs 'gro dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo bo gsum pa dang / klu sde dang / gzi chen dang / 'dam bu byin dang / klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang /
3a1(35 ha): 'od 'bang dang / mgo bdun pa dang / sngang can dang / mthong dga' dang / rab tu cher gtus dang / dri med ga'i brjid dang / mig b.rang dang / drag pa cha
3a2(35 ha): po dang / 'ad 'dra phung po dang / klu'i rgyal po gtum pa dang / khra ba drag shul can dang / rin chen du sbyin dang / chu sbyin sprin chen dang / dbang po'i 'od dang / rkang pas 'bung
3a3(35 ha): dang / sprin zla dang / me tog dri chen dang / ku mu ti'i 'byung gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po rin chen mig dang / tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang / sprin chen snying po dang / 2
3a4(35 ha): can dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / sprin mthu can dang / mtshan mo 'dzin dang / chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid me 'dra dang / sprin gyi dbang
3a5(35 ha): phrug rgyal po dang / khro bang dang / sa'i bum pa dang / klu dbang dang / chu 'dzin dang / sprin gzugs dang / ing gi ri'i gdong dang / gzi brjid can dang / sprin las mtshan
3a6(35 ha): byung dang / klu'i rgyal po goms stobs mtha' yas dang / cha byad mdzes dang / lus chen dang / spyad lto dang / zhi ba dang / dpa' ba dang / gser dan can dang / mchog
3a7(35 ha): tu brtson dang / dug drag dang / dbyangs snyan dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi snying po dang / rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang / rnam par g.yo dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga sgra dang / bdud
3a8(35 ha): rtsi rgyun dang / dga' bar byed dang / 'brug sgrogs dang / dpa' sde dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgya mtsho'i glong dang / klu'i rgyal po yon po dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs
3b1(35 ha): pa/ klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dag 'dus te 'khod pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te
3b2(35 ha): stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
3b3(35 ha): nas/ bla ma la gus pa dang / bu dud chen po byed pas/ me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bug pa dang / bye ma dang / na 'ba' dang / gdugs dang /
3b4(35 ha): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdog dang / glu dbyangs dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / ri bo che'i lda ldi dang mu
3b5(35 ha): tig gi 'phreng ba dang / klu'i me tog dang / mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/ bskor ba
3b6(35 ha): byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ smon lam rnams btab pa/ lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra
3b7(35 ha): rab kyi rdul snyed kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho thams/
3b8(35 ha): cad dang / sa dang chu dang me dang glu thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang / gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul
4a1(35 ha): re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa grangs med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab
4a2(35 ha): mtshungs pa med gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang / lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun du mngon par
4a3(35 ha): phyogs pa dpag tu med grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul kyi cha re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi gzhi
4a4(35 ha): rgyas par 'gengs pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa bya'o snyam pa 'di lta ste/ kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho
4a5(35 ha): sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/ grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis
4a6(35 ha): brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis ji ltar de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / 'od zer stug po dang / nyi ma dang /
4a7(35 ha): zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / ring po che thams cad kyi phreng ba dang / me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po
4a8(35 ha): che thams cad kyi snang bachen po'i snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / phye ma dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /
4b1(35 ha): spos dang / 'dug thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu ston pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / sgra thams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams
4b2(35 ha): cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho
4b3(35 ha): dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med brjod du med pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
4b4(35 ha): thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// yul thams cad du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor bu'i rgyal
4b5(35 ha): po rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du
4b6(35 ha): bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// thams cad kun tu snang ba'i rin po che'i char 'bab pa bkod pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i
4b7(35 ha): sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /
4b8(35 ha): kun tu sgra 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul
5a1(35 ha): pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnams su bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i
5a2(35 ha): rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od 'phro sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas
5a3(35 ha): kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che
5a4(35 ha): sna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par snang bar byed pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil kun
5a5(35 ha): tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho sprin thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par
5a6(35 ha): bya'o// rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog
5a7(35 ha): mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa
5a8(35 ha): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par sbas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
5b1(35 ha): rin po che'i 'phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par rgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/
5b2(35 ha): phyogs bcu kun tu 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can/ bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul
5b3(35 ha): gyis rab tu brgyan pa bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu rgyan pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs
5b4(35 ha): pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgo kun tu me tog gi taM babs dril bu'i dra ba dbyangs kyi rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs
5b5(35 ha): bar byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o//
5b6(35 ha): gser dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshod zod dang / 'phreng ba dang / rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog lnga snang
5b7(35 ha): sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / in+d+ra ni la dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho
5b8(35 ha): sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i sgron me'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che snang gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad ma sna tshogs
6a1(35 ha): kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po ches brgyan pa pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin
6a2(35 ha): rnams dang / an+da rIl mdzes khar 'bar ba'i 'od zer can gyi pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od zer 'bar bzang mi shes pa'i gzi
6a3(35 ha): brjid dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i
6a4(35 ha): khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad 'byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
6a5(35 ha): gsung sgra'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlangs te/
6a6(35 ha): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// spos dang / nor bu sna tshogs
6a7(35 ha): thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo la ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / shing ljon pa
6a8(35 ha): thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i srin shing ljon
6b1(35 ha): byang chub sems dpa'i lus byed can dan thams cad kyi bye mar kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya ma tshe sbyin rnaMs dang /
6b2(35 ha): pa lta bu rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba
6b3(35 ha): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
6b4(35 ha): 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra dbyangs thams
6b5(35 ha): cad sgrog pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun tu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho
6b6(35 ha): sprin rnams dang / kun tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad
6b7(35 ha): kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i 'phreng ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin
6b8(35 ha): rnams dang / kun nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / me tog dang / pad+ma thams cad
6b9(35 ha): kyi 'greng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho srin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ni
7a1(35 ha): po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba rab tu sbyangs pa'i rta babs stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa/ rim
7a2(35 ha): po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtshob sprin rnams dang / gser gyi ze ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / bkod
7a3(35 ha): pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od mtha' yas par bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin
7a4(35 ha): gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho sprin rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod
7a5(35 ha): par bya'o// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khengs par byin gyis brlabs la/ rin po che bcu'i
7a6(35 ha): 'od zer snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs
7a7(35 ha): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor du rgyal po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i 'dreng
7a8(35 ha): ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i rdul kun tu snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu dra bas dpyangs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor du
7b1(35 ha): thams cad kyi sdong bu'i yal ga'i rgyan can gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang / spos dang /
7b2(35 ha): gdugs pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs
7b3(35 ha): rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po snang bar byed pa kun tu bkod pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
7b4(35 ha): dpa' rgya mtsho sprin thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams
7b5(35 ha): dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil
7b6(35 ha): 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
7b7(35 ha): zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil
7b8(35 ha): 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bai DUr+ya dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin
8a1(35 ha): rnams dang / sems can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag/ sems kyi skad cig la kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs
8a2(35 ha): rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu byin pa dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
8a3(35 ha): cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang
8a4(35 ha): du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang /
8a5(35 ha): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
8a6(35 ha): chos sgrogs pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad sdud par byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams
8a7(35 ha): dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 6bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung
8a8(35 ha): ngas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i sgrogs pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che mi zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang / me tog thams cad
8a9(35 ha): rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
8b1(35 ha): kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / khri stan bkod pa thams cad kun tu ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
8b2(35 ha): dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres
8b3(35 ha): pa rnams dang / kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po 'ong 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin
8b4(35 ha): rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'od
8b5(35 ha): 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
8b6(35 ha): byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya
8b7(35 ha): mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gangs chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor
8b8(35 ha): bya'o// mchod par bya'o// spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi pad+ma'i dra ba
9a1(35 ha): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad
9a2(35 ha): kyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che dang / spos dang / tsan+dan thams cad kyi phye ma rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che
9a3(35 ha): thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi nor bu'i
9a4(35 ha): tshogs kyi 'phreng ba rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i mdzod mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / thams cad kun tu bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin
9a5(35 ha): rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gangs chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o/ mchod
9a6(35 ha): par bya'o// zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab po// klu'i rgyal po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang //
9a7(35 ha): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ rang rang gi stan la 'khod do// de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i smon lam gyi stobs
9a8(35 ha): can g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang phyag bya
9b1(35 ha): ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ongs so// de nas klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid
9b2(35 ha): kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig du gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lnga ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
9b3(35 ha): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan
9b4(35 ha): 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//
9b5(35 ha): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po
9b6(35 ha): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyis sems rangs par bya'o// de skad
9b7(35 ha): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di
9b8(35 ha): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na klu thams cad kri'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / rab tu dga'
10a1(35 ha): bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur/ tsA dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal
10a2(35 ha): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ 'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/ gzungs thams cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang
10a3(35 ha): ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdug
10a4(35 ha): lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa dang 'di ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
10a5(35 ha): don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so// klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do//
10a6(35 ha): klu'i bdag po chos gcig dang ldan na klu thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di
10a7(35 ha): lta ste/ byams pa'o// klu'i bdag po byams pa de la gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams ni mas mi tshig mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chus mi khyer/ dug gis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi
10a8(35 ha): dmag tshogs kyis mi non/ bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur/ rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur/ bsod nams chen
10b1(35 ha): po'i gzi brjid kyis gzi can du 'gyur/ lnga dang bcas pa'i 'chi rten gyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / mthong na dga' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du thags thogs
10b2(35 ha): med par 'gyur/ sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / mi'i chos bla ma rtogs nas/ lus zhig pa'i
10b3(35 ha): 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po lha dang mi'i byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag go// klu'i bdag po dbas na byams pa'i lus
10b4(35 ha): kyi las dang / byams pa'i ngag gi las dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis gnas par bya'o// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzung
10b5(35 ha): brjod par bya ste/ der klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed de/ 'dzam bu gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun
10b6(35 ha): 'bebs par byed/ rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog thams cad skye bar byed do// klu'i bdag po de la bde ba thams cad sbyin pa
10b7(35 ha): zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ d+hA ra Ni d+hA ra Ni/ ud+d+ha ra Ni/ sam pra tiSh+Thi te/ bi dza ya baH/ sad+ya pra ti dz+nyA sa ra ha/ dz+nyA na pa ti/ ud pa da ni dI nA ma
10b8(35 ha): ni/ a b+hi She tsa ni/ a bi bya hA ra/ shu b+hA ba ti/ e dzim tu/ e hi ku ma bA la na/ bA ha ha ra kle shA na/ d+hun pa bam/ sho d+ha ya mnan/ ni rA tsi ka d+harmata shuH/
11a1(35 ha): lo ka bi ti ma ri rA dza sa du kha/ sha ma na sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ka na a d+hiSh+Thi te pradz+nyA nA b+he swA hA/ klu'i bdag po gzungs kyi tshig don thams cad srud par
11a2(35 ha): byed pa/ chos kyi sku la 'jug pa/ de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag brdung bar bya/ brjod par bya'o// klu'i bdas po
11a3(35 ha): gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las byung ba'i byin gyi brlabs bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi snying po sprul par byed pa/ ye shes kyi rtog gi nu'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang
11a4(35 ha): ldan pa gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang ba'i byed pa/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan bzung bar bya/
11a5(35 ha): yid la bya'o// de dag gis klu thams cad dang / klu'i rigs thams cad dang / klu'i rus thams cad dang / klu'i cho rigs thams cad dang / klu 'byung ba thams cad dang /
11a6(35 ha): klu'i skye gnas thams cad dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / klu'i bu mo thams cad dang / klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/
11a7(35 ha): bde ba'i yo byad sgrub par byed do// klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
11a8(35 ha): mdzad snying po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba sprin gyis rnam par mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo//
11b1(35 ha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag
11b2(35 ha): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad
11b3(35 ha): rnam par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dpag med la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
11b4(35 ha): gshegs pa sprin chen po'i grog 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo//
11b5(35 ha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdug chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
11b6(35 ha): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo//
11b7(35 ha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
11b8(35 ha): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blta sdug sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs pa phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
12a1(35 ha): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu mtho 'gebs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab
12a2(35 ha): sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bsil 'byung mi dga' rab 'joms sgra zab sgrog pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
12a3(35 ha): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'dal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i chu sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
12a4(35 ha): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal gyis sprin ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug gi sgra bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshalo//
12a5(35 ha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin kun tu ston la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rgya chen la phyag 'tshal lo//
12a6(35 ha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par sgrogs la phyag
12a7(35 ha): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin lta bu'i na bza
12a8(35 ha): mnangs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyis le tog bskyed la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
12b1(35 ha): pa sprin gyi gnas la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char sprin gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
12b2(35 ha): gshegs pa sprin 'du bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de
12b3(35 ha): bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen ut+pal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen thos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
12b4(35 ha): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
12b5(35 ha): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i sprin lta bu la phyag
12b6(35 ha): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu
12b7(35 ha): ba la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dus ma yin
12b8(35 ha): pa'i sprin dang lce 'bab pa rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po ltar nam mkha'i mthongs nas bslab
12b9(35 ha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen byin la phyag 'tshal lo//
13a1(35 ha): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
13a2(35 ha): de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen chang chu skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snyems pa'i gzi brjid sgrub pa'i sprin la phyag 'tsha'o//
13a3(35 ha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ro bro ba drug dang ldan pa'i chu chen po'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'thor sprin chen
13a4(35 ha): la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgya mtsho 'gengs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char mi 'bangs pa na sprin
13a5(35 ha): gyis kun tu 'gebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gzugs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
13a6(35 ha): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin chen po thams cad rnam par sgrub pa 'jam pa'i sprin gyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od mdzad pa/ sprin gyi 'od
13a7(35 ha): zer can rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas/ klu thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / da
13a8(35 ha): ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog/
13b1(35 ha): thams cad bskyed par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprir bkod pa'i gzi brjid
13b2(35 ha): kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/ gang
13b3(35 ha): dag brjod na char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang / mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / nad dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ skar ma
13b4(35 ha): ma rungs pa gnas pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi
13b5(35 ha): gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlab du gsol/ gang dag klu thams cad la bskul ma 'debs par 'gyur ba dang /
13b6(35 ha): lha thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par
13b7(35 ha): 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bgyid pa dang / rgyu skar ma rungs pas bgyis pa rab tu zhi bar
13b8(35 ha): 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis char pa'i bar chad lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char pa'i
14a1(35 ha): rgyun legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bcom ldan 'das mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan
14a2(35 ha): pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par thugs brtse ba ldan pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo//
14a3(35 ha): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i
14a4(35 ha): rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol
14a5(35 ha): ba 'debs pa legs so legs so// klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / snying rje chen po las byung ba 'brug chen po'i sgra
14a6(35 ha): can bsgyings pa dpa' ba'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/
14a7(35 ha): byin gyis brlabs pa rjes su yi rang ba bshad par bya ste/ de ni char med pa'i tshe char 'bab par byed/ char ches na gcod/ 'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ klu thams
14a8(35 ha): cad bskul bar byed/ lha thams cad sim par byed/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed/ sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed do//
14b1(35 ha): d+ya ra/ mas d+ham/ a bzlas ni/ shI ti dze lag si dzi ti ba kra ma badz+ra sa da tsa \u0f7fni/ ba ra ma'i rid/ ni pa la klamu ka tu ba ban/ rim shA
14b2(35 ha): yaSh+Ti/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra/ du dum bu/ han ha na/ ma hA prab+he/ bi drul ta ma mo hA yan d+ha kA re/ prad+ha gra hU~Ms+t+wa~M/ pa ri bre 'ur Na me tre/ me traH
14b3(35 ha): raHswaH/ me d+ha ma d+hA d+hA re/ dza la dz+wa la/ dz+wa la m+b+ha prad+d+ha re/ shod+hA dkakra su Te/ dag pa le/ natu bgyur te/ Ang+ga da ma bi ni gzung \u0f7f/ shub sa
14b4(35 ha): hi[:]shuk+kha d+ha ra me sa ma ni te/ gam+b+hI re bi rA dza sde/ bi ma le/ bi sha Sha prA ba te/ ni rA swa bad+harbe/ sarba lo ka dz+yelA/ dz+hiSh+Ta pa ra pra ba re/ a nud ta re/ a sang ge/ d+ha ra
14b5(35 ha): d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ shAn ta ma te/ shAn ta ba pe/ tsa tsa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pa ra ma bud+d+ha nu ma te/ many+dza pradz+nyA pa ra mi te sA hA/
14b6(35 ha): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
14b7(35 ha): de nas 'dzam bu gling 'dir char 'babs pa'i phyir klu thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bden pas char pa'i
14b8(35 ha): bar chad byed pa lnga stsal bar bya'o// sad+ya thai ngan/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ nA gA nan/ dzi bi dzi bi/ dzu bu dzu bu/ klu chen po dag tshur gsheg/ sangs
15a1(35 ha): rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chang rab tu phob cig/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ra tsu ru/ klu'i bdag po chen po dag tshur
15a2(35 ha): gsheg/ kye klu chen po dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig/ bar bar/ bi ri bi ri/ bu ru bu ru/ sangs rgyas kyi bden
15a3(35 ha): pas/ klu thams cad dgug par bya'o// byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas
15a4(35 ha): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / bden pa dang / bsam pa chen pos klu'i bdag po tshur gsheg sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas
15a5(35 ha): kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams dran par gyis shig/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ chu chen po'i chu dang / sprin gyi chu 'chad pa
15a6(35 ha): can lag gis 'gro chen po'i g.yog rnams byams pa'i sems kyis tshur gsheg/ ston pa'i bstan pa dam pa dran par bgyis/ g+ha Da g+ha Da/ g+hi Di g+hi Di/ g+hu Du g+hu DA/
15a7(35 ha): drag shul car khro ba shugs chen po dang ldan pa/ dug chen po'i lce 'byin pa rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan par tshur gsheg/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
15a8(35 ha): gyi bden pas 'dzam bu gling 'dir char phob cig swA hA/ ta Ta ha Ta/ ti Ti ti Ti/ tu Tu tu Tu/ nor bu chen po'i cod thogs pa dang ldan pa/ sbrul gdug pa'i gzug
15b1(35 ha): na rnams/ dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs dran par gyis la/ rdo rje 'ayang gi 'den pas 'jam bu'i gling 'dir rang bab cigs na/ la ka la/
15b2(35 ha): ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ chu chen po la gnas pa dang ldan pa/ sprin chen po brtsegs pa'i gnon pa la zhon nas mngon par 'gro ba rnams chur gsheg/ byams
15b3(35 ha): pa'i sems kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun phob cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ lag na rdo rjes
15b4(35 ha): bsgo ba/ ra la ra la/ ri li ri li/ ru lu ru lu/ lag gis 'gro ba thams cad khyed rnams nyid med par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pas/ rnam
15b5(35 ha): g+ha ma/ g+hi mi g+hi mi/ g+hu mu g+hu mu swA hA/ klu thams cad dgu go/ byams pa'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro bas/ na ra na ra/ ni ri ni re/ nu ru
15b6(35 ha): nu ru/ swA hA/ yon po sna tshogs su gyur pa mgo stong pa/ mgo dang mig dmar ba/ stobs che ba'i lto 'phye chen po rnams dgug par bya'o// kye kye lag gi
15b7(35 ha): 'gro chen po dag mchog tu thugs rje can/ bsod nams thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyi brjid pa nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
15b8(35 ha): kyi byin gyi rlabs dran par gyis shig/ ga Ta ga Ta/ gi Ti gi Ti/ gu nu gu thu gu swA hA/ stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / gzi brjid
16a1(35 ha): thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa dag gis/ 'dzam du'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun rnams phob cig/ shar shar/ shi ri shi ri/ shu ru shu ru saH/
16a2(35 ha): se seM klu chen po rnams rang gi rigs dang / tshe rigs dra par gyis pa/ ma bgos par lha thams cad kyi den pas byin gyis 'arnams kyis/ 'jam du ming 'di
16a3(35 ha): rgyun po bas shig swA hA/ tshangs pa'i bden pas byin gyis brlabs kyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ brgya byin gyis bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling
16a4(35 ha): 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab
16a5(35 ha): tu phobs shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bden
16a6(35 ha): pas/ 'dzam bu gling 'dir char rab tu phobs shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling char rab tu phobs shig swA hA/ klu chen
16a7(35 ha): po dag dgra bcom pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling char tu phobs shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag rang sangs rgyas kyis bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phobs
16a8(35 ha): shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phobs shigs hA/ klu chen po
16b1(35 ha): ngag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang / byin gyis rlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phobs shig swA hA/ lha thams cad kyis bden pas
16b2(35 ha): gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/ klu thams cad kyi bden pas sa chen po 'dir rab tu char phob cig swA hA/ gnod sbyin thams kyi bden pas sems can
16b3(35 ha): thams cad srungs shig swA hA/ dri za thams cad kyi bden pas mi rnams kyi 'khrug pa dang gnod pa thams cad sol cig swA hA/ lha ma yin thams cad kyi bden
16b4(35 ha): pas rgyu skar ma rungs pa thams cad rnam par zlog cig swA hA/ nam mkha' lding thams cad kyi bden pas klu thams cad byams par byos la 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
16b5(35 ha): char chen po'i rgyun phob cig swA hA/ mi 'am ci thams cad kyi bden pas sdig pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig swA hA/ sems can thams cad tshim par gyis shig/
16b6(35 ha): lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi bden pas yangs shing rgya che ba'i char gyi rgyun phob cig/ 'dir chang la sgrib pa lnga po dag yang dag par zung zhig swA hA/ mi thams cad kyi
16b7(35 ha): bden pas mi thams cad la yongs su srungs shig swA hA/ ka ra kar/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ da ra da ra/ di ri di ri/ du ru duR+sha/ na Ta naT/ ni Ti ni Ti/ nuT+Ta
16b8(35 ha): nu Tu/ shin tu mgyogs par bzhud ma/ sprin chen po'i chu 'dzin ma/ sprin ldan ma/ sprin chen ldan ma/ sprin chen chu 'dzin ma/ sprin gsal ma/ sprin 'byung ma/
17a1(35 ha): dus sprin ma/ sprin gyi 'byung gnas ma/ sprin sgrogs ma/ sprin bzhugs ma/ sprin gyi cod pan ldan ma/ sprin gyi 'phreng ba mnga'am/ sprin gyi
17a2(35 ha): rnam par rgyan ma/ sprin bcings ma/ sprin la gnas bcas ma/ sprin gyi snying po/ sprin gyi ral pa can/ sprin 'od ma/ sprin gyi 'khor ldan ma/ rgya chen sprin zhugs ma/
17a3(35 ha): mchod phyir smin thogs ma/ lo tog 'das bsgrub ma/ ri sul na bzhugs ma/ klu'i yul bcom ldan 'das ma/ sprin can dpal ldan skar mdog can/ bsil reg
17a4(35 ha): ma chub ma chen po spyod yul ma/ klu chen rnam par rol mdzad ma/ bcom ldan 'das ma/ bon tra bcud kyis len drug 'dzin ma/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i
17a5(35 ha): gling 'dir char rab tu dbab du gsol swA hA/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ g+hu ru g+ha ru/ g+hi ri ni g+hi ri ni/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma ri/ dbu dgu dang
17a6(35 ha): ldan ma/ sprin chen 'phreng ldan ma/ klog tshogs 'phreng ldan ma/ lag gi 'gro thams cad 'dzin ma/ sprin lta bu'i na bza' mnabs ma/ dug drag po thams cad spyod yul ma/
17a7(35 ha): sprin bkod pa la bcibs ma/ 'brug sgrogs ma/ sgra spogs ma/ klu tshogs la bskul ma/ lha mo sprin chen 'phreng ldan ma/ klu thams cad la ma shol bar de bzhin
17a8(35 ha): gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char po bcig ces bskul du gsol swA hA/ ya ra ya ra/ yi ri yi ri/ yu ru yu ru/ dza ra dza ra/ dzi ri dzi ri/
17b1(35 ha): du ru nguru/ d+harad+har/ garbag trag tu suH/ gaNag sa/ ga tsig gi/ pa si li Ti li/ mu lu ru la/ sa la/ ti'i ti li/ hu lu tra mra
17b2(35 ha): han/ da cad \u0f7f/ bca paH/ gr-ih+Na graH/ mar dam dad/ pra mar dgra bar sha bi gnan/ me tre ye dz+nyA pa ya ti sA rba/ dud+he bad+he/ bad+mo bi bud+he 'i drAH/ ha ba baH/
17b3(35 ha): mthas ldanan/ a kyis bcwa pa/ / shi / gzal te/ bran pa zab ma dz+nyAn la ke shug sa mas cam ti// mthanar+dz+dza
17b4(35 ha): ga wa te/ bu d+ha me tre/ a yu bu ra ya sarba k+She tra ni/ shukra she ta ma/ pa rad/ pa na Ta ra bA sa ni/ d+hu d+ha ra/ d+hu d+hu ru/ sha ma sha ma/ shAn tamA na si/ char gyi dgegs
17b5(35 ha): thams cad rnam par 'grol bar gsol swA hA/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas byams pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par brtul zhugs dang / dka'
17b6(35 ha): thub kyi thugs skyon med pas/ klu chen po rnams la yang dag par bskul lo// klu'i rgyal po chen po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil

18a4(35 ha): bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la yang dag par bskul lo 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal

18a6(35 ha): gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nu ta la yang dag par bskul lo 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi
18a7(35 ha): brjid la yang dag par bskul lo 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal bzang la yang dag par bskul lo 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
18a8(35 ha): char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po glog gi 'phreng ba la yang dag par bskul lo/ dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phong cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor
18b1(35 ha): bu chen po la yang dag par bskul lo 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chang rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu thogs la yang dag par bskul lo 'dzam
18b2(35 ha): bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug phud can la yang dag par bskul lo 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig
18b3(35 ha): swA hA/ de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po thams cad yang dag par bskul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu thob cig swA hA/ nA gai nA ge/
18b4(35 ha): mas+t+rainA ge/ g+ho ra mA na ge/ na ga hri da ya/ d+hu mU ku le/ u kra ro khaM/ prA tsan ta te dze/ bai 'a gre ma shA bi she/ a bi b+hai re/ kr-iSh+Na li dag le/ tsanA li/
18b5(35 ha): lo la dzi d+h+we/ ma hA na ka re/ kA la dA she/ ro'u dra pA si naM/ Tu TA ma be/ g+han g+han/ shi khi ni/ kaN ka Na/ ga Na gar+Na/ ma hA g+ha na ga na/ pa ra ba ra/ bi ri bi ri/ pu ru
18b6(35 ha): pu ru/ bi bu rdza ne/ b+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA b+ho ge/ ma Ni d+ha re/ phi ri pi ri/ phu ru pu ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra Sha ba ra Sha/ dza lA ma b+hu d+ha re/ sham bu sham bu/ pa ta Tu tu ma de/
18b7(35 ha): drung drung d+hud d+ha ma be/ me g+ha pra b+he/ me g+ha bI ha ni/ D+ha ka D+ha ka D+ha ka/ d+hu rna ma ba/ g+har+b+ha g+har+Na/ shi ki ni/ ka na ka na/ gaN ga Na/ ma hA nA/ ga ga ne/ ni rA tra N+ya/ pa
18b8(35 ha): rang / ka ri ma hA nA ga d+hi da ye/ g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu nan yA/ sti ka/ dzA d+ha ra b+hudzadwe me/ bi ka ta sa ma ga te/ g+ho ra bi pu rdza ni bidz+ra ma ban+te/ klu thams cad dgug go//
19a1(35 ha): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang /
19a2(35 ha): byams pa'i thugs kyis 'jam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu bobashig sa hA/ nams r+b+ba bud+d+ha bya sid rgyan tu man pa des hA/ 'phags pa sbyin
19a3(35 ha): chen po'i mdo stong phrag brgya pa las char 'bad pa rlung gi dkyil 'khod ces bya ba'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / cho ga ni char cher 'bangs
19a4(35 ha): par 'dod na/ bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar bla re sngon mo bris/ ba dan sngon po dpung ngo // chos sna ba lus bkrus la/
19a5(35 ha): yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar gnas shing / gos gtsang ma sngon po bgos spos dri zhim pos bkrus nas/ zas dkar gsum zos la/
19a6(35 ha): spyan sngon po'i steng du 'dug nas/ kha shar phyogs su bsdus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab nas/ sprin chen
19a7(35 ha): po'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par bklag par bya'o// chu sngon pos bkang ba'i bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag par
19a8(35 ha): bya'o// gtor ma dang / 'dug pa dang / me tog ci nus kyis sbyar ro// de la chos spabs/ phyogs bzhir pa'i rtsa
19b1(35 ha): ba'i khu bas bri bar bya ste/ shar phyogs su khru gsum tsam du klu'i rgyal po pago gsum pa/ klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa/ nga'i lci
19b2(35 ha): bas bri bar bya'o// lho phyogs su khru lnga tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo lnga pa/ klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o//
19b3(35 ha): nub phyogs su khru bdun tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo bdun pa klu g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// byang phyogs su khru dgu tsam du klu'i
19b4(35 ha): rgyal po mgo dgu pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// chos smra ngas rang gi lus bsrungs la/ byams
19b5(35 ha): pa la gnas te sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
19b6(35 ha): gsol ba btab la/ klu rnams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bgo bar bya ste/ 'di ni cho ga'o// gang zhig char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/ sprin
19b7(35 ha): chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di klog na/ nyin zhag gcig gam/ gnyis nas nyin zhag bdun tshun chad/ gdon mi za bar char
19b8(35 ha): 'bab par 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho ni dus las yol kyang srid kyi/ thub pa chen po'i gsung rab char gyi cho ga 'di ni gzhan du mi
20a1(35 ha): 'gyur ro// de lta mod kyi tshul khrims dang / yon tan la gnas
20a2(35 ha): te/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / sha dang nya la sogs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o// 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang
20a3(35 ha): 'bras chan bu ram la sogs pa dang / mngar gsum za zhing klag par bya'o// de ltar na 'grub
20a4(35 ha): par 'gyur te/ thub pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa bzhin du/ the tshom med par bya'o//
20a5(35 ha): 'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba/ drug cu rtsa
20a6(35 ha): bzhi pa cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so// zhus dag / bkra shis dge legs 'dre/
1a1(36 a): gza' rnams kyi yum bzhugs so//
1b1(36 a): rgya gar skad du/ gra ha mA tra~M ka nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas
1b2(36 a): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'brog
1b3(36 a): gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // srin po dang dri za dag lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang //
1b4(36 a): lto 'phye chen po dang / bdud dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / bab sangs dang / phur bu dang / gza' lhag pa dang / spen pa
1b5(36 a): dang / sgra gcan 'dzin dang / mjug rings rnams dang / rgyu skar nyi shu brgyad la sogs pa mang po rnams kyis bstod pa/ rdo rje chen po'i dam
1b6(36 a): tshig gi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ rdo rje'i khri la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang yang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang
1b7(36 a): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gtum po dang / byang chub
2a1(36 a): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sde dang / byang chub dpa' sems dpa' sems chen po phyag na rdo rje
2a2(36 a): gzhu can dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje bdag po dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo
2a3(36 a): rje'i rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
2a4(36 a): gzegs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu gzigs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
2a5(36 a): chen po 'jig rten dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
2a6(36 a): dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
2a7(36 a): sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i spyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang / byang chub sem
2b1(36 a): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sa dge 'dun rnams kyis bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to// bkod pa chen
2b2(36 a): bo'i rgyan gyi nor bu zhes bya ba thog mar dge ba dang / bar du dge ba dang / tha mar dge ba dang / don bza dang / tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yod
2b3(36 a): su byang ba'i chos ston to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'khor de dag la bltas te/ langs nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong/
2b4(36 a): du mar bskor ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bsnyems pa dang bcas pas skyil mo krungs legs par bcas nas/ 'khor de dag la 'gying bag tu bltas te/
2b5(36 a): rdo rje'i thal mo rang gi snying gar bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gza' mi bzad pa/ mi bzad pa'i gzugs can/ drag shul
2b6(36 a): gyi sems dang ldan pa/ khro ba khro ba'i gzugs can dag sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ mtho 'tshams par bgyid pa/ mdangs 'phrog par bgyid cing // kha cig
2b7(36 a): nor zas 'phrog par bgyid/ kha cig srog 'phrog par bgyid/ sems can tshe ring ba kha cig ni thung ngur bgyid do// de ltar sems can thams cad la gnod cing 'tshe bgyid pa de
2b8(36 a): rnams kyi slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis so can thams cad la bsrung bar 'gyur babasha du gsol// bcom lda 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ga
3a1(36 a): yang khyod kyis snying rje bskyed pas sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang / gsang chen pas kyang ches gsang ba de bzhin gshegs par zhu bar byed pa legs so las
3a2(36 a): so// de'i phyir legs par rab du nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / gza' mi bzang ba'i gzugs can shin tu khro ba dang / shin tu 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyis mchod pa
3a3(36 a): dang / mchod yin dang bzlas brjod bzang po gsang ba pas kyang ches gsang ba ngas bshad do// de dag mchod pas mchod gyur cing // gnod pa byas na gnod byed dang / gzal
3a4(36 a): de kun gyi kha dog dang // ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba dang // lha rnams dang ni lha mi dang // mi 'am ci dang klu dag dang // gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang / mi rnams dang ni
3a5(36 a): mi yin// drag po gzi brjid chen po dang // zos pa zhi bar byed pa'i de'i// gsang sngags rnams dang mchod pa dag/ rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
3a6(36 a): bzhin gshes pa shAkya thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nas snying rjen par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye ste/ gza' rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs so// de nas de'i mdo la nyi ma la sogs
3a7(36 a): pa'i gza' thams cad langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas pus mo btsugs
3a8(36 a): nas thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
3b1(36 a): gyis bdag cag la sman yon btags par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis bdag cag rnams la sogs pa chos smra ba rnams la bsrung bar 'gyur/
3b2(36 a): ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa band
3b3(36 a): zhi la ba de
3b4(36 a): ba rnams bgyid par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang / gsang sngags bka' stsal to//
3b5(36 a): oM me g+ha la ka lA ya swA hA/ oM shi ta sha bai swAhA/ oM rak+Sha aM ga ku mA rA ya swA hA/ oM bud+d+hA ya swA hA/ oM br-i ha sA ta ye swA hA/ oM su rod ta mA ya swA hA/ oM kr-ih+NA pa Na ye swAhA/
3b6(36 a): oM a mr-i ta pri yA ya swA hA/ oM dz+yo ti ke ta bai swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni gza' dgu'i gseng sngags kyi snying / po bklags pas grub pa yin te/ kha dog dang mthun par spos kyi
3b7(36 a): dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis pa byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o// kham pa'am zangs la sogs pa 'am/ gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod yon phul nas/ re re la yang
3b8(36 a): bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// lag na rdo rje de'i 'og tu gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig lan bdun brjod par bya'o// de nas
3b9(36 a): gza' rnams thams cad srung bar byed par 'gyur ro// dbul ba'i gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// che zad pa las tshe ring por byed par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje
4a1(36 a): dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / gzhan yang sems can gyi rigs gang yin pa dang / gang dag gi rna lam du
4a2(36 a): grag pa de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod par byas te/ nyin gcig
4a3(36 a): bzhin du klog par byed pa'i chos smra ba gang yin pa de la gza' thams cad bdag nyid kun gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//
4a4(36 a): de dang rigs gcig pa rnams kyi dbul ba yang sel bar byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs
4a5(36 a): bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// bsam pa thas cad yongs su rdzogs par
4a6(36 a): byed pa'i gza' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu skar rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gza'i khyim bcu gnyis po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he brjo/
4a7(36 a): pad+me badz+re/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ s+pha ra sma ra/ krI DA ya kr-I DA ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ madz+dza ya mar+d+ha ya/ g+ha Ta ya g+ha Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nAM/ ku ru ku ru/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/
4a8(36 a): k+Sha pa ya k+Sha pa ya/ shAn+te shAn+te/ dAn+te dAn+te/ d+ha ma ya d+ha ma ya/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdag nyid myur du bstan 'du gsol// bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang sem
4b1(36 a): can thams cad la srung du gsolo// srung du gsol/ gza' thams cad dang / rgyu skar rnams kyi gnod pa zlog tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul chen po
4b2(36 a): mnga' ba/ sdang ba'i sems can rnams bsal du gsol// bdag gi sdig pa rnams skam du gsol// tsaNaDe tsaN De/ tu ruta ru/ tsaNaDe ni tsaHShe ni/ mu yu mu yu/ mu tsu mu nu/
4b3(36 a): ba ha baha/ u gre u gre \u0f7f me/ pU ra ya me/ ma no rad+b+ha pU ra ya/ sarba ta thA ga tA a d+hiSh+Tha de/ sa ma ye swA hA/ oM swA hA/ hU swA hA/ hriHswA hA/ d+h+waM swA hA/ d+ha~M swA hA/ pad+ma d+ha ra swA hA/ a
4b4(36 a): d+hI d+ya ye swA hA/ so mA ya swA hA/ d+hA ra Ni sU tA ya swA hA/ bud+d+ha ya swA hA/ br-ihaswa ta ye swA hA/ shu kA ya swA hA/ kriSh+Na baN ye swA hA/ ra ha bai swA hA/ kA ta bi swA hA/ bu d+hA ya swA hA/ badz+ra
4b5(36 a): d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma d+ha rA ya paT/ ku mA rA ya swA hA/ sarba gre h+ye b+h+yaHswA hA/ sarba na k+Sha tra~M b+hAHswA hA/ sarbad de sha rA shin g+hu swA hA/ sarba su pa dra be swA hA/ oM sarba bi d+hi tsUng+ku pha T+Ta sA hA/
4b6(36 a): phyag na rdo rje 'di ni gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ kyi gsang sngags kyi chog dngos grub thams cad kyi gzhi yi no// phyag na rdo rje gang yang gza' rnams kyi gzungs
4b7(36 a): kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston zla tha chung yar gyi ngo'i tshes bdun nas brtsams te/ gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/ tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du gza' rnams la mchod pa byas
4b8(36 a): te gzung bar bya'o// de nas zla ba nya'i nyin mtshan thog thag bklags na/ de dag la lo dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bar 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // gzi' 'jigs pa dang /
5a1(36 a): skar mda' ltung ba dang / zla ba dang rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs pas mi 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// gza' thams cad
5a2(36 a): mchod la byas par 'gyur ro// gza' thams cad kyis ci 'dod pa sbyin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gza' rnams kyis phyag 'tshal te/ legs so
5a3(36 a): legs so zhes gsol te mi snang bar gyur to// gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i bzungs rdzogs so// zhus dag
1a1(37 ki): skar ma'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs bzhus so//
1b1(37 ki): rgya gar skar du/ nak+Sha tra mA tri ka nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ skar ma'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/
1b2(37 ki): drang srong skar ma la dga' bas nus pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas
1b3(37 ki): la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom
1b4(37 ki): ldan 'das 'brog gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsi dang /
1b5(37 ki): gza' brgyad dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas drang srong skar ma la dag
1b6(37 ki): bas stan las las te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyu skar mi bzang ba drag shul can sems can
1b7(37 ki): rnams la tshe thung zhing mdangs 'phrog pa dang / tshe 'phrog cing bkra mi shis pa byed pa dang / sems can rnams la gnod cing 'tshe ba de dag
2a1(37 ki): mi bgyid pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gangs gang gis sems can rnams la phan par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol zhes zhus pas/
2a2(37 ki): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar ma la dga' ba khyod kyis sems can la phan par bya ba'i phyir zhus pa legs so// ngas bshad kyis legs par nyon la yid la gzung
2a3(37 ki): zhig/ rgyu skar drag po mi bzad pa dug pa can rnams kyis mchod pa dang bzlas brjod bzang po'i gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang bangs bshad do// de dag mchod pas lnga
2a4(37 ki): srin gdug pa can rnams dang / rgyu skar drag po khros pa'i gnod pa zhi par bye ba'i mchod pa'i rim pa bshad par bya'o// rgyu skar gyi gnas nyi shu tsa brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo//
2a5(37 ki): gza' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// klu rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal ba las/
2a6(37 ki): rgyu skar rnams 'di lta ste/ tha skar dang ni bra nye dang // smin drug dang ni snar ma dang // mgo dang lag dang nam so dang // rgyal dang skag dang mchu dang ni// bre dang dbo dang me
2a7(37 ki): bzhi dang / nag pas ri sa ga dang // lha 'tshams dang ni snron snrubs dang // chu stod dang ni chu smang dang // gro bzhin dang ni mon gre dang // mon gru dang ni khrum stong dang // khrum
2a8(37 ki): smad dang ni nam gru'o// de rnams kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smra zhing 'khod do// 'di lta ste/ cha yi sed/ snang d+ha me/ hA tshwa ye/ kun
2b1(37 ki): ts+tsha ye/ dza ya ye/ be ra tsa ye/ bad cag rnams ni shar phyogs na rgyu zhing gnas pa'o zhes 'khod par gyur to// mtshun ye/ en tra ye/ b+ho ye/ tsar a ga ye/ tra hrur ste/
2b2(37 ki): a ta b+hA ye/ a tri b+ha ye/ bdag cag rnams ni lho phyogs na rgyu zhing gnas pa'o zhes 'khod par gyur to// man tra ri ye/ man+dA ra ye/ sna zas ye/ ba yu ye/ ba sha ma ye/ hade d+ha/
2b3(37 ki): yed g+ho na shi ye/ bdag cag rnams ni nub phyogs na rgyu zhing gnas pa'o zhes 'khod par gyur to// pus d+harma ye/ mon gre ne ra ye/ khrum wa ra ta ye/ khru ral pu ra ye/ nam
2b4(37 ki): gru hu ra ye/ tha skar kur nam gru hu/ bra nye b+he ra ye/ bdag cag rnams ni byang phyogs na rgyu zhing gnas pa'o zhes 'khod par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang
2b5(37 ki): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la sogs pa dang / drang srong skar ma la dga' ba dang / skar ma'i gnas nyi shu rtsa brgyad la bka' stsal pa/ gzung
2b6(37 ki): sngags 'di klog pa tsam gyis skar ma'i gdon dang gnod pa kun las rab tu bsrung nas bde ba rgya chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de nas de rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu
2b7(37 ki): smras pa/ oM ra ma le ra ma le/ a d+he d+ha ra d+hA/ a kAn/ bi ma le/ sarba badz+ra ra ti dur+Na/ ma sha ma she ye/ ma ma sa pA ri sa ra sa ra/ b+had+ha ma swA hA// gang zhig gzungs sngags
2b8(37 ki): 'di lan cig brjod pas skar ma ngan pa'i gnod pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'di la the tshom med do// rgyu skar ngan pa gang la yang // skyes dang shi dang mna' shwa dang // gshin bag
3a1(37 ki): mkhar las btang gnan sogs// drag po gang byas las rnams dus// gang zhig gzungs 'di brjod gyur na// de dag thams cad dge legs
3a2(37 ki): 'gyur// rmi lam ngan dang bkra mi shis// gnod pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// sde dpon chen po gsan du gsol// dus gsum mchod pa'i bye brag las// phyogs bzhir
3a3(37 ki): gtor ma brgya phul// cho ga bzhin du g+ha skar mchod// bsrung bdus su bstsal bar bgyi// nam gri 'bying / tsar cir/ su r+ya bi d+ha ye/ kro d+ha ya/ dza la dza la// nam kar dza ya//
3a4(37 ki): a Ta dza lai/ pu ta pu ta/ tsa ga Na/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra/ sarba bi sha na/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ sh+lo d+ha sho d+ha/ nA ga ta/ sarba pra ta gi ra hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di lan cig brjod pas/ lha'i
3a5(37 ki): gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / 'byung po'i gad ni dang / gdon thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro// gza' skar ngan pa dang / bkra mi shes pa tham
3a6(37 ki): cad bzlog par 'gyur ro// stag dang dom dang / sbrul dang srog chags ma rungs pa rnams sgrol bar 'gyur ro// nad dang rims thams cad las srung bar byed do// lam
3a7(37 ki): du 'jug pa na yang bde bar 'gro zhing bde ba nyid du ldog par byed do// dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sems rnam par yengs pa dang / dran pa nyams pa yang dran bzhin du
3a8(37 ki): bde bar 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di la yon tan dpag tu med par shes par bya'o// gang zhig gzugs 'di 'dri 'am/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ 'dzin tam// mthong ba dang /
3b1(37 ki): tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro//
3b2(37 ki): mchod pa dang / bkur bsti byed pa dag gi bar chad dang rkyen rnams zhi nas/ mi mthun pa'i ngan pa thams cad las grol te bde bcan du skye bar 'gyur ro//
3b3(37 ki): rgyu skar rnams kyang ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ oM b+ha har ni/ he ra cer/ sa he sa ras he ra/ kun+da le/ tra ta le/
3b4(37 ki): tsarta ri swA hA/ zhes lan cig brjod pas rgyu skar gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo // lo brgya'i bar du 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // rgyu skar thams cad la mchod
3b5(37 ki): pa byas par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rgyu skar gyi lha rnams kyis leg so leg so zhes
3b6(37 ki): gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// drang sro skar ma la dgal bas zhus pa'i mdo las skar ma'i yum zhes bya ba/
3b7(37 ki): skar ma ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so// zhus dang
1a1(38 ku): rdo rje'i mchu bzhugs s+ho// /
1b1(38 ku): #/ rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra dur+d+ha nA ma nA ga sa ma ya/ bod skad du/ rdo rje'i mthu zhes bya ba'i klu'i dam tshig go
1b2(38 ku): thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po g.yog 'dor na bzhugs so// 'khor 'dus pa
1b3(38 ku): chen po 'jog po la sogs pa klu'i 'khor dang / lha dang mi'i tshogs chen po 'khor 'dus pa chen po la sems can rnams kyi don chen po
1b4(38 ku): phyir/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dang / re ba thams cad yongs su bskong ba// dge bar byed pa'i chos ston to// de nas grong khyer de na/
1b5(38 ku): bram ze khyab 'jug sbyin zhes bya ba phyug pa// nor che ba longs spro che ba/ rdzas dang yo byad mang po phun sum tshogs pa/ rig byed dang
1b6(38 ku): rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sngags la 'jug pa dang / sngags sgrub pa zhig 'dug ste/ de yang dang yang du klu
1b7(38 ku): dgug me la sbyin sreg byed de/ bram ze de'i lo tog smin kar char pa chad par gyur te// des nga rgyal gyis sgra sngags rab tu
2a1(38 ku): #/ brjod pa dang / 'di skad ces bdag gis char pa'i rgyun dbab cing klu dgug par bya'o zhes smras te/ me'i
2a2(38 ku): sbyin sreg bya bar bshams nas/ til dang / 'bras bu dang / yungs kar rnams dang / 'bru mar tshwa dang bsres te/ sbyin sreg byed
2a3(38 ku): do// de nas klu mi bsrun pa zhig gi gzugs byas te/ des lcags kyi phur bu la bsngags te/ klu'i spyi bor btab pa dang / klu de'i
2a4(38 ku): spyi bogs nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po nyams su myong bar gyur to// klu de yang cher 'khrugs te// khros nas skad cig
2a5(38 ku): thang cig yud tsam de la/ rang gi lus las klu'i shugs myur bar gnod pa chen po byed pa'i rdul tsha ba'i 'od zer de'i lus la btang ste
2a6(38 ku): gnod pa chen pos khebs par byas nas/ bram ze de'i zhing tshig par byas so// des yang lce dbab pa'i char gyi rgyun chen po bram ze de'i
2a7(38 ku): lus la phab nas/ bram ze de la mgon med bskyabs med// dpung gnyen med pas/ me'i sbyin bsreg byed par btang nas/ des bcom
2b1(38 ku): ldan 'das la mgon dang skyabs dang / dpung gnyen btsal bar 'bros par brtsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du brgyugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste/
2b2(38 ku): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das klu khros pas bdag gi srog ma rungs par bgyid par 'tshal te/
2b3(38 ku): skyob pa su yang ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das sgrub tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa sgrub tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po de dbugs
2b4(38 ku): dbyung bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze chen po ma 'jigs shig ngas khyod kyi mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ cang mi
2b5(38 ku): gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzigs su
2b6(38 ku): gsol// mngon sum du gyur bzhin du yang klu mi bsrun pas lo tog bas par ma rungs par bgyis na bcom ldan 'das khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi slad du/
2b7(38 ku): slad ma'i che/ slad ma'i dus na/ sems can thams cad kyi rten ni su lags/ ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das lo tog thams cad kyi don du/ lo tog
2b8(38 ku): rnams mchis par bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / kun tu bsrung ba dang / rab tu 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / lo tog yongs su bskyang zhing klu bzlog pa de bshad
3a1(38 ku): du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje klu khro bo'i khro ba
3a2(38 ku): byed pa'i snying po smras pa/ rdo rje'i mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
3a3(38 ku): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yod de/ ngas kyang bshad par bya'o// de nas myur du gnod pa bkag pa'i phyir/ lo tog thams cad yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur ro//
3a4(38 ku): legs par srung bar 'gyur ro// me'i phung po chen pos phyogs bzhi kun nas thams cad mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// me 'bar ba'i rim pa'i sprin chen pos
3a5(38 ku): nam mkha' lding 'dab ma gdengs pa'i shugs kyis gnod pa zhes bya ba'i sprin gyis rim pas nam mkha' kun khyab par byed do// lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu
3a6(38 ku): thams cad bsrungs te/ gnas par 'gyur ro// des klu la sogs pa thams cad kun tu rab tu 'bar bar gyur to// klu mi bsrun pa rnams phung bar gyur to// khyod
3a7(38 ku): dang 'dum par 'gyur ba ngas bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
3a8(38 ku): kyis sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / brtse ba'i slad du gzungs chen po 'di'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bshadadu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di
3b1(38 ku): bka' stsal to// na mo b+ha ga ba The/ sarba bud+d+hA naM/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ shakya rA dzA ya/ oM dza la dzal/ gi ri b+ha ba na/ daM pa ta be ga ma hA tsaN+Da na Ta/ hri da ya tsa la ni/ hu ru hu ru/
3b2(38 ku): ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ pa tsa ya/ sarba sa san/ na ga ku la/ pa sha na/ d+ha raH/ pra ba ra/ tsaH/ ge ge ma hA pA la pa ragra ma/ sU ri ta/ ro'u tra/ ma tha maH/
3b3(38 ku): pra dz+wa la/ ma la dang ni/ tsaN+Da be ga ba ti/ pra ba ra bi man/ dngo Ni/ hUM hUM/ bal ba ti/ beg ba ti/ sa ra sa ra/ bis bis ra/ bis ran du/ sarbas ten/ pas na ti pra
3b4(38 ku): sa pA la/ pad tra/ san d+hA ra Ni/ a ba sarban+tu/ sarba b+ha ba na/ bi ga pa ti swA hA/ hUM hUM/ hUM phaT/ nA ga ri d+hA ri Ni hUM phaT/ dza la ma Ni phaT/ dza li ni phaT/ phaT phaT phaT sA
3b5(38 ku): hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa 'di bshad ma thag tu/ klu mi bsrun pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / 'jigs par byed pa thams cad dang / klu dang klu chen po 'khor
3b6(38 ku): dang bcas pa thams cad klad pa na par gyur to// lus kyang rul te rnags shing dri mi zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ 'di skad
3b7(38 ku): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi zad pa dag bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis nongs pa ni mkhyen pa lta zhig/ 'on
3b8(38 ku): kyang bcom ldan 'das rig pa 'dzin pa gnod par 'dod pas/ bdag cag klu la brnyas pa dang / brdeg pa dang / 'ching ba dang / skrod pa dang / gnod pa de'i tshe/ tso
4a1(38 ku): ldan 'das klu mi bsrun pa rnams 'khrugs te/ de'i tshe mo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams las rungs par bgyid/ sang ba dbang bar
4a2(38 ku): bgyid// sad dang rlung gis 'khrugs par bgyid/ ha cang char che ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma lags par char chen po 'bebs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
4a3(38 ku): bdas rig pa 'dzin pas sngags smras pa/ byams pa bcom ldan 'das la gnas par bgyi/ byams pa'i go bgo bar bgyi/ byams pa'i ral gri lag na thogs par
4a4(38 ku): bgyis te// byams pas ni gnod pa bgyis pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dam bcas
4a5(38 ku): par 'tshal te/ gang na rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di rab tu spyod pa der/ bcom ldan 'das klus gtses par mi 'gyid do// gang na snying po'i gzungs 'dis srung bar bgyid pa dang
4a6(38 ku): yongs su bskyang ba dang / gzung ba dang / yongs su skyab par bgyid pa dang / sred bu bre ba dang / mtshams dgum pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyis rigs dgum pa dang / so sor
4a7(38 ku): gtor bar bgyis pa der/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par rgyun du gnod pa thams cad bzlog par 'tshal lo// lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams
4a8(38 ku): cad kun tu bsrung bar 'tshal lo// yongs su bskyab par 'tshal lo// tha na rkun po dang / g.yon can dang / ri dgas dang / bya rnams kyang kun du bsrung bar 'tshal
4b1(38 ku): te slad kyis kyang ma rungs par mi bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po de dag la legs so// khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig/ khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling
4b2(38 ku): legs par srung bar gyis shig/ de nas de'i 'og tu cho ga byas pa/ las thams cad byed pas dge ba brjod par bya'o// lo tog la gnod pa byed na/ de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pa
4b3(38 ku): zhing gi dbus sam/ khang pa'i steng ngam/ gnas mthon por skyil mo krung bzhi pa byas la/ phyogs bzhir bum pa bzhi dgod de bzhag go// me tog gi sim dgram mo//
4b4(38 ku): gzugs 'khyug pa bdun bya'o// 'bras las byas pa 'khyug pa bya ste/ gzugs re re zhing 'khrug pa nyi shu rtsa re re bya'o// 'bras chan dang / 'o thug bsres pa dang / no
4b5(38 ku): dang 'o ma gzhag par bya'o// 'bras bu dang me tog gzhag par bya'o// phyogs bzhir bya ma bum gzhag par bya'o// pad+ma lta bu'i zan gyi gtor ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o//
4b6(38 ku): dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bum pa chen po gzhag par bya'o// 'bru rnam pa lnga dang / chu dang bems dgang ngo // yungs kar dang 'bras yos blugs par bya'o// sngags
4b7(38 ku): lan drug bzlas par bya'o// bzlas pa ni seng ljang gi phur bu bzhi dang / lcags kyi phur bu gcig bya ste/ thams cad sor brgyad pa'i tshad du bya'o// ba ser skya'i lci ba las
4b8(38 ku): byas pa'i klu'i gzugs bzhi byas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir gzhag par bya'o// seng ldeng gi phur bu de dag kyang / snying gar nub par gzugs so// sngags
5a1(38 ku): brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o// shar phyogs su mgo dgu pa gzhag par bya'o// lho phyogs su mgo bdun pa bzhag par bya'o// nub phyog
5a2(38 ku): su mgo lnga pa gzhag par bya'o// byang phyogs su mgo gsum pa gzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yang mgo dgu pa gzhag par bya'o// spos por re re ste lnga
5a3(38 ku): gzhag par bya'o// yungs kar dang / bzas pos bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya ste/ phyogs bzhir gtor ro// gzugs bris la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la
5a4(38 ku): btags la/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir gzugs so// zhing gi dbus su yang gzugs so// skyed mos tshal gyi dbus su yang gzugs so// de gcugs ma thag tu phyog/
5a5(38 ku): bzhi kun nas me'i ri'i sul chen pos mtshams bcad pa byas par 'gyur ro// ji srid du phur bu ma byung ba de srid du mtshams bcad pa chen por 'gyur ro// lo tog thams
5a6(38 ku): cad dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// tha na 'dab ma gcig kyang nyams par mi 'gyur na/ yal ga dang sdong bu bskams
5a7(38 ku): pa lta ci smos/ srog chags kyi rigs/ ri dgas dang / bya thams cad kyang kha bcings par 'gyur ro// ma rungs par byed par mi nus so// gnas der rlung dang /
5a8(38 ku): sprin dang / ser ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung ma rungs par byed mi nus so// ma rungs par gyur na yang slar brtas par 'gyur ro// yang stobs dang / rtas pa dang /
5b1(38 ku): 'ongs yod par 'gyur ro// bum pa chen po'i nang na yod pa de yang / zhing dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor bar byas na/ srog chags
5b2(38 ku): gnod byed thams cad med par 'gyur ro// sbrul dang byi ba thams cad med par 'gyur ro// sbrul dang byi ba thams cad dang / ne'u lo dang / byi 'u dang / dom dang / sbal pa
5b3(38 ku): dang / sha sbrang dang / mchu srung dang / phye ma lib dang / 'dab chags rnams kyang mi gnod par 'gyur ro// grog sbur thams cad med par 'gyur ro// tha na phye ma leb la
5b4(38 ku): sogs pas nam yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// drod sher las skyes pa dang / brdzus te skyes pa dang / sgo nga las skyes pa dang / 'gro ba yongs kyis gnod par byed mi
5b5(38 ku): nus so// brlan dang me tog las skyes pa'i srog chags kyi rnam pa dag kyang phur bu ma phyung gi bar du nam yang mi 'byung ngo // phur bu ma phyung gi bar du yang klu'i nyes pa
5b6(38 ku): rnam pa sna tshogs dag mi 'byung zhing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / shing ljon pa rnams la
5b7(38 ku): gtor na/ srog chags thams cad lhung zhing med par 'gyur ro// srin bu t+ya ma bu ka dang / trai la ta dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / rkang pa brgyad pa dang / srog
5b8(38 ku): chags kyi rigs gzhan dag kyang phur bu ma byung gi bar du med par 'gyur ro// mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhing gi phyogs bzhir zhi ba'i las byas te/ nas
6a1(38 ku): dang gro dang / til dang yungs kar dang / 'bras dang / mar dang bsres te/ sreg par byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro
6a2(38 ku): skye gnas su song ba dag gis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so// gzungs 'di dang cho gar byas pa mtha' dag bri bar byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad
6a3(38 ku): dang drang srong chen po ri byi dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa bris la/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ gnas mthon por gzugs so// gtor ma dang / me tog dang / 'dug
6a4(38 ku): pa dag kyang dbul lo// seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa la lan stong bzlas te khang pa'i steng du gcugs na rlung dang / sad ser ba thams cad thub par 'gyur
6a5(38 ku): lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma ma rungs par byed pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / man dzu li ka dang / byi ba dang /
6a6(38 ku): sbrang ma dang / t+yA la bu ka dang / trai la dang / pi sha ka ti ka dang / nya phyis can dang / nya dang / lo mi ka dang / sbal ba dang / ne'u le dang / phag dang / gan ti ka dang /
6a7(38 ku): seng ge dang / rkang mangs dang / rkang gcig pa dang / rus sbal dang / grog mo dang / sbrang rtsi'i sbrang ma dang / thang gi sbrang ma dang / bung ba nag po dang / shang ka ni ka
6a8(38 ku): dang / sa'i 'og nas 'byung ba dang / ma lu shi ka dang / 'ug pa dang / byi ba dang / mchu rings la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi rigs med par 'gyur ro// mi 'byung
6b1(38 ku): zhing thams cad phung bar 'gyur ro// bya rog dang / byi'u dang / khug rta dang / phug ron dang / ma d+hu ri ka dang / bug pa dang / khan dza na da dang / ri sgeg la sogs pa thams
6b2(38 ku): cad med par 'gyur ro// sngags 'dis phur bu la yongs su bzlas pa byas te phyogs bcing ngo // na mo bud+d+hA ya/ oM a li mi li/ tsaN+De/ pi ri li/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ tsaN+Di ban+d+ha
6b3(38 ku): ya swA hA// de nas drang srong chen po ri byis/ bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na 'dug pas/ gzungs 'di thos nas stan las langs te/ bco ldan 'das
6b4(38 ku): kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis srogs chags kyi rigs gnod par sems pa rab tu gnod par
6b5(38 ku): sems pa/ dug 'chang ba/ me tog dang / lo tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sdong bu dang / rtsa ba ma rungs par bgyid pa thams cad kyi kha bcings par bgyi'o//
6b6(38 ku): bzlog par bgyi'o// bsdigs par bgyi'o// phyogs bzhi nas dpag tshad bcu tshun chad du mtshams bcad pa chen po bgyi'o// kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgyi'o//
6b7(38 ku): bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus kyi tshe na/ gnod par sems pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o// sngags kyi tshig rdzas su gsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'a
6b8(38 ku): sems can thams cad kyi don dang / bdag la thugs rtse ba'i slad du byin gyis brlabs tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// /
7a1(38 ku): drang srong chen pongs byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang lo tog dang / me tog dang / bzlas zungang /
7a2(38 ku): 'dab ma yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir sngags smros shig/ de nas drang srong chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas gzungs 'di smras so// na mo b+ha ga wa
7a3(38 ku): te shAkya rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo a gas+t+ra ya ma hA ri Sha ye/ tad+ya thA/ k+Sha mi tsu li/ tsam li/ ba rab ri ha be li/ ban d+ha ni/ na sha ni/ da ha da ha/ a su mu ri
7a4(38 ku): tsa ri/ sarba duSh+Ta/ ban d+ha ne/ tun ta b+han d+ha na/ sarba sa ra ni/ k+Sha k+Sha k+Sha k+ShA/ ma nu k+Shu rak+Shi ba ra/ sa ri pa li hu li hu ti hu ti/ sa ra a ra na/ swa ran tu/ sarba pA pA pa
7a5(38 ku): nA ga/ sha du liM swA hA/ drang srong ri byis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin sngar rig pa 'di smras ma thag tu/ de nas klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gnod par sems
7a6(38 ku): pa thams cad kha bub tu 'gyel nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skad chen pos smre sngags 'don te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ma rungs pa lags so// drang srong
7a7(38 ku): gi dmod pa bab par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag drang srong gi dmod pa'i mes tshig go/ kun tu tshig go/ bcom ldan 'das slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling
7a8(38 ku): gi sems can rnams la bdag cag 'che bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das slan chad bdag cag gis 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'dab
7b1(38 ku): pa ma rungs par mi bgyid do// srog chags kyi rigs thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po dag de ltar
7b2(38 ku): khyod kyis gyis shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dang / lo tog dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / yal ga dang / lo ma rnams
