7b3(38 ku): baphel zhing rgyas pa dang / bde bar rjes su srungs shig/ de nas drang srong chen po des chog rgyas pa smras so// bcom ldan 'das kha shar phyogs su bsdus te
7b4(38 ku): mchis pas rig pa drang srong gi snying po 'di ril ba 'bring po chus bkang ba la/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyis te/ drang srong gis smras pas phyog
7b5(38 ku): bzhir gtor bar bya'o// a pa ra sa re s+pha ra/ shA rA shA pa sa pa ta ri sha hr-i dA ya/ kro d+ha da tsa/ mu kha na/ ban+d+ha ya/ pra na pa rA/ g+hu mu ru tsa la swA hA/ sngags 'di lan
7b6(38 ku): bdun bzlas pa tsam gyis klu gnod pa thams cad tsha bas gdungs par 'gyur ro// rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa'i srog chags kyi rigs thams cad dmod pas
7b7(38 ku): gdungs par 'gyur te/ thams cad byer to// slar yang phyogs der lo tog la gnod par mi byed do// srog chags kyi rigs thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur ro/
7b8(38 ku): yang lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma ma rungs par mi bgyid/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
8a1(38 ku): drang srong chen po legs so legs so// khyod kyis ci nas kyang sems can thams cad la legs
8a2(38 ku): par bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams
8a3(38 ku): cad la legs par srung bar gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na
8a4(38 ku): rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na rjes su bsrung bgyid/
8a5(38 ku): yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ lag
8a6(38 ku): na rdo rje legs so legs so// sems can thams cad yongs su srungs shig/
8a7(38 ku): rdo rje'i mchu zhes bya ba'i klu'i dam tshig las/ lo tog la gnod pa zhi bar byed pa'i cho ga klu'i
8a8(38 ku): snying po rdzogs s+ho// / zhus dag// shuH/
1a1(39 ke): rdo rje gnam lcags mchu bzhugs s+ho//
1b1(39 ke): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra lo ha dur+d+ha nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje gnam lcags kyi/
1b2(39 ke): mchu zhes pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
1b3(39 ke): pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na rgyu zhing a mra'i tshal du gshegs te phyin nas/ a mra'i tshal du lus 'phag
1b4(39 ke): ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin nas/ bco
1b5(39 ke): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang
1b6(39 ke): phyug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das pa 'di skad
1b7(39 ke): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad 'dus nas/ klu thams cad kyi snying 'phrog par bgyid pa/ snying
2a1(39 ke): #bgyis par bgyid pa/ klu ma rungs pa rnams kyi rigs phung bar 'gyur ba/ rlung dang ser ba'i sprin dang / ma
2a2(39 ke): rungs pa thams cad bzlog par bgyid pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog 'byor par bgyid pa/ rdo rje gnam lcag
2a3(39 ke): mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams kyi don mdzad pa'i slad du/ byin gyi
2a4(39 ke): brlabs du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la bka'
2a5(39 ke): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rnams ngas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs
2a6(39 ke): kyis smros shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po
2a7(39 ke): chen po bzhi yis gzungs sngags smras so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag
2b1(39 ke): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol gyis gnon pa'i mthu bo che rnams la/
2b2(39 ke): phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gnam lcags mchu 'bar ba ma rungs pa drag/
2b3(39 ke): tu dgod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ma tha ma tha/ pra ma thA pra ma thA/ dz+wa li ta b+hi kri ta/ badz+ra dzA ya dzA ya/ ma hA ba ya birba pa rakra ma/ ko Ta ra tsa ya/ pra ma b+ha bu bu ma/
2b4(39 ke): pra ma sa re/ b+ho b+ho nA ga di pa di pa/ b+hi sa ra ma d+ha/ pra ma d+ha na/ na mur d+ha nan/ s+pho Ta ya na/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ b+hA ra b+ha ra/ b+ha rna tsakra dad na/ b+ho ba na/ gen dre/ ma
2b5(39 ke): ka ma de/ b+ha s+dza tsakre na/ shi na ra tsi na da me/ hu ti hu ti/ li hUM hUM phaT/ mu du mu du/ ha na tu/ sarba duSh+Tan/ b+ha s+pho dA ya/ hr-i da ya/ ma h+ye shwe re/ dzi la di tri shu da ra da ra/
2b6(39 ke): ha na ha na/ hUM hUM phaT/ mu tsi mu tsi/ du tsi ba b+ha ba b+ha ba/ kA nai k+Sha ne/ tsa tu ra nun/ ma hA rA dza nan/ dze li ti shag ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ phu phaT/ sU ra s+phu ra/ b+h+ye s+phu ra b+hI
2b7(39 ke): sU ra/ tsa ra rba tsarba/ tsa ra b+ha/ na zhu shu ya dusta nA ga hr-i da yA/ sU ta yA/ hUM hUM phaT/ du sta a sha ni/ b+had ta ma ga shi byi la rgya tsa la/ birma ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT
2b8(39 ke): swAhA/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra/ b+hon gi ti bai ti b+h+yo tsan d+h+ye/ b+h+yo b+ha ya/ b+he b+ho du/ ti dwe ti du/ hU~M hUM phaT phaT/ b+ha dzi ya a shi ni/ na sh+tsa hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ b+ha dzA ya ya/
3a1(39 ke): shi na/ na sh+ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sarba nag hr-i da ya ni/ bi s+pho Ta kA ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ b+hU tA ba lo ki te y+ra swA hA/ bu ma ya swA hA/ byis b+hu
3a2(39 ke): ra ya swA hA/ ma hA sha ra dzA li/ ti shu lu ye swA hA// tsa tud+ha me ra dza sa ma da ra ye swA hA// pu tsa ge ya phaT swA hA// oM daM ri di ri swA hA// dzA ba li ti b+ha ga ti ye swA hA/ dzu ti dzu ti
3a3(39 ke): swA hA/ hA phaT phaT swA hA/ rdo rje 'bar ba gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu/ klu ma rungs pa rnams rul nas/ dri mi zhim pa rnams bsnams
3a4(39 ke): par 'gyur ro// lus so sor zhig cing khro bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lnga
3a5(39 ke): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten du thams cad kyis smad par gyur/ bdag cag ni ma rungs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thos
3a6(39 ke): cad la gnod par mi bgyid/ 'gum par mi bgyid/ chung ngu na mig gis blta bar mi bgyid na/ skabs bstsal bar lta ci smos/ rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po glang po
3a7(39 ke): lta bu dang / klu'i rgyal po gdugs lta bu dang / klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas btugs te
3a8(39 ke): phyag 'tshal nas/ klu thams cad kyis dus phyi ma'i che/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / lo ma dang
3b1(39 ke): yal ga thams cad bsrung bar bgyi/ rlung dang / ser ba dang / tsha ba thams cad gcad par bgyi/ dus dus su char gyi rgyun yang dbab par bgyi'o// rang gi dam tshig dang /
3b2(39 ke): yi dam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rjes su bsrung bar bgyi'o// sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yid la bsams pa yong
3b3(39 ke): su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / gnod par mi bgyid do// sdom pa yang 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyi khyad par gyi yon tan 'di las 'gal bar bgyid na/ bdag
3b4(39 ke): cag kyang byang chub mchog tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur/ de'i tho tshig kyang 'di lags te/ tad+ya thA/ oM ta ki kaM ta/ gu li g+hu li/ mu li/
3b5(39 ke): sha gu gu shi ti/ bI ru ti/ hu yu hu yu/ hu ri ti ha/ char che ba 'am/ char mi 'bab pa'am/ dus ma yin par char 'bab pa 'am/ rlung dang sprin dang / dus ma yin
3b6(39 ke): ba'i rlung dang / gnam lcags lhung ba'i tshe/ rig 'dzin gyi bro chog 'di khang thog gam/ sa thon po'i steng / ri'i steng yang rung / kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ lan
3b7(39 ke): bdun du skad chen por bzlas nas/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas te gyen du gtor na/ gtor ma thag tu klu thams cad dum bur 'gyur zhing / nan tan du byas pas/
3b8(39 ke): myur du tshar 'bebs so// dril bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ phyogs bzhir kha bltas nas dkrol na/ mtshams gcad par 'gyur ro// rdo rje la lan brgya rtsa
4a1(39 ke): brgyad bzlas pas rlung 'gag par byed do// lan gcig dran pa tsam gyis rlung dang / ser ba dang / sprin zlog par byed pa'o// gnas lcags kya
4a2(39 ke): chur 'gyur ro// de kyang la bsgreng zhing / phyogs gang du bskor ba deng ser pa 'byol lo// nang bar gnas dben par 'dug ste/ lan nyi shu rgya gsum du bzlas na drung ba
4a3(39 ke): ser ba dang / sprin yang bkag cing / klu gnod par mi byed de/ byis kyang mi tshugs so// sungs kang la bsngags nas phyogs bzhir gtor na/ mi gcig tu mtshas
4a4(39 ke): bcad de/ rlung dang / sprin kyang mi g.yos te/ gang bsgre ba nyan cing rgyun tu bsrung zhing gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro// gnod pa byed pa thams cad sel to// legs
4a5(39 ke): bar khrus byas te/ skad gsal bas bzlas te/ phyogs bzhi dang / bla 'og tu yungs kar gyis gtor na/ ser ba dang / rlung dang / klu gnod par byed pa bcings par
4a6(39 ke): 'gyur ro// ltas ngan pa dang / mi dge ba dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / gza' dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad bcings
4a7(39 ke): par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad khor yug tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshangs pa dang / 'jug sreng
4a8(39 ke): dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa yi rangs te/ mngon par bstod do// rdo rje gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// zhus dag// dge'o//
1a1(40 ko): 'phags pa lcags mchu bzhugs so//
1b1(40 ko): #/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya lo ha dur+d+ha na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lcags mchu zhes bya
1b2(40 ko): ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
1b3(40 ko): na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na rgyu zhing / a mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas/ a mra'i tshal du lus 'phags ri'i
1b4(40 ko): dbang po'i zag phug na bzhugs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
1b5(40 ko): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig 'dug nas lha'i dbang po
1b6(40 ko): brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin dang / mi rnams ni bstan pa la
1b7(40 ko): gnod pa bgyid pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin dang / mi 'khor du ma gtogs pa'i bstan pa la yun ring bar gnod
2a1(40 ko): pa'i phyir rgol ba'i dgra lags na/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhi bas mi 'dul na/ bdag la drag pos
2a2(40 ko): 'dul ba'i chos bstan du gsol/ theg pa'i chos dgra srung du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
2a3(40 ko): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po khyod kyis thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i lcags
2a4(40 ko): mchu'i gzungs ma rungs pa 'joms pa/ don thams cad byed pa/ dam pa'i chos bsrung ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar
2a5(40 ko): byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dug thams cad 'jil ba/ mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa/ theg pa'i chos
2a6(40 ko): dgra srung ba/ rkang med pa dang / rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rkang gnyis thams cad skrag tu 'jug
2a7(40 ko): pa dgra thams cad phung bar byed pa/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang /
2b1(40 ko): smye byed dang / bram ze dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / bya'i gdon dang / srul po dang / nam gru dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / gnon po dang / brjed
2b2(40 ko): byed kyi gdon dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / log 'dren gyi gdon dang / ma mo'i gdon
2b3(40 ko): bung bar byed pa/ zas kyi rigs mi mthun pa za ba phung bar byed pa/ rims nad thams cad dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las
2b4(40 ko): gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / 'gro ba drag shul du spyod pa phung bar byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'tshang 'bru ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa lcags
2b5(40 ko): kyi mchu'i gzungs/ nam mkha' lding drag po'i gzungs 'di zungs shig/ bstan pa la gnod pa skrag par byed pa/ char drag po dang / ser ba drag po 'bebs par byed pa'i
2b6(40 ko): gzungs brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ e ta me te/ pra me ti tra/ go le bo le bos se/ mod te/ bad te/ khA ra ne gA na gA ne/ nA ga pu ga na/ me ne pra ti mo ne/ kA li pra ka
2b7(40 ko): li tsan te/ ma hA tsan te na pra ti tsan te/ be ge son/ gon mo hA/ pra mo ha/ mahA moT/ pra mo TA/ na shA ni/ pU na sha na d+he pa ni/ ba la ga Ni pra ba la gA Ni nir d+ha ni be ned thA ni/
2b8(40 ko): kro d+ha ni thid kro d+ha ni/ ha na ha na/ bi ha na bi ha na/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TAn/ na sha ya sarba a b+ha yi pra de hU~M phaT// sngags 'di brjod pa tsam gyis phyogs kun tu/
3a1(40 ko): g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul lo// gnod pa thams cad 'brub tu brgyal lo// ske tshe dang yungs nag tu bsres la/ chu bo dang /
3a2(40 ko): rgya mtsho dang / ri bor gtor ro// de phyin chad char 'bebs par byed do// yang chu bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / rdzing bu lu ma/ 'bab chu/ mnyan dgur bu ram/ sbrang shing dngar sha
3a3(40 ko): kar k+Sha sman sna tshogs 'o ma la bsngags la gtor ro// de'i phyir ser ba chen po 'bebs so// yid bzlos bgyis te sprin la lhas la phyag bya zhing bzlas na/ ji ltar 'dod
3a4(40 ko): ba'i ser ba chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// shes rab can gyis 'phags pa lcags mchu'i gzungs 'di zungs shig/ chongs shig/ brjod cig/ gzhan la ma spel cig
3a5(40 ko): spos shig/ thun mong du min no// rgya mtsho'i chu rdo bzhin mi mngon par spos shig/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa drag po'i gzungs 'dis/ 'thab pa 'am/ rtsod pa 'am/ 'gyed
3a6(40 ko): pa'am/ gang du 'gro yang rung ste/ thams cad rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la byang bu gzugs so// sngags pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dang
3a7(40 ko): gang gis yang rtse gcig tu bya'o// dge slong ba dang / dge slong ma dang / dge tshul pa dang / dge tshul ma dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma gang yang rung bas
3a8(40 ko): bstan pa la gnod pa bsrung ba'i phyir yid la zungs shig/ chongs shig/ de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin dang /
3b1(40 ko): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lcags
3b2(40 ko): mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // zhus dag/
1a1(41 khi): lcags mchu nag po bzhugs so//
1b1(41 khi): #/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya lo ha kA la duSh+TA na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lcags mchu nag po zhes bya/
1b2(41 khi): ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
1b3(41 khi): na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na/ gzings ma'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
1b4(41 khi): pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dzam+bu'i gling gi gnas der 'dong ngo // btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/
1b5(41 khi): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar mnyan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can
1b6(41 khi): rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / 'jog po dang / mtha' yas dang /
1b7(41 khi): dung skyong dang / gzi can dang / e lo'i 'dab ma can dang / mdongs bu dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'byin dang / klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang /
2a1(41 khi): klu'i rgyal po sprin skul dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo bo dgu pa dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo bo bdun pa dang / mgo bo drug pa dang /
2a2(41 khi): mgo bo lnga pa dang / mgo bo gsum pa dang / mgo bo gnyis pa dang / mgo bo stong pa rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mnas bsgrago//
2a3(41 khi): a nan te/ bi nan te/ bi shi ki shi/ a gu bi gu re re/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ b+han dza ya pras shri ra rA Ni/ ma tri tra ma kra ni na nan/ zlo ba na
2a4(41 khi): gen tra ma te/ badz+ra dus te/ na mor nan/ sba la ya/ ma hA re ha ra/ hUM phaT/ ma Ta ma Ta/ sa ra sa ra/ bi ri bi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ swA hA/
2a5(41 khi): sngags tshan dang pos klu rnams 'khrugs nas brgyal lo// bcom ldan 'das lo tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sman rnams dang / rtsi
2a6(41 khi): shing dang / myu gu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams skam par rngo mi thogs lags so// char dus su 'bebs lags so// rtsi shing
2a7(41 khi): nags tshal bskyed par bgyid lags so// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi longs spyod la 'che bar rngo mi thogs lags so// sems
2b1(41 khi): can rnams la rnam par 'tshe bar mi bgyid do// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' las 'das na/ bdag cag rnams kyi lus 'khums par gyur cig/ gnas med par gyur
2b2(41 khi): cig/ lus rngub par gyur cig/ mdze dang / sha bkra 'byung bar gyur cig/ mgo bo 'gas pa dang / snying 'brul bar gyur cig/ ces bre bor ba'o// nye bar 'tshe ba thams
2b3(41 khi): cad la gnod pa 'dor ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par 'dod pa'i 'byung po brgya stong dag kyang sems can rnams kyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed
2b4(41 khi): par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ nir gad tshad/ ning gad tsa ta/ nir gad ta ta/ myur du byer cig/ khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag phung bar gyur cig/
2b5(41 khi): gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / nyes pa mi 'dod pa/ bsrung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni khyod kyi lus la 'jug par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten
2b6(41 khi): la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ mu su mu su/ mu mu/ su mu ru su mu ru/ su mu ru su mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mi ri mi ri swA hA/
2b7(41 khi): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / gnod sbyin pho mo rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i char gyi rgyun myur bar 'bebs so// klu gnas pa'i chu mig kun
2b8(41 khi): nas chab phul dgu blangs la/ chab so sor bzhag la yungs kar gyis bsngags shing chu ru sbrul/ sngags rdzogs pa dang klu'i gnas su bskyal lo// char ji ltar
3a1(41 khi): 'dod pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis/ sems can rnams la phan pa dgongs par mnga' ba/
3a2(41 khi): byams pa la gnas pa thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas par gshegs kyis/ k+Shi sran nir gad ched swA hA/ nA ga yu yu swA hA/ sprin
3a3(41 khi): la blta zhing phyogs bzhir bltas la/ phyag byas shing lan lnga bcur bzlas na/ char myur du nges par 'bebs so// char 'bebs pa'i tshe/ klu mi bsrun pa'i gnas su
3a4(41 khi): song la/ lus spos chus bkrus la/ zas dkar gsum 'tshal lo// sha chang sgogacong spang bar bya'o// byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bsams la/ kha shar phyogs
3a5(41 khi): su bltas la 'phags pa rnams la gsol ba gdab po// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pa Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ khrom nyims sman na/ glang pa nan ku lu zhin
3a6(41 khi): na/ pi tra pu tra nan/ yak+Sha zlog nan/ ri pu ri lu nan/ ba la ya nan/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra badz+ra dz+wa la dzi swA hA/ sarba du sha ra/ bi ra na ga sha swA hA/ ga ru tri ru ti swA hA/ ya thog la bla
3a7(41 khi): re sngon po phub/ rgyal mtshan sngon po gzugs/ rig sngags 'chang gdan sngon po// rkang pa yang sngon por dkri/ lha bshos sngon po// bum pa chus bkang ba bzhi dkyil
3a8(41 khi): 'khor gyi grwa bzhing bzhag/ dbus su rdo rje snying po dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / mtha' yas dgod/ shang phyogs kyi pad+ma la/ klu'i
3b1(41 khi): rgyal po mgo bo gsum pa dgod/ lho phyogs kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la klu mgo bo bdun pa dgod/ nub phyogs kyi pad+ma la mgo bo lnga pa dgod/ byang phyogs kyi pad+ma la klu mgo bo dgu
3b2(41 khi): pa dgod/ 'phrin las gzhung las byung ba yang dgod do// oM hi hu la phaT phaT/ hUM bi dza ya phaT phaT/ nA ga li tsa la/ shad shad/ dzi li ti/ pi tri ta/ badz+ra dza ya ma hA ba la biN+ya
3b3(41 khi): pa par kra ma/ krod+harA dza pra me ru phaT phazad/ gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu/ sa chen po rnams g.yo bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad sul
3b4(41 khi): phub tu 'gyel nas/ tshig 'di skad du gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da phyin chad bka' gsungs pa ltar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ badz+ra badz+ra hUM hUM
3b5(41 khi): phaT ces gsungs pas/ klu'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu 'phub tu 'gyel nas/ rab tu 'dar te/ brgyal nas 'dre ldog cing du'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po
3b6(41 khi): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la smra zhing tshig tu gsol pa/ kyi hung bdag cag rnams tshig lags so// rdo rje snying po 'bar bas tshigs lags so// ma rungs lag so//
3b7(41 khi): zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i rgyal po rnams 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / srung
3b8(41 khi): ba dang / bskyab pa dang / zhing rnams kyi mig gang bar gyis shig/ lo tog phun sum tshogs par sgrubs shig/ mi rnams dang / mi ma yin pa rnams la 'che bar ma byed
4a1(41 khi): cig/ char gyi rgyun phob cig/ 'on kyang khyod kyis yun ring po'i bde ba dang / phan pa dang / klu'i gnod pa kun dang bral bar 'gyur ro// rkang mangs
4a2(41 khi): khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog/ phyi 'ongs rnams kyang bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur
4a3(41 khi): cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ khyod la bde legs byed 'gyur bas// sdang sems ldan rnams kun byed cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/
4a4(41 khi): gling 'dir char phob don rnams kyis/ sa dang bar snang gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la byams byed shog/ char med than chen byung ba'i tshe// sngags chen dang po
4a5(41 khi): brgya bzlas pas// bar ma lnga bcu lnga bcu bzlas// tha ma lan bdun bzlas par bya// sprin la blta zhing bar bar du// sus kyang mtshor shib bur bzlas// grangs
4a6(41 khi): las thal na ser ba 'grub pas sdig che'o// klu gnang la 'dor ba yin pas sdig che'o// lan grangs yang yang mi dbab po// zhag gcig gam/ zhag gnyis sam/
4a7(41 khi): zhag lngas char gyi rgyun ma 'bab pa mi srid do// chos kyi rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba// kun gyi smon lam myur du 'grub par shog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
4a8(41 khi): ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong rnams yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod //
4b1(41 khi): zhus dag// shu d+haM//
4b2(41 khi): sa bzugs mardungs panas bya big zungs pa rab tuzhi par byang ba kru rdzo rigs kyisamer ba rdzogs pa/
1a1(42 khu): zangs mchu dmar po bzhugs so// /
1b1(42 khu): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya g+ha dz+ha pra tang b+han d+ha g+hA tA kang kang bri ta tsa kha d+ha yA/ bod skad du/ 'phags bzangs
1b2(42 khu): kyi mchu dmar pos gdug pa'i phyogs thams cad gnon par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thas
1b3(42 khu): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag
1b4(42 khu): 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang // nyan thos sde dang dpung du bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
1b5(42 khu): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs
1b6(42 khu): pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas stong gi
1b7(42 khu): ngo bo can la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
2a1(42 khu): 'dam bu'i tshal/ pad ma mdzes byed sa khebs pa'i gnas/ chu bo yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i 'gram na bzhugs so//
2a2(42 khu): 'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig go// dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas 'phags pa zangs
2a3(42 khu): mchu dmar po'i dngos grub drag po'i las la dbang mdzad pa// mdze nad thams cad las gsol pa/ thog pa/ klog pa/ 'khyeb/
2a4(42 khu): khrag 'jib pa/ drod yul ba/ gnyen sde brgyad la gnad khro ba me 'tshed pa/ rnga khol ba/ khro chu khol ma 'bab du 'jug pa/ lcags
2a5(42 khu): kyi gzer 'debs pa/ yan lag bskums pas mtha' bzhi sdud pa/ dur khrod du rgyug pa/ klu chen po brgyad la nad gtong ga na mkha'
2a6(42 khu): la thig 'debs pa/ sa la srub bzhi ru dgas pa/ zangs kyi lus la bya khyung gi mgo bo yod pa/ klad pa la za ba/ zangs kyi mchu 'das
2a7(42 khu): dgu brgya dgu bcu yod pa/ zas su klu rigs bzhi za ba/ skom du chu ser dang khrag gsol pa/ spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig tu bgrad pa/
2b1(42 khu): lha ba mur ba/ rkang la ldag pa/ ro myags kyi nang lkog bur du gtong ba/ khams gsum zhe la gnon pa/ rlan smras 'jigs pa'i dug 'thul ba/ mar la dmyal ba'i gang/
2b2(42 khu): la 'khrug pa/ yang la srid pa'i steng du phugs pa/ gzhan rigs drug stong gshog pa la 'phyang ba/ klu rigs stong phrag khong na nyal ba/ de lta bu'i 'jigs pa'i rtsa
2b3(42 khu): lugs can dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das dka' thub mdzad pa la/ dpal phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'gro ba drug la/
2b4(42 khu): thugs rjes bzung du gsol/ nyon mongs pa'i nad las thar par mdzad du gsol/ 'dod chags kyi nad las thar bar mdzad du gsol// zhe sdang gi me bsad du
2b5(42 khu): gsol/ nga rgyal gyi brag rnyil du gsol// gti mug gi mun pa bsal du gsol// gdug pa'i nad las bsgral du gsol// gdon stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi/
2b6(42 khu): las bsgral du gsol// zhes zhus pas thugs rjes gzigs nas gnang bar mdzad do// dpal phyag na rdo rje nyon mongs pa can dang / nad gdol pa can gyis man
2b7(42 khu): ba/ lus nyams pa thams cad dang / dam las 'das pa/ dam tshig nyams pa/ nad kyis gdungs pa/ sred pas srad bus bcings pa/ thams cad ngal nyon
2b8(42 khu): cig/ nga'i gan du myur bar shog cig/ ngas bshad do// gdams pa po zhes bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes lha ma srin sde brgyad kyi gam du phyin te// rgyal ba'i
3a1(42 khu): bka' la nyon rgyal ba'i sku la ltos/ myur ba myur bar 'dengs zhes byas pas/ klu ba su ta bram ze'i rigs la/ phyag na rdo rjes nga su yin
3a2(42 khu): med dam byas pas/ nga la cha med do// khyod la nga mi nyan to// mi ltos so// nga ni stobs can yin no// khyad par can yin no// shugs can yin no// nga'i 'khor rnams
3a3(42 khu): kyang stobs dang ldan pa yod do// zhes zer ro// phyag na rdo rjes khyod la nus pa ci yod byas pas/ ngas khyod la kha rlangs shig btang gis sdod cig zer te/ phyag na
3a4(42 khu): rdo rje rang thang du 'dug pas/ klu ba su ta sa kha rlangs bun pa zhig btang bas/ phyag na rdo rje la shu ba thug thug tu byung ngo // de nas phyag na rdo rje thugs rtog skyes te/ khyod
3a5(42 khu): stobs can cig 'dug pa ji skad bya ba yin byas pas// nga ni klu'i rgyal po bram ze rin po che ba su ta zhes bya ba yin no// nga la dug rnam pa lnga yang yod do// gdon stong
3a6(42 khu): phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi yang nga'i 'khor yin no// zhes zer ro// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la zhus so// rgyal ba'i bka' la nyon/
3a7(42 khu): dam las ma 'da'/ dngos grub byin pas/ lha srin sde brgyad 'dir 'dus byas pas/ bdag la mnyan cing lus la rma mang po byung // kha rlangs kyang dug du yongs
3a8(42 khu): ba'i sems can cig gda'/ lus po me 'dra ba/ mig shel 'dra ba/ skra sbrul du 'dug pa/ so chu srin du 'dug pa/ lte ba nas nyi zla'i 'od 'phro ba/ rkang lags
3b1(42 khu): gyi be con du snang ba/ sbrul ser khwas zhags pa byas pa/ nag khras sted dkris pa/ sde khras ska nan lhas pa/ dkar khras tshigs bzhi dkris pa/ smug khras gdan du
3b2(42 khu): byas pa/ sa bdag nag pos gdan du byas pa/ sa bdag dkar pos zhabs nas 'degs pa/ gnyan sde brgyad jag la 'khol ba/ rgya mtsho khol ma la nyal ba/
3b3(42 khu): lus po dpag tshad phyed dang lnga yod pa/ mgo lus thams cad mig tu yod pa/ 'di na gnas kyi yul med pa/ bza' ba'i zas med pa/ 'gran pa'i zla med pa/
3b4(42 khu): steng gi lha la gnod pa/ 'og gi klu la 'phra ba/ bar gyi btsan la 'o dod gtong ba/ de 'dra ba cig tu byas te 'dug pa las/ phyag na rdo rjes lo dus na lta ru yongs pa las/
3b5(42 khu): slar yang log ste dpal phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te/ khyod song la de su yin dris la sheg cig
3b6(42 khu): gsung ngo // de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes kho'i gan du phyin nas khyod gang na yod pa khyod ji skad bya ba yin dris pas/ khe'i ngag nas nga ba su ta nag po bya ba nad kyi bdag
3b7(42 khu): po yin/ rims dal dang / mchin nad dang / glo nad dang / khrag nad thams cad ngal yod/ bram ze'i rigs thams cad kyi bdag po yin no zhes zer ro// bo na khyod
3b8(42 khu): rgyal ba'i bka' la mi nyan nam byas pas/ nga rang bas lhag pa med pas mi nyan no// khyod rang myur bar song nad 'dod dam ci 'dod zer bas/ phyag na rdo rje lus 'ad
4a1(42 khu): shum byed de/ de las phyir bskyed do// der klan re/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la/ khyod su yin zer ro// phyag na rdo rjes gsangs te nga rang zad cig yin no//
4a2(42 khu): nga la stobs kyang med do// shugs kyang med/ 'khor kyang med/ ci yang med do byas pas/ 'o na nga la nyon zer zhing / khyod ci 'chang byas pas/ nga ni 'dug pa'i gnas
4a3(42 khu): med par byed pa/ thams cad dbang du sdud pa/ drag po'i rig sngags me ri dmar po zhes bya ba 'chad do zhes zer ro// khyod kyis su la bslabs/ dbang su la nos/
4a4(42 khu): theg pa la zhugs sam/ bka' las nyan nam/ lung las drangs sam byas pas/ nga'i ston pa ni nga rang yin/ nga ni nga'i bka' la nga rang nyan no// 'o na khyod su la
4a5(42 khu): gnod/ su la phan byas pas/ 'dre mi la gnod de nad du ro myags gtong / skur phyugs la gnod de sla bzhi 'gebs/ srog chags la ltas ngan pa brgyad
4a6(42 khu): gtong ngo // phan pa ni klu chen po brgyad la phan no// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes sdang mig tu bgrad de bltas pas/ ba su ta des kha rlangs shig phyag na rdo rje la/ btang
4a7(42 khu): bas shu ba thor thor byung bas zed do// phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di 'dra ba ci gang lags na/ 'di dbang du 'dus na mthu dpag tu med pa 'byung bar nges so//
4a8(42 khu): dbang du ma 'dus na 'jig rten 'di phung bar gda' na/ thugs rje ci mnga' zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de ni klu'i rgyal po ba su ta me ma mur nag
4b1(42 khu): bo'i kha rlangs can bya ba yin te/ nad dgu brgya dgu bcu la dbang byed pa yin pas 'jig rten 'di phung bar 'gyur bas/ 'di la gnad pa'i sngags dang / bsnyen pa dang /
4b2(42 khu): bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten la phan pa'i chos ngas bshad do// 'khor 'dus pa thams cad nyon cig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ sgoms shig/ ces gsungs so//
4b3(42 khu): de nas 'khor 'dus pa thams cad dga' ste/ thal mo sbyar nas zhus pas/ 'phags pa zangs kyi mchu dmar po zhes bya ba'i gzungs drag po thob 'bab pa mi
4b4(42 khu): zad pa'i 'od 'phro ba/ bdud rtsi'i char 'babs pa// lha 'dre'i kha 'ching ba/ che dang srog la byin che ba/ khams gsum gyi sman pa/ nyon mongs pa'i bsil
4b5(42 khu): yag tsha grang rnam pa brgyad kyi 'khyag zhun la 'then pa/ nad sna dgu la mi 'dre ba'i sman du che ba/ gdon ma rungs pa bzlog pa/ theg pa'i chos dag dang / dben
4b6(42 khu): gnas rnams la stongs grogs mdzad pa/ dam tshig can la khyad par du 'ches pa/ klu thams cad kyi gnyen po// sa bdag kun gyi snying dum bu stong du thug
4b7(42 khu): pa/ gnyen kun gyi kha bskal nas stongs pa/ mdze nad kun la spyis 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi gzungs thag mi 'chad pa'i
4b8(42 khu): gter chen po// 'phags pa zangs mchu dmar po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bden par nges pa chos kyi phung po yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
5a1(42 khu): ldan pa bshad do// chos 'di spyod par 'dod pa 'am/ gzungs 'don par 'dod pa'am/ mthu bslab par 'dod pas/ 'di ltar sgrub
5a2(42 khu): par bya ste/ dang po bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du bya'o// de'i rjes la dag pa rnam pa gsum gyis sbyang ngo // sngags dang bzlas brjed par mi gcod do// bsgrub pa'i la
5a3(42 khu): la dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa bya'o// 'dab ma re la lha re'o// de'i phyi ma la ba su ta bcu drug/ de'i phyi rim la yi ge dza bcu drug
5a4(42 khu): sgo shar du rgyal rigs/ lho sgor rje rigs/ nub sgor bram ze'i rigs/ byang sgor gdol pa can/ zur bzhi la rma bya re/ logs bzhi la chu srin re/ pho brang la rigs
5a5(42 khu): lnga/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan du/ rgyal rigs dang / sa bdag khra bo// don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan du dmangs rigs dang / gnyen gdong gnyis bcings so// /
5a6(42 khu): de ltar na bsnyen bsgrub tshad du phyin par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// klu rnams la sngags kyi dngos grub kyis gnad la dbab du
5a7(42 khu): gsol zhes zhus pas/ gnang ngo // de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i mnga' bdag nyid// rdzu 'phrul ldan pas 'gro ba drug la gzigs//
5a8(42 khu): thun mongs ma yin sku mchog bstan du gsol// thugs rjes gdul dka' mtha' dag 'dul mdzad pa// bdud rtsis tshims mdzad 'gro ba gso mdzad cing // sran
5b1(42 khu): pa'i mchog la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo// bdud rtsi lta bu'i gso mdzad dga' ba che// kun la byams ldan thugs mnga' stobs dang ldan// shAkya'i sku yis bden pa'i don la
5b2(42 khu): la dgongs// phan pa mang pos sdug bsngal mtha' dag 'joms// gdug pa dbang sdud dpag bsam shing lta bu// nyon mongs sel mdzad sku la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes
5b3(42 khu): bstod nas zhus pas gnang ngo // rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag nga la nyon cig gsungs nas/ dpag bsam shing gi rtse mor gshegs te/ 'phags bzangs
5b4(42 khu): mchu dmar po zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos bshad do// de na nyan pa po mang po yod na'ang / ba su ta bram ze ma 'ongs te/ dpal phyag na rdo rjes gang nas gang du btsal ba
5b5(42 khu): las/ rgya mtsho'i gting shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi 'gram na 'dug pa mthong ste/ rgyal ba'i bka' byung na khyod nyan nam byas pas/ rgyal ba su yin ji skad bya ba yin
5b6(42 khu): zer ro// der dpal phyag na rdo rjes rgyal ba shAkya thub pa yin/ brdzun ma zer mi rung ngo mgo bo 'gas pa yin/ mig 'phrul pa yin/ snying 'byin pa yin/ nyams par
5b7(42 khu): 'gyur ro byas pas/ 'o na ngas ma mthong ngo // nga rang bas lhag pa med do// phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/ bka' yi chad pa yod do// nges par yongs ngo gsungs pas/
5b8(42 khu): bram ze'i rigs na re/ ngas khyod kyi rgyal ba la 'arlangs shig btang gis des mnyan nang sleb yong gis zer ro// der song ngo // de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye ma
6a1(42 khu): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mtshams brdol par gda' bas dgongs pa ma g.yel bar mdzod cig/ ces zhus pas/ slar log ste bltas pas pa
6a2(42 khu): su ta de mgo lus thams cad mig gis bkang / sbrul sngon po stong gis skra byas/ nag po khris ser ral kha brgyan te/ lha srin sde brgyad bran du 'khol zhing byung ste/
6a3(42 khu): nga ros 'jig rten gul gul yo ma yom por btang ngo // de nas kha rlangs bung cher btang bas thams cad chem chem nas 'khod do// de nas shAkya thub pas gtam dris so//
6a4(42 khu): khyod su yin gang nas yongs dris pas/ skad ma ster te/ dgongs pa mdzad nas nga la gtam mi ster ba 'di dbang du bsdu'o snyam du dgongs nas/ khu yis btab cing
6a5(42 khu): dgongs so// bltas pa las ba su ta 'gyel nas bskrad de 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas ba su ta de langs nas/ da bas kyang khyod mthu che'o// da ni bred do// sngangs so//
6a6(42 khu): 'dar ro// 'jigs so// khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes zer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngas khyod la chos bshad kyis nyon cig gsungs pas/ 'o na ngas zhag
6a7(42 khu): gsum bro bzhin/ lha srin sde brgyad sbran la myur bar yongs gis sbed cig zer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal phyag na rdo rje la gsungs pa/ 'di la min
6a8(42 khu): rgol cig/ dma' thod cig/ 'di dam lam thogs na 'jig rten mes stongs so// zhes gsungs so// de nas ba su ta 'khor dang bcas pa yongs so// phyag na rdo rjes
6b1(42 khu): ba su'i mig la phyag reg byas pas phyag skongs gis song ngo // 'jigs pa skyes te/ shAkya thub pa la zhus pas/ ngas sngal yo ga la zangs kyi mchu bshad kyis nyon
6b2(42 khu): cig gsungs pas/ bram ze ba su ta na re bdag 'gas par 'gyur bas mi bya'o zhes zer ro// de ci nyes byas pas 'di ni gnyen sde brgyad kyi snying 'don pa mgo bo 'gas
6b3(42 khu): par 'gyur ba yin teng mi dga' 'o zhes zer ro// rgya mtsho'i gting du song ngo // de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes mngags pa gcig sprad de 'gugs su btang / ba su
6b4(42 khu): 'gugs su btang byas pas/ shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas phyag na rdo rje slar log la song zhig lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgu pa gcig la mngags te/ gdan 'dug par
6b5(42 khu): dkrugs la shog ces gsungs pas/ des 'gro ma nus te/ yang shAkya thub pas bya khyung rab brtan bya ba zas su klu rigs za ba/ skom du chu ser dang khrag 'jib pa
6b6(42 khu): 'di stobs dang ldan pas 'di btang ngo zhes gsungs pas bya khyung rab brtan zhes bya ba de dga' nas/ se gol gcig gtogs pa tsam la dmyal ba bdar la
6b7(42 khu): lhan gyis phyin te/ bltas pa las ba su ta'i rgyal po de mig sgyu nas 'thon pa tsam du sngangs te/ su yin 'dri ba yang ma nus pa las/ bya khyung rab rtan des pa
6b8(42 khu): su ta'i spyi bo nas bzung nas bteg pas ma theg ste/ ba su ta na re khyod sdongad dang su yis btang su yi cho 'phrul yin zer ro// der bya khyung na re/ nga shAkya thub pa/
7a1(42 khu): btang ba yin/ nga ni klu rigs rnams za ba yin/ ngal zas su klu las med/ nga'i ming ni bya byung gA ru ra bya ba yin zhes byas pas/ 'o na ngas
7a2(42 khu): khyod la mgron cig bya yis sdod cig zer ro// byA khyung des bsdad tsam na/ kho yis chu srin gyi ro chen po zhig byin pas chu srin myong ba drug yang mi byed par 'dug pas/
7a3(42 khu): ba su ta bred de bya khyung gis chu srin chen po de'i khog pa rangs po de mid nas song ngo // der bya khyung gis da 'dod rgyal ba'i bka' la nyon byas pas/ mi 'gro zer ro//
7a4(42 khu): der bya khyung gis 'o na nga ni khyod za'o// 'cha' bo// mur ro// 'thog go// 'khyer ro// 'grung de byas pas/ kho re/ snying rje cig kyang med dam zer ro// 'o na mi bsang
7a5(42 khu): mi bza' yis sdod la zhugs byas pas/ der bram ze'i rigs thams cad 'dus so// bya khyung na re khyod mgyogs par mi 'gro nang 'gro zer te langs nas mchu
7a6(42 khu): brdar gshog pa dkrugs sder mo bgrad pas/ gnyen sde brgyad dang bcas pa 'grogs te su zhig zhes zer cing bltas pas/ bya khyung mthong ba tsam gyis brgyal lo
7a7(42 khu): zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ngo // rgyal bas bshad du gsol// bstan du gsol zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ngas
7a8(42 khu): zangs mchu dmar po'i chos bshad kyi/ dam las 'da' zhig/ bka' las ma rku zhig ces gsungs pas/ ba su ta'i rgyal po nges/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol/
7b1(42 khu): pa bdag ni rang gi snying po yang 'bul lo// gang dgongs pa mdzad du gsol/ zhes zer ro// de nas 'khor thams cad 'dus te gdod mnyan no// bcom ldan
7b2(42 khu): bdas shAkya thub pas zangs mchu dmar po'i gzungs kyi chos bshad do// rig sngags 'di la su mnyan pa'i mgo bo 'gas so// mig 'phrul lo// lus ro myags
7b3(42 khu): su 'gro'o// 'di nyan cing dad pa kun tshe ring ba dang nad med pa dang / bsam pa thams cad 'grub pa dag go/ dngos grub kun kyang ster bar 'gyur ro// ces bkra
7b4(42 khu): stsal pa/ oM hUM tAM hrIHaHta thA ga tA/ nA ga hr-i da ya/ ta thA ga ta na maHd+ha ma yA/ ta thA ga te rA dza sri lhanan/ bud ya bud yA/ ra dza'i sha la pi ra pa ri li raM/ nA ga hu
7b5(42 khu): ya rbad po bi d+ha swA hA/ g+hu ya rA dza la swA hA hr-i hr-i/ ka ro ka ya la hriM hri/ hUM bum hUM 'um/ pra tsa la pra tsa la/ ga la ga la ya yA/ tsa tu ma d+ha/ ko la ka ro/ khA ga na kha/ ba su ta
7b6(42 khu): reng reng / par la po ba ma/ she yang she yang swA hA/ de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'o dod lan gsum btang ngo // pho nya lan gsum bkye'o// lha srin sde brgyad nga can
7b7(42 khu): shog cig ces gsungs pas/ thams cad yongs te gsol pa/ nyan pa lags so// ji ltar bsgo ba las su bgyid do// zhes byas pas/ lha srin sde brgyad
7b8(42 khu): rnams 'tshogs nas bstan pa gnyen po bsrung dgos pas/ ngal khyed rang rang gi snying po rnams ga re zhes gsungs pas/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la lha srin
8a1(42 khu): sde brgyad kyi srog snying phul lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin lags bstan pa bsrung ngo // nad sel to// ha la
8a2(42 khu): ba sha g+hu ra ta ling sod/ lha rnams bran du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje'i bka' nyan no// nA ga tsa ta pa la ba sha hUM hUM phaT/ klu rnams bran du
8a3(42 khu): 'khol lo// gnyen gyi rgyal po ru rings brang dkar gyis chos 'khor bsrung ngo // ma la ko ba tsa tsan d+ha hUM hUM phaT/ gnyen rnams bran du 'khol lo// steng
8a4(42 khu): rnams kyi yang gsungs la nyan no// d+hu mA kA la mang du ri laM/ gnod sbyin rnams bran du 'khol lo// ru d+he ru re sA la ba ma ba ma hril/ srin po rnams dran
8a5(42 khu): du 'khol lo// rang ga dza la kha nan snying la ma du ka re swA hA/ dri za'i tshogs kyis bka' dang thugs la rjes su 'brang ngo // ca thang tsa 'ug mu la raM thum thum
8a6(42 khu): phaT/ bdud po bdud mo rnams kyis phyag na rdo rje la zhabs tog bgyis so// snying po phul lo// du d+ha ma d+ha ma ka la srid la ma ra ya khram khram ya swA hA/ rgyal po
8a7(42 khu): dang / skya rengs 'char ka dang / srog bdag la sogs pas srog snying phul lo// ging ta ging ta ba la sha traM traM bruM bruM phaT swA hA/ gza' rnams kyis srog gi snying po/
8a8(42 khu): phul lo// bi da d+ha tsakra e re sha d+ha ka la dur la pa mkhas swA hA/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis srog snying phul lo// nyata pe la pA lA pa tota ya mur ya mur yA sA hA
8b1(42 khu): zhes phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la dpal phyag na rdo rje thugs gdung ba skyes nas/ nam mkha' la skyil mo klungs kyis gshegs te/ yo mnga' ru bsdus nas/ dad pas
8b2(42 khu): mdangs phyung / ri rab ri'i rtse mor mnyam pa'i dang la bzhugs so// yang dam las 'das pa'i gdon rnams dbang du ma 'dus kyis dogs nas/ 'phags pa zangs mchu
8b3(42 khu): dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od can/ gdug pa can thams cad mnar pa'i gsang sngags/ nyi ma'i gzi mdangs zil gyis gnon pa 'di dag gsungs so// oM na ga kang ka ra ra dza
8b4(42 khu): la rmugs rbad/ thum rbad/ sad sha sad sha/ oM d+ha ra d+hA ra/ dzA yA ma yA/ du du phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra rA dzA ha la hA ba ta hA ba tA/ sU Ta s+phu Ta/ oM nA ga rA dza la long long / nA ga
8b5(42 khu): na ma na sid d+ha sid d+ha/ oM khar+tha Sha d+ha ShA/ ha na ha na/ ka le pa paM ka la pa pa~M/ hrIM trA~M/ sA ta swa ta/ b+ha la d+ha la/ badz+ra rA dzA sr-i tsa/ oM hu ra ya hud yA/ phaT phaT/ hU'u hUl+la/ ka
8b6(42 khu): thang pad ta ka ma la du swA hA/ zhes dpal phyag na rdo rjes thams cad la gnad bor ro// lha srin sde brgyad g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa'i rtse mo la mngon par gshegs te/
8b7(42 khu): thugs rje'i bsam pa thams cad bsgrubs lags so// nyon mongs pa'i bdud thams cad bskrad do// zhe sdang gi me bsad do// 'dod chags kyi chu skams so// nga rgyal rna
8b8(42 khu): par spangs so// bdud bzhi bcom mo// 'khor ba las rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro// ngan song brgyad las thar bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi mchu las gsol bar 'gyur/
9a1(42 khu): ro// gdug pa la gsang mdzad do// khrus rnam pa lnga la khrus byed par 'gyur ro// de nas lha srin kun dang / ba su ta'i rigs drug gis/ dpal phyag/
9a2(42 khu): na rdo rje la zhus pa/ 'jig rten la dus ngan pa 'byung ste 'ongs pas/ bstan pa bsrung ba'i man ngag cig bstan du gsol/ de skad ces zhus pas/ phyag na rdo rjes dmod
9a3(42 khu): pa'i las rnam pa lnga bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa lnga la/ rdzas kyi dmod pa dang gcig/ bcing ba'i dmod pa dang gnyis/ bsdu ba'i dmod pa dang gsum/ dgag pa'i
9a4(42 khu): dmod pa dang bzhi/ gdab pa'i dmod pa dang lnga'o// de la dang po rdzas kyi dmod pa ni/ gang pa'i rgyu bstan te/ gang la gang dgos pa rgyud kyi man ngag ltar sbyar ro//
9a5(42 khu): gang yang rung ba la sha'i khu bas bsings pa la/ bus pa'i sha la ri bong gi gcin gyis bsings pa lus la song na/ mig long bar 'gyur ro// phyil pa'i sha la
9a6(42 khu): sug pa'i khu bas bsings pa lus la song na/ sa ngan skams pa'i nang du 'gyur ro// rma bya'i sha la bya skong gi snying pos bsings la lus la song na/ kha tong /
9a7(42 khu): ka dza la rbad rbad yang dza dza hUM/ ces pa brgya 'am stong tshad du bya'o// mnan pa ni rus sbal gyi khog pa la khrag gi yi ge bris la mnan no// gzir ba ni tsher ma
9a8(42 khu): can gyi me la gzir ro// de ni las 'thu bo'o// yang dpal phyag na rdo rjes/ mdze dang / shu ba dang / dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / skya lngal dang / chu nang mig la
9b1(42 khu): spu nad smin ma la'o// rus me la'o// sbugs nang snga la'o// chu ba'i nad sen mo la'o// nad sna bcu la thugs dgongs mdzad do// na ga khas rbad long / nyug long / thim long /
9b2(42 khu): me lA dza \u0f85da/ nyad d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tshu la lig phung da dA d+ha ga/ bya gri tshe 'da' a g+ha sha ra rum rum/ sro ta kA tA yA/ na su yA/ 'brud d+ha 'dring / a d+ha kha ma la yA hUM hUM hUM hUM/
9b3(42 khu): badz+ra rak+Sha aM gu sha dzaHdzaHhUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de skad ces bka' stsal pas 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rang ngo // lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa lha sri
9b4(42 khu): sde brgyad thams cad dga' zhing yi rangs te phyag 'tshal lo// nad sel bar gyur cig/ nad med par gyur cig/ thar bar gyur cig dpal phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mthong /
9b5(42 khu): bar gyur cig/ 'jigs pa'i bskal pa gsum las thar par gyur cig/ 'phags pa zangs mchu dmar po rno ba'i dpal dang chas pa/ ba su ta rigs drug dbang
9b6(42 khu): du sdud pa'o// de nas kyang bram ze'i rigs rdul du rlog par byed pa'o// zangs mchu dmar po'i gzungs rdzogs so//
9b7(42 khu): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na de ba dang / bod kyi ban de chos grub dang / lots+tsha ba ka ba b+ha bos bya tshal du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
9b8(42 khu): maMng+ga laM//
1a1(43 khe): 'phags pa kha mchu nag po zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// /
1b1(43 khe): #/ rgya gar skad du/ ur+ya 'du d+ha ta pa ye sU tra nA ma ma hA yA na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags kha mchu nag
1b2(43 khe): po zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sengs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
1b3(43 khe): skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ko sa la na 'khor mang po la chos ston to// de'i tshe khyim bdag
1b4(43 khe): mdzes ldan zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas te 'dus par gyur pa bstan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
1b5(43 khe): kye ma ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag yul 'dir mchis pa rnams la rgyal po'i chad pa dang / yul gzhan gyi mis rtsod pa
1b6(43 khe): dang / skye bo phal pas tshang 'gru ba dang / dgra rnams kyi khamachu rtsod pa'i 'jigs pa du ma dag mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
1b7(43 khe): 'jigs pa de dag las bsrung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod kha mchu'i 'jigs pa la ma
2a1(43 khe): smug cig/ kha mchu nag po zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i mdo yod kyi/ de khyod la rnam par phye la bstan par bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal
2a2(43 khe): lo// bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a ra ha te/ samya k+Sha bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne/ mA hA mu ne rak+Sha/ sarba puSh+TiM ku ru
2a3(43 khe): sarba ta thA ga ta a tiSh+ThA na/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ma ma sarba rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM kha dr-i rak+Sha/ oM kha mchu song / tra rak+Sha/ oM Ni wa ra san rak+Sha/ ha ra ha ra rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ khyim bdag
2a4(43 khe): mdzes ldan khyod kyis gzungs 'di chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ ston cig/ rgyal po'i chang pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / tshang 'bru ba la sogs pa'i rgol ba/
2a5(43 khe): ngan pa thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra pA Ni ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha/ oM b+h+yo bzlog kha mchu ma ra ya phaT/ sa ma ya du rak+Sha hUM/
2a6(43 khe): hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la yas kyi bdud g.yos pa dang / pha 'u'i byung 'dre dang / dgra bo dang / nye du'i lan chags dang / lo ngan pa'i sgeg dang /
2a7(43 khe): zla ba'i sgeg dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / skye bo'i rtsod pa dang / rgyal po'i chang pa dang / tshang 'bru ba dang / kha mchu rtsod pa dang / ngan sems dang / bas pa ngan pa'i grogs dang / mig
2a8(43 khe): bltas ngan pa das gdon thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro// sang ba rnams 'dul du gsol// kha mchu dang / byol zor dang / rbong gtong dang / rim dang / ltas ngan pa zas
2b1(43 khe): cang zhi ba shin+tiM ku ru ye swA hA/ rigs kyi bu kha mchu nag po zhi bar bya ba/ zungs 'ad no// bzhi gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// ngas kyang de ltar bshad par bya'o//
2b2(43 khe): 'di rab tu bzung ba rgyun du thon cig/ 'jigs pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// Sha mchu dang lhas ngan pa thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro// nad dang gdon dang / 'byung po dang /
2b3(43 khe): lo sgeg dang / zla sgeg dang / mngon pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi rnam
2b4(43 khe): 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ltar bzung bar bgyi ces gsol pa dang / bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ni kha mchu nag po zhi bar byed pa zhes bya bar zungs zhig/ de nas 'jam
2b5(43 khe): dpal gyis gsol pa/ legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das mdo sde zab mo 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa'i mi de la bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o// bskyab par bgyi'o// smra
2b6(43 khe): ba ni tshig rtsub thub par bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig gzhan dang kha mchu rtsod pa'i tshe/ mdo 'di lan bdun klags te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal yid la bsgoms te song na/
2b7(43 khe): rol gyi rtsod pa thams cad 'joms so// rang gi tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// smras pa la gzhan yid ches par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ khyim bdag
2b8(43 khe): mdzes ldan dang / 'khor thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
2b9(43 khe): 'phags pa kha du nag po zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i madro rdzogs so// / zhus dag// mang+ga'o// /
1a1(44 kho): mig rnam par sbyong ba'i rig sngags bzhugs so//
1b1(44 kho): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha na nA ma ri / bod skad du/ 'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes
1b2(44 kho): bya ba'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa/
1b3(44 kho): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i grong rdal bzang po zhig na/ shAkya rnams kyi nang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe ste dus zhes bya ba na/
1b4(44 kho): shAkya bde ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa dang / sangs rgyas la skyab
1b5(44 kho): su song / chos la skyabs su song / dge 'dun la skyabs su song / sangs rgyas la gcig tu phyogs/ chos la gcig tu phyogs/
1b6(44 kho): dge 'dun la gcig tu phyogs/ sangs rgyas la nem nur med cing the tshom med/ chos dang dge 'dun dang / sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung
1b7(44 kho): ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam la nam nur med cing the tshom med la/ bden pa'i 'bras bu thob gi/ mngon par rdzogs par gyur pa/ mtshan
2a1(44 kho): dang / dbyig pa bor ba zhig gnas pa de'i mig la snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i gzugs rnams snang
2a2(44 kho): bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te/ yid la byed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal//
2a3(44 kho): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba mdzad pa/ sgron ma 'dzin pa/ gsal ba 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs pa
2a4(44 kho): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa gsal bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mig rnam par sbyang du gsol/ zhes bya ba
2a5(44 kho): dang / bcom ldan 'das lha'i gnas pa la bzhugs pa/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa/ mi las 'das pas/ shAkya bde bas
2a6(44 kho): tshig de skad ces brjod pa gsan to// gsan nas kyang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka
2a7(44 kho): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la mig rnam par sbyong ba'i rig sngags 'dis/ shAkya bde ba la srungs par gyis shig/ yongs
2b1(44 kho): su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / sdug
2b2(44 kho): bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing bar gyis shig dang / de bzhin du 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge
2b3(44 kho): bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / sems can gzhan gyi mig kyang rnam par sbyongs shig/ mig srubs rnam par sbyongs shig/ tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ ki li
2b4(44 kho): mi li/ hi li te/ hu ya hu ya hu yA/ ma ni/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ hu du hu du hu du/ tsak+Shar mu khi bi sho d+ha ya swAhA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal po mig rnam par spyod
2b5(44 kho): ba 'di ni/ mig gi skyon dang / rlung gi skyon dang / mkhris pa'i skyon dang / bad kan gyi skyon dang / 'dus pa las gyu pa'i skyon sel te/ tshul khrims kyi bden pa dang / brtul
2b6(44 kho): zhugs kyi bden pa dang / drang srong rnams kyi bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang /
2b7(44 kho): 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bden pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
2b8(44 kho): kyi bden pas/ shAkya bde ba'i mig na bar ma gyur cig/ 'chi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig/ kun du 'chi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig/ bdag dang sems can thams
3a1(44 kho): cad kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur cig kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
3a2(44 kho): sangs rgyas drug gis gsungs pa'o// nga yang da ltar 'chad de/ rgyal po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang rjes su
3a3(44 kho): yi rang ngo // kun dga' bo rig sngags 'di dus gsum du brjod na/ de la 'thibs por 'gyur ba dang / rab rib bam/ ling tog gam/ mig nang sngon por mthong
3a4(44 kho): ba 'am/ mig gi yul gyi skyon lha las gyur pa rnams sam/ klu las gyur pa rnams sam/ dri za las gyur pa rnams sam/ gnod sbyin las gyur pa rnams sam/
3a5(44 kho): za las gyur pa rnams sam/ byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ ro langs las gyur pa rnams sam/ ro langs dang byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ kun du rgyu las
3a6(44 kho): gyur pa rnams sam/ kun du rgyu dang ro langs las gyur pa rnams kyis tshugs par 'gyur ba ni/ lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas
3a7(44 kho): pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten nangs ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas med do// tshe dang /
3a8(44 kho): ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhi no zhes gsol nas/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams gzung ste/ kun chub
3b1(44 kho): par byas nas/ shAkya bde ba ga la ba der song ste/ bde ba mig rnam par sbyong ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la bskur gyis nyin
3b2(44 kho): re bzhin dus gsum du dran par gyis shig/ ces de la rgyas par smras so// shAkya bde bas thos ma thag tu de kho nar mig rnam par dag ste/ mig rnam par dag pa
3b3(44 kho): dri ma med pa'i mig gis thams cad mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / shAkya bde ba dang /
3b4(44 kho): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa mig rnam par spyong
3b5(44 kho): ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so// #rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ak+Shi ro ga pra sha ma Ni su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
3b6(44 kho): pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
3b7(44 kho): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod daphung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nag po/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/
3b8(44 kho): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir/ mig nang byung na de dag la ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/
4a1(44 kho): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ naka po mig nad kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di dag yod de/ tad+ya thA/ ru d+hi re phu re d+hi ra/ ak+Shi phu/
4a2(44 kho): ru d+ha ri piM ga le phu/ b+ha te phuHba de le phuHha na te phuHmAM sa du d+hA b+hi phu/ pad ma ak+Shi phu/ pad ma daN+Da hi ra Ni ye phuHswA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
4a3(44 kho): bka' stsal nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nag po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // cho ga ni 'di
4a4(44 kho): yin te/ srad bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te/ mdud pa bdun bor ro// chu la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la lag pas byabs na/ mig nang zhi bar
4a5(44 kho): 'gyur ro// 'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// k+Sha yi'i nad sel
4a6(44 kho): ba'i sngags/ na mo hi tu he ke swA hA/ lus la nad byung na/ nad khong skems kyis btab na/ bsil yab chus gtor te/ lan drug cu rtsa gcig bsngags nas/
4a7(44 kho): de'i lus la g.yangs na nad med par 'gyur ro// k+Sha ya'i nad sel ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @/ rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya A ra pra sha ma ni su
4a8(44 kho): tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
4b1(44 kho): bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i tshal na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi
4b2(44 kho): dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i khab bco lnga'i gso sbyong zla ba nya ba de nyid kyi tshe/ dge 'dun gyi mdun na gdan
4b3(44 kho): bshams pa la bzhugs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi gnam logs na rnga yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug
4b4(44 kho): par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
4b5(44 kho): ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na/ dge slong gzhang
4b6(44 kho): 'brum can mang po dag/ gzhang 'brum gyi bro nad kyis gzir te/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag po mi bde ba/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar gyur na/ btsun pa
4b7(44 kho): bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di
4b8(44 kho): skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzhang 'brum sel ba'i mdo 'di longs shig/ kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis/ gzhang 'brum
5a1(44 kho): sel ba'i mdo'i/ ming dang / tshig dang / yi ge shes nas/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro//
5a2(44 kho): tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ a lan+de/ a ma le/ shA li tsi ni/ ku she saM b+he swA hA/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ byang phyog
5a3(44 kho): na ri'i rgyal po gangs zhes bya ba de na/ sA la'i shing rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba de'i me tog gsum yod do// gcig ni 'phel ba zhes bya/ gnyis pa ni
5a4(44 kho): 'jam pa zhes bya/ gsum pa ni skam po zhes bya ste/ ji ltar de bskams pa de bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyi rlung gi 'brum bu bskam par gyur cig/
5a5(44 kho): mkhris pa'i 'brum bu bskam par gyur cig/ bad kan gyi 'brum bu bskam par gyur cig/ mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu bskam par gyur cig/ khrag gi 'bru
5a6(44 kho): bu bskam par gyur cig/ 'dus pa'i 'brum bu bskam par gyur cig/ de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi bad kan gyi 'brum bu bskam par gyur cig/
5a7(44 kho): mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu bskam par gyur cig/ khrag gi 'brum bu bskam par gyur cig/ 'dus pa'i 'brum bu bskam par gyur cig/ sna'i 'brum bu bskam par gyur
5a8(44 kho): cig/ 'brang ba'i 'brum bu bskam par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sha me sha me ne/ sha ma sha ma ne swA hA/ na bar ma gyur cig/ rengs par ma gyur cig/ sgra 'byung bar ma
5b1(44 kho): gyur cig/ 'dzag par ma gyur cig/ sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig/ rab tu sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig/ zag par ma gyur cig/ rab tu zag par ma gyur cig/
5b2(44 kho): 'di nyid du zad pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / med par gyur cig/ 'og tu song zhig/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bud d+hA ya/ sa t+ya/ bA dI naM/ sid d+han+tu/ man+ta/ pa da ni swA hA/
5b3(44 kho): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / de la
5b4(44 kho): cho ga ni 'di yin te/ bklags pas 'grub pa 'di srad bu dmar po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la/ mdud pa bdun bor te/ mgul du gdags so// 'phags pa gzhang 'bru
5b5(44 kho): rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dan shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing gtan la
5b6(44 kho): bab pa/ @#rgya gar skad du/ AR+tha sarba ro ga pra sha ma ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi
5b7(44 kho): bar byed pa ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
5b8(44 kho): 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa
6a1(44 kho): dge slong dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag
6a2(44 kho): par ston cig/ tad+ya thA/ tsa le me/ tse le me/ paM na ko ki li/ shri ma ti/ kuN+Da le/ dun+da b+he/ in+d+ra ni/ mu khe swA hA/ 'di dag ni zas ma zhu ba dang / khros pa dang /
6a3(44 kho): khrag dang / mkhris pa 'dres pa dang / gzhang 'dzum gyis btab pa dang / gzhang nad can dang / za gu dang / lud pa can dang / rims nad can dang / klad pa na sa
6a4(44 kho): dang / gzhogs phyed na pa dang / yi dgas kyis zin pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi yin te/ kun dga' bo gang gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed pa
6a5(44 kho): de ni/ ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo // tshe zad pa ni ma gtogs so// gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
6a6(44 kho): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog go/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ni chos thams cad
6a7(44 kho): kyi mchog go// dge 'dun ni tshogs thams cad kyi mchog go// bden pa'i tshig dang / bden pa'i ngag 'dis/ bdag gis zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang /
6a8(44 kho): myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar zhu bar gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
6b1(44 kho): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
6b2(44 kho): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ i li mi ti me le/ ha ne su ha ne/
6b3(44 kho): ge mo zhig rdza ra ban+d+ha me/ e ke tsi ka ma tI hi kau tsa tu tsa ka na/ sni t+ya dz+wa ra na swa hA/ cho ga ni 'di bris te mgul du btags na rims nad med par byed do// rims nang
6b4(44 kho): zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya ga skad du/ Ar+ya phrags ni nas hA Ni/ 'di skad du/ 'phags pa rims nad
6b5(44 kho): tu zhi bar byed pa ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
6b6(44 kho): 'das rgyal po'i khab dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// de nas dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
6b7(44 kho): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug phyogs cig tu 'dug nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
6b8(44 kho): bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rnams rims nad kyis gtses par mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag srung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang /
7a1(44 kho): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo phyogs 'di na me lce'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rims nad 'dug ste/ sems can rnams la
7a2(44 kho): nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa la thugs rje dang ldan pas brtse bar byed pas de srung ba'i gsang sngags kyi
7a3(44 kho): gzhi rnams 'di dag yin no// tad+ya thA/ dz+wa la ni dz+wa la ni/ pra ti ba ni pra sha ma ni/ bdag gi rims nad song zhig/ ma 'dug cig swa hA/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i
7a4(44 kho): tshig dang / 'jig rten na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis bdag gi rims nad song zhig/ ma 'dug cig swA hA/ sid
7a5(44 kho): tu man+ta pa tA ba d+ha ra bid+ya na pra ma a nu me de swA hA/ skud pa nag po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas shing mdud pa nyi shu gcig bor ro/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
7a6(44 kho): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed
7a7(44 kho): pa'i gzungs rdzogaso// // / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ oM pi shu ne swA hA/ 'di gzung
7a8(44 kho): bas 'phags pa rma bya chen mo gzung bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa rma bya chen mo'i snying po rdzogs so//
7b1(44 kho): xxx
1a1(45 gi): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya'i g+h+nAn bi na ya kA ratwa d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bgegs sel ba'i gzungs/ 'di skad bdag gis thos
1a2(45 gi): pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze hi'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe da
1a3(45 gi): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'dzin pa des cho ga thams cad dang / dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par
1a4(45 gi): 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ namastu te/ ka DA ka Ta/ maT maT/ da ra da ra/ Da ha DaH/ grih+Na/ b+hany+dza d+hany+dza/
1a5(45 gi): na mastu te/ ru ru tsa tsa ye swA hA/ a b+hU tA bi na duHkhaM many+tse d+b+ha ba ra sa gats+tsha ha ha ha ya/ ma hA hastit+ta ta nan/ pra go ba ye mo/ ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/
1a6(45 gi): na mo ni maHswA hA/ nang par langs te sngags lan bdun bzlas la/ chu khyor ba gang steng dang 'og gi phyogs su gtor cig dang / bgegs thams cad bcings
1a7(45 gi): par 'gyur/ gsang sngags sgrub par 'dod pas skud pa dkar po la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te lag pa la bcings na rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur
1a8(45 gi): ro/ bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyuraro// gang na tshogs kyi bdag po snang ba der sngags 'di lan cig bklags na yang bgegs rnams bar chad
1b1(45 gi): mi byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'khor de dag thams cad dga' ste/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i
1b2(45 gi): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bgegs sel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
1b3(45 gi): zhus dag// gu gul ser po dang pa waM gi sdug pa kun la bsku ba'i sdug pa skur ba'i du bas bdugs na 'go ba'i nang pa'i gaM du phyin yang mi tshugs/ gos pa la thug na myu ma
1b4(45 gi): du sel/ khyim du 'byung po gnod pa dag la rab tu bsngags so// /
1a1(46 gu): 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba bzhugs so//
1b1(46 gu): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba an ta ra ya bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bar
1b2(46 gu): du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge/
1b3(46 gu): 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi shar phyogs su bram
1b4(46 gu): ze'i grong shing a mra'i chal zhes bya ba'i byang phyogs na lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so// de nas lha'i dbang
1b5(46 gu): po brgya byin 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe'i 'du byed kyi snga ltas byung nas skrag pa skyes te/ btsun mo dang g.yog dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das
1b6(46 gu): kyi gan du song nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas don du gnyer ba zhus
1b7(46 gu): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de'i phyir khyod bdud thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba dang bar du gcod
2a1(46 gu): pa thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/ bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags
2a2(46 gu): kyi gzhi 'di rnams nyon cig/ tad+ya thA/ a b+ha ye b+ha ya bi ga te/ d+ha ya pa ri sho d+ha ne/ a b+ha ye a ba yo da ni/ ni ru pa kliShI/ a na
2a3(46 gu): ku la a ku pa ri sho d+ha ni/ a ga bi ka la bi/ a ga la ba na arbu te/ shu b+h+re shu b+he/ te dze te dze ba ti/ sha me a sha me/ mai tre me t+ya d+hi ti te/
2a4(46 gu): go ta Sha ye Ne sa t+ye/ sat+ya dar shi/ a bi dud d+he/ sa hi te/ sa hi ta te/ adze ni ar+tha sid+d+hi/ a mr-i ta pa te/ a b+hi te/ badz+ra sa t+ye/ ak+Sha
2a5(46 gu): ye/ a kA ya pra b+ha dran ta pa re/ shud d+he shud d+he pra b+he/ a wa b+ha se/ a wa b+hA sa ba te/ u pa yo ke/ a nud ta re/ sa ma tsid te/ bud d+ha
2a6(46 gu): a d+hiSh+Thi te/ shi li bi sho d+ha Ne/ a sA ha re/ su ni gri hi/ tam me ra ba lan nam/ ba ra dza yo driSh+Ti ka tra nAn/ dz+wa la nan lha mo la kA ya/ ud
2a7(46 gu): ga tA nan/ d+harma ni d+ha na s+ya/ sang gra ha ni d+harma ko sha s+ya/ ko'u shi ka/ khyed kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis bdud thams
2b1(46 gu): cad dang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gtso par 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs pa bar du gcod pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // don
2b2(46 gu): thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bya dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te de'i tshe 'di skad du/ kho bo lnga las
2b3(46 gu): ma gyur la// 'di nyid na ni 'dug bzhin du// kho bos tshe yang thob zin gyis// grogs dag de ltar shes par gyis// zhes ched du brjod pa ni ched du brjod do// 'di'i mthu
2b4(46 gu): bar du gcod pa dang // bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad med par gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub par gyur cig/ na mo arge tu le na ge tsan da
2b5(46 gu): ni ye swA hA/ sarba arba sarda ni ye swA hA/ dar mar+tha sarba ni ye swA hA/ sarba an ta rA ya bi sho d+ha na ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ brgya byin
2b6(46 gu): btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa bar du gcod pa
2b7(46 gu): thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // zhu dag
1a1(47 ge): nor lha gser 'od bzhugs so//
1b1(47 ge): #/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rad na d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
1b2(47 ge): po las/ nor phyugs skyong zhing spel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dadal ldan rnam thos sras dang ar+ya 'dzam b+ha la la sogs pa/ nor lha
1b3(47 ge): 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya
1b4(47 ge): rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos
1b5(47 ge): sras dang / nor lha'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de yi che sa yi lha mo snyan mas/ bcom ldan
1b6(47 ge): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag sogs pa rnams/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
1b7(47 ge): skye ba mang po la phan pa dang / skye ba mang po la bde ba'i phying/ dbul zhing 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang thal nas/ phyug cing 'de ba dang /
2a1(47 ge): // bsam pa 'grub pa dang / nor dang rigs rgyud dar zhing 'phel ba dang / tshe rabs thams cad du longs spyod che zhing / mthu
2a2(47 ge): dang rdzu 'phrul che ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo khyod kyi
2a3(47 ge): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhus pa legs so legs so// de'i phyir khyod legs par nyon cig/ dang po
2a4(47 ge): bdag gi mdun du mgon po rnam thos sras sku mdog ser po// phyag g.yas na rin po che'i dbyug to// g.yon na ne'u le ser po sre mong gi
2a5(47 ge): rgyal ba nor gyis bkang ba 'dzin pa/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang / seng ge la gdan byas pa/ btsun mo nor bu rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin
2a6(47 ge): pa dpal ldan ar+ya 'dzam b+ha la sku mdog mthing kha/ phyag g.yas na shing thog gi 'bras bu pan tsa pur 'dzin pa/ g.yon na ne'u le'i
2a7(47 ge): rgyal ba ner gyis bkang ba 'dzin pa/ dang sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ ut+pa la'i phreng bas se ral khar brgyan pa/ btsun mo nor bdag
2b1(47 ge): mo dang / nor lha chen po brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / phyugs lnga ljang khu/ rin po che'i brgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa phyag g.yas na rin po che'i gzhong pa mar gyis
2b2(47 ge): bkang ba 'dzin/ phyag g.yon na shel gyi zo ba zhos bkang ba bsnams pa/ de ltar lha rnams mngon sum du dmigs la/ spos chab kyi maN+Dal byas pa'i steng du me tog
2b3(47 ge): sil ma bkram/ pu dza rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchod/ de nas nor dang bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa'i gzungs 'di brjod do// na mo rang na tra yA yA/ na ma bai shra maN+Da la/
2b4(47 ge): ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si mi si mi/ su mu su mu/ tsan ta tsan ta/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki li ki li/ gu ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ sad d+h+ya ad ma nam/ nyid r+b+ha
2b5(47 ge): na ad d+ha na/ tsan d+ha d+hu swA hA/ na mo bai shra ma NA ya swA hA/ na mo ra ta pa ra pu ye swAhA/ gang gis gzungs 'di brjod pas che rabs thams cad du/ nor dang rigs brgyud dang
2b6(47 ge): zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// na mo bai shra ma NA ya swA hA/ na mo Ar+ya 'dzam b+ha lA ya swA hA/ na mo de ba 'dzam b+ha la ya swA hA/ na mo nA ga 'dzam b+hai lA ya swA hA/
2b7(47 ge): ha na mo yag sha 'dzam b+ha lA ya swA hA/ na mo rag sha 'dzam b+ha lA ye swA hA/ na mo suh+ya 'dzam b+ha lA ya swA hA/ na maHpu hra tsan tra 'dzam b+ha lA ya swA hA/
2b8(47 ge): nam sti zi 'dzam b+ha lA ye swA hA/ d+ha na ma d+he hi swA hA/ bdeg la ba su de hi swA hA/ snying po 'di brjod pa'i mthus dge slong chos smra ba'i khyim du nor dang / 'bru dang /
3a1(47 ge): gser dang / g.yu dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / lcags dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / rdo rje dang / dung dang / byu ru dang / pu na Da ri ka dang /
3a2(47 ge): pad+ma dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / ke ke ru dang / d+hi ka dang / kar sha pa ni dang / man shel dang / sa le spr-i dang / bai DUr+ya dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / gnag dang /
3a3(47 ge): ba lang dang / re lug dang / nas dang / 'bras dang / gro dang / khre dang / til dang / nyungs kar dang / so ba dang / sran ma dang / byi til dang / mon gre dang / tshe rabs
3a4(47 ge): thams cad du nor phyugs 'phel bar 'gyur ro// 'byor chang gtor mar bshams nas ni// nor lha rnams la mchod gyur na// byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal po rnas
3a5(47 ge): thos sras// gter ma 'bul ba 'di bzhes la// bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon bdag la// nor lha chen po khyed rnams kyis// bsod nams nor gyi dngos grub sbrul du
3a6(47 ge): gsol// 'dzam gling gter gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// de bzhin dpal ldan Ar+ya 'dzam b+ha la dang rta bdag ku b+he ra// lug bdag nor bu bzang po dang //
3a7(47 ge): gang ba bzang po dang / 'brog gnas lnga rtsen dang / pi tsi kun Da li dang / phyugs lha ljang khu dang ni lha me nor rgyun ma// rmugs 'dzin la sogs pho nya chen po
3a8(47 ge): brgyad// nor lha'i tshogs rnams gtor ma phul ba 'di bzhes la/ bdag la che rabs thams cad du// bsod nams nor gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol//
3b1(47 ge): 'dzam gling gter gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// nor lha chen po khyed rnams kyis// 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// sde bo che la stobs po che// pha rol dpung
3b2(47 ge): ni 'jom par byed// gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing grags dang ldan// mi nad nor gyi god ka zlog par mdzod// lha dang mi ni skyong ba byed//
3b3(47 ge): bdag nyid chen po de dag la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// bdag la tshe rabs thams cad du// bsod nams nor gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol//
3b4(47 ge): 'dzam gling gter gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// de nas sa'i lha mo stan ma stan las langs nas// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pu saM mo g.yas
3b5(47 ge): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nor lha'i tshogs ni ji ltar sgom/
3b6(47 ge): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nor lha sgom pa'i rim pa 'di ltar legs/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rnam thos sras sku mdog ser po// be ser
3b7(47 ge): po las bskyed/ de'i spyan sngar Ar+ya 'dzam b+ha la sku mdog mthing kha/ phyag g.yas na shing thog gi 'bras bu bsnams pa// g.yon na ne'u le'i rgyal pa nor gyis
3b8(47 ge): gang ba 'dzin pa/ shar du sbugs 'dzin/ lto na gang ba bzang po bum pa 'dzin pa/ nub na nor bu bzang po nor bu thegs pa// byang du rta bdag ku be ra ral gri thogs
4a1(47 ge): // pa/ mtshams bzhir yang dag shes ser po ral gri can/ 'brog gnas mdung thogs nas nor bsrung ba/ lnga rtsen ser skya rat+na'i khang bu brtsegs pa bsnams
4a2(47 ge): pa/ dzi bi kun Da li ral gri bsnams nas gnod byed zlog par byed pa/ de dag thams cad rtal chibs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ yum
4a3(47 ge): brgyad sku la 'khril ba/ gnod sprin dang nor lha'i 'khor bye bas bskor ba/ g.yas thams cad du so so'i phyag mtshan phyar ba/ g.yon thams cad rta'i srab mda'
4a4(47 ge): bzung bar bsgom/ 'dzam b+ha lha'i yum nor rgyun ma sku mdog ser mo// phyag g.yas mchog sbyin/ g.yon gyis 'bras kyi snye ma bzung ba/ rat+na'i rgyan gyis
4a5(47 ge): brgyan pa/ rab tu mdzes pa'i cha byad can/ zhi zhing 'dzum pa na chung ma lta bu/ yum zla 'od ma dang / rab spyi ma dang / 'phags ma dang / sbas ma dang // lha mo dbyung
4a6(47 ge): can ma dang / de rnams kha dog yab dang 'dra ba/ rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ g.yas thams cad 'bras kyi snye ma bzung ba/ g.yon thams cad rin po che'i phreng
4a7(47 ge): ba 'dren pa/ rab tu mdzes pa'i cha byad can/ yab re la g.yon phyogs su yum re bsgom mo// de nas 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
4a8(47 ge): 'di rab tu 'don par byas nas/ de la spos kyang byug/ me tog bsil mar bkram/ pu tsa rnam pa lnga bsham/ mtshams drag tu bcad/ bdag nyid khrus leg
4b1(47 ge): par byas/ de nas nor lha'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa mdun du spyan drang nas/ gong ltar sgom zhing gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo
4b2(47 ge): shra ma NA ya swA hA/ ma hA ra dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si mi si mi/ suM ru su ru/ tsan ta can ta/ tsar tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki li ki li/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru
4b3(47 ge): mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ sad+d+ha ad ma nam nyid d+h+ya na/ a d+ha na tsa ha/ ma hA sA hA/ na me bai shra ma NA ya swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ na mo Ar+ya 'dzam b+ha lA ya swA hUM/ na me de ba
4b4(47 ge): 'dzam b+ha lA ya swA hA/ na mo nA ga 'dzam b+ha lA ya swA hA/ na mo yag sha 'dzam b+ha lA ya swA hA/ na mo rag sha 'dzam b+ha lA ya swA hA/ na mo sur+ya 'dzam b+ha
4b5(47 ge): lA ya swA hA/ na maHsur+ya tsan+d+ra 'dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ bdag la ba su de hi/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / nor lha'i rgyal
4b6(47 ge): po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbus na rgyal po rnam thos sras yab yum ser po// shar na 'dzam+b+ha la yab yum mthing kha/ lho na gang ba bzang po yab
4b7(47 ge): yum/ nub na nor bu bzang po yab yum/ byang na rta bdag ku be ra yab yum/ shar lho mtshams na lug lha yang dag shes ser po yab yum/ lho nub mtshams
4b8(47 ge): na nor lha 'brog gnas nag po yab yum/ nub byang mtshams na lnga rtsen ser skya yab yum/ byang shar mtshams na lug lha dzi bi kun Da li dkar po yab yum/ yang
5a1(47 ge): dbus na phyug lha ljang khu/ gzhan yang lha chen po'i nor lha dang / klu chen po'i nor lha dang / gnod sbyin nor lha dang / srin po'i nor lha dang / tshangs pa'i nor lha
5a2(47 ge): dang / nyi ma dang zla ba'i nor lha dang / gza' dang rgyu skar gyi nor lha dang / lha srin sde brgyad kyi nor lha dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor lha dang / nor lha'i
5a3(47 ge): tshogs rnams kyis bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbul ba'i sdug bsngal bsal nas/ thams cad du phun sum tshogs nas/ nor dang / 'bru dang / gser dang / dngul
5a4(47 ge): dang / zangs lcags dung dang / byu ru dang / bai DUr+ya dang / pun Da ri ka dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra ni la dang / ke ke ru dang / tir ya ka dang / kar sha pa ni dang / man shel dang
5a5(47 ge): sa le sbram dang / rta dang glang po che dang / ma he dang / gnag dang / ba lang dang / ra lug dang / nas dang / gro dang / 'bras dang / til dang / so ba dang / sran ma dang /
5a6(47 ge): khre dang / yungs kar dang / mon sran dang / nor phyugs dang / yo byad thams cad kyi char chen po phob cig/ dkon mchog mchod pa'i yo byad/ chos spyod pa'i mthun
5a7(47 ge): rkyen/ bsod nams nor gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ bdag la ba su pusting ku ru d+he hi/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa gser 'od
5a8(47 ge): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po bdi 'don zhing / nor lha mchod gyur na/ tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas
5b1(47 ge): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// nam du yang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur ro// gang du skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// gang zhig tshe zad pa
5b2(47 ge): las/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'don na che yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa'i phung po ri rab tsam yang byang bar 'gyur
5b3(47 ge): ro/ de dag la bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyi lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za rnams kyi glags btsal kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// gal te
5b4(47 ge): dus la babs te 'chi bar gyur na yang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus mngon sum du lung bston par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas stong gis de la phyag skyong bar 'gyur
