5b5(47 ge): ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'di la the tshom dang som nyi dang yid gnyis ma za cig/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang de'i phyi bzhin 'brang
5b6(47 ge): nas srung ba dang / bde ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do// sa phyogs gang du mdo sde dkon mchog 'di 'dri 'am/ klog gam/ kha don du 'don na/ sa phyogs de yang
5b7(47 ge): mchod rten du 'gyur ro// phyag bya bar 'os par 'gyur to// byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i tshe na bya dang ri dgas kyi rna lam du sgra grag par gyur na yang / de dag bla na med
5b8(47 ge): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de dag mir skyes na yang rgyal rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// gzugs bzang
6a1(47 ge): ngar 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro// shes rab che bar 'gyur ro// chos spyod pa'i skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// zad pa med pa'i longs spyod ni tshe
6a2(47 ge): rabs kun tu rnyed par 'gyur ro// khyad par du rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras dang / de bzhin Ar+ya 'dzam b+ha la dang rta bdag ku be ra/ phyugs bdag lha mo nor rgyun ma dang /
6a3(47 ge): lug bdag nor bu bzang po dang / de la sogs te nor lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis tshe rabs rtag tu grogs byed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
6a4(47 ge): stsal pa dang de nas de'i tshe lha mo dpal stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ phyag dang skor ba mang du byas na
6a5(47 ge): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yon tan de dag dang ldan pa lags na/ gser 'od 'don zhing nor lha mchod gyur na/ grub pa
6a6(47 ge): mtshan ma ji ltar lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo dpal legs par nyon cig/ ngas khyod la bshad do// gser
6a7(47 ge): 'od 'don zhing shor lha mchod gyur na/ grub pa'i mtshan ma 'di ltar lags/ bdag gi gter dang nor srungs rnyed// gser dang shing 'bras 'thu ba dang // zhing rno lo thog/
6a8(47 ge): dang snyim bsil dang 'bru bdag byed/ bang khang 'bru dang nor gyis gang // pho ma rab tu bzang po yis/ bza' 'atud nor 'bru la sogs sbyin// bu mo bags
6b1(47 ge): bzang po yis/ grong khyer chang dang 'o ma blung // dkar gsum sbyin dang dus byed dang // nor phyugs mang po bdag byed dang // dmag mi khrab can bon po bya ru can// ma
6b2(47 ge): rnal byon pa'i dmag tshogs kyis// rtsa dang sog dang lo ma sbyin/ de dag grub pa'i mtshan ma lags/ grub pa'i mtshan ma byung gyur na/ bdag gi nor dang rigs
6b3(47 ge): brgyud dar gyur nas// bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ nor lha'i tshogs rnams dang / lha mo chen mo
6b4(47 ge): dpal dang // lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
6b5(47 ge): 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ tshe rabs thams cad du yo byad phun sum tshogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so//

1a1(48 ge): gser 'od ga yang skyab shes bya ba bzhugs so// /
1b1(48 ge): #/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su war+Na sa twa nA ma~M mA hA ya na sU tra hu ye/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser bod dam pa
1b2(48 ge): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las g.yang skyabs zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
1b3(48 ge): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri'i rtse mo chos kyi dbying
1b4(48 ge): kyi spyod yul na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs so// de'i tshe nyan thos kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun 'bum phrag grangs med pa dang / byang /
1b5(48 ge): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ched med grangs med pa dang / li tsa byi gzhon nu stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu bzhi
1b6(48 ge): khri nyis stong dang / klu'i bu mo sum khri drug stong dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po bzhi khri dgu stong dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /

2a1(48 ge): #// der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug
2a2(48 ge): ste/ sems rtse gcig tu byas shing thal mo sbar nas mig mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la blta zhing gsel ba 'debs
2a3(48 ge): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa mang po la thugs brtse ba'i spyan gyis gzigs nas tshigs su bcad pa
2a4(48 ge): 'di dag bka' stsal to// mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po ste// nyan na shin tu zab pa dang // yongs su brtags na zab pa nyid//
2a5(48 ge): gser 'od dam pa 'di 'chad do// phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// byin gyis brlabs te brjod par bya// mi 'khrug
2a6(48 ge): pas ni shar phyogs su// rin chen tog gis lho phyogs su// 'od dpag med kyis nub phyogs su// rnga sgra yis ni byang phyogs
2a7(48 ge): su/ sdig pa thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// bshad pa dam bkra shis pa// sdig pa thams cad zad byed pa// sdug bsngal
2b1(48 ge): thams cad 'jig par byed// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhi/ dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan// byin gyis brlabs te brjod par bya// sems can
2b2(48 ge): gang dag dbang po nyams// tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang // phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang // mdza' sdug skye bo sdang
2b3(48 ge): ba dang // bran gza' la sogs gces pa dang // phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang // nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang // mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang /
2b4(48 ge): 'jigs pa dang ni 'phongs pa dang // gza' dang rgyu skar byed sdems dang // mi bzang gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan mngal las byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig
2b5(48 ge): pa mthong na yang // de ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yis// mdo sde dam pa nyan par bya// gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing // gos gtsang gis ni rab brgyan te//
2b6(48 ge): zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul pa// mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na// mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis// shin tu mi bzang 'di 'dra ba// de dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
2b7(48 ge): 'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang // blon po'i tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas// gnod sbyin bye ba du ma yis// de dag la ni bsrung bar byed// lha mo chen po dpyang
2b8(48 ge): can dang // na ra dza nar gnas pa dang // 'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog pa dang // sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang // tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang // klu dbang mthu
3a1(48 ge): chen rnams dang ni// mi 'am ci dang lha min dbang // de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang rnams// sde dang stobs dang gzhon par bcas// bcas te de dag
3a2(48 ge): lhags nas ni// nyin dang mtshan mo mi g.yel bar// de dag la ni srung bar byed// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa ste//
3a3(48 ge): bskal pa bye ba spyod dka' bar// mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bya// gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa dang // gang dag gzhan las thos byed dang // gang dag rjes su
3a4(48 ge): yi rangs dang // gang dag mchod pa byed pa yi// de dag rnams la lha dang klu// mi dang mi 'am ci dag dang // lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis// bskal pa du mar
3a5(48 ge): mchod par 'gyur// srog chags bsod nams byed pa rnams// de dag bsod nams phung po ni// mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang // bsam gyis mi khyab
3a6(48 ge): skye bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin zab mo spyod pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // rab tu bzung bar
3a7(48 ge): 'gyur ba yin// gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la// dri zhim pa yi gos 'chang zhing // byams pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas// g.yel ba med par

3b2(48 ge): yang / bshad pa 'di ni grag gyur pa// de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa ste// sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags// phyi mar gyur pa'i dus nyid du// mi rnams bsod
3b3(48 ge): nams nyams pa dang // cho ga 'di la brtson byas na// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar// dgos 'dod thams cad ster bar byed// shin tu dben zhing nyams dga'
3b4(48 ge): bar// gzhi ma dkar gtsang steng du ni// dkon mchog mchod pa rgya cher bshams// yi dam chos skyong gtor ma dang // phyogs skyong nor lnga sde brgyad la// dkar ma
3b5(48 ge): mchod pa rgya cher bshams// mda' dang phye mar gser skyems mchod// rin chen bum pa mar khrus bkang // rba stug rin chen gser g.yu dang // g.yang gi ra ba rin chen
3b6(48 ge): mar gyis bkang // mar lug dung sha chang phud sogs// phyag rgya sngags kyis byin brlabs te// byang phyogs gnod sbyin gter nang nas// rin chen sna tshogs mdzes
3b7(48 ge): par byas// sems bskyed yan lag tshangs byas nas// dang dkar g.yab cing spyan 'dren na// chos kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das// chos kun rnams la mnga'
3b8(48 ge): mdzad pa// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sras bcas rnams// bkra shis skyid brtags gnas 'dir byon// dar dkar g.yab cing g.yang du len// thugs rje'i
4a1(48 ge): byin rlabs chen po yis// pha dang slong du bskyab tu gsol// chos rnams gang dag me long 'dra// rnam rtog bral bas m+me long ltar// mi skye mi 'gag
4a2(48 ge): gzugs sku 'char// dri med 'ja' tshen ji bzhin du// g.yang dag thabs shes sku ru gsal// g.yang brtan mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku// byAk+ka shis gnas 'dir g.yang
4a3(48 ge): la byen// dang dkar gas bcing g.yang du zam// byin rlabs pa dang g.yang du 'dus// dge 'dun byang chub pying po sdig// mi tog ba dga' sa la 'azhugs// !
4a4(48 ge): don ma rig mun sel ba// bkra shis skyid rtags g.yang la byon// dar dkar gi yab cing g.yang du len// rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po la// gal te 'di la bgegs yod
4a5(48 ge): na/ dkon mchog gsum gyis byin rlabs dang // khro bo bdud rtsi khyil pa yis// mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing // lus kyang dum bu stong du 'jig/ oM A badz+ra
4a6(48 ge): kro d+ha hUM phaT// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// yum chen shes rab pha rol phyin// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas// dang dkar g.yab cing g.yang du len//
4a7(48 ge): 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir byon la// yon bdag che srog skyab du gsol// 'og mir chos kyi gzhal yas nas// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad dang // sa bcu'i
4a8(48 ge): byang chub sems dpa' rnams// dar dkar g.yab cing ga yad+ma la d+hu bcas pa 'dir byon la// yon bdag che ga yang skyab du gsol// bya rgod phung
4b1(48 ge): bo'i ri bo nas// bcom ldan shAkya thub pa dang // nyan thos chen pa man sring ba 'aye// dar dkar ka yab cing g.yang du len// 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir byon la/
4b2(48 ge): yon bdag che g.yang skyab tu gsol// seng ge bsnol ba'i khri stengs su// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs na// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad ni// sku mdog dkar la 'od
4b3(48 ge): zer 'phro// phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams// zhal nas g.yang rab dam pa 'don// oM shrI badz+ra bai re tsA rat+na sid+d+hi hUM hrI tha// dar dkar g.yab cing spyan 'dren na// 'a
4b4(48 ge): ldan skyid pa'i gnas 'di ru// 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir byon la// yon bdag che g.yang skyab tu gsol// 'di nas shar phyogs zhing khams na// glang chen bsnol
4b5(48 ge): pa'i khri stengs su// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor bcas ni// sku mdog dkar gsal rgyan dang ldan// phyag na gser gyi lhung bzed bsdams//
4b6(48 ge): zhal nas g.yang rab dam pa 'don// oM badz+ra rat+na hUM hrItha/ dar dkar g.yab cing spyan 'dren na// bde ldan skyid pa'i gnas 'di ru// 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir byon
4b7(48 ge): la// yon bdag che g.yang sgrub du gsol// gdi nas lho phyogs rol pa na// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// rta mchog bsnol ba'i khri stengs su// nyi zla
4b8(48 ge): pad+ma'i gdan stengs na// bcom ldan rin chen byung ldan ni// sku mdog gser gyi lhun po 'dra// phyag na g.yang gi dung zhal bsnams// zhal nas g.yang rab de
5a1(48 ge): pa 'dod/ b+hU u~M a badz+ra rat+na sarba b+ho wa hAM hI thA// dar dkar ga ya ba cing spyan 'dren na// bkra shis skyid pa'i gnas 'di ru// 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir byon/
5a2(48 ge): labadag cag che gsang sgrub tu gsal// 'di nas nub kyi phyogs rol na// rma bya bsnol ba'i khri stengs su// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stongs na// bcom ldan mgon po
5a3(48 ge): tshe dpag med// che la dbang ba'i lce dang bcas// sku mdog dmar po 'od zer 'bar// phyag na che yi bum pa bsnams// zhal nas g.yang rab dam pa 'don// oM A
5a4(48 ge): badz+ra a mr-i ta pad+ma saM b+ha wa hUM hri tha// dar dkar g.yab cing spyan 'dren na// bkra shis skyid pa'i gnas 'di ru// 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir byon la// bdag cag
5a5(48 ge): che g.yang skyab tu gsol// byang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// shang shang bsnol ba'i khri stengs su// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs na// bcom ldan don yod grub pa ni//
5a6(48 ge): ljang khu in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ 'phrin las grub pa'i lha dang bcas// phyag na g.yu'i lhung bzed ni// rin chen g.yang gis gang ba bsnams// zhal nas g.yang rab/
5a7(48 ge): dam pa 'don// oM A a mo b+ha kaR+ShA sid+d+hi sar+b+ba dza hUM hI tha/ dar dkar g.yab cing sman 'dren na// bkra shis skyid pa'i gnas 'di ru// 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir/
5a8(48 ge): byon la/ bdag cag tshe ga yang skyab du gsol// dbuSh+ka tsuk+Sha trorarA dkar me lha mo che// sku mdog dkar mo gangs ri 'dra// dbu
5b1(48 ge): spyod spyan gyis kun tu gzigs// phyag mtshan rnam gra tA ni// thugs rjes 'gro ba kun la snyoms// mi dang nir gyi bdag po ste// der dkar ge
5b2(48 ge): cing spyan 'dren na// bkra shis sgyid rtags gnas 'de ru// 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir byon la// yon bdag che g.yang skyab tu gsol// shar gyi phyogs na
5b3(48 ge): bzhugs pa ni// rdo rje gtsug tor lha me te// phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// g.yon na g.yu'i dril bu bsil// bde ljon skying pa'i gnas 'di ru// dar
5b4(48 ge): dkar g.yab cing spyan 'dren na// 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir byon la// bdag cag tshe ga yang sgrub tu gsol// lho yi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// rin
5b5(48 ge): chen gtsug tor lha mo che// phyag na yid bzhin nor bu bsdams// gser gyi dril bu gsung sbyin sgrog/ mi ga yang sdud pa'i bdag mo ste// dar dkar
5b6(48 ge): g.yab cing spyan 'dren na// bkra shis skyid pa'i gnas 'di ru// 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir byon la// bdag cag mi g.yang skyab tu gsol// nub kyi phyog
5b7(48 ge): na bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma gtsug tor lha mi ste// phyag na pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsnams// g.yon nagayang gi zhags pa 'dzin// phyugs g.yang sdud pa'i bdag
5b8(48 ge): ste// dar dkar g.yab cing spyan 'dren na// bkra shis skyid pa'i kanas 'di ru// 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir byon la// yon bdag phyugs g.yang skyab du gsol//
6a1(48 ge): // byang gi phyogs na bzhus pa ni// las kyi gtsug tor lha mo che// phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams/ g.yon pa 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin// lo g.yeng sdud pa'i bdag
6a2(48 ge): me ste// dar dkar g.yab cing spyan 'dren na// bkra shis pa'i gnas 'di ru// 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir byon la// bdag cagu lho g.yang skyab tu gsal// gra yi
6a3(48 ge): phyogs ni kun tu yang // rigs kyi yum dang gsang ba'i yum// dgos pa rnams ni ster ba dang // lo tsA dang ni ma mA kI/ dkar me sgrol ma la sogs rnams// dang
6a4(48 ge): dkar g.yab cing spyan 'dren na// dum bu bzhi la g.yang rten gsol// lha yi dbang po brgya byin yang // lha rnams kun la dbang bsgyur zhing // pha rol chos kyi dge
6a5(48 ge): slong mdzad// lha bron mang por sgra sgrog cing // bkra shis skyed pa'i gnas 'di du// yid bzhin nor bu ga yang du btags// kayas pas lA li pho brang du// bkra shI
6a6(48 ge): g.yang rnams brtan pa yis// don grub lha mo 'phrin las chu// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// dar dkar g.yab cing spyan 'dren na// gnas 'dir
6a7(48 ge): bsrung ba'i las mdzod cig/ de ring yon bdag 'khor bcas la// mi yi tshe dang nor gyi g.yang // zas kyi bcud dang skom gyi bcud// rnga phyugs srog chags kun gyi
6a8(48 ge): g.yang // mi rnams kun la sgrub tu gsol// lded dag kun la de dag sdig par ma gyur cig/ nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin// rgyu skar thams
6b1(48 ge): cad bzang po yin// sangs rgyas thams can rdzu 'phrul d+ha/ zag pa zad// bden pa'i tshig 'di brjod pas// bdag cag rnams la bde
6b2(48 ge): legs shog/ lo brgya 'tsho zhing ston brgya mthong ba shog/ skabs 'dir gtor ma 'bul// dkon mchog le gsol ba 'debs// chos skyong la bstod bskul
6b3(48 ge): drag po bya// de nas nor lha rnams la g.yang blan pa ni phye mar dang // gser skyems kyis mchod de 'di skad do// hUM bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni// gdug pa ma lus
6b4(48 ge): 'dul ba'i phyir// rdo rje bsdams la phyag 'tshal lo// khyed kyi bka' nyan gsung stod ni// ci 'dod re ba skong mdzad pa// mthu chen stobs dang ldan pa po// gnod
6b5(48 ge): sbyin sum khri drug stong la// mthun pa'i dam rdzas 'bul ba ni// phye mar mda' dang rin chen dang // bdud rtsi gser skyems sil snyan sogs// dkar mangs
6b6(48 ge): sman gyi mchod pa 'bul// nor gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// byang phyogs dkor mdzod pho brang nas// nor lha'i rgyal po rnam thos sras// gnod sbyin
6b7(48 ge): kun gyi gtso bo ste// sku la bse khrab 'bar ba gsol// phyag na ba dang rtse brgyad 'phyar// g.yon pa rin chen ne'u le 'dzin// gser gyi mchod rten sor
6b8(48 ge): po las// dgos 'dod rin chen char ltar 'bab// chibs su seng ge bgying pachi bas// nor lha bye ba'i 'khor gyis bskor// kun kyang rin chen rgyan cha can/
7a1(48 ge): la la rin chen ni le 'dzin// dar dkar g.yab cing spyan 'dren na// bkra shi sa pa'i gnas 'di ru// khor dang bcas pa 'dir byin la// rin chen dngos
7a2(48 ge): grub bdag la stsol// oM bai shra ma Na ya rat+na sid+d+hi sa ma sa hU~M hri tha// bcom ldan lha me ner rgyun ma// phyag g.yas mchog sbyin phyag rgya yis// 'jigs pa
7a3(48 ge): brgyad skyobs 'gro ba sdud// g.yon pa'i phyag gi thugs ka ru// rin chen 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin// dgos 'dod re ba skangs mdzad pa// dpag bsam shing chen rgyu
7a4(48 ge): pa ltar// dbul ba sel zhing nyon mongs 'joms// dar dkar g.yab cing spyan 'dren na// 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kun// bkra shis gnas 'dir g.yang
7a5(48 ge): la 'dus// rta glang rin chen gos dang 'bru// khrus kyi rdzing bu la sogs pa// rin chen dngos grub bdag la stsol// oM g+ha ti dzam+b+ha sems ra ga ni ma ka ra badz+ra rak+Sha
7a6(48 ge): ting ti sarba dza hUM hri tha// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen gter mdzod nas// nor lha'i rgyal pe Ar+ya 'dzam+b+ha la// gtso ma gser mdog gzi brjid ldan// rin chen rgyan ldan
7a7(48 ge): phan sems can// phyag g.yas nor bu ster mdzad pa// phyag g.yen ne le'i rgyal ba nas// sgrub pa po la dngos grub ster// dar dkar g.yab cing spyan 'dren na/
7a8(48 ge): 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kun// shes gnas 'di sa// mi dor zas gos dngos grub stsol// oM dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye rat+na sid d+hi dza hU
7b1(48 ge): g.yab cing spyan 'dren na// 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis// 'dod yon lnga la longs spyod dang // bla na med pa chen po'i nor// ci 'dod phun sum tshogs pa yi//
7b2(48 ge): dngos grub chen po bdag la stsol// oM hri a pa ra ma ti ti bdag la sid+d+hi dza hUM// gnod sbyin rgyal po gter bdag po// bzhugs pa ri rab rtse la bzhugs// thugs
7b3(48 ge): ni 'dzam gling kun la khyab// sku mdog dmar ser gzi brjid la// nor rgyun ma yi yum dang bcas// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'byung po mnan// rin chen bzang
7b4(48 ge): po khyod la bsted// oM a phu yu Ni sha ya d+ha ra d+ha ra d+hi ri d+hi ri swA hA// nor lha'i rgyal po rnam thos sras// sku mdog ma des ci yang sten// phyag mtshan mdung dang ba dan
7b5(48 ge): bsdams// mchod rten rin chen ne le 'dzin// ri rab gling bzhi mi yi bcud// rnam rgyal khang bzang nor gyis 'gengs// yid bzhin nor gyis g.yang 'bebs pa/
7b6(48 ge): re ba skod zhing nor rnams sbyin// zhal nas g.yang rab dam pa 'don// na mo rat+na tra pA ya// ne mo bai shra ma NA ya ma hA rA dza ya// tad+ya thA/ su mu su mu/ tsan d+ha
7b7(48 ge): canaH/ sar tsa re/ ka ra ka ri/ ki li ki li/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru// san+na pa ye// ang ma nam nyid tan// an dang d+hu ra swAhA// na mo bai shra ma NA ya

9b1(48 ge): bcud kun gyi mchog/ gi waM sman mchog kun gyi
9b2(48 ge): khod lo rin chen gling bzhi dbang // rta mchog rin
9b3(48 ge): bde mchog ldan// khyim bdag rin chen dang
9b4(48 ge): yang / de ring bdag cag 'khor bcas
9b5(48 ge): rabs mched bzhi des// gser gyis
9b6(48 ge): phya gzhi ga yang gzhi'i steng du ni//
9b7(48 ge): las/ phyugs rnams kun lag
9b8(48 ge): por 'gyur// rin chen bdun la
1a1(49 go): 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos zhus pa bzhugs so// he he//
1b1(49 go): #/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba su d+ha ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs//
1b2(49 go): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
1b3(49 go): bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u sham+bi na/ tsher ma can zhes bya ba'i gnas mchog chen po na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong
1b4(49 go): gi dge 'dun chen po dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
1b5(49 go): te/ de'i tshe ko'u sham+bI'i grong khyer chen po na/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba// dbang po nye bar zhi ba/ yid nye bar
1b6(49 go): zhi ba/ bu pho dang bu mo mang ba/ bza' mi mang po dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
1b7(49 go): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas
2a1(49 go): nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos/ bcom
2a2(49 go): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la
2a3(49 go): skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs
2a4(49 go): 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces
2a5(49 go): bka' stsal to// khyim bdag khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig/ khyod kyis ji skad dris pa'i dri ba lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi
2a6(49 go): sems rang bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes
2a7(49 go): gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
2b1(49 go): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji ltar dbul ba ma mchis par 'gyur zhing / tho nad kyi thebs pa rnams bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/ de nas bcom
2b2(49 go): ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du// khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag khyod ci'i phyir dbul po'i don du 'dri/ de skad ces
2b3(49 go): bka' stsal pa dang / khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dbul ba/ gso ba mang ba/
2b4(49 go): bu pho dang bu mo mang ba/ bza' mi mang po dang ldan pa lags na/ de'i slad du gang gis sems can dbul po rnams/ dbul ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / bro
2b5(49 go): nad kyi thebs pa bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / nor dang 'bru dang bang mdzod mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang // sdug pa dang / yid du 'thad pa dang /
2b6(49 go): dbang phyug du 'gyur ba dang / sbyin bdag mdzad pas ma 'tshal zhing // dbyig dang / gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / lcags dang / nor dang / 'bru'i
2b7(49 go): mdzod dang / bang mdzod mang po dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dag 'tshal
2b8(49 go): zhing / 'byor par gyur pa dang // khyim gyi bu smang dang // bza' mi rnams brtan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par
3a1(49 go): bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag
3a2(49 go): sngon 'das pa'i dus/ bskal pa grangs med pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/
3a3(49 go): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi
3a4(49 go): ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rgya mtsho'i dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de la nor gyi rgyun zhes
3a5(49 go): bya ba'i gzungs 'di thos te/ gzung zhing bcangs/ klags/ kun chub par byas/ rjes su yi rangs par byas shing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab
3a6(49 go): tu bstan te/ rigs kyi bu ngas rab tu bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus mi rnams rnam par mtho tshim par mi byed do// gnod sbyin
3a7(49 go): dang / mi ma yin rnams rnam par mtho tsham par mi byed do// srin po rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// yi dgas rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi
3a8(49 go): byed do// sha za rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// 'byung po rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// grul bum rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par
3b1(49 go): mi byed do// brjed byed rnams rnam par mtho batsham par mi byed do// rnon po rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// lus srul po rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi
3b2(49 go): byed do// lha ma yin rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnam
3b3(49 go): dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su dar rnabs za ba rnams
3b4(49 go): dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su dbugs rngub pa dang / 'byung ba za ba'i bar rnams rnam par 'che bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
3b5(49 go): nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gi khyim na yod dam/ snying na yod dam/ lag na yod dam/ glegs bam du chud dam/ thos
3b6(49 go): par gyur tam/ kun chub par byas sam/ klags sam/ bzung ngam/ rjes su yi rang bar byas sam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i rig
3b7(49 go): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / dge ba dang / grub pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur ro// su zhig de bzhin gshegs
3b8(49 go): pa rnams la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di nam phyed na lan gnyis sam/ lan gsum mam/ lan bzhi bton na/ de'i lha yi rangs nas/ de bzhin
4a1(49 go): gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dga' ba dang / chos gdags par byas pas dga' ba dang / dge 'dun gdags pas dga' ba dang / chos smra ba la lhag pa
4a2(49 go): bsam pas bdag nyid 'ongs te/ 'bru'i char 'bebs par 'gyur ro// na mo b+ha ga wa ti/ badz+ra nir g+ho She/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myag sam bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/
4a3(49 go): su be b+ha tra bi ta/ ba le/ mngag la ma ti/ a tse le a tsa ba le/ ud ga ta ni/ swa b+hA ba te/ d+ha na pa ti/ shu b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ bi ma le/ nir ma la/ su ru su ru
4a4(49 go): be sa b+ha ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ a tsan te/ a nan+te/ bi na ma te/ bi sha ke shi ne shi/ aM ku re/ maM ku re/ pra b+ha ka re/ bi ra me/ bi d+ha me/ ri ri mai/ d+hI d+hi me/
4a5(49 go): d+hu d+hu me/ kha kha me/ ta ta kha mi/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ra/ badz+re badz+re/ badz+ro b+ha me/ ta ke ta ke/ tha ke tha ke/ u ke/ bug ke/ tha ke/ tha ra ke/ a pa ta ni/ par sha ni/ ne tra d+ha/
4a6(49 go): ni/ sa ma ga ra nir g+hoShA ya/ ma nu sma ra sma ra/ sarba sad tA/ ta thA ga ta/ ma nu s+pha ra/ sad ta ya/ ma nu s+pha ra d+harma sad te ma nu sma ra/ sad ga sad ga ta ma nu sma ra/ ta
4a7(49 go): Ta ta Ta/ pu ra pu ra/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ b+ha ra b+ha ra ni/ a ma le/ su mang ga le/ shan ta ma ti/ shu ba ma ti/ maM ga la ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ b+ha ta ma ti/ pra b+ha maM ti/ su
4a8(49 go): tsan+d+ra ma ti/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra swA hA// a pa ra na ma nu sma ra swA hA/ pra b+ha ma nu sma ra swA hA/ d+hi ti ma nu sma ra swA hA/ ched ma nu sma ra swA hA/
4b1(49 go): dzap+tA ya ma nu swa ra swA hA/ hri da ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ sarba sad ta ya ma nu s+pha ra swA hA/ oM bA su d+ha re swA hA/ oM shri bA su swA hA/ oM mahA bA su swA hA// rigs kyi bu 'di ni
4b2(49 go): nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs te/ gzungs 'di'i mthus mu ge dang / nad dang / 'chi nges 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
4b3(49 go): la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nub gcig bton na/ de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// rgyas pa'i don du bdag gi khyim mam/ gzhan gyi
4b4(49 go): khyim 'am/ gnas gtsang mi'i bang mdzod dam/ gnas gang yang rung bar de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / sangs rgyas dang
4b5(49 go): byang chub sems dpa' dang / gsang sngags kyi lha'i phyir tsan+dan gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas te/ nub gcig bton na/ rigs kyi bu de'i khyim nor dang / 'bru
4b6(49 go): dang / gser dngul dang / yo byad thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshad tsam gyis gang bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ro//
4b7(49 go): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod rab tu bsgrim la nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ ston cig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag
4b8(49 go): par rab tu ston cig/ des khyod yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde dang / grub pa dang / lo legs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag
5a1(49 go): zla ba bzang pos legs so zhes gsol to// khyim bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di blangs nas/ tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing
5a2(49 go): yi rangs nas/ rab tu dga' ba dang yid de ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs
5a3(49 go): 'di bklags lags/ kun chub par bgyis lags/ rjes su yi rang bar bgyis lags so// gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyid
5a4(49 go): lags so// de'i skad cig tsam la khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i bang mdzod rnams nor gyis yongs su gang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag
5a5(49 go): zla ba bzang pos lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
5a6(49 go): kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim nor dang 'brus yongs su gang ba dang / bang mdzod chen po dang / mdzod
5a7(49 go): yongs su gang ba rnams la ltos/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan nas/ ko'u sham+b+hi'i grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin
5a8(49 go): nas nang du zhugs pa dang / nor dang / 'brus yongs su gang ba dang / yo byad phun sum tshogs pa'i mdzod chen po dang / bang mdzod rnams yongs su gang bar
5b1(49 go): mthong ngo // mthong nas tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
5b2(49 go): bcom ldan 'das gang gis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po nor mang zhing bang mdzod rnams kyang nor dang 'bru phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang
5b3(49 go): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu khyim bdag zla ba bzang po dad cing mchog tu dad la dge ba'i bsam pa can des nor
5b4(49 go): gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di gzung zhing rab tu 'don/ bklags shing kun chub par byas/ rjes su yi rang byas shing gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir//
5b5(49 go): kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang de'i phyir nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di long zhing / chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis la/ gzhan dag la yang rab tu ston
5b6(49 go): cig/ des ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang
5b7(49 go): bde bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo su zhig rig sngags 'di las gzhan du smra ba ni/ lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa
5b8(49 go): dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nangs ma mthong ngo // lan gnyis lan gsum du ston kyang bgal
6a1(49 go): bar byed pa ni gnas med do// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba zad pa rnams kyi rna lam du sgra grag par yang mi gyur na/
6a2(49 go): glegs bam la yi ger bris pa 'am/ yid la bzung ba la ni lta ci smos// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' ste/ gzungs
6a3(49 go): 'di ni sems can dbul po dang / nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / sems can sdang bas gnod par byas pa thams cad kyi don du/ de
6a4(49 go): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang / bshad pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / rab tu phye ba dang / bsngags pa dang / bkrol ba dang /
6a5(49 go): gsal bar mdzad pa dang / skyed pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang / gnyan par brjod pa dang / go bar mdzad pa'i
6a6(49 go): phyir ro// de nas kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ de'i tshe thal mo sbyar nas ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod cing / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// /
6a7(49 go): sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam gyis mi khyab ste// sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags// bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dad rnams kyis
6a8(49 go): rnam par smin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab lags// zhi ba ci yang mkhyen pa thams cad mkhyen// chos kyi rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba/ ye shes pha rol
6b1(49 go): skrod par byon gyur pa// sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs nas rab tu
6b2(49 go): dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar
6b3(49 go): bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ni khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos zhus pa zhes bya bar zungs shig/ nor dang 'bru dang
6b4(49 go): rin po che thams cad kyi gter zhes bya bar zungs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa nor gyi rgyun zhes bya bar yang zungs shig/ bcom ldan
6b5(49 go): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'
6b6(49 go): dedang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
6b7(49 go): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // mang+ga laM//
1a1(50 ngi): 'phags pa nor bu bzang po'i gzungs bzhug so// /
1a2(50 ngi): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma ti b+ha dra nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nor bu bzang po'i gzungs zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la
1a3(50 ngi): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
1a4(50 ngi): gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang po'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin
1a5(50 ngi): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ gnod sbyin gyi
1a6(50 ngi): sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang po'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bstan
1a7(50 ngi): nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis ming bro 'di nyin re bzhin dus gsum du 'don par byed na/ bdag de'i slad bzhin du rtag tu 'brang
1a8(50 ngi): bar bya'o// de'i dgos pa thams cad / gos dang / zas dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / dngul dag kyang
1b1(50 ngi): stsal bar bgyi'o// de'i don thams cad kyang 'grub paru/ Ar+ya ams can tha mnas kyang de'i dbang du 'gyur bar bgyi'o// de'i bya ba sna tshogs thams cad kyang med
1b2(50 ngi): la bsgrub par bgyis te/ 'khrig pa dang ldan pa ni mjal ba'i bzo// na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha dra ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ snang ya the na/ hi li ma Ni b+ha /
1b3(50 ngi): ti li tsi li ma Ni b+ha dra/ ki li ki li ma Ni b+hadra/ tsi li maNi d+ha ng+ge/ tsi l-i tsi le ma ti khyadra/ tsu lu ma ti b+ha dra/ tsu lu tsu lu ma ti b+ha pra/ tu ru ma Ni b+hapra/ tu ru tu ru ma Ni khA pra ku ru
1b4(50 ngi): xxx
1b5(50 ngi): ma Ni b+hadra/ ku ru ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsu ru tsu ru ma Ni b+ha drA/ su ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ su ru su ru ma ti b+ha dA/ sarba A ar+tha ma me sA d+ha ya swA hA/ tad+ya thA ba d+hu ta ne su pU \u0f7fna
1b6(50 ngi): su ru me sum te/ su ra the/ susmA bte/ he le ke hi la ka li/ pu n+ya sid d+hi b+ha dra/ hi li he la~M swA hA/ e hi ke ni Sh+pe/ e he ko ni b+he swA hA// lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na 'grub
1b7(50 ngi): par 'gyur ro// 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ zla ba yar ngo'i tshes bco lnga la gtsang sbra byas la dus gsum du a ka ru yi du bas 'dug ste/ lan bdun stong bzlas brjod
1b8(50 ngi): byas na gser rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa nor bu bzang po'i gzungs rdzogs so// zhus dag/ sarba mang+ga la ma/
1a1(51 ngu): a par yang dag shes kyi gzungs bzhugs so//
1b1(51 ngu): rgya gar skad du/ yag+na a pa ra bi shud d+ha nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gzhan gyis mi thub pa yang dag shes
1b2(51 ngu): kyi gzungs/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag
1b3(51 ngu): na rdo rje/ re rab ri'i rtse mo byang shar mtshams kyi pho brang / ngal bso ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa'i tshe/ grangs med pa'i lha dang
1b4(51 ngu): klu dang dra za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lho phye chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / gnod
1b5(51 ngu): sbyin ngal bso ba dang / yang dag shes dang nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po dang / dza ma b+ha la la sogs pa/ bcom ldan
1b6(51 ngu): 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas 'khod do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po yang dag shes a pa ra'i cha lugs 'dzin pa/ sku la no
1b7(51 ngu): bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ zla ba dang nyi ma ltar 'bar ba'i sgo rab tu bzhad pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na
2a1(51 ngu): rdo rjeg la ba der song ste/ b+hag ban la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// blag zan/ bdag gi bcom ldan 'a/
2a2(51 ngu): kyi zhabs la dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol/ nu mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na ma sAd+d+ha ya/
2a3(51 ngu): nam tha mA ya/ na ma in drA ya/ na me tsi tu nam/ ma b+he ra sha na ma/ tad+ya thA/ tsa~M le hi le/ me le mi le/ gu rim tu ri/ ma hab+hU d+ha ri/ d+ha ra mi kye/ d+hun d+ha/ khu 'un
2a4(51 ngu): d+hid ha ha ha ha ha/ hi hi hi he hi/ tso tsa ho tsoH/ ha lo ma b+he/ tsatsa66/ tsi tsi tsi tsi/ tsu tsu tsu tsu/ krAn drA sh+ya la/ un ti sa tha ti/ b+ha ga wAn/ sing shed d+hi lA ya/
2a5(51 ngu): swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni gnod sbyin yang dag shes kyi gzungs/ 'phang du cha bzhi lnga tsam yod pa la/ g.yas na dgra sta thogs pa/ g.yon ne'u le'i kha nas rin
2a6(51 ngu): po che skrag pa thogs pa/ lus sgeg pa/ spyan dmar ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ sku mdog nag po gcig bris la/ de'i mdun na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa gcig
2a7(51 ngu): byas 'o/ de'i phyogs bzhir bum pa bzhi/ dkar gsum mngar gsum gyi rab kyi bkang la bzhag go/ byug pa dang / daphye ma dang / bdug pa dang / me tog
2a8(51 ngu): rnams bkram mo// de'i mdun du thab gcig byas la/ der gzhan shing ngam shug pa'i me bar la/ gzungs gong ma brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bsreg lugs re re
2b1(51 ngu): 'bul ba ni/ de'i dus su yang dag shes 'ong ste// khyod ni 'dod zhes zer du 'ong ngo // sgrub pa po bdag la/ gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che thams cad dang / sa
2b2(51 ngu): 'og gi gter dang / bar snang gi 'gro shes pa dang mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / na ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa
2b3(51 ngu): dang / sems can gyi yid 'phrog pa dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad sman pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bsgo ba dang / me dro dang / 'phreng ba dang / rgyan la sogs pa ci 'dod
2b4(51 ngu): pa thams cad gsol ba bdag po// des thob par 'gyur te/ the tshom med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po yang dag shes la legs so//
2b5(51 ngu): zhes bya ba byin no// phye ma'i dus su bstan pa 'dzin cing skyong ba la nor med pa dang / dad pa dang brtson 'grus chung ba dang / bla ma dang dkon mchog mchod pa'i yo byad med pa rnams
2b6(51 ngu): la nor byin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas 'khor thams cad dga' mgu yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// a par yang
2b7(51 ngu): dag shes kyi gzungs rdzogs so// sarba mda'o// nus dag/ shud+d+ha//
1a1(52 nge): gnod sbyin ku ber nor spel ba'i gzungs bzhugs so//
1b1(52 nge): rgya gar skad du/ ar+yakra ber ra b+ha b+he sarba tanA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nor phyugs bsrung zhing rje
1b2(52 nge): ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ nor bdag ku be ra la phyag 'tshal lo// nor bdag chen po lha'i lha// nor rnams thams cad bsrung zhing
1b3(52 nge): spel// nor la gnod byed bgegs rnams kun/ skad cig nyid la thal bar rlog/ nor nad thams cad rab tu bsrungs// chos
1b4(52 nge): rkun gis ni 'phrog par dka'// glo dang nyon dang tshig sgor tsha// 'brum dang shig dang rgyu nad dang // tsher 'bam khris sbyar o ga 'bung
1b5(52 nge): dang // rdo dang 'bras dang klad nad gzer// sha za bar sbyang gcan zan che// de dag ma rungs log par lta// nor phyugs rnams la bsrung
1b6(52 nge): du gsol// oMn mo rad na tra yA ya// ku ber ar tse sarba bud d+ha d+harma ko'u sha bi ta ra da na pA ri shI kar d+hi shat+yA yai swA hA/ nor phyugs
1b7(52 nge): spel zhing sgrub tu gsol// kun nas mi mthun phyogs dus blta// dgra dang choms rkun 'jigs la sogs// de dag kun la
2a1(52 nge): e kha ga ra dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/
2a2(52 nge): mi 'jigs sbyin// nor bzangs nor spel srid pa'i rgyal// rgyal ba'i mchog ste nor rnams bsrungs// namo
2a3(52 nge): ran na tra yA ya// be ra rad na/ na ma ma ki ma ma rak+Sha bsrungs cig swA hA/ oM de badzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ oM suru dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/
2a4(52 nge): oM tsan+da dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ oM ro ha b+he dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ oM tI dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ oM yA ma dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ oM ak+Sha dzam+b+ha la
2a5(52 nge): ya swA hA/ \u0f7foM yak+Sha dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ oM rak+Sha dzan+d+ha lA ya swA hAM/ oM yong \u0f7fdzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ oM ma ke na dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ oMH
2a6(52 nge): ru na dzem+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ oM ki shi ti dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ u yu sha dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ sarbaM sa ti ma hA ba su puSh+Ti ma ku ru ya~M swA hA/ na
2a7(52 nge): mau rad na tra yA ya/ ma hA yar+dz+dza dzam+b+ha la dzaM len+d+ra ye b+he su rad na swa ti praSh+Ti ku ru ye swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ na mo spyad te/ mahA yak+Sha dzam+b+ha la
2a8(52 nge): gan ba te/ ka ta kata/ ki ti ki ti/ kutra ku r+tha/ ma nya maH/ dar dang / da ha dang/ skr-i bAk+Sha~MSh+Tha/ b+haHb+haH/ dzam+b+ha dam+b+ha/ sra ya ma nus
2a9(52 nge): oM nag dzam+b+ha lA ya swAhA/
2b1(52 nge): ran mo stu te/ ru tra sa tsi ni swA hA/ oM b+ha'u ni duk+Sha b+ha tsi ta ha ran/ b+ha sa ma gad tsha tha ma hA b+hA ya/ ma ta b+hA la ha ha stid+hak+Shi go ya swa kong pa la yA/ tad+yaH/ a~M kA
2b2(52 nge): ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ na mo na ma ye swA hA/ saM ti b+ha su puSh+TiM ku ru ye swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i tshig dang don ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
2b3(52 nge): mo gang gis bris pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / kun nub pa dang / tsan+dan gyi phye mas/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi byas te// khrus dang
2b4(52 nge): mtshams legs par bcad nas/ spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / rol mo dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu
2b5(52 nge): tig dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / mchod pa'i yo byad dpag tu med pas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang
2b6(52 nge): chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa dzam+b+ha la la sogs pa/ gnod sbyin bye ba 'bum phrag du ma mchod cing bstod pa dang / rjes su bsgrub pa dang / gsal bar
2b7(52 nge): byas te/ mtha' na yang nub gcig gnyis gsum du ston na/ rigs kyi bu de'i khyim dang / bang mdzod dang / nas khang thams cad du/ gser dang / dngul dang
2b8(52 nge): 'bru dang / rta dang / lug dang / gnag dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / yo byad thams cad kyis gang zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nad dang gnod pa dang / rims dang /
3a1(52 nge): dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sa g.yo ba dang / rgyal po'i chad pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba dang / mu
3a2(52 nge): ge'i bskal pa dang / gnod pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir dus la bab par gyis shig/ gser gyi 'od can/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi
3a3(52 nge): gzungs 'di mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / bsgrub par gyis shig/ bzung shig chongs shig klogacig/ ston cig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
3a4(52 nge): ston cig/ de'i yon tan dang phan yon ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab dang mtshungs pa med do// bcom ldan 'das skyes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya
3a5(52 nge): byin gyis/ gser gyi 'od can gnod sbyin rnams kyi gzungs 'di thos nas/ rab tu dga' ba dang / yid spro ba chen po dpag tu med pa/ tshad med pa/ gzhal du
3a6(52 nge): med par yid bde ba rab tu bskyed te/ bcom ldan 'das ldan 'bum phrag tu mar bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/
3a7(52 nge): thal mo sbyar te/ tshigs su bcod pa 'di dag gsol to// rnam dag sku mnga' chog tu gzugs bzang ba// ye shes rgya mtsho gser gyi lhun po 'dra/ grags pa 'jig
3a8(52 nge): rten bkra dang lham me ba// gser gyi mdog can mi dang lha yi lnga// mgon po mchog nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// yang lha'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
3b1(52 nge): ces gsol to// gang gis bstod pa dang / nye bar snyed pa dang / sgrub pa dang rjes su yi rang bgyid pa de la yon tan dang phan yon gyi rgyu gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan
3b2(52 nge): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ gang gis gnod sbyin rnams kyi gzungs 'di/ glegs bam la gser zhun gyis bris nas/ 'chang
3b3(52 nge): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gnas dang / bang mdzod gtsang mar mchod pa byas na/ sangs rgyas stong gis de la bsrung ba dang / sgrub pa dang sba bar 'gyur
3b4(52 nge): ro// bya dang ri dgas kyi rna lam du grags pa na yang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro// byol song dang / gshin
3b5(52 nge): rje'i 'jig rten du nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// gal te mir skyes na yang rgyal rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro//
3b6(52 nge): shes rab che bar 'gyur ro// chos spyod pa'i skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// zad pa med pa'i longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mdo sde dkon mchog 'di klag pa'i sa
3b7(52 nge): phyogs de yang phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// mchod rten du 'gyur ro// klog gam/ klog tu 'jug pa nas// kha der 'donan/ de'i lus la yang / mdze dang / shub 'brum cu
3b8(52 nge): dang / bal ljags dang / lhog pa dang / skem pa dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang // dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// lam dang 'brog
4a1(52 nge): dgon par song yang rung ste/ gcan gzan stag dang / dom dang / dre dang / mi rgod dang / sbrang bu tra ma bu ka dang / trai la rta dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul la sogs/
4a2(52 nge): glanod pa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / dar za ba dang / rin po che'i gter dang ldan par 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru dang / tshe dang /
4a3(52 nge): bsod nams dang / rigs brgyud kyi dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / nor lha'i
4a4(52 nge): tshogs thams cad dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
4a5(52 nge): gser 'od las gnod sbyin nor spel ba'i gzungs so// / nor bu phreng ba'i rgyud le'u bcu dgu pa'o// // oM nang nang / stis stis pur/
4a6(52 nge): stis phur nan/ lhang lgang // tri tri shag/ shar shar/ dung dung / zad sod/ nad sod/ lug gi rims sngags so//
4a7(52 nge): ku ber nor spel ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// sarba mang+ga la// zhus dag/
1a1(53 ngo): 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzungs bzhug so// /
1b1(53 ngo): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ga na pa ti hri da yA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag
1b2(53 ngo): po'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
1b3(53 ngo): na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
1b4(53 ngo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'di 'dzin cing / klog pa'i
1b5(53 ngo): mi de'i las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// yid la 'dod pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad
1b6(53 ngo): kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// nor dang longs spyod thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// ma blang ma bcu le bar
1b7(53 ngo): rang ci 'dod pa'i zas nor ster bar 'gyur ro// de'i gzungs 'di bzlas par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ na mo tud d+ho/ ga na
2a1(53 ngo): pa ti/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Te/ ku Ta ku Ta/ ma tra ma tra/ da ra da ra/ d+ha ha d+ha ha/ g+h+rin g+hi na/
2a2(53 ngo): da bA da ba/ dzam+b+ha dzam+b+ha/ sa ma ya ma nu smA ran tud de dud tra/ ba tsa na ye swA hA/ u pra te b+hi du k+Sha ban tsa ta na/ ba sa ma ga re tsha/
2a3(53 ngo): tha ma ha b+ha ya/ ma hA ba yA/ ma he te ta k+Shi ni ya/ pra kom pa ya si/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/
2a4(53 ngo): na ma na ma swA hA/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ba dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pa
2a5(53 ngo): dang / dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis tshogs dbang phyug gis snying po 'di nyin re bzhin du ston na/ mi de ni tshe 'di la bde skyid/
2a6(53 ngo): dang ldan par 'gyur ro// phyag cing longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dbul ba dang phongs pa'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung / mi
2a7(53 ngo): kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// las ci dang ci bsams pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di dang phyi ma gnyis
2b1(53 ngo): ka la yang nor dang longs spyod kyi phongs par mi 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du nang par snga bar langs nas/ gzungs 'di lan gsum mam bdun ston na/
2b2(53 ngo): thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / de dag thams cad kyi mngangs 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro//
2b3(53 ngo): pi de la bsrung ba dang / sgrub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / wA dang /
2b4(53 ngo): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag
2b5(53 ngo): po'i gzungs rdzogs so// mang+ga laM// / de nas tshogs kyi bdag po'i sprul pa spre'u yi gzungs 'di ci mang du bzlas na/ zas dang nor
2b6(53 ngo): gyis phongs par mi 'gyur ro// oM na mo ga na pa ti/ dza ya ba ra ne/ dzi ban ti ye swA hA/ snying po 'di dus rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na/ dus de nyid
2b7(53 ngo): la nor gyi gter chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro// stong 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro// sngags kyi snying
2b8(53 ngo): po 'di mang du bzlas nas/ rang gi mig la byugs na/ mi gang mthong ba de dbang du 'dus par 'gyur ro// nub mo nyal khar sngags chu
3a1(53 ngo): mig la byugs nas nyal na/ ci bsams pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par
3a2(53 ngo): gser la sogs pa'i rin po che la spre'u yi gzugs po mtshan gyen du sgreng ba/ phyag thal mo sbyar ba'i bar du/ spos kyi reng bu thogs pa gcig
3a3(53 ngo): bzhengs la de'i steng du/ gan pa ti bskyed de/ gzungs 'di bzlas shing dus gsum du a~M ka ru nag po'i du bas 'dug cing
3a4(53 ngo): mchod na nor thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro// oM na ga la ska man dza ye swA hA/ bgegs thams cad
3a5(53 ngo): kyis nor ster bar 'gyur ro// mi thams cad kyis rgyal po bzhin du mchod par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin
3a6(53 ngo): rnams kyis gter kha 'byed cing // skye ba phyi ma la yang nor gyi gter chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro// gan pa ti'i
3a7(53 ngo): gzungs rdzogs so// sarba mad pa/ dgeg/ shuH/
1a1(54 ci): 'bru spel ba'i gzungs bzhugs so// /
1b1(54 ci): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ga na rat+na b+ha ya d+ha ra na ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po rin po
1b2(54 ci): che 'bru'i dkor mdzod dang / 'bru dang longs spyod spel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo//
1b3(54 ci): rin chen mdzod dang gter dbang phyug/ 'bru drug sbyin dang longs spyod bdag/ kun dbang rgyal po 'jig rten dpal// btsun po legs
1b4(54 ci): spyin dag pa'i dbang // 'khor sbyar bran rnams yangs pa'i spyir// de sogs dpag tu med pa rnams// yid 'thad 'chang 'don rab tu
1b5(54 ci): 'grub// mi zad dpag med myur 'grub gsol// oM rad na ga na ga na pa ti/ rad na sarba/ ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ g+hag+h+ra
1b6(54 ci): g+ha g+ha/ g+ha g+ha/ g+ha g+ha/ na mo na ma ye swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i byin brlabs mthu dbang gis// rin chen nor mdzod gter rnams la/
1b7(54 ci): me chu rlung sgras g.yos dang // 'bru nad sad ser rtsa nad 'jigs// pha rol dgra kun ma rung 'tshe// log lha gnod pa thams cad bzlog
2a1(54 ci): oM kro ta tsakra/ ra tsa sarba ha na huM phaT/ khro rgyal 'khor lo sgyur rgyal gyis// gter dang rin chen 'bru dang mdzod//
2a2(54 ci): rgyal po btsun mo 'bangs 'khor bcas// zhing dang lo tog bskyed byed tshul// de dag thams cad srung du gsol// 'jig rten dbang phyug
2a3(54 ci): rin po che// rigs brgyud sbyin dang nor gyi dpal// gang 'dod 'byung dang legs dbang mchog/ bkra shis sbyin dang yon tan gter/
2a4(54 ci): dkyil 'khor 'grub dang brtul shugs ldan// gang gis mos phyogs rnams la dge/ de dag thams cad myur 'grub shog/ oM
2a5(54 ci): sa man+ta b+ha dra ma g+ha la b+ha ta swA hA/ glang chen dang ni gzhon nu dang // mche ba gtsigs dang phyag bzhi pa// glang sna dang ni mgrin sngon dang /
2a6(54 ci): gsus po che dang bag shed dang // zla mdog dang ni mal gyis gzhon// tshogs bdag dang ni snying rje ldan// 'di rnams mtshan gyis khyod la
2a7(54 ci): bstod// 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po mdzod zhing khams thams cad spel zhing bsrung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs le'u bcu drug pa rdzogs so// mang+gaH/
1a1(55 cu): lug 'phel ba'i gzungs dazhugs so// /
1b1(55 cu): #rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa ra tsi ta g+hi rad na si ti na ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dngos grub 'byung ba thugs
1b2(55 cu): kyi nor bdag rkang 'gro dang g.yul las rgyal ba'i bzungs/ gnod sbyin dngos grub 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// lug bdag chen po rnam par
1b3(55 cu): rgyal// a pa ra tsi ta rkang 'gro skyong // gter bdag chen po rin chen mdzod// mi zad kun spel 'gro ba skyog// rgya mtshos gzhi drod dbang bdag/
1b4(55 cu): nam mkha' nyi zla skar dbang sbyin// gang la gang gis de dbang phyug/ rgyal mtshan rgyal ba 'gro ba'i mgon// nor bdag lug dang gzhon nu mchog/
1b5(55 cu): dpal rab sbyin dang nor lug bsrung // oM a pa ra tsi ta dza ya a mo g+ha si ti/ A a A AH/ ri ri ri ri ri/ lI lI lI lI lI/ e e e e me/
1b6(55 cu): sa ma yA rang na si ti si ti/ rad na swa b+ha ba traM swA hA/ gzungs sngags rgyal po mthu dbang sbyin// lug nad gtal grum rkang reng dang // shi mi sa nad
1b7(55 cu): dang ni phar srung gi/ lang rgyu ring dang mgo skyon 'jom// ra lug nad las srung du gsol// dgra dbang rkun mas 'phrog pa dang // ma rungs brtsod dang
2a1(55 cu): g.yul las rgyal// rgyal thabs dbang phyug gnod sprin mchog/ oM ma ma ki laM maM dza yA swA hA/ longs spyod
2a2(55 cu): sbyin pa nor phyugs spel// 'gro ba dbang po mchog tu bsrung // oM pra ti na d+han b+ha ki ta pa ri sha ra b+ha shri ta ye swA hA/ smon lam longs spyod thams
2a3(55 cu): cad kun// bdag gi 'dod pa myur du bsgrubs// khro rgyal 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bsrungs// rkang 'gror lug nor rnams la// dgegs dang /
2a4(55 cu): gnod pa 'tshe ba'i gdon// ma rungs sems dang ldan pa rnams// de dag thams cad zhi bar byed// zhi ba zhi byed gzungs sngags mchog
2a5(55 cu): oM badz+ra kro ta du he ra dzA b+hai hUM phaT/ khro rgyal 'dod pa'i rgyal po yi// rkang 'gro ra lug longs spyod gter// phyogs dus gzhan rgyu chom rkun
2a6(55 cu): dang // spyang gi srin mo stegs gzig dom// tre ma bu ka ti mur ta// ma rungs rnams ni gsal du gsol// oM a pa ra tsi ta rang na a
2a7(55 cu): yur d+hi shi ta swA hA/ longs spyod rkang 'gror lug dang // nor bzangs mdzod dbang mi phyugs bdag/ gang dang gang gis 'dod pa rnams/
2b1(55 cu): ngag thams cad myur 'grub shog/ gnod sbyin rgyal po kun dbang phyug/ ma rungs cher gcod g.yul las rgyal// rkang 'gro kun spel nor gyi lnga// gang+ga lha mo bde ba'i yum/
2b2(55 cu): tshangs pa kun spyod gter gyi bdag/ rin chen gser 'od ne bu le'i mdzod// a pa ra tsi ta la phyag 'tshal// bdag gis re ba'i don rnams kun// khyod kyis skad cig thogs med
2b3(55 cu): shog/ gnod sbyin a pa ra tsi ta rkang 'gro 'phel zhing lug nad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs le'u bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// mang+ga laM//
2b4(55 cu): rgya gar skad du/ a ru dzam+b+ha la/ bod skad du/ 'phags padza m+b+ha la'i lug nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ 'di lta ste/ oM badz+ra tro tan yA saH/
2b5(55 cu): lug rnams la srungs cig/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas lug nad thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig/ glo nad rta ba 'brum pa las sogs pa'i lug nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs
2b6(55 cu): ni 'di lta ste/ oM badz+ra dzam+b+ha la~M/ mr-i gan tra hra sAng+ga/ oM badz+ra na mo rad na tra yA ya swAhA/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya swAhA/ oM badz+ra tad+ya thAs hA/ oM ha la ha la/ dzu lu dzu lu swahA/
2b7(55 cu): lug 'di rnams la srungs shig/ lug nad thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig/ nor gyi dngos grub rnams bdag la stsol/ 'phags pa dzam+b+ha la'i lug nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i
2b8(55 cu): gzungs rdzogs so// dag/ sarba mang+ga laM//
1a1(56 ce): rta gzungs pazhugs so//
1b1(56 ce): #/ zlog skad du/ Ar+ya ta thAg ta re man+ta/ dod skad du/ 'phags pa re man+ta zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rnga nad thams cad
1b2(56 ce): rab tu zhi bar byed pa yi// dkon mchog gsum la phyag lapa lo// 'di ni rta yi lha yin te// rta rnams kun la bsrung bar byed//
1b3(56 ce): la gnod pa'i bgegs rnams kun// skad cig tsam gyis thal bar rlog/ rnga nang thams cad rab tu ni// 'di yi bsrung ba byas na ni//
1b4(56 ce): rta yi che sreg rab tu 'artan// gnod byed gzhan gyis mi tshugs so// glo bung dgra yis 'phrog par dka'// sngo dang 'bras dang 'tsher
1b5(56 ce): langs dang // glo dang lced dang 'theng grum sogs// rta nad thams cad rab tu zhi// 'di nyid ma gtogs khams gsum na// bsrung
1b6(56 ce): ba'i rig sngags gzhan med do// oM ma hA kro d+ha re man+ta han ha na hU~M phaT/ 'phags pa rta mgrin rgyal po yis// rkang bzhi'iH
1b7(56 ce): rnams slob tu gsol// rgyal pos rtand srung du gsol// mo pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta tsa la grob badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
2a1(56 ce): byang chub sems pa' thabs byed ni lce'i rgyal pa la
2a2(56 ce): 'phrul gyis bzhes su gsol/ shin tugs nan 'a gsu khyo ga/ dpal bang rang ba'i mgon po gro// las kyi rgyal po 'de mang
2a3(56 ce): ba'i dgra phul cig/ gnod pa'i 'gegs thul cog/ rta yi nang 'tshal lo// 'gro ba nyam thag don slad du// thugs rje'i dbang gis 'dren
2a4(56 ce): gyur cig/ bdag gi gnod pa thams cad lha mgon po nag pos thum/ skyibs spel ba dang // mnga' mdzad thub dbang lha yi lha// phyag 'tshal gzhon/
2a5(56 ce): srin po sku rangs choms la// lha ma yin gyi grong khyer drag par byed pa/ 'jigs pa sol// nor rtsi dngos grub padag la stsol// oM aH rem
2a6(56 ce): pa thams cad sol cig/ ces nang par po rangs 'ang 'don du byas na gzungs rdzogs so//
2a7(56 ce): dang bcas pa'i bsrung brdzogs so/ bde zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ ni shar do pal shang //
2a8(56 ce): sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad l+la pra mu bar+dz+dza/ ma ma'i mchog de nyi ma'i sras// gzi ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//

2a10(56 ce): spyi bong blangs te/ nong rnams stong zhing dpal bskyed par ma dmi gas rnams spel ba dang // mnga' mdzad thub dbang lha yi sras// phyag bcal gzhon nu
2a11(56 ce): cing lan gsum bskor ba byas/ thal mo sbyar gus par 'dug/ na mong// skyong zhing na nor spel ba dang // skyes rabs mchog la dad pa yis// re ba'i sems kyis
2a12(56 ce): cig swA hA/ brgyang phyag 'tshal zhing gsang sngags brjod pas/ nad dang gan skyab tu gsol// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ha de pra ni ha de pu ni hA swA hA/ lha yi bu de nyi ma'i sras/
2a13(56 ce): pa'i/ khrugs dam srog snying dngas grub ster mdzad pa// byang chub gang gang ma/ dpyugs legs shing mi dang daphyag go// de'i rgyan dang / cha lugs ni/ 'khor lja bar+b+ha
2a14(56 ce): mgul du btags na nad kyis mi tshugs so// Arban thab ser po gsol pa/ lcags kyi bye khra gnyis phrag pa la lding ba/ lhag gnyis sngon la
2a15(56 ce): na gas dang / / / bdad pa/
2a16(56 ce): sa na sa/ mam
2a17(56 ce): tu brtan par 'gyur/ me mas 'a pa// sa da rje/ bang bang du/ 'phags pa bzhin pa nag pa ti'i gdungs/ sangs rgyas dang
2a18(56 ce): byang chub sems da/ thabs rgya/ khyed ni le'i rgyal pa la
2a19(56 ce): 'phrul gyis bzhes su gsol/ oM shwa ga d+hAgs rgya nanan me gsu mi stong po/ dpas ba rang ba'i mgod bgyi// lam kyi rgyal po bde mdzang
2a20(56 ce): ba'i dgra thul cig/ gnod pa'i bgegs thul cig/ rta yi nang du'atshal lo// 'gro banyam thag don slad du// thugs rje'i dbang gis 'dren/
2a21(56 ce): gyur cig/ bdag gi gnod pa thams cad lha mgon po nag pos thum/ mas spel ba dang // mnga' mdzad thub dbang lnga yi lha// phyag 'tshal gzhan
2a22(56 ce): srin po spu rangs choms la// lha ma yin gyi grong khyer drag par byed pa/ bajigs pa sol// nor gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol// oM Ar+tha re san+ta
2a23(56 ce): pa thams cad sol cig/ ces nang par tho rangs 'ang 'don dubyas na 'gazungs rdzogs so//
2a24(56 ce): dang bcas pa'i bsrung ba rdzogs so// kha la zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ nyis shar ngo dpal shar // dpa
2a25(56 ce): sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lnga pra nu brgya dgra pa'i mchog de nyi ma'i sras// gzi ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
2b1(56 ce): tshul lo// bcom ldan 'das snying po byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la rig pa
2b2(56 ce): #/ rgya gang skad du/ Na b+huM ni/ taHthA/ oM li sa ge ni hi la swA hA/ 'di sten pas bdag la dgyes par dgongs shig/ snga
2b3(56 ce): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams na/ nang sam cig/ 'khor dang nanor skal cig/ bdag gi bsam pa thams cad mthar phyin par
2b4(56 ce): 'das rdo rje la rab tu bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kye rmi ny+dzu/ chibs su rga nag po dzang dkar la chibs pa/ nyi ma dang zla ba rgyu skar gyi 'od bzhin 'phro sa
2b5(56 ce): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas lag na dang mi yi skar ma ngan pa sel ba dang / gnod pa thams cad choms shig/ lam gyi 'jim
2b6(56 ce): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs rgya chags pa mi 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das la mgon po nag pos rig pa phul nas/ mi phyug
2b7(56 ce): bden pa/ srag brtan pa/ thams cad du thogs ga skad du/ shrI maN+Da lagan/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po 'ams gsum la dang
2b8(56 ce): byed pa/ sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed ni nga/ dor lha gnod sbyid gang ba bzang pos dpal phag na rdo rje la gus par btud cing zhabs
3a1(56 ce): spyi bor blangs te/ nor rapas myong shing dgal bskyed par me kyi ga rnams spel ba dang // mnga' mdzad thub dbang lha yims// phyag bcal gzhon du
3a2(56 ce): cing / lan gsum bskor ba byas/ thal mo sbyar gus par 'dug/ na por// skyong zhing rta nor spel ba dang // skyes rabs mchog la dad pa yis// re ba'i sems kyis
3a3(56 ce): cig sA hA/ brkyang phyag 'tshal zhing gsang sngags brjod pas/ nang dang kan sgrub tu gsol// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ha de pu ni tsa de pu ni hA swA hA/ lha yi bu de nyi ma'i sras/
3a4(56 ce): pa'i/ thugs dam srog snying dngos grub ster mdzad pa// byang chub gang ba dan/ rta phyugs legs shing mi dang rta phyag go// de'i rgyan dang / cha lugs ni/ 'khor lnga brgya
3a5(56 ce): mgul du btags na nad kyis mi tshugs so// / na tshwa thab ser po gsol ba/ lcags kyi bye khra gnyis phrag pa la lding ba/ lhag gnyis sdon
3a6(56 ce): ma zhugs pag dang / da / b+h+ri / ba da dang/
3a7(56 ce): dpal phyags sa sa pa tsha / pa pa da nas pa sa sa/ kya brnams bya
3a8(56 ce): chu brtan par 'gyur/ oM bshas 'jud// sa na rlung drug te/ bong gang du/ daphags pa bzhin pa nag po 'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang
3b1(56 ce): rang bzang pos/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la rig 'dzin gsol ba bdebs pa'i sngags 'di brjod
3b2(56 ce): gnod par byed pa k+Sha tral ya/ nam ste lo kyo b+hu re b+hu ri/ ses nata/ rtarnams la srungs shig/ nor rnams sra
3b3(56 ce): rlag par byed pa/ gdon thams cad lasad pa thams cad sel lo// dpal phyag na rdo rje sku gsung thugs// rta nad drag po 'dul mdzad
3b4(56 ce): byed du 'jug pa/ ma grub pa rnams grub bzang pos ha nor spel// rta rnams bsrung ba'i tshig ni/ srad yul sngags 'di bta'i nas
3b5(56 ce): can thams cad srung ba/ zhi brgyas pa/ gar skad du/ ba~M shwa ma Na 'dra/ bod skad du/ rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis/ dpal phyag mardza
3b6(56 ce): can thams cad rmongs par byed pam gyis mi khyab pa dang bcas nas pus mo gzugs thal mo sbyar/ zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas nas/
3b7(56 ce): tram pa/ nam shuN+Da badz+ra pa rgyun du ston na/ bu dang rigs brgyud 'phel/ 'di'i snying po 'di brjod na/ bsod nams 'phel zhing rab
3b8(56 ce): g+hA b+h+rUMH/ g+hu d+ha pa lal phyagan rdo rje bstod cing rang rtags su phul bas/ dpal phyag na rdo rjes rgyal po la bstod pa/ rgyal ba byang du
4a1(56 ce): // gser 'dra seng ge zhor// mi 'jigs skyeb phyir ne le'i rgyal ba 'dzin// lha dbang skyob phyir brgya byin nyid dang bcas// rta ne n+ya spel phyir gnod sbyin tshogs dang
4a2(56 ce): bcas// rta nor spel zhing 'bru rnams 'phel byar mdzod// gser g.yu rin chen bang mdzod dngos grub stsol// dpal phyag na rdo rjes rgyal po la bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs
4a3(56 ce): so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+ha ra d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rta nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ rta mgrin dbang gi sku la phyag
4a4(56 ce): 'tshal lo// 'di ni rta yi lha yin no// rta rnams kun la bsrung bar byed// me dpung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// rta mgrin pad+ma he ru kaM/ sku mdog dmar po mi 'ong 'gro//
4a5(56 ce): zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis bskrad// g.yas pa rdo rje dbyug tho 'phyar// g.yon pa rdo rje lcags sgrog bsdams// zhal gdangs ljags 'dril mche ba gcig/
4a6(56 ce): thugs rjes khro gnyer can spyan gsum// gdangs mig phyogs bcur 'khro zhing gzigs// spyi gtsug rta mgo ljang khu yi// rta skad 'tsher bas dgra bgegs 'dul//
4a7(56 ce): rta la gnod pa'i bgegs rnams kun// skad cig tsam gyis thal bar rlog/ rta nad thams cad rab tu zhi// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// rta yi tshe srog rab tu brtan/
4a8(56 ce): glo bur dgra yis 'phrog par dka'// sngo dang 'bras dang 'tsher lang spa // / tshwa long grang long srin 'gags dang // lted dang thang 'gram la sogs pa'i// rta nang
4b1(56 ce): thams cad rab tu zhi// 'di las ma gtogs khams gsum na// bsrung ba'i rig sngags gzhan med do// gzungs sngags 'di la 'bad par rigs// oM shrI pad+ma
4b2(56 ce): n+ta kr-ita badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ gnod byed sarba rak+Sha/ rta la gnod byed kun tu ya swA hA/ rta rnams kyi cha dkar po shan+tiM ku ru ye swA hA/ bdud ye shing nag tha
4b3(56 ce): shAts+yai ku ru ye swA hA/ sa'i phyogs byed nag pa shin+tiM ku ru ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das te mgrin dbang gi rgyal po yis// mi phyugs rta dang bcas pa'i gnod pa srung
4b4(56 ce): du gsil/ se re ba bsrung du gsol/ khyad par rkang bzhi'i rtal srungs shig rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ces pas rta'i nad dang gnod pa thams cad las grol lo// gtor ma rgyan
4b5(56 ce): bcas te gnas dben par gtsugs te/ chang phung gtsang ma sbran la/ nub phyogs su rta nad dbang ga dang g.yul ngo rgyal lo// mi phyugs rta dang bcas pa la dgra
4b6(56 ce): bgegs kyi gnod pas mi tshugs so// gzungs sngags 'di mang du bzlas te/ skud pa dmar po la mdud pa bor te/ rta'i ngo la rtags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu
4b7(56 ce): 'gyur ro// dpal rta mgrin gyi rta'i gzungs 'di/ slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis/ lho dpal rta mgrin gling nas gtir nas bton pa'o//
4b8(56 ce): d+ha lha'i rgyal po Ar+g+ha che man+ta mim shar phyogs kyi mgron po mi dkar ge// dadamarang po la chibs pa/ phyag na ba dan dmar po bsdams pa/ sku la dung rngub
5a1(56 ce): dkar po gsol pa/ dbu la dung gzhu gsol ba/ khyod kyis rta 'di la srungs shig/ skyob cig/ Ar+ya re man+ta g+ho ra rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ nyi ma
5a2(56 ce): byang gi mgon po nor lha rta bdag ku b+hai ra zhes bya ba/ sku la bse khra ba dang / dbu la gser gyi rmog gzhugasol ba/ chibs su rta sngon po skal
5a3(56 ce): nag chibs pa/ phyag na ral gri bsnams pa/ 'khor du lha chen brgyad dang bcas pa/ ba dan 'phyar bai khyed kyis rta 'di rnams la srungs shig/ spel
5a4(56 ce): cig/ rgod ma chos cig/ rte'u'i rdzi'u khyod kyis mdzod cig/ gdon bgegs dang srid la ma bskur cig/ oM ku b+he rA ya swA hA/ gnod sbyin ku
5a5(56 ce): b+he ra zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // zhu dag/ mang+ga laM//

1a1(57 co): rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bzhugs so//
1b1(57 co): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bi dA ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/
1b2(57 co): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
1b3(57 co): 'das rdo rje la rab tu bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rje'i lus thams cad rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje'i
1b4(57 co): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / byang
1b5(57 co): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje khro bo las byung ba rdo rje'i dam tshig smras te/ mi chod pa/ mi shigs pa/
1b6(57 co): bden pa/ sra ba/ brtan pa/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa/ thams cad du ma pham pa/ sems can thams cad skrag par
1b7(57 co): byed pa/ sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad
2a1(57 co): gnon par byed pa/ las thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gzhan gyi las thang 'jig par byed pa/ gdon thams cad
2a2(57 co): rlag par byed pa/ gdon thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi las zad
2a3(57 co): byed du 'jug pa/ ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ sems
2a4(57 co): can thams cad srung ba/ zhi ba rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa/ sems can thams cad rmugs par byed pa/ sems
2a5(57 co): can thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes rab tu smras so// na mo rat+na
2a6(57 co): tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ au trA Ta truT/ tro Ta ya tro Ta ya/ s+pha Ta s+phu Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/
2a7(57 co): g+huHg+huH/ g+hur+N+Na pa ya g+huHpa ya/ sarba satwA ni/ bo d+hi bed+ha/ saM bo d+ha ya saM bo d+ha ya/ tra sa tra sa/ tra sa ya tra sa ya/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra me/ sa b+h+ra rA
2b1(57 co): ya saM b+h+ra mA ya/ sarba b+hu tA ni/ ku Ta ku Ta/ saM ku TA ya saM ku TA ya/ sarba sha trun+na/ g+ha Te g+ha Ta/ sa~M g+ha Ta ya saM g+ha TA ya/ sarba bid+yaM badz+ra badz+ra/ s+pho TA ya badz+ra badz+ra/ ka TA ya badz+ra/
2b2(57 co): badz+ra/ ma Ta badra badz+ra/ ma tha badz+ra badz+ra/ badz+ra aT+TA ha sa nI la badz+ra/ su badz+ra ya swA hA/ he pu lu ni ru phu lu ni gr-ih+Na ku lu/ mi li/ tsu lu/ g+hu nu/ phul lu/ ku ru ku lu/ badz+ra
2b3(57 co): bi drA sa sAhA/ kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma tha ma ze/ ra thar \u0f7f/ mo then phra mo Tan pa swA hA/ tsar Ni sh+tsar/ ha ra ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya/ 'dra bi dA ra NA ya swAt+ma/
2b4(57 co): tshin+d+ha tshin+na/ b+hin+na b+hin+ta/ ma hA badz+ra ki li kI lA ya swA hA/ ban+d+ha ban+ta/ kro d+hakro d+ha/ ma hA kI li ki lA ya swA hA/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsaN+Da kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ trA sa ya tra sa ya/ ma hA badz+ra kA
2b5(57 co): li kI lA ya swA hA/ ha ra ha ra/ badz+ra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ badz+ra pra b+hany+dza na ya swA hA/ ma ti s+thi re badz+ra/ shru ti s+thi ra badz+ra/ pra ti s+thi ra badz+ra/ ma hA badz+ra/ a pra ti
2b6(57 co): ha ta badz+ra/ a mo g+ha badz+ra/ oM h+ye hi/ shi g+h+raM badz+re d+hA ra ye swA hA/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ra~M/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sarba badz+ra ku la~M a wa d+ha ya swA hA/ sarba bi g+h+nAn shA trun mA ra ya phaT/ nam
2b7(57 co): sa man+ta badz+ra NaM/ sarba ba laM A wa rdza ya/ ma hA ba le ka Ta we/ ta ta le/ a tsa le/ maN+Da la ma ya/ a ti badz+ra/ mahA ba laM bi gar Na ra Na/ a dzi te/ dz+wa la dA la/ ti Ti tsiH
2b8(57 co): tin le/ da tsid ha/ She dzo wa ti/ ti li ti li/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ mahA ba le/ sarba badz+ra a~M ku sha dz+wa la yA swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra pA ya/ nam sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pa Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/
3a1(57 co): tad+ya thA/ oM ha ra ha ra badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha badz+re/ d+hun d+hu na 'adz+ra/ han ha na badz+ra/ da ha da ha badz+ra/ pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badz+ra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya badz+ra/ dA ru Na dAra?/
3a2(57 co): 'adz+ra/ tsin+taN+Di n+ta badz+ra/ b+hiT+Ta shrI rbA badz+ra d+ha paH/ nam r+b+ha badz+ra gr-i d+ha sa/ bu lu thAthA/ tAM teSha/ bcwa bat+ta/ gan ta na/ arba ti hUM \u0f7f// sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas/
3a3(57 co): sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed// rgyud de cog gi rtsa ba ste// dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan// sems can dbang po nyams pa dang // tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang /
3a4(57 co): phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang // bran bza' la som/
3a5(57 co): gces pa dang // phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang // nor 'grib pas ni gnod pa dang // mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang // 'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang // gza' dang rgyu
3a6(57 co): skar byad stems dang / mi bzang gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan/ ngal las byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang // de ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yis// mdo sde
3a7(57 co): dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing // gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na/ mdo
3a8(57 co): sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis// srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi// mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kyang // de dag thams cad zhi bar blta// tshe dang bsod nams rnam
3b1(57 co): par 'phel// sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// nor bu nyungs kar dur ba dang // rin chen rma med tsan dan bcas// shel dang rdo rje me tog dang // chu yis gser ram
3b2(57 co): yang na ni// dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung // gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkris shing dgang // lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad// rdo
3b3(57 co): rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas ni// rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ phyag rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs pa la
3b4(57 co): mngon par bstod do// gzungs mdo 'di ni rdo rje 'chang chen po rje btsun ta ra nA thas zhus dag gnang ba'i dpe las bris pa'o// /

1a1(58 chi): bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po bzhugs so//

1b2(58 chi): snying po// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
1b3(58 chi): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs
1b4(58 chi): cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnams grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
1b5(58 chi): zhugs so// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang shes rab kyi
1b6(58 chi): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par blta zhing phung po lnga po de dag la yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o// de nas
1b7(58 chi): sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di
2a1(58 chi): skad cing smras so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyad pa sbyong bar 'dod pa des/ jiltar
2a2(58 chi): bslab par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces
2a3(58 chi): smras so// shA ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa des 'di ltar rnams par blta bar bya ste/ phung po lnga po/
2a4(58 chi): de dag kyang / rang zhin gyis stong par yang dag par rjes su blta'o// gzugs stong pa'o// stong pa nyid gzugs so// gzugs las kyang stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid la
2a5(58 chi): kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin du tsho ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na chos thams cad stong pa nyid de/
2a6(58 chi): mtshan nyid med ga ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa dri ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba med pa/ bri ba med pa/ gang ba med pa'o// sha ri'i bu de lta bas na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs med//
2a7(58 chi): tshor ba med/ 'du shes med/ 'du byed rnams med/ rnams par shes pa med/ mig med/ rna ba med/ lce med lus med/ yid med/ gzugs med/ sgra med/ dri med//
2a8(58 chi): ro med/ reg bya med/ chos med do// mig gi khams med pa nas yid kyi khams med yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do// ma rig pa med/ ma rig pa
2b1(58 chi): zad pa med pa nas/ rga shi med/ rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang med do// de bzhin du/ sngags bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog dang / lam med/ ye shes med/ tho
2b2(58 chi): pa med/ ma thob pa yang med do// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems pa' rnams la thob pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten
2b3(58 chi): cing gnas te/ sems la sgrib pa med cing skrag pa med de/ phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar byin to// dus gsum du mngon par bzhugs
2b4(58 chi): pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
2b5(58 chi): rgyas so// de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ rig pa chen po'i sngags/ bla na med pa'i sngags/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par byed pa'i sngags/ sdug bsngal
2b6(58 chi): thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags/ mi brdzun pas na bden par shes par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM gteg te pa rage
2b7(58 chi): te pa ra saM ga te bo d+hi swA hA/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o// de nas
2b8(58 chi): bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin
3a1(58 chi): nas// legs so legs so rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la
3a2(58 chi): spyad par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /
