28b7(68 jo): nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa sdug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gtong nus so// khyod ni 'jig rten gyi khams dpag
28b8(68 jo): tu med grangs med par 'gro ba dang / sems can rnams snying rje'i dbang gis grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong mang ba dang / ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho
29a1(68 jo): zang du/ gzugs dang / mthugs dang / skyed sa kyis theg pa chen pa'i ma sa tshogs 'acad pa dang / sems can yongs su
29a2(68 jo): smin par bya ba dang / rgyal rigs kyi byug ngapa nas/ dge sbyong gi phyag da pa rdzog pa'i chos las snang pa dang / thams cad dge ba'i chos la bzhag par du/
29a3(68 jo): sa sa / ltu 'i skye ngas med/ med pa nga/ dang / yod pa sa ga
29a4(68 jo): b+h+ya/ sa la shes skyes par nas sna mas la ba 'a pa tha pa gyur// sems dgas ga
29a5(68 jo): da gyur pa// de dag gis ni gan la na bskyengs// myung du nga dag gon// rtsa ba bzhi po thams pad 'gyur bar gyis// com ldan
29a6(68 jo): kyim de skad ces bka'aphrul pa dang / dag zong de dag / da dang / A dang / smye dang / lham yin dang / drI shA 'azlas pa'i 'a na
29a7(68 jo): dpa' sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis paka'aphrug pa la mngon par thod / 'phags pa rnams pa'i gling bzhes bya ba theg pa chen pa'i ma rdzogs sa//
1a1(69 nyi): 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sbas dang bcas pa bzhugs//
1b1(69 nyi): gyi/ 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal
1b2(69 nyi): po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha/ ha ra tsa ra/ ma hA sha ma ru pA tA/
1b3(69 nyi): snga dpa
1b4(69 nyi): a me g+na badz+ra satwa swA hA// de nas yon tan sbyin pa yi// gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//
1b5(69 nyi): ti se'i gangs bcas g.yos par gyur// sa yi snying po tshogs dbang la// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis smras// skal ldan chen po
1b6(69 nyi): legs so legs// sa steng khyod kyis yangs par byas// khyod kyi gzugs ni rnam grags shing // yon tan dpag med mchog skyed
1b7(69 nyi): pa// sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal dang // nyes pa zlog byed thob pa ni// 'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na// nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te// ji
1b8(69 nyi): ltar 'dam gyi pad ma dag/ 'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos bzhin// lus can dag las su yang rung // khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed
2a1(69 nyi): pa// de dag las ni gcig tsam yang // byang chub las ni log mi 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog/
2a2(69 nyi): zos nas mos par byed pa ni// nges par yon tan thams cad kyang // thob par 'gyur te the tshom med// de nas thams cad ldan
2a3(69 nyi): pa'i 'khor// langs te sa yi dbang phyug po// sa yi snying po sa mchog la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad smras pa ni// sa yi snying po/
2a4(69 nyi): gtso bo che// glog 'gyu lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba// cod pan can tes brnyes pa// phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor pa mchog/ rig ldan
2a5(69 nyi): rig mdzad mchod pa'i gnas// gtso bo dge sbyong ston pa po// gzhi bcas ldan pa'i rlung gi tshul// swA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i rab/
2a6(69 nyi): thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyi ma'i mchog/ snying po snying po mkhyen par grags// gsang sngags rol cing rgya cher rol// sa yi dbang phyug
2a7(69 nyi): gar thabs can// sgeg po zhal bzang gar mkhan ldan// 'bras bu mngon sum ston pa po// rab 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen// snying
2b1(69 nyi): po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med// mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba// shes rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs// 'dod chags la sogs skyon bsal cing // gar
2b2(69 nyi): thabs chen po ston pa po// ston pa dpag bsam shing dang 'dra// nam mkha'i dbang phyug gsung snyan pa// nyi ma chen po nyid yin te// dbang phyug chen po 'bar bas
2b3(69 nyi): bskor// yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa// sa yi dbang phyug spyod yul can// chos kyi longs spyod longs spyod che// yon tan rgya che'i gangs chen mtsho//
2b4(69 nyi): yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog/ thabs tshul za bo la mkhasde ste// theg pa chen po 'jigs pa med// mchod
2b5(69 nyi): pa chen po sgra che ba zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can// rdo rje 'chang chen mtshan brgya pa// rdo rje dkyil 'khor me tog thod// blo gros chen po phyag ring
2b6(69 nyi): ba// pad ma chen po tobs po che// gsang sngags chen po tshogs chen po// sa gzhi chen po lhun po legs// lag na rdo rje yon tan nges// nor bu'i me tog thod kyis brgyan/
2b7(69 nyi): mnyam nyid 'byams la longs spyod pa// rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can// rdo rje'i 'od mnga'i rdo rje ldan// sa yi bdag po lhun po bzhin// sa la longs spyod longs spyod bzad//
2b8(69 nyi): mtshon cha g.yo ba phun sum tshogs// rab 'byams snod ni rnam par grags// sgra mkhas rdo rje rab 'joms pa// spyan rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste// me tog sngon po'i thod kyis bcings//
3a1(69 nyi): rdzo ba chen po phyag ring ba// brtan po brtan la bde sbyin pa// ded dpon dpal bzang chen po ste// gangs can lhun po lta bu lags// dbang po gshin
3a2(69 nyi): rje rgyal chen dang // btsan po khyab 'jug stobs dbang phyug/ 'jig rten mchog rigs sangs rgyas tshangs// de bzhin nyid tshul spyod yul can// rin chen tog ste cher bzhad
3a3(69 nyi): pa// dgyes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol// gzigs pa ring ba spun yangs pa// nam mkha' bzhin du thog pa med// thogs pa mi dpogs rin chen gtsug/ srid gsum 'dod
3a4(69 nyi): pa med pa'i rgyu// dul ba nyon mongs dri ma bstsal// dag pa gtsang ba gso sbyong can// rnam par gnon pa'i g.yul las 'das// ljang mdog skyabs mdzad snying rje che//
3a5(69 nyi): stobs kyi grags pa rgya che ba// bsam na shes pa'i spyod yul can// dpa' bo seng ge 'jigs par byed// sdang ba rnams kyi snying 'joms pa// mnga' bdag grags pa
3a6(69 nyi): yul dang ldan// dga' ba rgya chen rab 'byung ba// rigs mkhyen rigs kyi snying po mkhyen// rigs kun du ni mchod pa lags// rgyal po rigs mchog skyes pa'i rten//
3a7(69 nyi): rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan// rdo rje 'og rab grags pa// rig sngas 'chang ba stobs po che// mngon par 'phags pa khyab pa mchog/ mgrin bzang nad dang bral ba lag//
3a8(69 nyi): skyong mdzad ston pa dag pa ste// sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa// grol ba smin mdzad dus / dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams kyis brgyan// rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams
3b1(69 nyi): la mkhas// rdo rje'i slob dpon yon tan rten// grub pa sbyin pa rnam dag mchog/ tshul dang tshul min rtogs pa po// dkyil 'khor rtsa ser mnga' ba ste// 'od zer ljang
3b2(69 nyi): gu'i 'od dang ldan// ser lan bza' ser po bsnams// dkyil 'khor ma lus kun gyi rgyan// spyan rtsa dmar ba zla ba'i dpal// nor bu sna tshogs 'od 'byung ba//
3b3(69 nyi): rdo rje rgya yi stobs kyis spro// mnyam nyid mnyam pa dri ma med// sku yang dag cing na bza' dag/ dag pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan// dag pa'i chos mnga' snang ba ste//
3b4(69 nyi): 'byung ldan srid pa sel mdzad pa// 'khor bzang mdzad shes rab can// tshul shes tshul la spyod yul ba// rdo rje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags// rdo rje sems dpa'
3b5(69 nyi): dge ba che// 'byung ldan rab 'byams shes rab can// ma lus grags pa'i 'od bzang ba// sa yi snying po snying po che// rdo rje'i snying po rnam par 'dren// dpag tu med pa
3b6(69 nyi): dpag med rdzogs// khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas// zab cing gsal ba'i gtso bo ste// bar 'dan// dpag ta med pa dpag mad rdzogs// khangad par 'phags pa
3b7(69 nyi): yal la gnas// zab cang gsal ba'i gca ba ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsel// dga' dang dang bskyed pa ste// ye shes rgya chen spyod yul ba// rlung gi
3b8(69 nyi): drag shul lta bur drag/ drag po lags te drag sel btsang // rgyal bar byed cing rgyal bzhi// rgyal ba'i dpal mdzad dga' bar mdzad// lhun po ti sem la yas//
4a1(69 nyi): spyod yul zab mo non pa ste// rin chen rdo rje snying po che// sa gzhi'i spyod yul mnga' ba lags// rin chen brag las byung ba'i 'od// rdo rje
4a2(69 nyi): dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan// de bzhin gshegs la lhur dgyes pa// shugs drag dpal gyi gzhi rten lags// rab gsal dpal mdzad gtsang ma ste//
4a3(69 nyi): phyogs bcu'i dbang phyug dbang phyug che// de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog rnams kyis// rdo rje sems dpas bstod nas ni// rdo rjes gsum
4a4(69 nyi): dbang mchog smras// yon tan snying po shes rnams kyis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog brjod cing // nyes pa zlog pa 'di las gzhan/ sa yi sdeng na ngas ma
4a5(69 nyi): mthong // ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste// sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang // dri ma kun bral yon tan nges// de phyir
4a6(69 nyi): sgrib pa thams cad kyis// phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i mes// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di// rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis// ming brgya tsa brgyad
4a7(69 nyi): dam pa 'di// bsam bkun dang 'byor pa yi// gnas mchog thar med pa ste// dpal yon rgya chen sbyin pa yin// yid ni shin tu dang ba yis// sa yi snying po'i mtshan
4a8(69 nyi): gsal pa// 'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'i// yon tan mchog ni gang brjod dang // dpal yon rgya chen 'dzin pa yi// ming brgyartsa brgyad dam pa 'di// mi ni dnga'in
4b1(69 nyi): rjod byed pa// sdug bsngal kun las myur de 'grol// 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
4b2(69 nyi): bkra shis//
1a1(70 nyu): sa'i mdo bzhugaso//
1b1(70 nyu): rgya gar skad du/ b+hU mi sU tra/ bod skad du/ sa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
1b2(70 nyu): kha phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum na/ sum cu rtsa gsum
1b3(70 nyu): pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas/ shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi rtsa ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang
1b4(70 nyu): po brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyi zhu ba zhus pa/ skye bo gang zhig bde 'gror mchis// skye bo gang zhig mtho ris
1b5(70 nyu): skye// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su// rtag tu bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de
1b6(70 nyu): skad ces tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs nyid kyis zhus pa'i lan gsung
1b7(70 nyu): ga kun dga' ra ba nags tshal skyed/ skye bo gang zhig zam pa byed// chu steng khang dang chu mig dang // gang zhig ngal gso
2a1(70 nyu): gnas ster dang // dad dang tshul khrims phun tshegs ldan// mkhas shing ser sna dang bral zhing / 'dod pa kun la ma chags na// rtag tu sem
2a2(70 nyu): can phan brtson pa'i// skye bo da ni bde 'gror 'gro/ skye bo de ni mtho ris skye// de ni nyin dang mtshan rnams su// rtag tu bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// ser sna dang
2a3(70 nyu): ldan lhar mi 'gro// byis de sbyin pa ster mi byed// brtan rnams sbyin pa yi rangs pa// des 'di gzhan du bde bar 'gyur// zhing gyi skyon ni rtsa yin ltar// skyes bu 'di
2a4(70 nyu): la 'dod chags skyon// de bas chags dang bral rnams la// byin dang 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// gang zhig sangs rgyas chos rnams dang // dge 'dun dag dang mchod
2a5(70 nyu): rten dang // skyes pa 'am yang na bud med dag/ tshul khrims ldan pa'i mi la byin// gang dang gang du skye 'gyur ba// ji ltar mi yi rgyal po bzhin// lha rnams kyi ni
2a6(70 nyu): mchog 'gyur zhing // lhag pa'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur// khor bar yongs su 'khor ba na// sbyin pa ma gtogs gnyen med par blo ldan phun tshogs 'dod pa yis//
2a7(70 nyu): rab tu 'bad de sbyin pa byin// gang zhig mda' rgyang gang tsam zhig/ sa 'di sa 'di sbyin pa rab gtong ba// de ni lha yi gnas// mtho ris dag tu bskal par dga'//
2a8(70 nyu): gang zhing kun dga' ra ba tsam// ba'i sbyin par gtong byed pa// tshangs pa'i mdun na rab spyod de// mtho ris dag tu bskal par dga'// brgya byin gtsug lag khang gi phyir//
2b1(70 nyu): sa ni sbyin par gtong byed pa// tshangs pa'i bsod nams rab skyed de// mtho res dag tu bskal par dga'// sa ni 'bru'i 'phreng bcas sa// rmos pa mtshan mar bcas
2b2(70 nyu): byin na// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu// de ni skye ba nyams mi 'gyur// tshul khrims ldan la khyad par du// 'bras bu zhing ni gang gi sbyin// gang gi sbyin pa de yis ni/
2b3(70 nyu): 'bras bu mi zad des 'thob 'gyur// sa ni sa lu bur ram shing // nas ni ldang bas brgyan pa dag/ gang zhig sbyin par byed pa de// lha mchog bde ba rab 'phel
2b4(70 nyu): 'gyur// ral gri seng ge gdan dang gdugs// rta mchog glang po mchog rnams dang // sa sbyin pa yi me tog ste// brgya byin 'bras bu thar pa yin// gang zhig sa ni len
2b5(70 nyu): pa dang // gang zhig sa ni ster byed pa// gnyi ga phan byed yin pa'i phyir// nges par mtho ris dag tu 'gro// til mar thigs pas khyab byed pa// de bzhin sa ni sbyin pa la//
2b6(70 nyu): yang dag brten las bsod nams 'phel// ji ltar 'o ma yod pa'i ba// 'o ma 'byin pas be'u gso// bskal bzang de bzhin sa gtong ba// sa yis yongs su gsos
2b7(70 nyu): par 'gyur// de bzhin la rab sbyin pa yis// zho dang mar gsar chu bo dang // 'o ma'i chu ni 'bab pa yis// tshim par byed pa nyid du 'gyur// rgyal po 'dod chags kyis
2b8(70 nyu): gdungs nas// sdig pa gang zhig byas gyur pa// dor phyed tsam zhig gnod gyur la// byin pas bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// rgyal po 'dod chags kyis gdungs te/
3a1(70 nyu): sdig pa gang zhig byas gyur pa// dor phyed tsam zhig dge 'dun la// byin pas bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ rtsa lasas
3a2(70 nyu): ni yongs su brtag/ ma yi phyogs las be'u brtags te/ rta nai ba'i phyogs las brtag tshul khrims 'tsho bas mi rnams so// bsam
3a3(70 nyu): gtanas rab sbyin pa las// gang zhig zlog par byed pa dang // de dag bsdus 'joms ri bo ni// dmyal bar mi ni 'gro bar 'gyur// sa dang
3a4(70 nyu): mnyam pa'i sbyin pa byed// sbyin dang mnyam pa'i gter med la// bden dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams med// rdzun pas gzhan pa'i sdig pa med//
3a5(70 nyu): de nas 'argya byed stabs ldan pa'o// bde sogs bdag pos lus btud de// rin chen rang bzhinas bya bas// dkon mchog gsum la kun tu mchod/
3a6(70 nyu): sa'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad makar bar ma dang / shu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing nus
3a7(70 nyu): te gtan la pha pa'o//
1a1(71 nye): khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo bzhugs so// /
1b1(71 nye): 6\u0f7f/ rgya gar skad du/ kU Ta gA rA sU tra/ bod skad du/ khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo// thams cad mkhyen pa
1b2(71 nye): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
1b3(71 nye): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
1b4(71 nye): ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das
1b5(71 nye): la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyag dar bgyis pas dge ba'i rtsa ba cir 'gyur
1b6(71 nye): lags/ dkyil 'khor bgyis pas ni ci 'gyur lags/ skyabs su mchi ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyis dge ba
1b7(71 nye): rtsa ba ni cir 'gyur lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba'i sug las kyis ni cir 'gyur
2a1(71 nye): lags/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'khor bar bas par mi 'gyur zhing / yongs su gtugs par
2a2(71 nye): mi 'gyur la/ bas ma 'tshal ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ba ni gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs
2a3(71 nye): bgyis pas ni cir 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo phyag dar byas pa'i phan yon ni lngar
2a4(71 nye): 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ bdag gi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba das
2a5(71 nye): lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes pa'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi
2a6(71 nye): 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du dkyil 'khor gru
2a7(71 nye): bzhi pa byed na/ de byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling gi dbang phyug gis bdag por 'gyur zhing / lus zhig nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
2b1(71 nye): rnams su skye bar nga smra'o// kun dga' bo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dang bas dkyil 'khor zlum po byed na/ de nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gleng gi dbang
2b2(71 nye): phyag gi bdag por 'gyur zhing / lus zhig nas 'thab bral gyi lha rnams su skye bar nga smra'o// kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
2b3(71 nye): la sems dang bas dkyil 'khor zla gam lta bu byed na/ de shar gyi lus 'phags pa'i gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag por 'gyur zhing / lus zhig nas dga' ldan gyi
2b4(71 nye): lha rnams su skye bar nga smra'o// kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sems dang bas dkyil 'khor shing rta'i dbyibs 'dra ba lta bu
2b5(71 nye): byed na/ de 'dzam bu gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag por 'gyur zhing / lus zhig nas 'phrul dga'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur bar nga smra'o// kun dga' bo gang
2b6(71 nye): la la zhig gis sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / gang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang mnos nas/ yongs su
2b7(71 nye): srung bar byed na/ kun dga' bo dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i bsod nas ni dpag tu med cing grangs med par nga smra'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mya ngan la
2b8(71 nye): 'das pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du mtha' gzungs par mi nus par nga smra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems thugs su chud
3a1(71 nye): nas/ ljags pad+ma dmar po'i 'dab ma dri ma med cing lo ma 'jam pa dang / mtshal dmar po dang / shing mya ngan mtshang gi lo ma dang / zangs
3a2(71 nye): kyi glegs ma srab mo 'dra ba chu zheng gab pas/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor dbu'i skra mtshams la thug pa'i bar thams cad du brkyang ste/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
3a3(71 nye): pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma smra ba dang / tshig rtsub mo sba ba dang / tshig 'khyal pa smra ba la lce 'di lta bu mthong ngam/ btsun pa ma lag so//
3a4(71 nye): kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni bden pa gsung ba yin no// kun dga' bo gang la la thal mo sbyar
3a5(71 nye): te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo zhes phyag 'tshal bar/
3a6(71 nye): byed na/ sems can de dag ngas yongs su gzung zhing / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no// sems can de rnams ni nga thugs khral chung ba yino// de
3a7(71 nye): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings ni shin tu rab tu gnas pa yin no// de shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i phyir/ thal mo
3a8(71 nye): sbyar ba yang chud za bar mi 'gyur na/ sbyin pa la sogs pa byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo ltos shig skyes bu zhig la rang gi gzar bu bkrus
3b1(71 nye): pa tsam mam/ phur bu bkrus pa tsam mam/ phru ltogs bkrus pa tsam gang yin pa de yod la/ gal te de sems la 'di snyam du/ 'di na gnas pa'i srog chags
3b2(71 nye): thams cad 'dis bde bar gyur cig snyam du sems shing / stor khung du byed na/ kun dga' bo 'on kyang bsod nams skye ba'i sgor 'gyur bar smra na/ mir gyur pa lta
3b3(71 nye): smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo gsum po 'di dag ni bar gyi bskal pa dag yin no// gsum gang zhe na/ mtshan gyi bar gyi bskal pa dang / nad kyi bar gyi
3b4(71 nye): bskal pa dang / mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa'o// kun dga' bo de gang gis nyi ma gcig gcig srog gcod pa spong zhing / yang dag par blangs te gnas par byed na/
3b5(71 nye): de mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal par mi skye bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig gis a ru ra gcig tsam yang dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed na/ de nad kyi bar gyi bskal par mi skye bar
3b6(71 nye): 'gyur ro// gang zhig gis zas nal ze gang tsam dge 'dun la phul na/ de mu ge'i bar gyi bskal par mi skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum po
3b7(71 nye): 'di dag bskyed pa ni 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur zhing / yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur la/ zad mi shes pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur bar byed pa
3b8(71 nye): yin no// gsum po gang zhe na/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni/ 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur zhing / yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur la/
4a1(71 nye): dge ba'i rtsa chos la 'greng ba dang / dge 'dun la 'byed pa dang / 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur zhing / yong su gtugs par mi 'gyur la/ zang mi shes pa'i mya ngan las 'das 'amam pa byed pas so//
4a2(71 nye): zad mi shes pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i
4a3(71 nye): phyir/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'dzam bu gling mthong ngam/ kye btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu gling ni zheng du
4a4(71 nye): ni dpag tshad bdun stong / mtshur yang dpag tshad bdun stong ste/ byang gi zheng ni che/ lho'i ni shing rta'i dbyibs so// de rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa
4a5(71 nye): can la la dag gi rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa
4a6(71 nye): rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang / gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
4a7(71 nye): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du 'jug/ srog shing ni khab tsam 'dzugs su bcug/
4a8(71 nye): gdugs ni rgya shugasi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug cing / sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug la sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na/ kun dga'
4a9(71 nye): bo 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu mang bar nga sla'o// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu gling gi gleng lta zhog gi/ kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling zheng du
4b1(71 nye): ni dpag tshad brgyad stong / mchur yang dpag tshad brgyad stong yod pa/ kun nas zla ba kham pa lta bu zhig yod de/ de rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las
4b2(71 nye): rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs
4b3(71 nye): rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang / gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
4b4(71 nye): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du 'jug/ srog shing ni khab tsam 'dzugs su 'jug/ gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam
4b5(71 nye): 'gebs su 'jug cing / sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug la/ sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na/ kun dga' bo 'di de bas bsod nams shin
4b6(71 nye): tu mang bar nga sla'o// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gling lta yang zhog/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa'i gling lta yang zhog gi/ kun dga' bo nub kyi ba glang spyod ces bya/
4b7(71 nye): ba'i gling / zheng du dpag chad dgu stong / mchur dpag chad dgu stong yod pa/ kun nas zla ba nya ba lta bu zhig yod de/ de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la
4b8(71 nye): las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang /
5a1(71 nye): rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang / gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
5a2(71 nye): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du 'jug/ srog shing ni khab tsam 'jug
5a3(71 nye): su 'jug/ gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug cing / sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug la/ sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na/
5a4(71 nye): kun dga' bo 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu mang bar nga smra'o// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gling lta yang zhog/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa'i gling lta yang zhog/
5a5(71 nye): nub kyi ba glang spyod kyi gling yang lta zhog gi/ kun dga' bo byang gi sgra mi snyan ces bya ba'i gling zheng du dpag tshad khri/ mchur yang dpag tshad khri yod pa/ kun nas gru bzhi
5a6(71 nye): pa zhig yod de/ de rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/ rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams
5a7(71 nye): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la 'bul bar byed pa dang /
5a8(71 nye): gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du
5b1(71 nye): 'jug/ srog shing de khab tsam 'dzugs su 'jug/ gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug cing / sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug la/ sku gdung lung /
5b2(71 nye): kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na/ kun dga' bo 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu mang bar nga smra'o// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu gling lta yang zhog/ shar gyi lus
5b3(71 nye): 'phags pa'i gling lta yang zhog/ nub kyi ba glang spyod kyi gling yang lta zhog/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lha yang zhog gi/ kun dga' bo lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi
5b4(71 nye): khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa
5b5(71 nye): rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi
5b6(71 nye): dge 'dun rnams la 'bul bar byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten ni
5b7(71 nye): 'jim pa las skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam byed du 'jug/ srog shing khab tsam 'jugs su 'jug/ gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo mo tsam 'jug par byed na/ kun dga' bo 'di nyid
5b8(71 nye): de bas bsod nams shin tu mang bar nga smra'o// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gling lta yang zhog/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta yang zhog/ nub kyi ba glang
6a1(71 nye): spyod kyi gling lta yang zhog/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lha yang zhog/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba
6a2(71 nye): lta yang zhog gi/ kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod do// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la las/ rin po
6a3(71 nye): che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas
6a4(71 nye): rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang / gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
6a5(71 nye): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam byed du 'jug/ srog shing ni khab tsam 'dzugs su 'jug/ gdugs ni rgya shug gi le/
6a6(71 nye): ma tsam 'gebs su 'jug/ sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug la/ sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na/ kun dga' bo 'di nyid de bas bsod
6a7(71 nye): nams shin tu mang bar nga smra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sbyin//
6a8(71 nye): pa dpag tu med pa// tshul khrims dpag tu med pa/ bzod pa dpag tu med pa/ brtson 'grus dpag tu med pa/ bsam gtan dpag tu med pa/ shes
6b1(71 nye): rab dpag tu med pa/ byams pa nas btang snyoms kyi bar du dpag tu med/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
6b2(71 nye): marnams ldanas
1a1(72 nyo): 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa chos brgyad pa zhes bya ba bzhug so//
1b1(72 nyo): #/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mai tri ya pa ri bin+da d+harma aSh+Ta nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pas/
1b2(72 nyo): zhus pa chos brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
1b3(72 nyo): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong
1b4(72 nyo): gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su
1b5(72 nyo): bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus
1b6(72 nyo): par gyur te 'dug de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus
1b7(72 nyo): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga lA de logs su thal mo sbyang ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
2a1(72 nyo): ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i rmang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ de bzhin/
2a2(72 nyo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang /
2a3(72 nyo): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod de bzhin
2a4(72 nyo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas
2a5(72 nyo): ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
2a6(72 nyo): bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/
2a7(72 nyo): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing / mi nyams la/ yongs su mi nyams te/ khyad
2b1(72 nyo): bar thong par 'gyur ba dang / bdud phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs
2b2(72 nyo): nas/ 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba dang / yongs su mi skye ba'i yid dang / ldan par gyur nas kyang / gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang
2b3(72 nyo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par yang 'tshang rgyas par 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems/
2b4(72 nyo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa legs so// byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa/
2b5(72 nyo): khyod yang legs so// byams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal zhes gso
2b6(72 nyo): te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams
2b7(72 nyo): pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing /
2b8(72 nyo): mi nyams la yongs su mi nyams te/ khyad par thob par 'gyur/ bdud phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ chos thams cad
3a1(72 nyo): kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas/ 'khor pa na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur/ yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas kyang
3a2(72 nyo): gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o// brgyad gang zhe na
3a3(72 nyo): 'di lta ste/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin//
3a4(72 nyo): gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/ yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin/ byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin//
3a5(72 nyo): thabs la mkhas pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par byung ba yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
3a6(72 nyo): phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang //
3a7(72 nyo): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa zos kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
3a8(72 nyo): byang chub la bsam pa nges pa yin/ dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa zos kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges
3b1(72 nyo): pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum sa tshogs pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
3b2(72 nyo): sems dpa' chen po sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/ ma byin pa len
3b3(72 nyo): pa dang / 'dod pa la logs par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma'i tshig dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig khyal ba spangs pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na byang
3b4(72 nyo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa
3b5(72 nyo): yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams dang / phongs pa dang / slong ba rnams la gos dang / zas dang //
3b6(72 nyo): mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams gtong ba dang / sbyin bdag tu gyur pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong baphun sum
3b7(72 nyo): tshogs pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
3b8(72 nyo): sems dpa' chen po ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis dge'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang ci yang rung ste/ de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
4a1(72 nyo): tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar
4a2(72 nyo): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa'i
4a3(72 nyo): lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa
4a4(72 nyo): sems dpa' chen po byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/
4a5(72 nyo): byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gnod sems med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ gnod sems med pa'i ngag gi
4a6(72 nyo): las dang ldan pa yin/ gnod sems med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje phun sum
4a7(72 nyo): tshogs pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
4a8(72 nyo): dpa' chen po ni kun rdzob kyi don la mkhas pa yin/ gnyi ga'i don la mkhas pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la
4b1(72 nyo): mkhas pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang/
4b2(72 nyo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pas 'di ske ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen
4b3(72 nyo): gyi 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen kyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug
4b4(72 nyo): skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ srid pa'i rkyen
4b5(72 nyo): gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/
4b6(72 nyo): de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung / 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/ 'di lta ste/
4b7(72 nyo): ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'bag/ ming
4b8(72 nyo): dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ ske mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa
5a1(72 nyo): 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags
5a2(72 nyo): pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal
5a3(72 nyo): gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro snyam pa ste/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
5a4(72 nyo): tu phyin pa la nges par byung ba yin no// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang par rdzogs
5a5(72 nyo): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing / mi nyams la yongs su mi nyams te/ khyad par thob par 'gyur/ bdud phyir rgol ba bcom
5a6(72 nyo): par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i smad pa spyod pa na/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas/ 'khor
5a7(72 nyo): pa na yongs su mi skye bar 'gyur/ yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan pas kyang / gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
5a8(72 nyo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
5b1(72 nyo): pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das/
5b2(72 nyo): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags bkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ byams pas zhus pa chos
5b3(72 nyo): brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'das pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// / sh+lo ka brgyad cu rtsa gsum mchis/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
5b4(72 nyo): dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// // 6// rgya gar skad du/
5b5(72 nyo): Ar+ya sA ga ra na ga rA dza pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang
5b6(72 nyo): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas na/ dge slong stong
5b7(72 nyo): nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom
5b8(72 nyo): ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya che la bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag chos kyi mdo bzhi po 'di dag brjod na/ gang dag rjod pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong brjod par
6a1(72 nyo): 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
6a2(72 nyo): bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / zag pa dang bcas par chos thams cad sdug bsngal bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
6a3(72 nyo): kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad dag med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bstan pa mi zad
6a4(72 nyo): pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug
6a5(72 nyo): pa dang / klu'i bdag po chos kyi mdo bzhi po 'di dag brjod na/ gang dag brjod pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi sdong brjod par 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bcom
6a6(72 nyo): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la mngon
6a7(72 nyo): par btod do// 'phags bklu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg po chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /
6a8(72 nyo): zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// /
1a1(73 ti): 'phags pa dkon mchog sum la skyabasu 'gro ba zhes pa zhug so//
1b1(73 ti): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tri sha rat+na ga ma na rA ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la
1b2(73 ti): skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
1b3(73 ti): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi ma la mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong ni
1b4(73 ti): dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gcig pu dben par 'dug pa dang / sems kyis
1b5(73 ti): sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes so// ston pa bdag gi mngon sum du gyur na/ bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi rje'i spyan sngar bdag so/
1b6(73 ti): la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa gang la las sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba'i
1b7(73 ti): gang zag de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig stsogs par 'gyur ba'i don de zhu bar bya'o sems so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phye bred kyi dus kyi tshe/
2a1(73 ti): nang du yang dag 'jog las las te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
2a2(73 ti): mgo bos phyag 'tshul+la tre/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun
2a3(73 ti): sa ga ceg tu 'dag go/
2a4(73 ti): pa bdag gcig pu dben par mchis te/ nang du yang dag 'jog la mchis pa na/ sems kyis sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes te/ rig
2a5(73 ti): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa gang la las sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis pa'i gang zag de'i bsod
2a6(73 ti): nams ji snyed cig stsogs par 'gyur snyam bgyid las so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di
2a7(73 ti): skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i
2a8(73 ti): tshogs phal po che'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhus pa legs so legs so// gang khyod de bzhin gshegs
2b1(73 ti): pa'i spyan sngar 'ongs te/ don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems dpa' de ni shA ri'i bu don nyid rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir te/ dpes bstan par bya ste/ skyes bu gang zag
2b2(73 ti): zhig rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pas gang 'dri 'dzam bu'i gling dang nye ba'i gling zheng dang srid du dpag tshad bdun stong yod pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling de na/ gang
2b3(73 ti): srogs chags gnas pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du bkod de/ mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang / skrag rnams las 'dzam bu'i gling tsam gyi mchod rten
2b4(73 ti): srid du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar la thug par brtsigs te/ mchod rten de la lha'i spos dang / lha'i me tog dang / lha'i 'bring ba dang / lnga'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
2b5(73 ti): dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byas la de nas skyes bu de rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur pas gang rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
2b6(73 ti): du byo ste/ ma ru ka'i til mar gyis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ltar bkang ba'i nang dra snying po ri rab tsam btsugs la/ bskal pa mang po'i mtha' ji srid par mar me'i rgyun mi 'chad par
2b7(73 ti): bus na/ shA ri bu de ji skad du sems/ skyes bu de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du stsogs snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/ bde bar
2b8(73 ti): gshegs pa mang las so// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i yul lo// bde/
2b9(73 ti): lag sakyil snang marnam par byas parin po ma sna bdun pa 'dis te/ gser dang dus dang / brdzun dang / shes dang /
3a1(73 ti): bar gshegs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lo// bka' stsal pa/ sha ri bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sangs rgyas dang /
3a2(73 ti): chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong dang / brgya stong
3a3(73 ti): gi cha dang / grangs dang / rgyu dang / bgrang bar yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
3a4(73 ti): khams 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ de'i tshe der
3a5(73 ti): glog gi rgyun chen po byung ngo // lha rnams kyis kyang rnga sgra bsgrags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
3a6(73 ti): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'di ltar chos kyis rnam grang
3a7(73 ti): 'di sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa zhes bya bar zungs shig/ de'i don ni de ltar blta bar bya ste/ de de bzhin du zungs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
3a8(73 ti): stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong gzhan dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon chog gsum
3b1(73 ti): la skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba thegs pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dzA de ba dang / zhwa chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur
3b2(73 ti): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
1a1(74 ti): dkon cog rjes dran gyi mdo bzhugs so//
1b1(74 ti): #dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ de ni de bzhin
1b2(74 ti): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
1b3(74 ti): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
1b4(74 ti): ldan 'das so de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bsod nams dag gi rgyu mthun pa/ dge ba'i tsa ba rnams chud mi za ba/ bzod pas
1b5(74 ti): brgyan pa/ bsod nams kyi gter rnams kyi gzhi/ dpe byed bzang po rnams kyis smras pa/ mtshan rnams kyi me tog rgyas
1b6(74 ti): pa/ spyod yul ran par mthun pa/ mthong na mi thur pa med pa/ dad bas mos pa rnams la mngon par dga' ba/ shes
1b7(74 ti): rab zil gyis mi non pa/ stobs rnams la rdzi ba med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
2a1(74 ti): kyi yang / 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams kyi rgyal po// mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba rnams
2a2(74 ti): kyi ded dpon/ ye shes dpag tu med pa/ spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gsung rnam par dag pa/ dbyangs snyan pa/ sku byad
2a3(74 ti): blta bas chog mi shes pa/ skra mtshungs pa med pa/ 'dod pa bdag gis ma gos pa/ gzugs dag gis nye bar ma gos pa gzugs med
2a4(74 ti): pa dag dang ma 'dres pa/ sdug bsngal las rnam par grol ba/ phung po dag las rab tu rnam par grol ba/ khams rnams dang mi ldan pa/
2a5(74 ti): skye mched rnams bsdams pa/ mdud pa rnams shin tu bcad pa/ yongs su gdung ba dag las rnam par grol ba/ srid pa las grol
2a6(74 ti): ba chu bo las brgal ba/ ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
2a7(74 ti): rnams kyi ye shes la gnas pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa/ yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' la gnas pa/ sems can thams cad
2b1(74 ti): la gzigs pa'i sa la bzhugs pa ste/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku che ba'i yon tan yang dag pa rnams so// dam pa'i chos ni thog mar dge ba/
2b2(74 ti): bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ bcom ldan 'das
2b3(74 ti): kyis chos legs par gsungs pa/ yang dag par mthong ba/ nad med pa/ dus chad pa med pa/ nye bar gtod pa/ 'di mthong ba la don yod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis
2b4(74 ti): so so rang gis rig par bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la legs par ston pa/ nges par 'byung ba/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pa/
2b5(74 ti): mi mthun pa med cing / 'dus pa dang ldan pa/ brten pa yod pa rgyu ba bcad pa'o// theg pa chen po'i dge 'dun ni/ legs par bzhugs pa/ rig par bzhugs pa/ drad
2b6(74 ti): por bzhugs pa/ mthun par bzhugs pa/ thal mo sbyar ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ bsod nams kyi dpal gyi zhing / yon yongs su sbyong
2b7(74 ti): ba chen po// sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa/ kun tu yang sbyin pa'i nas su gyur pa chen po'o// sangs rgyas yon tan bsam mi khyab/ chos kyi yon tan bsam mi khyab/ dge
2b8(74 ti): 'dun yon tan bsam mi khyab/ bsam mi khyab la dang byas pa'o// rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyad/ rnam dag zhing du skye bar shog/ mang+ga lam/
1a1(75 tu): nyid ma dang zla ba'i mdo bzhugs so/
1b1(75 tu): rgya gar skad du/ sUr+ya sU tra/ bod skad du/ nyi ma'i mdo/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum lags pas phyag
1b2(75 tu): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas byin gyi kun dag
1b3(75 tu): ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe lha'i bu nyi ma/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin gyis bzung ngo // de nas lha'i bu nyi mas bcom ldan
1b4(75 tu): 'das rjes su dran pa yid la byas ste/ de'i dus su tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to// sangs rgyas dpa' bo de la 'dud// thams
1b5(75 tu): cad myur du grol bar gyis// bdag 'di'i kha ru bcug pas na/ bdag ni khyed la skyabs su mchi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
1b6(75 tu): lha'i bu nyi ma'i ched du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin la tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la
1b7(75 tu): brtsebs// dgra bcom de bzhin gshegs pa la// nyi ma skyabs su songs pas na// sgra gcan 'dzin gyis nyi ma thos// gang zhig
2a1(75 tu): mun pa snang bas gsal bar byed/ rnam snang drag po'i gzi brjid dkyil 'khor can// nam mkha'i nyi ma skra gcan
2a2(75 tu): sgrib ma byed// nyi ma 'di ni sgra gcan gyis thongs shig/ de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin gyis lha'i bu nyi ma grol bar
2a3(75 tu): byas nas/ sngar gyi gzugs bzhin du gang su zhig gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris kyi drung du song zhing song nas/ sems
2a4(75 tu): mi dga' zhing yi mug pas ba spu langs par gyur to// phyogs bcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po
2a5(75 tu): sgra gcan 'dzin la/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ ci phyir yid ni skrag par gyur// sgra gcan
2a6(75 tu): 'dzin gyis nyi mthong // gzugs kyi rnam 'gyur kun du ngan// ci phyir 'jigs pas 'di ru lhags// des smras pa/ sangs rgyas
2a7(75 tu): tshigs bcad thos nas ni// bdag gis nyi ma ma btang na// mgo bo tshal pa bdun 'gas shing // 'tsho ba la ni bde ba med// nyi ma'i
2b1(75 tu): mdo rdzogs so// // paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnam
2b2(75 tu): kyi gdanas/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// sa'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig// // rgya gar
2b3(75 tu): skad du/ tsan+da sU tra/ bod skad du/ zla ba'i mdo// 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gu pas phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
2b4(75 tu): ldan 'das mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu zla ba/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin gyis
2b5(75 tu): bzung nas/ de nas lha'i bu zla bas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran pa yid la byas te de'i dus su bcad pa 'di gsol to// sangs rgyas dpa' bo de la 'dud/ thams
2b6(75 tu): cad myur du grol bar gyis// bdag 'di'i kha ru bcug pas na// bdag ni khyed la skyabs su 'gro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba'i ched du/ lha ma yin
2b7(75 tu): gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin la tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la btse bas// gra bcom de bzhin gshegs pa la// zla ba skyabasu song bas
2b8(75 tu): na/ sgra gcan 'dzin gyis zla ba thong // de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin gyis/ lha'i bu zla ba grol bar byas nas/ sngar gyi gzugs bzhin du gang su zhig/
3a1(75 tu): gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris kyi drung du song zhing song nas/ sems mi dga' zhing yi mug pas ba spu langs par gyur pas phyogs
3a2(75 tu): pa smras pa/ ci phyir yid ni skrag par gyur/ sgra gcan 'dzin gyis zla bzongs// gzugs kyi rnam 'gyur kun tu ngan// ci phyir 'jigs pas 'di ru lhags// sgra
3a3(75 tu): gcan 'dzin gyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas tshigs bcad thos nas ni// zla ba bdag gis ma btang na// go bo tshal pa bdun 'gas shing // 'tsho ba la ni bde ba med// zla
3a4(75 tu): ba'i mdo rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis
3a5(75 tu): smra ba rnams kyi gnas/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gang+gA la phab pa'o// /
1a1(76 te): 'phags pa khye'u rin chen zla bas zhus pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
1b1(76 te): // rgya bar skad du/ Ar+ya rat+na tsan+d+ra pa ri pr-its+tshi nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa khye'u rin chen zla bas zhus
1b2(76 te): pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
1b3(76 te): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ shA ri bu dang mgol gyi bu chen po la sogs pa dge slong 'bum phrag bdun
1b4(76 te): cu rtsa gnyis kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri la 'di lta
1b5(76 te): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang / byang chub
1b6(76 te): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang /
1b7(76 te): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros
2a1(76 te): brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub
2a2(76 te): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po
2a3(76 te): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
2a4(76 te): po dga' sdug dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dgu khri dang / lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
2a5(76 te): phrag du ma dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin g.yog 'khor bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa
2a6(76 te): dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor g.yog tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa dang / klu'i rgyal
2a7(76 te): po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab dang / khab spu can dang / rtsi sman dang bong bu dang / de dag
2a8(76 te): klu'i rgyal po kun du grags dang / de dag la sogs pa klu 'dra thab du ma dag gnod sbyin gyi sder por chen po 'brog gnas dang //
2b1(76 te): la sogs pa gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs dang chos gos gsol de
2b2(76 te): lhung bzed bsnamaso nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs so// de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras/ khye'u ri ni chen
2b3(76 te): zla ba zhes bya ba/ glang po che lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan cing gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ dril bu gser ka dpyangs pa/ gser
2b4(76 te): gyis spras pa'i dar gyi lda ldi mang pos mdzes par byas pa/ bdug pas gdugs pa/ me tog sil mas gtor pa/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba/ gdugs dang
2b5(76 te): ra bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa/ stegs bu bdun gyis khor khor yug nas bskor ba la zhon nas/ rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal
2b6(76 te): po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste sems can thams cad la sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing song ba las/ gzhon nu rin chen rna
2b7(76 te): bas thag ring po zhig nas/ bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dad par bya ba dbang po dul ba/ thugs dul ba/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan
2b8(76 te): pa/ dul ba dang zhi ba'i mchog dul ba dang / zhi ba dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ gtso bo chen po dbang po bsrungs pa/ dbang po thul ba/ mtsho ltar dngas
3a1(76 te): sheng gsal la rnyog pa med pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku gser gyi mchod sdong ltar
3a2(76 te): gas pa/ dpal kyim ga shes sa pa/ nan yang ga shegs pa mang // yangs kyang ma la gyuras/ skye
3a3(76 te): ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig
3a4(76 te): tu 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das la zhes dang bcas/ gus pa dang bcas pas phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla bas
3a5(76 te): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs
3a6(76 te): kyi bu mo dad pa can gang dag gis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu po dag gi mtshan thos na/ bla na med pa
3a7(76 te): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyi bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol//
3a8(76 te): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen rna la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu legs so lags so//
3b1(76 te): gzhon nu khyod 'di ltar skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs pal po che'i don dang / lnga dang /
3b2(76 te): mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / da lta dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhug/
3b3(76 te): te/ gzhon nu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di zhu bar sems pa legs so// gzhon nu khyod kyi zhu ba bzang
3b4(76 te): sde spobs pa dge ba'o// de'i phyir gzhon nu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do// sems rtse gcig tu rna ba blags te sems bsdus la/
3b5(76 te): soms shig dang / don dengs khyod la bshad do// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla bas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/
3b6(76 te): bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas
3b7(76 te): kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med pa snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med ces bya ba zhig
3b8(76 te): yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa ji snyed 'das pa na yod ce na/ gzhon nu dper na stong gsum gyi stong
4a1(76 te): // chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du byems yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de nas me la la zhig gis bye ma de las 'bru re re nas blangs
4a2(76 te): shing shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer bye ma 'bru re 'jog par byed pa de lta bu'i tshul gyi bye ma de thams cad shar phyogs su yongs su zad cing yongs su gtugs
4a3(76 te): par gyur kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gis tshang dam mtha' rtogs par mi nus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med
4a4(76 te): pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de yang lag mthil lta mnyam par gyur pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis
4a5(76 te): legs par brgyan pa/ gser gyi sa gzhir 'dug cing mig mangs ris su bris pa/ rin po che'i shing ljon pas brgyan pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro
4a6(76 te): skye gnas dang yi dgas dang lha ma yin gyi tshogs med pa/ rtswa dang shing skam dang / tsher ma dang rdo dang / gseg ma dang gyo mo dag med pa/ ngam grog dang g.yang sa
4a7(76 te): dag med pa/ me tog sel ma dag bkram pa yin te/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po zhes bya ba da
4a8(76 te): bzhugs shing 'chol gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa/ rig pa dang zhabs sa ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs/
4b1(76 te): 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan
4b2(76 te): pa'i sku/ gser legs par bcos shing legs par dul ba lta bu/ rin po che'i rgyan legs par bkod pa bzhin du/ 'khor gyi nang na mdzes par bzhugs shing / thog
4b3(76 te): mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba'i chos ston to// 'di skad ces kyang ston to// 'di ltar sa'i khams ni med par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du chu'i khams
4b4(76 te): dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / skyes dgu'i dag po tshangs pa dang / gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnams par shes pa med par
4b5(76 te): mi 'gyur ro zhes ston to// gzhon nu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po bla na med pa yang dag
4b6(76 te): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ni bskal pa bye ba phrag drug cu lon no// gzhon nu gzhan yang sangs rgya skye zhing de na nyin mo dang
4b7(76 te): mtshan mo'i ming yang med de/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtse ba'i thabs 'dis dper bya ba ni ma gtogs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad kyang rtag tu de bzhin
4b8(76 te): gshegs pa de'i 'od kyis snang bar 'dug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa de chos bstan pa re res kyang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
5a1(76 te): // dpag tu med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos la 'grod par mdzad do// bzod pa dang po dang / bzod pa gnyis pa dang / bzod pa gsum pa la ni de'i nyis 'gyur
5a2(76 te): 'god par mdzad do// gzhon nu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs bskyed
5a3(76 te): bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na/ gang dag sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can dag gi lus la
5a4(76 te): 'od kyis reg pa de dag kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo// gzhon nu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa
5a5(76 te): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po de'i mtshan thos na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
5a6(76 te): ldog par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu 'di nas lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa snga ma ji snyed pa de snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig
5a7(76 te): rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ lag mthil ltar mnyam pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
5a8(76 te): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpas bskor cing / byang chub
5b1(76 te): sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba'i chos ston to zhes bya ba nas/ rnam par shes pa med par
5b2(76 te): mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// gzhon nu de la ji snyam du sems/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpal zhes bya zhe na/
5b3(76 te): gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs pas yongs su khyab pas na/ de'i phyir de bzhin gsheg
5b4(76 te): pa de'i mtshan tsan ngan dpal zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
5b5(76 te): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mtshan thos na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu 'di nas nub
5b6(76 te): phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa snga ma ji snyed pa de snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po zhes bya ba
5b7(76 te): zhig yod do// lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin tu sbyar te/ ji ltar gong du bstan pa bzhin no// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom/
5b8(76 te): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sem
6a1(76 te): dpas mdun gyis bltas pa na/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba'i chos ston to// 'di skad ces kyang ston to zhes bya ba nas rnam pa
6a2(76 te): shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// gzhan nu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa
6a3(76 te): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mtshan thos na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldogs par 'gyur zhing / 'od de yang
6a4(76 te): nyams su myong ngo // gzhon nu 'di nas byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa snga ma ji snyed pa de snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
6a5(76 te): gyi khams 'khrug med ces bya ba zhig yod de/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa zhes bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de na de bzhin gshegs pa
6a6(76 te): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tog gi dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor cig
6a7(76 te): byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to zhes bya ba nas/ rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// gzhon
6a8(76 te): nu gzhan yang rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mtshan thos na/ bla na med pa yang dag
6b1(76 te): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rgyal mtshan lta bur 'gyur ro// gzhon nu 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs
6b2(76 te): mtshams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ lag
6b3(76 te): mthil ltar mnyam pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// gzhon nu de la ji snyam du sems/ ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba snang ba zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig
6b4(76 te): rten gyi khams de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de'o 'od kyis snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de zla ba snang ba zhes bya'o// de na de bzhin
6b5(76 te): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la ga zhes te/ byang chub sems
6b6(76 te): dpas yongs su bskor cing / byang chub dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to zhes bya ba nas/ rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du
6b7(76 te): snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung / de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
6b8(76 te): bar 'gyur ro// gzhon nu 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig
7a1(76 te): rten gyi khams tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de na de
7a2(76 te): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i mchod sdong zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ byang chub
7a3(76 te): sems dpas yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to zhes bya ba nas/ rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro//
7a4(76 te): zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de'i mtshan thos na/ bla na med dpa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
7a5(76 te): las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten na rin po che ltar mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu 'di nas nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams su sangs rgyas kyi
7a6(76 te): zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgra ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa zhes
7a7(76 te): bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// gzhon nu de la ji snyam du sems/ ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de dgra ldan zhes bya zhe na/ 'jigs rten gyi khams de sgra 'di
7a8(76 te): bu dag dang ldan te/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa
7b1(76 te): sgra dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / btson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi sgra dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgra dang / rnam par
7b2(76 te): grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i sgra rnams dang ldan no// gzhon nu 'jig rten gyi khams de sgra de lta bu dag dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de sgra ldan
7b3(76 te): zhes bya'o// de na bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ byang chub sem
7b4(76 te): dpas bskor cing / byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du
7b5(76 te): sbyar ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung de'i mtshan zos na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing /
7b6(76 te): me tog ltar mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro// gzhon nu 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
7b7(76 te): phrag grangs med pa de snyed 'dab na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi
7b8(76 te): mang pos gang zhing lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
8a1(76 te): // rgyas mngon par shes pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang chen po rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpas bskor
8a2(76 te): cing / byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to zhes bya ba nas/ rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro//
8a3(76 te): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung ba de'i mtshan thos na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldogs par 'gyur zhing / byang chub
8a4(76 te): sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / tshul thams cad la mkhas shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i shes pa yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu 'di nas 'og gi phyogs su
8a5(76 te): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya zhig yod de/ gzhon nu de la
8a6(76 te): ji snyam du sems/ ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa ri med cing khor
8a7(76 te): yug dang / khor yug chen po med de sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ri zhes bya ba'i ming yang ye med pas na/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//
8a8(76 te): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba'i dbul zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'chol ba zhes te/ byang chub sems dpas
8b1(76 te): bskor cing / byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to zhes bya ba nas/ rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar
8b2(76 te): ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de'i mtshan thos na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / nye bar len
8b3(76 te): pa'i nyon mongs pa thas cad zad pa yang rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag
8b4(76 te): khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med pa de snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod/
8b5(76 te): de/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa ji snyed cig 'das pa na yod ce na/ gzhon nu 'di lta ste stong gsum gyi
8b6(76 te): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du bye mas yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de nas mi la la zhig gis bye ma de las 'bru re re nas blangs
8b7(76 te): shing steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer bye ma 'bru re 'jog par bye ba de lta bu'i tshul gyis bye ma de thams cad steng gi phyogs su yos su zad cing / yongs
8b8(76 te): su gdugs par gyur kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi tshad ngam mtha' rtogs par mi nus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grang
9a1(76 te): med pa de snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de yang lag mthil ltar
9a2(76 te): mnyam par gyur pa rin po che sna bdun gyis legs par brgyan pa/ gser gyi gzhir 'dug cing mig mangs ris su bris pa/ rin po che'i shing ljon pas leg
9a3(76 te): par brgyan pa/ sems can dmyali ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs rnams med pa/ rtsa dang shing skem dang /
9a4(76 te): tsher ma dang rdo dang gseg ma dang gyo mo dag med pa/ dam grog dang g.yangs med pa/ me tog sil ma dag bkram pa yin te/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
9a5(76 te): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpas bskor cing / byang chub sems
9a6(76 te): dpas sa mdun gyis bltas pa/ reg pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na
9a7(76 te): med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku/ gser legs par bcos
9a8(76 te): shing legs par dul ba lta bu rin po'i che'i rgya legs par bkod pa bzhin du 'khor gyi nang du mdzes par bzhugs shing / thog mar dge ga bar du dge ba/ tha mar/
9b1(76 te): dge ba'i chos ston to// 'di skad ces kyang ston te/ 'di ltar sa'i khams med par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung
9b2(76 te): gi khams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang / gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes
9b3(76 te): ston to// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de'i mtshan thos na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
9b4(76 te): zhing / chos rin po che bla na med pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa
9b5(76 te): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod pa dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshul khrims dang /
9b6(76 te): ting nge 'dzin dang / shes bya dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de dag gi mtshan thos na/ bla na med pa
9b7(76 te): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa yun
9b8(76 te): ring po tshad med pa 'das pa de'i tshe rin chen 'byung zhes bya ba'i bskal pa zhig byung ste der dezhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
10a1(76 te): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
10a2(76 te): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig 'jig rten du byung ste/ der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu po 'di
10a3(76 te): ngag thams cad lhan cig tu mthun par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ zas dang skom dang bza' ba dang bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog dang spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang
10a4(76 te): byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rnam pa dpag tu med grangs med pas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/ thams cad kyis
10a5(76 te): lhan cig tu mthun par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ thams cad kyis nyi na gcig tu skad cig zang cig yud tsam gcig la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa/
10a6(76 te): thob par gyur to// de nas de dag gis rim gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sprad pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ skad cig yud
10a7(76 te): tsam gcig lnga rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig
10a8(76 te): la de dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// thams cad kyi tshe'i tshad kyang mnyam mo// gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag zam/
10b1(76 te): cad kyang nyi ma gcig tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po
10b2(76 te): gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
10b3(76 te): gi sku tshe'i tshad ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis ni sems can rnams la thugs btse ba'i slad du sku tshe'i tshad de tsam du ring ba gzhes
10b4(76 te): lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshad 'di la de bzhin du 'dzin cing yid ches la spong
10b5(76 te): bar mi bgyid / 'dor bar mi bgyid pa de la bsod nams ci tsam skye bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
10b6(76 te): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bcu po 'di dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig po rnams lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs
10b7(76 te): su bkang nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du sbyin pa byin te/ de lta bur bskal pa grangs med par sbyin
10b8(76 te): pa sbyin par byed la rigs kyi bu mo gang gis mtshan 'di rnams dang / ku tshe'i tshad 'di rnams thos nas/ de bzhin du 'dzin cing yid ches la spong bar mi byed/ smod par mi byed de/
11a1(76 te): mos par byed cing mthun par byed na/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des bsod nams kyi phung po de'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong gi cha dang / dpe'i bar du yang
11a2(76 te): mi bzod do// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang /
11a3(76 te): dpal ldan legs dang / dga' ldan dang / lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan gyis 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bcu po de rnams la mchod pa bya
11a4(76 te): ba'i phyir de bzhin gsheg pa la lha'i me tog dang / tsan dan gyi phye mas gtor mngon par gtor// rab tu gtor to// tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi/
11a5(76 te): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / brjod par bgyid pa de dag ni phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so// bcom ldan
11a6(76 te): 'das za na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gis sug pa na mchis pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba lags so//
11a7(76 te): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rnam lam du grag par 'gyur ba de dag bdud sdig can gyi dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur lags so//
11a8(76 te): de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla bas tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ phung po med pa bcom ldan 'das/ khyod kyis legs
11b1(76 te): gsungs dpag tu med/ bdag dang lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams// khyod kyi 'di la yi rang ngo // 'jig rten mgon po 'das pa dang // gang dag da rung ma byon dang // phyogs rnams ma lus
11b2(76 te): gang bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi// sangs rgyas kun gyi yul gcig pa// chos dang dge 'dun zhi ba'i mchog/ yon tan lags pa bsam mi
11b3(76 te): khyab// dge 'dun la yang skabs su mchi// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa// gang dag bzod la rab gnas shing // gang dag gzugs la gnas pa dang /
11b4(76 te): gang dag mtshungs med stong nyid tshul// mtshan nyid kyi ni mdo sde dang // byang chub rgyur 'gyur sde snod dang // mthun par 'jug pa'i mdo sde la// legs bslabs byang chub
11b5(76 te): sems rnams dang // thub pa dag ni byang chub kyi// sprad pa spyod cing slob par 'tshal// rang byung de dag ji bzhin du// zhing gi bkod pa rnams dag dang // spyod dang spyod yul
