11b6(76 te): ting 'dzin dang // de dag gi ni yon tan dang // drang srong mchog rnams sku tshe'i tshad// gsungs pa gang lags rdzogs par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu
11b7(76 te): de dag dang // rin chen zla ba bzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'jig rten mgon po de rnams kyi// mtshan
11b8(76 te): ni gang zhig 'dzin byed pa// ma 'ongs dus na de dag kun// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur// nga yis ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// drang srong mchog bzhugs de dag ltar//
12a1(76 te): de dag tshe yang bskal pa ni// bye ba bsam yas snyed du 'gyur// gang zhig skyob pa de dag gi/ mtshan 'di dag ni 'dzin de la// me dang chom rkun dug
12a2(76 te): rnams dang // mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// mtshan 'di dag ni 'dzin byed na// chu chen dag gis de mi 'chi// rgyal po'i gnod pas ma yin te// de ni nams
12a3(76 te): kyang chos mthong // mtshan mo thun tshad dang po dang // grang dang ma 'ang de bzhin te// dus gsum dag tum rdzogs dang // drang srong mdzag ni de dag gi/ ma
12a4(76 te): snga dro sgrogs byed cing // nyi ma gung la sgrogs byed dang // mkhas pa nub khar sgrogs byed pa// rmi lam bzang po mthong bar 'gyur mtshan rnams bzung nas de'i 'og tu/
12a5(76 te): bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// sngon chad sdig pa ci bsags pa// mi dge thams cad bshags par bya// de yis lus ngag yid kyi las// mi dge gang dag byas
12a6(76 te): gyur na// mtshan rnams bzung nas de'i 'og tu// nyes byas de yang bshags par bya// yan lag lnga yis gtugs nas ni// rgyal rnams byang chub sngon rol du//
12a7(76 te): dus gsum dge ba ci bsags pa// de kun rjes su yi rang bya// 'jig rten rtsa lag rnams kyis ni// byang chub brnyes nas chos gsungs dang // lus can gang dag
12a8(76 te): 'jig rten gyi mgon po rnams la mchod byed pa// de la rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi// nyin mtshan dus gsum yi rang bya// des na ngag gzhan don byed pa'i// pha rol
12b1(76 te): byin pa rdzogs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen rdza ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' je
12b2(76 te): de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang // dri zar bcas pa'i 'dzin rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do//
12b3(76 te): 'phags pa rin chen rlabs zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gri mkhan po 'i shrad+d+ha sa~M d+ha rung / lo na bya n+de gi dpal gyis bstsu
12b4(76 te): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya kA ra sid+ha dang / shu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de de btsan+d+ras zhus te gtan la phab pa// / mang+ga lam//
1a1(77 to): bya// bgres mos zhus pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// /
1b1(77 to): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA la li ka pa ri prets+tsha nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bgres
1b2(77 to): mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
1b3(77 to): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul bri dzi na yul rgya ba rgyu zhing / dge slong nyis brgya
1b4(77 to): lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po ra tu mang po dang thabs cig tu grong
1b5(77 to): khyer chen po yangs pa can ga la der gshegs pa dang / de'i tshe grong gi bud med rgan mo gtum pa 'khogs pa na tshed las
1b6(77 to): 'das par gyur pa/ skyes nas lo rgya nyi shu lon pa zhig dgon pa na rtswa sdud cing 'dug ste/ bud med des bcom ldan 'das
1b7(77 to): mdzes pa dang bar byed pa/ dbang po dul ba/ thugs dul ba/ dril ba dang zhi gnas mchog mnyes pa/ sbas pa skyon
2a1(77 to): med pa/ mtsho ltar dngas zhing gsal la rnyog pa med pa gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags
2a2(77 to): pa/ dpal gyi lham me/ ldan ne/ lhang nge ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ zag
2a3(77 to): ring po nas byon pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sems dad par gyur nas/ ngang pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
2a4(77 to): der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
2a5(77 to): ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bud med des bcom ldan 'das ga la der los su thal mo sbar ba btud nas btsem
2a6(77 to): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye ba gang nas mchis/ rga ba gang nas mchi gang du mchi//
2a7(77 to): bcom ldan 'das na ba gang nas mchis/ 'chi ba gang nas mchis gang du mchi/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs gang nas mchis/
2b1(77 to): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang nas mchis gang du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams gang nas mchis/ chu'i kham
2b2(77 to): dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nas kha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang nas mchis gang du mchi/ bcom ldan 'das mig gang nas
2b3(77 to): chis/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid gang nas mchi gang du mchi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sring mo skye ba gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
2b4(77 to): rga ba gang nas kyang mi 'ongs gang du'ang mi 'gro'o// sring mo na pa gang nas kyang mi 'ong / 'chi ba gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro'o// sring mo gzug
2b5(77 to): gang nas kyang mi 'ong / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro'o// sri mo'i khams gang
2b6(77 to): nas kyang mi 'ong chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi
2b7(77 to): 'gro'o// sring mo mig gang nas kyang mi 'ong / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid gang nas kyang mi 'ongs gang du yang mi 'gro'o// sring mo 'di lta/
2b8(77 to): ste dper na/ gtsub shing dang gtsub stan la yang brten/ de sked pa mi'i rtsol ba la yang brten na me byung ste/ me yang rtswa dang shing de bsregs na rgyu
3a1(77 to): med pa dang shi bar 'gyur to// sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/ me de gang nas 'ongs du song/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das zhug
3a2(77 to): de ni tshogs pa'i dbang gis byung / tshogs pa dang bral bas 'gags te gram mo// bka' stsal pa/ sring mo de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang tshogs
3a3(77 to): pa'i dbang gis 'byung tshogs pa dang bral bas 'gags te/ 'di la chos gang yang gang nas kyang 'ong ba 'am gang du yang 'gro ba med do// sring mo 'di
3a4(77 to): lta ste/ mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung yang / mig gi rnam par shes pa de la skyed par byed pa yang med/ 'gag par byed pa yang
3a5(77 to): med/ gang yang sogs pa med/ phung po gang las kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba yang med/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis las mngon par 'dus byas nas khams
3a6(77 to): gsum du 'bras bu gsum gyis 'bras bu nye bar ston te/ 'bras bu de yang stong pa dang / 'ong ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ sus kyang ma skyed pa/ sus kyang ma
3a7(77 to): bkag pa ste/ sring me tshe sa thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang sna dang dri dang lce dang ro dang lus dang reg bya dang //
3a8(77 to): yid dang chos rnams la brten nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung yang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa de bskyed par byed pa yang med/ 'gag par byed pa yang med//
3b1(77 to): gang yang sogs pa med/ phung po gang las kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba yang med la/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyi sa las mngon par 'dus byas nas kham
3b2(77 to): gsum du 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gyis 'bras bu nye bar ston te/ 'bras bu de yang stong pa/ 'ong ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ sus kyang ma skyed pa/ sus
3b3(77 to): kyang ma bkag pa ste/ sring mo chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'o// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ shing dang lpags pa dang dbyug grol yang brtan
3b4(77 to): de skyed pa mi'i rtsol ba la brten nas rnga'i sgra 'byung ste/ rnga'i sgra de 'das pa yang stong / ma 'ongs pa yang stong / da ltar byung ba yang stong ste/ sgra ni shing la
3b5(77 to): yang mi gnas/ lpags pa la yang mi gnas/ dbyug gu la yang mi gnas/ mi'i lag pa la yang mi gnas mod kyi/ 'on kyang de'i rkyen gyis sgra 'dogs te/
3b6(77 to): gang sgra de 'dogs pa yang stong pa/ 'od ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ sus kyang ma skyed pa/ sus kyang ma bkag pa ste/ sring me chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
3b7(77 to): gyis 'gags pa'o// sring mo de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rkyen gyi kha na las pa ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang las dang rnam par shes pa'o//
3b8(77 to): chos de dag yod na 'chi 'pho dang skye ba 'dogs te/ gang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba 'dogs pa de yang stong pa/ 'ong ba med pa 'gro ba med pa/ sus kyang ma skyed pa/
4a1(77 to): sus kyang ma bkag pa ste/ sring me chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'o// sring mo de ltar sus rnga sgra'i tshul gtu shes pa des
4a2(77 to): stong pa nyid rab tu shes so// sus stong pa nyid rab tu shes pa des mya ngan las 'das pa rab tu shes so// sras mya ngan las 'das pa rab tu shes pa de
4a3(77 to): tha nyid rnam pa sna tshogs kyis tha nyid 'dogs kyang dngos po gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/ bdag gi 'di dang de ni bdag go zhe'am/ sems can zhe 'am/
4a4(77 to): srog go zhe 'am/ gso ba'o zhe 'am skyes bu'o zhe 'am/ gang zag go zhe'am/ shed las skyes so zhe'am/ shed bu'o zhe 'am/ byed pa po zhe'am/ byed du 'jug pa po ni
4a5(77 to): 'am/ len pa po zhe'am/ 'dor ba po zhes de mngon par zhen pa med par chos ston/ chos rab tu ston/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ston/ yang dag pa'i mtha' rab
4a6(77 to): tu ston tod/ sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ ri mo mkhan nam ri mo khan gyi slob ma zhig gis ras bcom shin tu byi dor byas pa 'am/ shing leb bam rtsig ngos shin
4a7(77 to): tu byi ngor byas pa zhig la/ tshon sna tshogs 'gyed cing / gzugs kyi rnam pa gang dang gang 'dod pa 'di lta ste/ skyes pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa 'am/ bud med kyi
4a8(77 to): gzugs kyi rnam pa 'am/ glang po che'i gzugs kyi rnam pa 'am/ rta'i gzugs kyi rnam pa'am/ bong bu'i gzugs kyi rnam pa de dang de dag yan lag dang / nying lag dang /
4b1(77 to): dbang po thams cad mtshangs pa med par tshogs chung ngus mngon par sgrub cing 'dri ste/ mngon par grub par byed kyang / de la chos gang yang ri mo mkhan gyi lag pa
4b2(77 to): 'am/ sems las gzugs su 'phos pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang de'i rkyen gyis gzugs 'dogs te/ gang gzugs de 'dogs pa de yang stong pa/ 'ong ba med
4b3(77 to): pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ sus kyang ma skyed pa/ sus kyang ma bkag pa ste/ sreng mo chos thams cani rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'o// sring mo de bzhin du bsod nas nye ba
4b4(77 to): 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa rnams yod na/ 'di lta ste/ lha 'am mi'i nang du bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i lus mngon par grub kyang / de la gang 'jig rten 'di
4b5(77 to): nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'pho ba'i 'pho ba ni rdul tsam yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba sna tshogs yod de/ skye mched yod pas lusu
4b6(77 to): rnam par rig go/ de bzhin du bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams yod na/ 'di lta ste sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i ske gnas sam/
4b7(77 to): gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha ma yin rnams su bsod nams ma yin pa'i lus mngon par grub kyang / de la gang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'pho ba'i
4b8(77 to): 'pho ba ni rdul tsam yang med mod kyi/ 'od kyang mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba sna tshogs yod de/ skye mched yod pas lus su rnam par rig go/ sring mo
5a1(77 to): // 'di lta ste/ dper na/ klu rnams kyi klu'i mthus sprin gyi tshogs rgya chen po 'byung ste/ sprin gying dra ba de dag gis khebs par byas nas/ 6
5a2(77 to): po rgya cher 'bebs te/ char chen po rgya cher bab nas kyang sgang dang gshong ngoms par byed de/ sgang dang gshong ngoms par byas nas slar 'gro yang / de dag
5a3(77 to): klu'i lus sam sems las byung ba yang med mod kyi/ klu rnams kyi klu'i mthu nyid kyis sprin gyi tshogs rgya chen po 'byung ngo / sring mo de bzhin du bsod nam
5a4(77 to): su nye bar 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa yod na/ 'di lta ste lha 'am mi'i nang du bsod nas su nye bar 'gro ba'i lus rnams mngon par 'grub po// de bzhin
5a5(77 to): du bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa rnams yod na/ 'di lta ste sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i ske gnas sam/ gshin je'i
5a6(77 to): 'dzin rten nas/ lha ma yin rnams su bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i lus mngon par 'grub kyang / de la mngon por 'du bya ba yang stong pa/
5a7(77 to): mngon par 'du byed pa po yang stong pa/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i 'bras bu yang stong pa'o// sring mo mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa yod na/ gzugs
5a8(77 to): med pa rnams su rnam par shes pa mtshams sbyor te/ gang gis rnam par shes pa de gzugs med pa rnams su mtshams sbyor ba de yang stong pa/ gang rnam par shes
5b1(77 to): pa de gzugs med pa rnams su mtshams sbyar ba de yang stong pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sring mo chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang chos
5b2(77 to): rnams 'dogs so// mkhas pa rnams ni de la mngon par mi zhen te/ mngon par zhen pa med pas mi rtsod do// rtsod pa med pa ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi mchog go//
5b3(77 to): gsol pa/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos zab mo bka' stsal pas/ bcom ldan 'das yang bdag chos 'di dag la shes rab kyi mig 'jug ste/ slar
5b4(77 to): zhing yid gnyis ma mchis the tshom mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon ni chos 'di dag ma thos pas the tshom mchis so// da ni bdag rgas bdag 'khogs/
5b5(77 to): bdag sdug bsngal/ dag dbul/ bdag mgon ma mchis te/ bdag mi 'tshe zhing 'gum mi mdo'o// bcom ldan 'das dag gis chos 'di thos pas 'di na rgas pa 'am
5b6(77 to): dbul ba 'am/ bde ba 'am nad ma mchis pa'i na ba 'am/ phyug pa 'am dbul ba gang yang mchis so zhes bdag tu 'du shes pa dang bral bar gyur to// de nas bcom
5b7(77 to): ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lta bu
5b8(77 to): ka' stsal la/ de kyang 'di rab tu btsal bas bus med 'di ni bsod nams dang ldan pa/ mkhas pa shes rab kyi rang bzhin can lags pa snyam bdag bgyid do//
6a1(77 to): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin no// kun dga' bo ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ bud med 'di ni bsod nams
6a2(77 to): dang ldan pa mkhas pa shes rab kyi rang bzhin can no// kun dga' bo bud med 'di tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du nga'i mar gyur te/ kun dga' bo ngas tshe rabs de dang de dag tu yang
6a3(77 to): bud med 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do// kun dga' bong bud med 'di la shin tu phangs par bya ba dang / ngang pa dang gus par
6a4(77 to): gyur to// 'di yang bdag gi bu spyod pa gang la spyod pa'i spyad pa de la bdag gis kyang spyad de/ theg pa de bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
6a5(77 to): 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam mo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ci'i slad du 'di ltar dbul bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo
6a6(77 to): byang chub sems dpa'i spyang spyod pa na/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi bstan
6a7(77 to): pa la rab tu byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ kun dga' bo bud med 'di nga'i mar gyur te/ des ma btang nas de'i phyir nga zag cig zan bcad pa dang / de'i 'og tu 'dis
6a8(77 to): 'dod pas nga btang bar gyur te/ kun dga' bo 'di las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di ltar dbul bar gyur to// kun dga' bo 'di ni 'di'i dbul ba'i tha ma yin te//
6b1(77 to): kun dga' bo bud med 'di she 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten khams bde ba
6b2(77 to): can du bud med kyi dbang po la 'dod chags dang bral nas/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob par gyur te/ der skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med cing bsdam
6b3(77 to): gyis mi khyab pa la mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi bya dag byang chub la 'dzud par 'gyur/ sems can grangs
6b4(77 to): med dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag byang chub la yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med cing bsam gyis khyab pa dag
6b5(77 to): byang chub la 'god par 'gyur/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag byang chub la bkod nas/ da ste skal pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa
6b6(77 to): brgyad na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub
6b7(77 to): kyi yan lag gi me tog byed ces bya bas gyur te/ kun dga' bo sum cu ci gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs
6b8(77 to): rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod de yang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gsheg
7a1(77 to): pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to// nga yi mdun nathal sbyar gang 'dug pa// rgan mo 'di la kun
7a2(77 to): dga' khyod ltos shig/ 'di ni mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// byang chub yan lag me tog byed ces bya// 'dis ni bud med dngos po 'di spangs nas/
7a3(77 to): bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams su 'gro/ rgyal ba tshe dpag med de bsnyen bkur nas// khams gsum rgyal ba mtshungs med sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'jig rten
7a4(77 to): khams gzhan dag na gang bzhugs pa// drang srong chen po 'jig rten don mdzad pa/ rnam 'dren de dag la yang bsnyen bkur nas// 'di ni mtshungs med mi mchog
7a5(77 to): sangs rgyas 'gyur// de dag kun las chos kyang thos gyur nas// bsam pa dag pas de bzhin sgrub par 'gyur// byang chub sems mchog mi bskyed gnas nas ni//
7a6(77 to): sems can dpag med chos la sbyor bar byed// de yi tshe na gang dag dman pa dang // sna tshogs lus dang kha dog ngan pa dang / rmongs dang 'theng po de bzhin zhar ba dang /
7a7(77 to): lag rdum mdze can de dag 'byung mi 'gyur// nyi zla me dang glog dang nor bu rnams// de dag 'od ni de tshe 'byung mi 'byung // rnam 'dren byang chub yan lag me tog gi/
7a8(77 to): thub pa'i 'od kyis kun tu gsal bar khyab// sum cu rtsa sum lha mchog rnams kyi ni// chu zheng rtags dang kha dog ci 'dra ba// de 'dra'i rang bzhin can gyi skye bo yis/
7b1(77 to): de tshe ma smad zhing ni gang bar 'gyur// de na bdud kyi ris kyang med// bdud kyi bud med bdud kyi phyag brnyan med// bde bar gshegs pa de ni chos ston tshe// de na mu steg
7b2(77 to): can gyi ming mi grag/ bde bar gshegs pa de ni chos ston tshe// de dus yi dgas dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang // sems dmyal ngan song rnams kye ming mi grag/ de na bud
7b3(77 to): da med ming yang grag mi 'gyur// 'di ni nyan thos rkyen gyis theg pa ltar// de tshe theg pa rnam par bzhag pa med// kun kyang rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dang ldan/
7b4(77 to): de dag byams la gnas shing snying rje can// zhing der mi rnams thams cad rtag par yang // rdzu zhing skye ste mngal nas rnam par thar// skye ngan blo mchog ldan zhing mkhas pa ste/
7b5(77 to): legs par gsungs pa thos nas thos pa 'dzin// zhing gi bkod tshul ci 'dra 'byung 'gyur ba// yon tan bskal par 'dir ni brjod byas kyang // rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs gcig
7b6(77 to): lta bu// dpe tsam du yang brjod par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / rgan me de dang / byang chub sems dpal
7b7(77 to): de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
7b8(77 to): pa 'gres mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang // dan shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba brje ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phag pa// mang+ga la/
1a1(78 thi): stag mos zhus pa zhes bya ba'i mod bzhug so//
1b1(78 thi): dkor mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa du gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rnal
1b2(78 thi): 'byor dang mthun pa'i gnas ri'i sul sman ljongs zhig na gnas shing spyod do// de nas ri khrod de na/ stag mo phrug gu 'brang ba zhig/
1b3(78 thi): phrug gu 'brang ba'i sdug bsngal gyi// spyod pa nyams par gyur pa mthos/ bkres pas ltogs pa rab tu rnyod// mig gnyis lta ba
1b4(78 thi): zhan par gyur// phrug gu bdag gis bu yin kyang // kha zas bzhin dang ldan par 'gyur// ma la yid gcugs 'jigs med
1b5(78 thi): cing // nu zho 'dod phyir lhags pa las// stag mo der der sgra 'byin cing / gzhan gyis bu bzhin spangs par 'gyur// byang chub
1b6(78 thi): sems dpa' de mthong nas// btan kyang snying rje'i dbang gyur pas// sa g.yos pa yi ljon shing bzhin// gzhan gyi sdug
1b7(78 thi): bsngal gdungs pas 'dir/ bdag gis sdug bsngal chen pos kyang // snying rje'i bdag nyid bstan pa sel// gzhan gyi sdug bsngal
2a1(78 thi): chung ngus kyang // 'dar bar gyur pa de rmad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de// brtags shing ring
2a2(78 thi): rings skad du smras pa'i tshig rang bzhin khyad par can gsal bar ston pa/ snying rje'i dbang gis tshig 'bru gsal bar slob ma
2a3(78 thi): la smras pa/ 'u bu 'khor ba yon tan med la ltos// gcan gzan mo 'di ltogs nas kyang // bams pa'i mtshams las
2a4(78 thi): 'das pa ni// rang gi bu yang za bar 'dod// kye ma bdag la byams pa ni// ha cang ma 'ongs pa ni 'di bzod do// gang phyir ma
2a5(78 thi): yang bdag gi bu// za bar 'dod pa ga la srid// gang phyir 'di 'dra'i las dag kyang // byed par rtsol ba de lta bu'i// bdag la
2a6(78 thi): sdang ba'i dgra bo de// 'phel bar byed pa su zhig yod// de lta bas na stag mo dang phrug gu rnams ma rungs par 'gyur ba 'di
2a7(78 thi): bkres pa'i sdug bsngal sel ba'i rgyu bshad nas myur du tshol zhing // bdag cag 'di thub tshod 'di las bzlog pa'i phyir
2b1(78 thi): 'bad do// des kyang de mnyanas de bzhin bgyi'o zhes nas de'i tshe zas 'tshal ba la 'brang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' slob ma de bsnyad
2b2(78 thi): gtags te btang nas bsams pa/ bdag gi lus tshad mar yod bzhin du/ ci'i phyir gzhan las btsal bar bya/ des kyang rnyed dam mi rnyed brtol med
2b3(78 thi): la/ bdag gi dgos pa mi 'grub srid dper na bdag med 'jigs la snying po med pa'i lus// sdug bsngal dran med rtag tu mi gtsang ba'i// lus kyis gzhan
2b4(78 thi): la phan 'dogs nus pa la// dga' bar mi 'gyur de ni mkhas ma yin// bdag gi bde la ma chags gzhan dag gi/ sdug bsngal yal bar 'dor ba mthu
2b5(78 thi): med dam// gzhan yang sdug bsngal dag la bde ba med// nus pa yod bzhin ci ste yal bar 'dor// nus pa yod bzhin bdag gi yal dor na// gsod pa'i
2b6(78 thi): dgra yang sdug bsngal bying ba la// yal bar bor bzhin sdig pa byas pa ni// bdag gi sems ni 'dam bu mes tshig bzhin// de bas lus kyis stsal ba
2b7(78 thi): byas pa ni// g.yang sar lhung la thug pa'i srog yod pas// phrug gu bsad pa'i gcan mo bsrung ba dang // gcan mo las kyang de yi phrug gu bsrung // gzhan
2b8(78 thi): yang 'jig rten phan brtson rnams la bstan pa dang // brtson 'grus gzhan la spro ba skyed pa dang // gtong phod rnams ni dga' ba sked pa dang // skye bo dam pa'i
3a1(78 thi): yid ni drang ba dang // 'dud kyi sde chen srani skong ba dang // sangs rgyas yon tan dag la dga' ba dang // bdag gis don brtson ngo mtshar skyed pa dang /
3a2(78 thi): 'jungs dang 'dod chen ngo mtshar skyed pa dang // theg pa mchog la rten dang bskyed byed cing // gtong phod rten pa ngo mtshar bskyed pa dang // gtod la dga' la rjes su
3a3(78 thi): yi rang dang // mtho ris lam chen rnams la sbyang phyir ro// lus tsam gyis kyang gzhan la phan 'dogs par// nam zhig 'gyur zhes bdag gis gang bsams pa'i//
3a4(78 thi): smon lam de ni 'bras bu yod pa dang // byang chub mchog kyang rab bya'o// 'gran phyir ma yin grags pa 'dod phyir min// mtho ris su 'dod grags dang rgyal srid skrag/
3a5(78 thi): bdag gi bde ba mchog thob phyir min gyi// gzhan don bsgrub phyir bdag ni 'di rtsom mo// de bas na bdag 'di yi dus gcig na// 'jig rten dag la sdug bsngal bde
3a6(78 thi): 'byung ba// bsal zhing bsgrub pa rtag tu nus gyur cig/ nyi mas mun sel snang byung dus bzhin du// mthong ngam thos sam rjes su dran kyang rung // reg gam gtam du
3a7(78 thi): brjod pa tsam gyis kyang // rnam pa kun du 'gro la phan pa ni// bde dang ldan pa rtag tu byed gyur cig/ de ltar gzhan don/ 'grub phyir de des nas// srog dang bral yang rab tu
3a8(78 thi): dga' 'gyur te bstan pa'i lha rnams ngo mtshar skye 'gyur bar// bdag gis lus ni de nas bor 'gyur ba// de nas stag mo nges byang chub sems dpa' lus bor ba'i sgra de
3b1(78 thi): thos shing ngo mtshar skyes nas/ rang gi phrug gu bza' ba btang ste/ de nas de la mig gnyis bltas/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus srog dang bral ba mthong bas//
3b2(78 thi): de ma thag tu nye bar 'ongs te bza' bar brtsams so// de'i 'og tu slob ma des sha ma rnyed pa slar 'ongs pa/ mkhan po ga na bzhugs snyam nas bltas na/ byang chub
3b3(78 thi): sems dpa' de'i lus srog dang bral ba stag mo de za zhing 'dug pa mthong ba dang / des de'i spyod pa khyad par can ngo mtshar che bar bzung nas mya ngan sdug bsngal gyi shugs/
3b4(78 thi): btang ste/ de'i yon tan gyi gzhi la smon pa'i tshig tu smra ba bzhin du yid la bsam pa tshig tu smras na legs te/ e ma sdug bsngal can la 'di snying rje// bdag nyid
3b5(78 thi): rjes pas bdag gis de ma chags// dam pa rnaMs kyi spyod pa mchog tu byas// gzhan gyi dpal dang grags pa zil gyis mnan// e ma rab tu dpa' ba 'jigs pa med/
3b6(78 thi): yon tan bzhi ldan byams mchog rnam par brtan// e ma yon tan chen po bdag gi lus// phyag gi gnas kyi khyad par can du byas// rang bzhin zhi bas sa gzhi
3b7(78 thi): bzhin du brtan// e ma gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa// e ma dpa' ba phun sum tshogs pa 'dis// bdag gi skyon ni rab tu grags par 'gyur// mgon po 'dis
3b8(78 thi): ni mgon dang bcas byas pa// de ni 'gro ba mya ngan bya mi dgos// gzhan gyis pham dus dgos pa'i bar dag kyang // de ni nges par shugs kyang nar zhes 'byin// yod
4a1(78 thi): ye bsal ba chen po sems can thams cad kyis skyabs su gyur pa/ thugs rje shin tu rlabs che ba/ snying stobs dpag tu med pa/ byang chub sems
4a2(78 thi): dpa' don ji lta ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes smras nas/ de nas don de tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la sman no// de nas de'i spyod pas ngo mtshar gyur
4a3(78 thi): pa'i slob ma dang / dri za gnod sbyin klu dang sum cu rtsa sum gyi bdag po rnams/ 'phreng ba na bza' rgyan dang tsan dan phye ma'i char pa bab pas/ de'i sku gdung 'dzin pa'i
4a4(78 thi): sa bzhi khebs par byas/ de bas na de ltar bcom ldan 'das de'i sku tshe snga ma yang / de sems can thams cad la rgyu med par rab tu byams pa'i rang bzhin can/ sems
4a5(78 thi): can thams cad la bdag gi mar gyur pa yin pas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rab tu dang par bya'o// dad pa skyes pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
4a6(78 thi): 'das rnams la dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// de lta bas na bdag gis dad pa'i gnas yin no// zhes pa de ltar yang sbar bar bya'o// de ltar chos kyang bya dka' ba med
4a7(78 thi): po bsgrubs pa'i phyir rim gro bskyed de/ chos mnyan par bya'o// de ltar snying rje ni gzhan la phan 'dod pa'i rgyu yin zhing / ngo bo nyid khyad par can bsgrubs pa yin pa'i phyir/
4a8(78 thi): snying rje'i yon tan bsngags pa lo'ang sbyar bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud las rdzogs pa dang po'i le'u rdzogs so// gcig zhus/ mang+ga la//
1a1(79 thi): stag mos zhus pa'i mdo bzhugs so// /
1b1(79 thi): #/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su ba bu ba rmi ta ma nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa stag mos zhus pa zhes
1b2(79 thi): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
1b3(79 thi): pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul stag mo'i tshal zhes bya ba'i dur khrod kyi nags tshal chen po na/ dge slong stong nyis
1b4(79 thi): brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang thabs
1b5(79 thi): gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe stag tsher ma can gyi nags tshal na gnas pa'i stag mo rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/
1b6(79 thi): stag mo rnams nyon cig/ bzod pa la gnas pa'i sems can dag mthong ngam/ byams pa la gnas sems can dag mthong
1b7(79 thi): ngam/ ting nge 'dzin thob pam dran pa nye bar gzhag gam/ yid rlom sems med dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / stag
2a1(79 thi): mos rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye ba gang nas mchi//
2a2(79 thi): rgas pa gang nas mchis/ na ba gang nas mchis/ gang du 'gro/ mig gang du mchi/ gzugs gang du mchi/ tshor ba gang du mchi
2a3(79 thi): 'du shes gang du mchi/ 'du byed gang du mchi/ rnam par shes pa gang du mchi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkab stsal pa/ skye ba
2a4(79 thi): gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang mi 'gro'o// na ba gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang mi 'gro'o// 'chi ba gang nas kyang
2a5(79 thi): ma 'ongs/ gang du yang mi 'gro'o// mig gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang mi 'gro'o// gzugs gang nas kyang ma
2a6(79 thi): 'ongs/ gang du yang mi 'gro'o// tshor ba gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang mi 'gro'o// 'du shes gnas kyang ma'o/
2a7(79 thi): gang du yang mi 'gro'o// 'du byed gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang mi 'gro'o// rnam par shes pa gang nas kyang ma 'ongs//
2b1(79 thi): gang du yang mi 'gro'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gzhan la phan phyir du lus dri ma med pa shin tu rgyas pa'i yon
2b2(79 thi): tan rgya mtsho dang / lha yul du rnam par 'phro ba thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / stobs kyi pha rol gnon pas bcom ldan 'das dge slong
2b3(79 thi): stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dag gis yongasu bskor te/ yul lnga len gyi ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas nags tshal zhig tu gshegs pa dang / me tog dri zhem pa rna
2b4(79 thi): pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i sa phyogs dag gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
2b5(79 thi): sa 'di shin tu mdzes pa dang / yid rab tu dang bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stan things shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin gdan bting ngo //
2b6(79 thi): gdan bting nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gdan bting lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gtso bo mchog mi la mchog stsol dam pa
2b7(79 thi): srid bcings grol/ gzhugs te mi la sman slad thar bar bgyid// bka' mchid bdud rtsi gsung bar zhu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs nas//
2b8(79 thi): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed bya ba byed pa'i drang srong dam pa sems can mchog gi snying po bzod pa dang brtson 'grus blo gros yon tan dpag
3a1(79 thi): tu med pa de bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong gi ri mo can/ me tog ka ma la gsar du kha bye ba lta bu 'jam pa'i phyogs
3a2(79 thi): la bsnun pa dang / sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// 'brug dang glog rab du 'khrug/ char rab tu 'babs/ de sngar
3a3(79 thi): 'od kyang rab tu 'gro ba dang / nor bu dang gser g.yu dang / mu tig gi dra bas rab tu khebs pa'i nang na gser gyi za ma tog cig 'dug go// de'i sgo drung na stag ma
3a4(79 thi): dar la babs pa smin ma dang / smar dang ze ba ring ba/ so dang sen mo dkar la ring ba/ lce dang so snying dkar ba/ kha gdangs shing mched gtsigs pa/ 'ja' dang
3a5(79 thi): 'od du 'phro ba/ smar 'khyug pa/ ri mo thig le legs pa/ mjug ma sgril ba lhag par sleb pa/ gzhogs g.yas la bzhag cing 'gre/ 'dzum smral byed cing
3a6(79 thi): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das za ma tog 'di ji lta bu zhig mchis/ ci zhig yin de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
3a7(79 thi): kyis stag mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// stag mo za ma tog 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ste/ de ltar mi mngon par rig par bya'o// mchog tu rig par
3a8(79 thi): bya'o// don du rigs par bya'o// yang dag par rigs par bya'o// ma nor bar rig par bya'o// gya nom par rig par bya'o// bla na med par rig par bya'o// lhag ma
3b1(79 thi): med par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / yang stag mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
3b2(79 thi): za ma tog 'di'i don ci lags/ ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stag mo za tog 'di'i ming ni/ rgyu'i chos su blta'o//
3b3(79 thi): 'bras bu'i chos su bsta'o// mthar phyin pa'i chos su blta'o// gzhi'i chos su blta'o// lam gyi chos su blta'o// dag pa'i chos su blta'o// stong pa nyid du/
3b4(79 thi): blta'o// mtshan ma med par blta'o// smon pa med par blta'o// de nas stag mo de sa las langs te/ stag mos bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ku mo da
3b5(79 thi): dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / tsam pa ka dang / ut+pa la dang / dri zhim pa mang pos mchod nas/ stag mos bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
3b6(79 thi): bskor ba byas nas/ stag tshal can gyi nags tshal du zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
3b7(79 thi): gsol to// stag mo gang lags par 'tshal/ ci'i phyi stug mo zhes bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang
3b8(79 thi): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo stag mo zhes bgyi ba 'di sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba dpungs dmag dang /
4a1(79 thi): bzhon pa rab tu mang ba/ stobs dang ldan pa 'khor rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor ba/ thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gyi sde rab tu
4a2(79 thi): 'joms pa zhig byung ste/ de la lha sras rgyal bu gzhon nu gsum zhig yod de/ sgra chen po dang / lha chen po dang / snying stobs chen po'o// de nas rgyal bu rtse ba'i
4a3(79 thi): phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang / gzhon nu de dag skyed mos tshal de'i yon tan la chags shing / me togs 'dod pas phan tshun du rgyu ste/ nags stug po bcu
4a4(79 thi): gnyis su zhug so// de nas deng ga dong pa dang / gzhon nu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang rgyal bus bskrad nas phan tshun dong ngo // kun tu bsungs pa'i skyed mos tshal chen
4a5(79 thi): po'i nags stug po bcu gnyis su zhugs so// de nas sgra chen pos nu bo gnyis la smras pa/ kho bo nyid 'jigs pas non pas/ 'dir bdago cag gcan
4a6(79 thi): gzan gyis bsang du 'od gyis tshur sheg/ lha chen pos smras pa/ bdag la 'jigs pa ni ma mchis na/ skye bo sdug pa dang 'bral snyam bgyid pa'i snying du gyur
4a7(79 thi): to// sems can chen pos smras pa/ thub pas bsngags pa'i nags khrod dben pa 'dir/ bdag ni mi 'jigs mya ngan ma mchis kyis/ shin tu rgyas pa'i
4a8(79 thi): don chen rnyed snyam ste// bdag gi snying ni rab tu dga' bar gyur/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag nags stug po bcu gnyis po de dag gi khrod du rgyu ba dang / stag
4b1(79 thi): mo bu byung nas zhag bdun lon pa cig pu lngas bskor te/ bskos shi skoms pas nyams spang nas/ lus mchog tu nyams chung bar gyur pa de 'dra ba zhig
4b2(79 thi): mthong ngo // mthong nas sgra chen pos smras pa/ k+She e ma he nyon mongs ma 'di bu byung nas zhag drug gam bdun lon pa da ltar zas ma rnyed pa/ yang na ni rang
4b3(79 thi): gyi bu la za bar 'gyur/ yeng na ni bkres pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur sems can chen pos smras pa/ nyon mongs ma 'di'i zas ni cing / sgra chen pos
4b4(79 thi): smras pa/ 'dir shagasar pa dang khrag dron mo yod na stag dang / dom dang / dreng dang / seng ge rnams kyi zas yin no// zhes zer ro// lha chen pos
4b5(79 thi): smras pa/ 'dir nyon mongs ma 'di bkres pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ su shig rang gi lus 'di gtong bar nas/ snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ lus
4b6(79 thi): ga tong mi nus pa blo chung ba chags pa rnams yin gyi/ bdag ltag bu'i lus 'di la 'phangs pa dang chags pa med pa'i sems kyis lus 'di
4b7(79 thi): btang ba'i dus la bab po// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de snying rje'i sems kyis stag mo de la mig mi 'dzum par yun ring du bltas nas/ rgyal bu
4b8(79 thi): gzhon nu de nags 'dab der slar log nas stag mo'i gan du song ngo // de nas nags kyi yal ga/ la rgyal po'i gos gzar te/ ji srid blo gros rgya man
5a1(79 thi): byang chub dri med thob par shog/ ces smon lam btab nas nyal lo// lhag mo de nyam chung bas byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang
5a2(79 thi): chub sems dpa' la ci yang ma byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ni/ kye mnyon mongs ma 'di nyam chung bas ci yang ma nus so snyam mo//
5a3(79 thi): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de langs te/ shes rab kyi mtshon cha btsal bas gang nas kyang ma rnyed do// der 'ong ma'i yal gasra zhing mkhregs pa cig
5a4(79 thi): blangs nas rang gi mgul pa bcad de stag mo'i mdun du nyal te 'gyel lo// byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag tu/ chu'i steng gi grwa rlung gis bskod
5a5(79 thi): pa ltar du/ sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos so// nyi zla yang sgra gcan gyis zin pa ltar 'od zer mi snang ngo // lha'i spos kyi
5a6(79 thi): char rab tu phab po// de nas lha zhig ngo mtshar du gyur to// de nas lhag mo des byang chub sems dpa'i lus khrag gis sbags pa la ltas nas/ yud tsam zhig
5a7(79 thi): la lus kyo sha dang khrag med par byas so// de nas skye chen po des sa g.yos pa de la bsam nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// snying stobs chen po de ni mi rtag pa
5a8(79 thi): nyid kyis zin par gyur to// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis lam de las slar log ste/ stag mo'i drung du phyin pa dang / gos ni 'od ma'i yal ga la gzang/
5b1(79 thi): sha dang rus pa ni bral/ khrag ni rdzab tu gyur/ skra ni phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang lag pa bsgrengs te brdabs
5b2(79 thi): nas nyam thag pa'i sgra byung nas dus so// kye ma ho sdug bde ga re/ rab tu sdug pas gdungs pa'i ma des/ bdag cag gnyis la tha chung 'dri bar 'gyur/
5b3(79 thi): kye ma bdag cag gnyis ni sa phyogs 'dir shi na legs te/ gson pa de ni ma yin no// de nas gzhon nu'i rim gro pa dang bcas nas gzhon nu 'tshol ba la rgyu go/
5b4(79 thi): btsun mo nyal ba'i rmi lam na nu ma gnyis chad pa dang / so phyung ba dang / thi ba'i phrug gsum gyi gcig khras khyer ba rmis so// de nas btsun mo des g.yos pa nges
5b5(79 thi): snying rab tu spangs te/ mod la sad pa dang / lus sems zhum pa dang / khums nas yod pa la/ bran g.yog 'khor dang 'khor rnams kyis btsun mo la
5b6(79 thi): smras pa/ bu gcig sdug pa stor ces gda'o// de nas btsun mo snying dngang mig mchi mas gang ba des rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so// bu tha chung de ga re zer
5b7(79 thi): med do// bzang mo mya ngan ma byed ces smras so// kye ma kye he bu sdug pa dang bral lo zhes sdug bsngal lo// rgyal po btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa sdug bsnga
5b8(79 thi): ni rnga mod snad du bsnun pa lta bu shin tu mi bzod pa'i sgra byung ngo // de ltar bu gsum dag ni g.yog gi tshogs dang bcas de me togs gi nags tshal khrod du zhugs
6a1(79 thi): pa las/ bu'i rus pa sha khrag med pa sku ni phyogs su 'thor ba mthong ba dang / btsun mo de shing rlung gyis 'das pa bzhin kha bub du 'gyel
6a2(79 thi): lo// nyathang ba la skyes pa bzhin du sa'i steng du 'dre ldog byed pa 'am/ rnga mong dang ma he'i be'u stor ba ltar snying rje'i skad du ngu zhing / rgyal ba sangs pa
6a3(79 thi): dang / kye maho rmi lam gyi 'bras bur gda'o// rgyal po btsun mo dpud kyi tshogs dang bca pa bu'i rus pa mchod pa byed cing gnas so// kun dga'
6a4(79 thi): bo de'i tshe de'i bu na/ rgyal po gzhon nur gyur pa sems can chen po de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na de de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhes na/ nga de
6a5(79 thi): tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu bzhon nu sems can chen po zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' bo 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang dug gsum yongs su ma
6a6(79 thi): grol ba'i tshe yang / sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sbrul dang las ngan 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan gdags pa dang / skyom thams cad las phral
6a7(79 thi): te/ yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la lta ci dgos te/ de ltar sems can re re'i phyir yang / sems can snying po bya dka' ba sna tshogs las 'gro
6a8(79 thi): ba langs phan btags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// byang chub mchog tu bskal pa mang po
6b1(79 thi): nas// rgyal po'i lus ni mang po sbyin par btang / sngon gyi tshe rabs shing rta chen po zhes// bu ni snying stobs chen po bya ba byung // ming ni sgra chen po dang lnga
6b2(79 thi): chen po// bu dang dpungs tshogs nags khrod gling du rgyu// stag mo bkres pas rab tu gzir ba mthong // stag mo bkres skoms mthong nas sbyin pa ni/
6b3(79 thi): byang chub sems ni rgya chen bkyed pa yis// de da ri ngos gzar la 'phyongs te song // mun nag 'thibs por ri dgas rgyu ba mthong // rten med
6b4(79 thi): nags kyi nang du zhugs pa'i tshe// stag mo nyam chung gar nyal ba// stag mo dang ni stag phrug gi// mchu la khrag chags pa dag mthong // skra dang rus
6b5(79 thi): pa cung zad cig/ sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong // lag pa bsgrengs te ngu zhing sa 'gyel// snying rje'i skad dang dran pa nyams// sems 'phro lus
6b6(79 thi): ni khab kyis btsab pa 'dra// blon po 'khor g.yog bcas pa rnams// rgyal ba'i thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas rnams//
6b7(79 thi): rmi lam sad pa bzhin du song // chos nyid rang gsal 'di la ltos// dam pa'i snying po mthong can// rgyal po zas gtsang mi'i btsun mo pad+ma sgra 'phrul ma/
6b8(79 thi): snying stobs chen po shAkya thub pa nyid// lha chen po dang sgra chen po// 'jam dpal dang ni byams pa'o// stag mor gyur pa skyed dgu'i bdag mi yin/
7a1(79 thi): stag phrag rnams ni dge slong lnga por gyur// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang // de nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
7a2(79 thi): dga' bo dang / dge slong rnams stag tsher ma can gyi nags khrod nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das
7a3(79 thi): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la byang chub mchog tu sems can 'dren pa'i mchog tu gyur cig
7a4(79 thi): ces byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stag mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// stag mo de ltar sems bskyed pa ni legs
7a5(79 thi): so// de ltar bskyed pa mchog go// dam pa'o// phul lo// rab po// gtso bo'o// gya nom pa'o// bla na med pa'o// stag mo 'di nas shor phyogs mngon
7a6(79 thi): par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i nags khrod na shing yongs 'dus brtol zhes bya ba'i nags khrod na/ ka ya tsa dur zhes bya ba'i me tog yod de// su zhig me tog de
7a7(79 thi): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phul na don chen po'o// yang dag pa nyid do// sangs rgyas so// chos
7a8(79 thi): so// dge 'dun no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas stag mos shar phyogs kyi shing ginags khrod du zhugs pa dang // nags khrod nas lha'i me tog
7a9(79 thi): 'bras bu chen ma/
7b1(79 thi): ma na da ra ba dang / ku mu da dang / ku mu da chen po dang / sa ma gan d+he dang / ut+pa la dang / tsam+ba ka'i me tog dang / gzhan yang chu las skyes pa dang / thang las
7b2(79 thi): skyes pa la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mang po bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ro// rab tu gto ro// gtor ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
7b3(79 thi): ka nas 'od zer 'di lta ste/ mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ljang khu dang / btsod kha dang / ser po dang / bai rur+ya'i kha dog de lta bu dpag tu med
7b4(79 thi): pa 'phros nas/ shar phyogs kyi stag mo'i khrod du song ngo // song ma zag tu stag dang / seng ge dang / dom dang / dreng dang / spyang ki dang / bya dang / ri dgra
7b5(79 thi): dang / de la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag tu dud 'gro dman pa'i lus bor te/ skad cig de nyid la mngon par rdzogs par
7b6(79 thi): sangs rgyas so// stag mo de yang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang lnga pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
7b7(79 thi): dag shar byes stag tsher ma can gyi nags tshal du rgyug nags tshal la gnas pa'i sems can sa dgu rtse gcig kyang ma mchis par snang ngo // de nas che dang
7b8(79 thi): ldan pa kun dga' bo nags khrod de nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba dang bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug
8a1(79 thi): ste/ pus mo'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bla gos phrag pa la gzar / thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ stag
8a2(79 thi): ra ma can gyi nags khrid na gnas pa'i sems can ma lus sgra rtsa cig kyang mi snang ba ci'i rkyen ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
8a3(79 thi): kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo stag tsher ma can gyi sems can de rnams ni byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pas skad cig de nyid la mngon par
8a4(79 thi): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// sems can de rnams ni gnas ngan pa'i lus bor nas/ 'bras bu byang chub thob pa ni mdo sde 'di'i byin rlabs te/ de'i mthu
8a5(79 thi): de 'dra'o// gzhan yang sems can su gang mdo 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'bri ba dang / nyan pa dang / ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha
8a6(79 thi): bton byed pa de ni lam mo// mchog go/ sgron me'o// ston pa sangs rgyas so// chos so// dge 'dun no// bla ma'o// don dam pa'o// ma nor ba'o// 'dre
8a7(79 thi): ni yang dag pa'i mtha' 'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba ni dbu ma'o// dbu ma'i lam ni smra bsam brjod pa dang bral ba'o// de ni skye ba med pa'o// su mdo sde 'di la gus
8a8(79 thi): par byas te mchod par byed pa de la ni/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // chom rkun kyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // dgra bo'i dbang du mi 'gro'o// pha
8b1(79 thi): rol dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // mu ge dang dbul ba las grol lo// nad dang gdon las grol lo// bgegs dang log 'dren thams
8b2(79 thi): cad kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'thab rtsod dang g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// sngangs pa dang rmi lam ngan pa thas cad phyir
8b3(79 thi): bzlog par 'gyur ro// ltos ngan pa dang cho 'phrul thams cad zhi bar 'gyu ro// su mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'am 'chang ba'i bud med des bu rnyed do// tshe dang
8b4(79 thi): bsod nams dang stobs kyang rab tu rnyed do// mdo sde 'di la yon tan dpag tu med brjod du med/ brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das so mdo sde 'di sems can
8b5(79 thi): gang su dag gi rna lam du bsgrags na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mtha' 'khob dang kA klo
8b6(79 thi): nyid du mi 'gyur ro// bcings pa thams cad dang btson rar chud pa yang grol bar 'gyur ro// de'i phyir kun dga' bo mdo sde 'di g.yar dam du bcas nas bton na/ sems can
8b7(79 thi): thams cad kyi 'dren pa dang / ston pa dang / rten du 'gyuraro// gling du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
8b8(79 thi): dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
8b9(79 thi): pa stag mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / zhus// mang+ga lam masta//
8b10(79 thi): mgon dang byas su 'gyur ro//
1a1(80 thu): dbang skod phyag rgya ba bzhugs so/
1b1(80 thu): #/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang skong phyag rgya ba zhes bya ba phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
1b2(80 thu): mtha' yas mu med pa dag na/ dus gsum gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas
1b3(80 thu): pa rab 'byams ma lus pa'i dkon mchog thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag
1b4(80 thu): 'tshal lo// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mya
1b5(80 thu): dan med pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de bzhin gshegs pa la
1b6(80 thu): phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa phyag 'tshal lo// byang shar mtshams kyi
1b7(80 thu): sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shar lho mtshams kyi sangs rgyas
2a1(80 thu): pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lho nub kyi sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa
2a2(80 thu): la phyag 'tshal lo// nub byang mtshams kyi sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas pad+mo
2a3(80 thu): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// yang shar phyogs kyi sangs
2a4(80 thu): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyog
2a5(80 thu): kyi sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyis sangs rgyas don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal
2a6(80 thu): lo// sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde gdab pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas tshe mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
2a7(80 thu): 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa
2a8(80 thu): la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sA la'i me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de bzhin
2b1(80 thu): gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin po che'i dpal gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs
2b2(80 thu): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas ut+pa la rgyas pa bsung gi tog gi rgyal po de bzhin
2b3(80 thu): gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi ldog pa'i 'a
2b4(80 thu): lo bsgrags pa'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas rab tu gdon mi za ba pad+mo rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul med pa'i 'jig rten na/ sangs
2b5(80 thu): rgyas seng ge de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rab tu snang ba'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug phud de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
2b6(80 thu): 'od bzang po'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'da' bar dka' ba'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas chos
2b7(80 thu): kyi 'od zer rab tu rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rab tu bzang po'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i blo gros 'od zer
2b8(80 thu): gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// me long gi dkyil 'khor bsgrags pa'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas zla ba'i thugs de bzhin gshegs pa
3a1(80 thu): la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+mo dpal gyi 'jig rten na sangs rgyas dpal bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs
3a2(80 thu): rgyas zla 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mdzes chen de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor
3a3(80 thu): dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dga' ba'i spyan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i dpal
3a4(80 thu): de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser gyi gzu ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i yon tan gyi 'od
3a5(80 thu): zer de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas smon lam thams cad las 'byung ba'i rin po che'i gzi brjid shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gsheg/
3a6(80 thu): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas grags pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbang po de
3a7(80 thu): bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gtsug tor can de bzhin gshegs
3a8(80 thu): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas log par dad sel de bzhin gshegs pa
3b1(80 thu): la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser thub de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das
3b2(80 thu): pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag
3b3(80 thu): 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas chos kyi sku mu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig
3b4(80 thu): rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i sku gzugs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// ring bsrel thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// mchod rten thams cad la phyag 'tshal
3b5(80 thu): lo// dam pa'i chos mdo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyangs kyis bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// tshigs su bcad
3b6(80 thu): pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// ched du brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// gleng bzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo//
3b7(80 thu): 'das pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo//
3b8(80 thu): chos rtogs pa brtan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod theg pa chen po'i mdzod thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu dus gsuM
4a1(80 thu): gyi gsung rab thams cad dang / 'dul ba thabs kyi sgo mo ma lus pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' brjod du med
4a2(80 thu): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang
4a3(80 thu): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// lho/
4a4(80 thu): phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi
4a5(80 thu): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo// byang shar mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
4a6(80 thu): shar lho mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad mo la phyag 'tshal lo// lho nub kyi mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo//
4a7(80 thu): nub byang mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// 'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma
4a8(80 thu): phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
4b1(80 thu): sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag lo// byang
4b2(80 thu): chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
4b3(80 thu): sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems
4b4(80 thu): dpa' mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab chen
4b5(80 thu): po'i mchog 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul che ba'i mchog 'phags pa mo'u gal gyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo// mang du thos pa'i mchog 'pham
4b6(80 thu): pa kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi mchog 'phags pa 'od srungs la phyag 'tshal lo// bslab pa la gus pa'i mchog 'phags pa nor sbyin
4b7(80 thu): 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog 'phags pa nye ba 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan mnga' ba'i mchog 'phags pa ma 'gags
4b8(80 thu): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dri zhing lan ldan pa'i mchog 'phags pa rab 'byor la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la phyag
5a1(80 thu): 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun bzhugs so 'tshal thams cad la phyag
5a2(80 thu): 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la dad pas phyag 'tshal nas// sdig pa kun byang dge tshogs rnam par 'phel// bcom ldan so so'i bka' las ci 'byung ba/
5a3(80 thu): yon tan khyad par can de grub par shog/ phyogs bcu'i dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bstod cing bsngags so// blta zhing brtag go// byang chub sem
5a4(80 thu): dpa'i bsod nams rab 'byams las byung ba// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs mchog/ gtso bo/ dam pa/ khyad par can/ bzang po/
5a5(80 thu): nom pa/ bla na med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas phyogs bcu'i snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad byung bur bkang ste/ chos kyi mchod pa dang bcas pas ma lus
5a6(80 thu): mi lus lus pa med pa'i dkon mchog gsum la phyi ma'i mu'i mthar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod cing 'don to// dbul zhing gsol lo// bkur stir bgyi'o//
5a7(80 thu): bla mar bgyi'o// ri mor bgyi'o// mnyes par bgyi'o// bdag cag gi skye ba 'di dang / skye ba thog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis pa nas srid pa gsum gyi 'khor ba
5a8(80 thu): na 'khor zhing / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gsum gyi dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med/
5b1(80 thu): pa lnga la sogs te/ gsung rab kun las 'gal ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag gis ci bgyis pa dang / gzhan la bcol ba dang / gzhan bgyid pa la rjes
5b2(80 thu): su yi rang ba de dag rdul tsam bag tsam yang ma lus par mthol zhing bshags so// sbyangs shing bsal to// gzhig cing 'don to// mi 'chab po// mi sbed do// mi
5b3(80 thu): bsnyen mi bgyid do// de nas de'i tshe sdig pa thams cad ni byang / bsod nams thams cad ni rdzogs te/ dus 'di nas byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du dgongs pi
5b4(80 thu): dbang gis ched du sprul pa ma gtogs par na ma nam zhar zhar che tshe rabs rabs su ngan song gsum la sogs te/ bgegs rigs thams cad du mi skye zhing mi ltung
5b5(80 thu): bar shog cig/ log pa mi dge ba'i las la mi phyogs mi bgyid par shog cig/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu la mi phyogs mi sogs par shog cig/ spad pa'i
5b6(80 thu): lus dang sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu kun las thar nas phyin chad mi myong bar shog cig/ dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du sgo gsum nas
5b7(80 thu): dge ba chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad par shog cig/ tshe rabs gar skyes kyang bde skying phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la
5b8(80 thu): mthu dang dbang yod par shog cig/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' shig gi thugs su chud pa'i chos bla na med pa'i byang chub tu gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya ba'i don de
6a1(80 thu): kho na nyid gang yin pa de bdag gis kyang ma nor bar khong du chud cing bsgoms la/ gzhan dag la yang ma nor bar ston cing 'dren par shog cig/ dus
6a2(80 thu): 'di nas nam byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ste/ bdag nyid lus dbul gyis thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ so
6a3(80 thu): so nas rtag tu bzhes shig/ ji ltar na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
6a4(80 thu): kyis ma zin pa'i chos bdag med pa dang mnyam pa/ thog ma nas ma skyes pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa ltar/ bdag ming 'di zhe
6a5(80 thu): bgyi bas kyang / dus 'di nas nam byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// byang chub kyi sems ni nam gzhar yang mi stor zhing
6a6(80 thu): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa de dang nam yang mi 'bral bar shog cig/ ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas de dag bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang
6a7(80 thu): ba ltar/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo // nam 'chi bar nges pa'i
6a8(80 thu): dus de na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum du mthong nas/ phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ bdag
6b1(80 thu): gi spyi bor bzhag nas lung ston par gyur cig/ bdag gis kyang nyon mongs pas sems mi 'khrul par chos bdag med pa dang mthun pa'i 'dun pa can dang / byang
6b2(80 thu): chub kyi sems tshad med pa dang ldan bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par shog cig/ mdor na ba chags ma lus kun byang nas// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen
6b3(80 thu): yongs rdzogs te// 'gro ba ma lus byin gyis bskal ba'i phyir// bdag nyid myur du mngon par sangs rgyas shig/ dbang skong phyag rgya ba rdzogs so//
6b4(80 thu): bong du dam pa'i chos 'byung ba'i lnga ltas su lha tho tho ri snyan shal gyi sku ring la pho brang yum bu bla mkhar du nam mkha' las babs mi rabs ldan 'di'i don shes
6b5(80 thu): pa 'ong zhes rmi laM du lung bstan te chos kyi dbu rnyings so// // gcig zhus//
1a1(81 the): 'phags pa glang ru lung bstan bzhugaso// /
1b1(81 the): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya shridang+ga byA ka ra Na na ma mahA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa glang ru lung /
1b2(81 the): bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gcig go/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag
1b3(81 the): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum
1b4(81 the): nas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rnam par smin pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brnyes te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ljongs
1b5(81 the): kyi yul gzhan du 'du ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad nas/ yul yangs pa can gyi phyogs thub pa drang srong chen po'i
1b6(81 the): gnas rgyal po'i khab na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems
1b7(81 the): dpa' du ma dang / gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang / mau gal gyi bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /
2a1(81 the): tshangs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa lha du ma dang / lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa 'jig
2a2(81 the): rten skyong ba du ma dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po du ma dang / gnod sbyin mthu chen po mang po dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa la sog
2a3(81 the): pa dri za mang po dang / mi 'ab ci'i rgyal po yid 'ong la sogs mi 'am ci du ma dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa 'dzan
2a4(81 the): bu'i gling gi mi'i rgyal po mang po'i 'khor du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas shAkya thub
2a5(81 the): pas/ phyi ma'i dus kyi yul dge ba la rjes su dgongs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas/ 'khor mang po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs
2a6(81 the): kyi bu byang phyogs logs na/ ri glang ru dang nye ba'i chu bo go ma'i 'gram na/ thub pa drang srong chen po'i pho brang mchod rten go ma sA la gan
2a7(81 the): d+ha zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ der gdon mi za bar bya dgos pa'i 'phrin las shig yod pas/ de gshegs pa'i dus la bab bo// de nas
2b1(81 the): de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor phal po che dang / nam mkha' la 'phags te/ dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa la sogs pa dri za
2b2(81 the): grangs med pa ni mdun na lha'i rol mo sna tshogs byed/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po yid 'ong la sogs pa mi 'am ci du ma ni steng nas mchod pa'i las byed cing / sangs
2b3(81 the): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs dang lha'i skad yid du 'ong bas bstod bzhin du/ 'khor de dag dang mchod pa de dag dang bcas te/ ri glang ru ga la ba der gshes
2b4(81 the): so// gshegs nas lha'i yang lha/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhengs bzhin du zhal byang phyogs su mtsho chen po yun ring po nas rgya mtsho ltar 'dug pa la
2b5(81 the): gzigs te/ sku drang por bsrangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba phrag brgya steng du ma la snyoms par zhugs te/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum nas/
2b6(81 the): bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa smon lam dang / bsod nams mngon sum du mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri glang ru
2b7(81 the): dang / yul dge ba dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor nas/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du byin gyis brlabs te/ bsrung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bkra shis dang / mtshams
2b8(81 the): bcad pa dang / zlas brjod dang dge bar mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/
3a1(81 the): ri glang ru bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang / mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha dang bcas pa yul dge ba dang bcas pa 'di ni bskal pa
3a2(81 the): bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi phyag mtshan dang / ma 'dres pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa dang dben pa yin te/ rgyu des na
3a3(81 the): yul 'di dge ba zhes bya'o// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul dge ba dang / ma'ang dge bcan dang/
3a4(81 the): 'dun so so'i kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / dgon pa'i gnas dang / yul der so so nas bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba byed par
3a5(81 the): 'gyur ba'i rgyal po dang / chos dang ldan pa'i dad pa can dang sbyin bdag dang li yul thams cad lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
3a6(81 the): sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i yul 'dir/ ci nas kyang sems can rnams
3a7(81 the): dam pa chen po myur du thob par 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis rlobs shig/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mtsho rol nas cung zad cig slar
3a8(81 the): bkye ste/ ri'i mod la ri glang ru'i steng du gdan khri bshams pa la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs nas/ gal nub phyogs su bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten goms
3b1(81 the): la ga tug la ba de logs su gzigs so// de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri mngon par shes pa lnga dang
3b2(81 the): ldan pa'i drang srong mang po dang thabs cig tu bcom ldan 'das gnab de logs su lhags so// lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten goms
3b3(81 the): la gan d+ha la yang phyag 'tshal/ skyabs su song / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la'ang phyag 'tshal skyabs su song nas phyogs gcig tu
3b4(81 the): 'khod do// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor phal po che 'dus par mkhyen nas/ 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces dka' stsal to//
3b5(81 the): bskal pa bzang po 'di la sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung ste/ de dag gis kyang mchod rten go ma sa la gan d+ha yul dang bcas pa byin gyis
3b6(81 the): brlabs so// bskal pa bzang po 'di la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang / sangs rgyas stong rtsa gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang
3b7(81 the): bcas te 'dir gshegs nas/ mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha yul dang bcas pa byin gyis rlob cing / mtshams bcad pa dang / bkra shis dang / dge bar
3b8(81 the): mdzad par 'gyur ro// nga yang da ltar byin gyis rlob pa'i dus la bab pas byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
4a1(81 the): 'das ting nge 'dzin da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge
4a2(81 the): 'dzin grangs med pa la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / bsam gtan pa rnams yongs su spyod par byed
4a3(81 the): la/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen gyis kyang sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs te/ yul de byung bar gyur pa'i tshe bdag gi gzugs brnyan byed
4a4(81 the): par 'gyur bar sa gzhi de byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du smon lam chen pos gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas kyang / ri glang ru
4a5(81 the): la gtsug lag khang spong byed ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der brnyen pa byed pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du nam
4a6(81 the): mkha' ltar stobs dpag tu med pa byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos kyang gtsug lag khang 'jigs tshogs spong byed ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi
4a7(81 the): de mchod gnas su 'gyur bar byin gyis brlangs so// de bzhin du thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
4a8(81 the): kyang / gtsug lag khang 'od can zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der dngos grub 'grub par byin gyis rlabs so// de bzhin du rtag tu byams pa dang ldan
4b1(81 the): pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang gtsug lag khang gi so notsa zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gni dang bdag nyid bzhugs par byin gyis
4b2(81 the): brlabs so// de bzhin du spyod pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos kyang gtsug lag khang ye shes ri zhes bya ba 'byung bar
4b3(81 the): 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi de la phyag bya bar 'os par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams sgrol bar mdzad pa la thogs brdugs mi
4b4(81 the): mnga' bar 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal pos kyang gtsug lag khang pa no tse zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der dngos grub 'grub
4b5(81 the): par byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kyang gtsug lag khang dge 'dun skyong zhes bya
4b6(81 the): ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa byang chub sems
4b7(81 the): dpa' gzhan dag dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang li yul gang dang gang du gtsug lag khang dang / dgra bcom pa chen po rnams kyis kyang li yul gang
4b8(81 the): dang gang du gtsug lag 'ang dang / skyed mos tshal dang / dgon pa'i gnas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs thams cad dper na zla ba nya gang ba la skar ma'i
5a1(81 the): tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas steng gi bar snang la rgyu ba bzhin du mdzes pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / rgyas pa dang /
5a2(81 the): dga' ba ltar 'dug par byin gyis brlabs so// yang de'i tshe ri glang ru la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
5a3(81 the): sems dpa chen po rnams dang / dgra bcom pa chen po rnams kyis 'ong nger rnam pa sna tshogs du ma kyibs la yul thams cad snang bachen pos rgyab
5a4(81 the): byas so// de nas skad cig de nyid la rgya mtsho chen po de'i nang na pad+ma sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum byung bar gyur to// pad+ma re re'i steng na yang sangs rgyas dang byang
5a5(81 the): chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs 'od dang bcas pa snang bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe lha rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu mthong nas/ sangs rgyas
5a6(81 the): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mtsho nang na pad+ma sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum sangs rgyas dang /
5a7(81 the): byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs dang bcas te byung ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul 'di nyid du pad+ma ji snyed pa'i dgon pa'i gnas dang / gtsug lag khang na
5a8(81 the): gaN+DI brdung bar 'gyur ba dang / gnas gang dang gang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams 'ong zer rnam pas chos
5b1(81 the): bskyed cing / yul byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa gzhi de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang mchod rten goms la gan d+ha yul dge ba dang bcas pa byin gyis rlangs
5b2(81 the): pa'i gzhi 'dir dad pa can gyi sbyin bdag rnams kyis so so nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed par 'gyur zhing gnas de dang de dag tu bsnyen pa
5b3(81 the): byas na ci 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas yin no// yang de'i tshe lha rnams spyan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun
5b4(81 the): pa bcom ldan 'das yul 'di ji tsam zhig na ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ su zhig gis ni 'byin par bgyid pa lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar ni
5b5(81 the): dgon pa chab chen po'i gter lags na/ su zhig gis ni ji ltar 'byin pa bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
5b6(81 the): bu nyon cig nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa'i tshe/ rgyu'i yul nas rgya'i rgyal po ca yang zhes bya ba bu stong tshang bar 'dog pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur
5b7(81 the): te/ bu re re yang yul re re gsar du tshol du bcug go// phyis nub phyogs na ri glang ru dang bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten go mas la gan d+ha yod pa'i yul
5b8(81 the): de bzhin gshegs pa du mas byin gyis brlabs pa zhig yod do zhes thos nas/ 'di snyam du ma la bdag la bu gcig yod na/ sangs rgyas phal po ches byin gyis
6a1(81 the): brlabs pa'i gnas der yul 'debs su gzhug go snyam du bsams nas/ de'i tshe rgya'i rgyal pos rnam thos kyi bul bu gcig bslangs
6a2(81 the): so// rnam thos kyi bus kyang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na rgyal po mya ngan med ces bya ba'i bu gcig btsas pa byin te/ bu de ni gzugs bzang ba dbyings mdzes pa/
6a3(81 the): lha na sdug pa zhig yin no// bu de'i don du sa las nu ma zhig byung ba dang / bu de sngon gyi bsod nams dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus num de la nu bar byed pas de nas bu de'i
6a4(81 the): ming sa las nu ma nu zhes bya'o// bu de myur bar skyes nas/ brgya'i rgyal pos rgyal srid kyi dbang ni bskur/ nor mang po ni byin/ blon po phal mo che ni lus kyi
6a5(81 the): rim gro bar bskos nas/ rgyal bu sa las nu ma nu de blon po chen po dzang sho zhes bya ba la sogs pa dmag du ma dang lhan cig tu rgyu'i yul nas byung
6a6(81 the): ste yul 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs nas 'dir yul 'debs par 'gyur te/ rgyal po sa las nu ma nu des yul btab pa'i phyir/ rgyu des na
6a7(81 the): yul 'di'i ming sa las nu ma nu'i yul zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// dus de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs nas rgya gar gyis mi phal mo che 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/
6a8(81 the): rgyal po sa las nu ma nu'i 'bangs su mchid kyis 'tshal zhing / chu srang gcig pa du mar gyur nas/ rgya'i blon po chen po dzang sho la sogs pas rim gyis
6b1(81 the): rgya dang rgya gar gyi grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal 'debs par 'gyur ro// de ltar rgyal pos las num nu des mi rabs du ma'i bar du yul 'di'i rgyal po byed/
6b2(81 the): par 'gyur ro// rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang rim gyis so so nas yul 'dir dgon pa'i gnas dang / gtsug lag khang byas nas zhing chu dang 'brangs dang zhal ta
6b3(81 the): byed pa yang 'bul zhing / la la yang bdag nyid kyang rab tu 'byung bar byed do// la la ni bu dang bu mo rab tu 'byin par byed do// la la ni 'bangs las grangs
6b4(81 the): med pa zhig rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar byed do// yul 'dir mi byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can mang po zhig 'byung ste/ rtag tu dkon mchog gsum las
6b5(81 the): dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs shing bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po byed par 'gyur ro// de ltar na yul 'di ni rgyal po sa las nu ma nus yul gtod pa'i tshul de lta bus
6b6(81 the): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yul 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba re re'i tshe yang byung zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir yul gzhan dang gzhan dag zhig nas yun ring mo zhig
6b7(81 the): tu stongs zhing dgon par 'dug la yul dge ba ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba re re'i tshe mi rnams kyis brgyan cing mdzes par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di ltar yul 'di na thub pa drang /
6b8(81 the): sring chen po'i gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mchod rten gom sA la gan d+ha zhes bya ba/ ri glang ru dang nye ba chu bo go ma'i 'gram na yod pa'i phyir ro//
7a1(81 the): mchod rten 'di mdo sde'i nang nas ni ming go ma sA la gan d+ha zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten phal gyi yang tha snyad du ni chu bo go ma'i 'gram zhes bya
7a2(81 the): bar 'dogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar ji srid du mchod rten chu bo go ma'i 'gram zhes bya ba dang / 'od srung gi mchod rten 'di nyis rgyas shing mchod gnas su byed
7a3(81 the): pa de srid du ni yul dge ba yang rgyas shing bzang por 'gyur ro// nam mchod rten 'di gnyis rgud pa'i tshe yul yang chud cing stongs par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe
7a4(81 the): 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i gsung de thos nas/ mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha dang / ri glang rul dad pa
7a5(81 the): dang gus pa chen po rnyed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal skyabs su song nas/ spyan sngar 'di skad du bdag cag kyang dus de'i tshe yul
7a6(81 the): 'dir rigs mthon por skyes nas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung zhing / yul chos kyi bka' khrims mi nyams par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab
7a7(81 the): bo/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes can zhes bya ba dang / lha'i lha
7a8(81 the): mi pham pa zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po khyim tshig ces bya ba dang / lha nam mkha'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang / lha gser gyi phreng ba can zhes bya ba dang / lha mo lpags
7b1(81 the): gya cas zhes bya ba dang / lha po gnas can zhes bya ba rnams la 'di sa dpas bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyed rnams la mchod rte goms lag
7b2(81 the): dang / ri glang du yul dang bcas pa dang / nga'i bstan pa dang sras rnams yongs su gtad kyis yongs su bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / dbyung bang
7b3(81 the): mchod gnas su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul 'di'i rgyal po dang / yul 'dzin pa'i blon po dang / sbyin bdag chos dang mthun pa rnams kyang yongs su gtad kyis
7b4(81 the): de bzhin du gyis shig/ ri glang rur lung bstan pa'i mdo 'di yang yongs su gtad kyis 'phel zhing rgyas par gyis shig/ gang gi tshe yul 'di me 'am/ chu 'am pa
7b5(81 the): rol gyi dmag gis nyan cing phongs par gyur pa na/ mdo 'di klag pa dang / kha ton dang mchod pa dang / bsam pa dang bsgom pa byas na/ des na yul de'i gnod pa
7b6(81 the): zhi bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yul 'dir sum pa rnams dang / bod rnams 'ong bar 'gyur gyis/
7b7(81 the): de'i tshe mdo 'di ldogs shig dang / mdo 'di bos nas mdo 'di'i mthu dang / lha rnams kyi byin gyis dad pa med pa de rnams yul 'jig par byed cing yid kyang 'gyod/
7b8(81 the): par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul 'dir rgya rnams kyang 'ong bar 'gyur gyis/ de'i tshe mdo 'di lhogs shig dang / mdo 'di thos nas de dag dad pa skye bar
8a1(81 the): 'gyur ro// dad pa'i stobs kyis yul mi 'jig cing phyir zhing bsrung ba dang / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang byed par 'gyur
8a2(81 the): te/ rgyu des na mdo 'di ni yul la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no// mdo 'di'i phan yon gzhan yang mang du yod de/ yun thung ngus ni brjod par mi nus so// /
8a3(81 the): de'i phyir mdo 'di khyed rnams la yongs su gtad do// de nas de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa lha rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po dang / lha mo de dag thams cad
8a4(81 the): 'khor dang bcas te langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
8a5(81 the): ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos len par 'tshal lo// yang gsol pa/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad
8a6(81 the): bka' stsal pa bzhin du mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha dang / ri glang ru yul dang bcas pa thams cad kyang yongs su bsrung bar 'tshal/ bde bar gshegs pa'i
8a7(81 the): bstan pa dang / chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal po dang / rab tu byung ba dang / chos dang mthun par yul 'dzin pa dang / chos dang mthun pa'i sbyin bdag dang gang
8a8(81 the): zhig bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bgyid par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su bsrung bar ni 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das ji srid du yul 'dir dkon
8b1(81 the): mchog gsum mchod gnas su bgyid pa dang / yul 'dzin pas kyang chos dang mthun par yul skyong zhing / chos dang mi mthun pa'i sems can rnams kyi
8b2(81 the): mgon mi bgyid pa de srid du ni/ bdag cag gis yongs su bsrung bar rngo thogs ste// mdo 'di yang li yul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ li yul
8b3(81 the): las nyi 'og tu gyu pa'i rgyal po dang / blon po rnams la mdo 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis li yul gyi ched du ri glang ru la bshad pa yin no zhes rnar grag par bgyi/
8b4(81 the): sug par thob par bgyi/ sems bsgyur bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das nam yul 'dir dkon mchog gsum mchod gnas su mi bgyid cing / chos dang mi
8b5(81 the): mthun pa rnams kyi mgon lhag par bgyid pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag rnams kyi gzi brjid dang mthu stobs nyams par 'gyur bas/ yul 'di'i cha thang bsrung bar ni rngo mi
8b6(81 the): thog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag cag gi mthu stobs dang / gzi brjid ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / chos dang mthun par yang yul tshul bzhin du
8b7(81 the): skyong ba dang / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'phel bar 'gyur lags so// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdan las
8b8(81 the): bzhengs nas ri glang ru'i steng gi 'gram nas/ mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha gang na ba de logs su gzigs nas/ yang nas yang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul
9a1(81 the): mchod rten gom sA la gan d+ha dang / ri glang ru yul dang bcas pa lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du byin gyis brlabs nas/ li yul/
9a2(81 the): thams cad dang / mtsho'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can grangs med pa rnams la 'od zer dang thugs rje chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ 'od zer de dang thugs rje chen po
9a3(81 the): des chu na gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal ni zhi bar gyur/ khro ba dang khon du 'dzin pa dang ni bral te/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur
9a4(81 the): cing lha'i bde ba dang ldan nas skad cig de nyid la sems can de dag las grangs med pa zhig tshe 'phos nas lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ sangs rgyas nyid
9a5(81 the): du gyur pa'i sa bon rnyed cing / byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams la lan gsum gyi bar du bos
9a6(81 the): nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyed kyis dam bcas pa rnams ni brtson 'grus med par mi 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa grangs med pa
9a7(81 the): gsum gyi bar du bka' ba spyod pa'i bstan pa 'di dang / mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha yul dang bcas pa khyed rnams la yongs su gtad kyis yongs su srungs
