9a8(81 the): shig/ khyed rnams las gang rjes su dran zhing gzungs yod pa dang / bstan pa bsrung ba des ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba rnams yongs su 'asrung bar gyis
9b1(81 the): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi khyim pa la la zhig lo brgya'i bar du nyin re zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams chen po byed la/ 'ga' zhig nyin gcig rab tu byung nas
9b2(81 the): bstan pa la gnas na/ snga mas phyi ma'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang mi chog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang sngar
9b3(81 the): khyim gyi gnas spangs te rab tu byung nas spyod lam de nyid kyis byang chub chen po brnyes so// nga yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs te sa bcu brnyes nas/ srid/
9b4(81 the): pa tha ma'i tshen ma phyed na rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste nags tshal du gshegs so// nags tshal nas bzhon pa rgyal po yab kyi thog tu bkri nas/ rang gi sgra ral gris
9b5(81 the): bregs te/ nga'i gos gya nom pa rin thang med pa rngon pa la chos gos ngur smrig tu brjes so// ngas chos gos de gyon nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la
9b6(81 the): phyag 'tshal skyabs su song nas rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam bzung ba dang / lha thams cad la phyag 'tshal skyabs su song nas phyi bzhin du byung ngo // nga yang spyod lam de
9b7(81 the): nyid kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brnyes so// de'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni dam pa yin par shes par bya rab tu byung ba ni bsod nams
9b8(81 the): dang ldan par shes par bya'o// 'jig rten na khyim pas thob pa ma gtogs par khyim pa'i cha lugs kyis dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ bla na
10a1(81 the): med pa'i byang chub thob pa ni sus kyang ma thos ma mthong ngo // rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam 'di ni 'jig rten na/ lha la sogs pa thams cad
10a2(81 the): kyi mchod gnas yin no// de nas de'i tshe lha dang lha mo de thams cad stan las langs nas dbyangs gcig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
10a3(81 the): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal zhing / bsams bzhin du
10a4(81 the): ni bka' las 'gal ba mi 'tshal lo// yul 'di sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mchod rten dang bcas pa yang kun du
10a5(81 the): bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang rjes su gzung bar 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bdag cag rnams la mthu btang du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
10a6(81 the): ma 'ongs pa rtsod pa'i dus na/ byin gyis brlabs brlabs pa'i yul 'dir dgra mang po dang ma dad pa dang / phyir rgol ba bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la
10a7(81 the): dad pa'i khyad par mi rnyed cing / bstan pa gzhig pa'i slad du brtson pa dag 'byung ba'i slad du'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la legs so
10a8(81 the): zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa rnams legs so legs so// ngas kyang yul 'di byin gyis brlabs zin te/ byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid kyis mtshams
10b1(81 the): bcad pa ma yin no// ma 'ongs pa rtsod pa'i dus na/ yul 'di gzhim pa'i phyir sum pa'i dmag phal mo che dang / dru gu rus sna tshogs dang / hor dang / gzhan
10b2(81 the): yang dad pa med pa dag 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe yul gzhan dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byin gyis brlabs pa dag yul 'dir
10b3(81 the): gshegs nas yul gyi mtshams bsrung bar mdzad de/ bsod nams kyi stobs des na/ yul 'di gtan rlag par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan de dag gi phyi
10b4(81 the): bzhin du byang chu sems dpa' dang / lha dang klu mthu stobs dang ldan pa mang po dag 'ong zhing yul du gnod pa rnams zlog par byed/ dgra rnams kyis yul mi
10b5(81 the): choms par byed de/ bde ba can zhes bya ba'i mkhar nas de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzugs brnyan gshegs nas/ nub phyogs mkhar
10b6(81 the): ko sheng du bzhugs shing yul gyi mtshams bsrung bar 'gyur ro// byang phyogs su yul she na zha zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan she na zha zhes
10b7(81 the): bya ba'i sa'i 'og nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / yul gyi sa mtshams bsrung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan ka'i lang zhes bya ba
10b8(81 the): gshegs nas/ shar phyogs su yul bye ma zhes bya ba'i mkhar du bzhugs shing yul gyis mtshams bsrung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
11a1(81 the): brnyan phyi se zhes bya ba gshegs nas/ byang phyogs kyi ri glang ru la 'od srungs kyi mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs shing / dge slong dgon pa pa
11a2(81 the): rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang yul gyis mtshams bsrung bar 'gyur ro// mkhar dge ba can bya ba'i nang /
11a3(81 the): tshed dus kas de ze zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rgyal po'i pho brang gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs shing mkhar dge ba yul dang bcas
11a4(81 the): pa'i sa mtshams bsru bar 'gyur ro// sa gzhi nyo mo nya zhes bya ba gang du rgyal po yo la zhes bya bas mkhar rtsig pa'i gros byed par 'gyur ba der/ de bzhin
11a5(81 the): gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bcu gor pan zhes bya ba bzhugs shing mkhar dge ba can zhes bya ba yul dang bcas pa'i sa mtshams bsrung bar 'gyur ro//
11a6(81 the): gtsug lag khang di dz+ya zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi gzugs brnyan thor khung du byas pa gshegs par 'gyur te/ gzugs brnyan de ni
11a7(81 the): 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzugs brnyan thor khung du byas pa thams cad kyi thog mar byung ba yin no// gzugs brnyan li rnams kyis ni mtshan bskor ba'i mar me mdzad
11a8(81 the): ces bya bar 'dogs par 'gyur te/ de ni li yul gyi gzugs brnyan por khong du byed pa thams cad kyi dper 'byung zhing / bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa yul dang
11b1(81 the): bcas pa yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi gzugs brlan yul 'di'i dbus su gshegs nas/ phyogs bcu'i
11b2(81 the): mtshams gcod par mdzad de/ ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan phyogs phyogs na bzhugs pa de dag mchod gnas su byed pa de srid du yul 'di
11b3(81 the): rlag par mi 'gyur ro// yul 'di nas skyes pa'i mi dang yul gzhan nas skyes pa'i mi la la zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan de dag la snying
11b4(81 the): thag pa nas dad pa dang gus pa dang rab tu dang bar byed cing 'di snyam du bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan 'di dag ni yul 'di bsrung ba'i slad du gshegs
11b5(81 the): so snyam du yang sems na/ gzugs brnyan de dag kyang sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzhin du don mdzad par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs brnyan de dag nga dang dus
11b6(81 the): gsum du rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang yul 'dir nga'i gzugs brnyan chen po shing rtas 'dren pa byas
11b7(81 the): te mkhar dge ba can zhes bya ba'i nang du bzhag nas mchod gnas chen por byed par 'gyur ro// des na yul 'dir phyogs dang phyogs mtshams nas/ tshong
11b8(81 the): dpon chen po rnams 'ong bar 'gyur zhing gnod pa rnams kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yul 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan nyis brgya rtsa brgyad
12a1(81 the): 'od srungs gi mchod rten dang bcas pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang cho 'phrul chen po ston cing sems can rnams kyi sdig pa chen
12a2(81 the): po yongs su sbyong ba dang / gnod pa sel bar mdzad par 'gyur ro// yul 'dir gnod pa dang 'jigs pa dang skrag pa 'ga' zhig 'byung na/ yul 'di ched du phyogs
12a3(81 the): lngar sbyor ba byas te/ rgyal po dang blon po yul 'dzin pa dang / gang gzhi 'dzin pa dang bral bar bya ba'i bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa las bsod nams
12a4(81 the): bskyed par 'dod na/ gtsug lag khang tshar ma zhes bya bar bsod nams bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'di'i mi rnams kyi dad pa dang yang dag pa'i
12a5(81 the): lta ba ni dang po'i gtsug lag khang de nas skye bar 'gyur ro// nam zhig la la'i rgyal po dang blon po dang / yul 'dzin pa rnams la gnod pa rnam pa
12a6(81 the): sna tshogs shig byung na/ ri glang ru la sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na bzhugs/ bzhugs pa'i gzhi de la bskor bar bya'o/ yul
12a7(81 the): 'di'i sems can rnams las mi dge ba 'chags par 'dod na/ mchod rten go ma sa la gan d+ha'i drung du bshegs par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod rten de ni
12a8(81 the): sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzhin du gang dag gis bskor ba 'am/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'i dbyangs sam/ rol mo'i sgras mchod pa byas pa de'i mtshams med pa
12b1(81 the): lnga yang nyams dmas par 'gyur na/ gzhan lta spos kyang ci dgos/ yul 'di'i rgyal po dang blon po dang / yul 'dzin pa gang zhig brtul zhugs chen po'i
12b2(81 the): sdom pa len par 'dod pa des/ ri glang ru gang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan phyi se zhes bya ba dang / 'od srungs gi mchod rten yod pa'i de'i dge
12b3(81 the): 'dun las nod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'dir chos kyi spyod pa de yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni de nas 'byung bar
12b4(81 the): 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// yul 'di'i mi la la zhig chad pa chen po la thug na/ des ri glang ru la gnas pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar byas te/
12b5(81 the): des na chad pa de las thar bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnas de ni thar pa thob pa stong phrag du ma'i phyi ma'i mtha'i bar du gnas shing mi stongs pa'i phyir te/
12b6(81 the): rgyu des na ri glang ru dang mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha yul dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lcags kyu yin no// de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs
12b7(81 the): rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gan ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ dbyangs gcig tu 'di skad ces
12b8(81 the): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang thabs sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul dang / yul 'di yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ bsrung
13a1(81 the): bar bgyi zhing ji srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la gnas shing / rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa mi'i/
13a2(81 the): tshul khrims dang ldan pa dad pa can dang yul chos dang mthun par bgyid pa mchis pa de srid du yongs su mi gtong zhing yul 'dir dus dus su spyod lam dang /
13a3(81 the): cha lugs ci dang ci lta bus sems can mang po'i bsod nams chen po yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas nyi du sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bsam
13a4(81 the): gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skye ba blang ba'i slad du/ kha cig gis ni
13a5(81 the): rgyal rigs yongs su bzung bar bgyi/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ba dang / khyim pa gzhan gyi cha lugs yongs su bzung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
13a6(81 the): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis 'di ltar bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul dang / yul
13a7(81 the): 'di gang du sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur chu gang thob cig/ yang de'i tshe lha rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / mi pham pa
13a8(81 the): zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
13b1(81 the): rnams kyi yul 'di bsrung ba'i slad du mthu btangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mthus bdag cag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs
13b2(81 the): pa'i spyod yul dang / byin gyis brlabs brlabs pa'i yul 'di kun du bsrung zhing yal bar mi gtang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ brtson 'grus chen po'i shug
13b3(81 the): kyis 'bad par 'tshal lo// gal te yul 'dir dru gu la sogs pa gtum po dad pa ma mchis pa rnams dang // hor dang sum pa'i dmag dag mchi bar 'gyur
13b4(81 the): na/ de dag phan tshun nang 'khrug 'byung ba dang / de dag gi 'khor nang mi mthun par 'gyur ba dang 'gum par 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yang na de dag ci nas kyang 'dir mchi
13b5(81 the): zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'jig mi nus par bgyi ba'i slad du/ gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur bar bgyi'o// gal te rgya'i dmag dag mchis par gyur na/ de dag
13b6(81 the): gi sems dad par bgyi zhing slar yul 'di la phan 'dogs pa dang / phyis yul 'dir bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba rgya chen po bgyid du stsal to// nam zhig
13b7(81 the): yul 'di'i sems can rnams la gnod pa bgyid pa de'i tshe na yang phyir dad par bgyi zhing / mdo 'di yang khong du chud par bgyid du stsal to// gang gi tshe de dag ma
13b8(81 the): 'ongs par dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad la dbang 'tshal zhing / mang du 'phrog pa dang / sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe ba de'i tshe ni/ bdag
14a1(81 the): cag gi 'khor gnod sbyin dad pa can dang / dad pa ma mchis pa du ma zhig dbang bskur te bkye nas yul der ci nas kyang yun ring mo zhig gi bar du/
14a2(81 the): 5/ rgud par bgyi zhing / yul 'di 'jig mi nus par bgyi ba'i slad du mu ge dang nad dang pha rol gyi dmag mchi bar bgyid du stsal to// li yul gyi nor rdzas de dag
14a3(81 the): gis 'tshal ba rnams kyang bkra mi shis par bgyi zhing / gang dang gang du phyin pa'i yul de thams cad du yang sman yon mi thogs shing 'khrug par bgyi'o// de dag
14a4(81 the): gi yul 'dzin pa dang / dmag dpon yang rgud par bgyi'o// bod kyi dmag rnams la yang de bzhin du rig par bgyi ste/ de gang gi tshe de dag chos dang mthun par
14a5(81 the): yul 'di 'dzin cing bsrung na ni bdag cag rnams kyis kyang de dag yongs su bskyang zhing rgyal bar 'gyur bar bgyi'o// nam zhig de dag bde bar gshegs
14a6(81 the): pa'i bstan pa 'jig pa dang / yul gyi mi la gnod par bgyid pa de'i tshe ni dmag rnams nang 'khrug 'byung ba dang / dpag gi dpon po yang tshe thung du rgud par bgyi
14a7(81 the): ste rgyas par ni snga ma bzhin no// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul 'di'i rgyal po dang / blon po sems gya gyu can bsod nams chung ba dad pa med pa dkon mchog gsum gyi
14a8(81 the): dkor la 'jol cog tu rlom zhing yul gyi rtsis 'go dang 'gal bar bgyid pa/ nor rdzas ma brtags pas go 'chang 'tshol ba/ sems can bsod nams dang ldan
14b1(81 the): pa rnams sun 'byin du rgol ba ngo tsha med pa rngan dus can 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis ngoms mi myong ba/ rab tu 'byung ba dag gis sems skyo ba la la dag 'byung /
14b2(81 the): bar 'gyur na/ de dag ni bdag cag gis kyang yul 'di nas 'byung ba zhig/ yul ngan pa gzhan dag tu skrag par bgyi ste/ tshul de lta bus yul 'di yongs su
14b3(81 the): bskyang ba dang bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das slad ma rtsod pa'i dus na yul 'di gzhig par brtson pa'i sems can bdud kyi phyogs sdig par 'gyid pa'i
14b4(81 the): mthu stobs dang ldan pa/ yul dag tu sems can rnams kyi dad pa zlog par bgyid pa/ sems 'dug cing rung ba'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dum
14b5(81 the): zhig 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de dag kyang bdag cag gi dbang du mi 'gyur na/ de la bdag gis thabs ji ltar 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
14b6(81 the): rigs kyi bu khyed yid skyo bar ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gling bzhi pa 'di na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha mthu stobs che ba dang / klu dang gnod
14b7(81 the): sbyin sa thob pa du ma zhig gnas pa de dag la sems 'jam pos mchod pa chen po byas te/ mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha dang / gtsug lag khang tshar ma la sogs
14b8(81 the): po yul byin gyis brlabs brlabs pa rnams su theg pa chen po'i sde snod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas phal po che dang / dkon
15a1(81 the): mchog brtsegs pa/ shin du rgyas pa'i sde mang po lhogs shig dang / yul so so nas byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la sogs pa dang /
15a2(81 the): mthu stobs chen po'i sems can de dag yul 'dir 'ongs nas chos kyi ro mnos shing / dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig las mi
15a3(81 the): 'gal bar byed/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul dang / yul yang srung bar byed/ yul 'di'i mi dang bstan pa yang srung bar byed par 'gyur ro//
15a4(81 the): gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ yul dge ba 'di'i rgyal po mthu chung bar 'gyur te/ mthu chung ba des na rang gi mthu stobs kyis yul mi thub pas rgyal po dad pa can
15a5(81 the): gzhan 'di lta ste/ bod kyi rgyal po dang rgya'i rgyal po la sogs pa la skyabs btsal nas yul srung bar byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgya dang bod kyi
15a6(81 the): yul du dkon mchog gsum gnas shing mchod gnas chen por byed pa dang / yul de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnas su 'gyur zhing /
15a7(81 the): sems can de dag kyang byang chub chen po'i lam tshol ba'i ngang tshul can/ theg pa chen po la dang pa ting nge 'dzin la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi mthu stobs kyis 'i/
15a8(81 the): yul gyi mi dang / dkon mchog gsum brlag par mi 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyis kyang bod dang rgya'i rgyal po dang blon po dag ci nas kyang mchod rte/
15b1(81 the): go ma sA la gan d+ha dang yul dge ba 'di la ri mor byed par 'gyur ba dang / yul 'dir bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba rgya chen po byed par 'gyur ba dang /
15b2(81 the): yul 'di'i mi nyi 'og dad pa med pa'i yul gzhan du 'khyams pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal dang bral zhing bde bar rang gi yul du bskyal nas/ phyir
15b3(81 the): yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang / bsod nams la dga' bar 'gyur bar sems sgyur cig dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i stobs kyis skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyi
15b4(81 the): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / mdangs dang gzi brjid dang / 'khor 'phel bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas nyid du yang nye bar 'gyur gyis/ dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin
15b5(81 the): gshegs pa rnams kyi gdams ngag la byas pa gzo bar gyis shig/ 'di ltar yul 'di'i sems can rnams phyir mi ldog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
15b6(81 the): las dang ldan pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang ldan pa/ gtong phod pa/ phrag dog dang khon du 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/ byas pa gzo ba/ chos
15b7(81 the): la dga' ba/ yang dag par lta ba can/ leg pa'i lta ba thams cad rnam par spangs pa/ sems 'jam par 'gyur te/ rgyu des na dge ba rnams zhes
15b8(81 the): bya'o// yul 'di'i mkhar yang mi byams pa dang / 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang du mas brgyan par 'gyur/
16a1(81 the): te/ de'i phyir mkhar dge ba can zhes bya'o// gzhan yang yul gzhan dag nas sems can dad pa med pa/ sdang ba khon du 'dzin/
16a2(81 the): pa dag yul 'dir 'ongs pa kun yul 'di'i rdul gyis reg cing / yul 'di nas 'khrungs pa'i mtsho ba la longs spyod na/ de dag thams cad kyis sems bsgyur
16a3(81 the): nas/ sems 'jam pa dang / mnyen pa dang / byams pa'i bsam pa dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa spangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs phyogs
16a4(81 the): nas lhags pa de dag thams cad sa la gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang nams mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dang / gnod sbyin thams cad sems ngo mtshar du gyur nas rangs pa skyes te/
16a5(81 the): chos kyi sgo mo'i sgra de ga la yid mi phyed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe 'khor de dag gis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam
16a6(81 the): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
16a7(81 the): tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi sgo mo 'di dag ni yul dge ba nas skye ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi
16a8(81 the): ched du yang lhag par byin gyis brlabs nas bstan pa yin te/ chos kyi sgo mo 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshegs chung ngu dang / 'bad pa chung ngus dbang po//
16b1(81 the): dang shes pa yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi sgo mo de dang de dag kyang rtogs par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo de dag ni byis pa chung ngu yan chad chos mngon
16b2(81 the): par rtogs par dga' zhing / rtsed mor yang chos kyi sgo mo 'di dag smra bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag dbang po yongs su brtas pa nas chos kyi mig rnam par dag
16b3(81 the): pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mthong bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rna ba rnam par dag pas chos yang dag pa ma nor ba yang thos par 'gyur/ de dag 'khor ba na 'du
16b4(81 the): byed dang / chos thams cad las kyang sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur te/ sems de lta bu des na yul dgon pa byin gyis brlabs pa 'dir dge ba'i phyogs
16b5(81 the): la brtson pa 'am/ yang na ri glang ru la de dag thams cad dngos grub thob par 'gyur te/ bdud sdig can gyis kyang glags mi rnyed na/ gzhan dag gis lta smos
16b6(81 the): kyang ci dgos/ 'di lta ste/ lha rnams kyis 'khor gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ mi 'am ci chad pas bcad par gyur na'ang / mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha
16b7(81 the): 'am/ ri glang ru la mkhas na de dag gis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mthong na yang sems zhi bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na ri glang ru dang mchod rten gom
16b8(81 the): sA la gan d+ha na mtshams bcad pa dang / gtsang sbra byed pa dang / skyabs dang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang phyag bya ba
17a1(81 the): 'os pa yin no// mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha dang / ri glang ru dang / yul dge ba dang / mkhar dge ba can dang / dgon pa byin gyis
17a2(81 the): brlabs brlabs pa'i ming thos nas dad pa skyes pa tsam gyis kyang sdig pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
17a3(81 the): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis song la/ mtsho chen po 'di sha ri'i grol te/ byang phyogs logs su
17a4(81 the): gyi sho gtsang po'i nang du pho la chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la mi gnod par bsrung ba dang / yul 'dis mtshams mngon par gyis shig/ de nas
17a5(81 the): nyan thos chen po sha ri'i bu dang / rnam thos kyi bus de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las sha ri gang na ba de logs su chas
17a6(81 the): so// shA ri'i bus ni lag na mkhar gsil thogs/ rnam thos kyi bus ni lag na mdung thogs nas sha'i ri phyed snum pas blangs te nub phyogs logs su bzhag nas/ chu
17a7(81 the): srol chen po gtod de/ mtsho srog chags dang bcas pa gyi sho gtsang po'i nang du po ste/ tshul de lta bus mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha dang / ri glang ru dang / li yul de mngon
17a8(81 the): par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang /
17b1(81 the): byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri drang srong dang bcas pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang khyim tshig la sogs pa lnga chen po brgyad 'khor sum khri lnga stong lnga brgya dang bcas pa
17b2(81 the): la mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha la sogs pa yongs su gtad de/ lha de dag gis kyang de bzhin du mnos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin du mnos
17b3(81 the): so/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dad pa dang yang yul 'dir sdig pa mi byed par 'gyur te/ yul 'di ni yon tan mang po de dag dang ldan pa yin no// de nas de'i
17b4(81 the): tshe sngar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum gyi bar du byin gyis brlabs nas 'od zer thugs rje chen po dang bcas te/ bkye ba des chun gnas pa'i
17b5(81 the): sems can rnams kyis sems yongs su dag pa dang bde ba dang ldan par byas nas chu'i nang nas slar 'thon te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
17b6(81 the): cad du khyab par gyur to// yang 'od zer de dag slar log nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yul byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nyan thos chen po rnam
17b7(81 the): kyis yul byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mtsho'i nang nas byung ba'i pad+ma'i steng na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa de dang de dag gi 'od zer
17b8(81 the): dang 'dres nas nam mkha' la phags te/ steng gi nam mkha' khebs par gyur cing / li yul thams cad du lha'i me tog gi char bab bo// lha'i me tog de dag phan tshun du
18a1(81 the): reg pa las chos kyi sgo mo 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi mtshan dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / shes rab dang / tshul
18a2(81 the): khrims dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' ba spyad pa dang / smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems can yod/
18a3(81 the): su smin par byed pa dang / dge slong gi 'bras bu bzhi po rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / khams gsum gyi
18a4(81 the): srid pa las nges par 'byin pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / 'du byed 'jig pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
18a5(81 the): rkang pa dang / bsam gtan dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang dbang po yongs su dag pa/
18a6(81 the): byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos mtha' dag gi sgra 'byin par gyu te/ gzhan yang sems yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang
18a7(81 the): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sa dang stobs dang / thugs rje dang / byams pa chen po dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / the tshom sel ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid las
18a8(81 the): mi ldog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba dang / mi rtag pa dang /
18b1(81 the): sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / ma byas pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / phyin ci log pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
18b2(81 the): stong pa'i khongs su gtogs pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rtogs pa dang / rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so so rang gis rig pa'i spyod yul dang / skye ba dang / sdug
18b3(81 the): bsngal ba dang / rga ba dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa'i sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang 'byung bar gyur to// gzhan
18b4(81 the): yang phung po lnga po dag la sems can med pa dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / srog med pa dang / chos bden pa skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ rtag pa med pa/
18b5(81 the): chad pa med pa/ 'ong ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'gro ba lnga po dag gi 'khrul pa rmi lam lta bu
18b6(81 the): dang / 'khor ba'i 'du byed btson ra lta bu dang / sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / brag cha lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang dad pa dang /
18b7(81 the): mngon par rdzogs pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dge bcu'i las kyi lam dang / 'khor bas skyo ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa brgya stong du ma byung bar gyur to// de nas pa khor 'du/
18b8(81 the): pa mang po de dag la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// babs pa glang du lung bstan pa zhes bya ba
18b9(81 the): theg pa chen po'i ma rdzogs so// zhus pa/ man /
1a1(82 tho): 'phags pa phyogs bcu mun sel bzhugs
1b1(82 tho): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya da sha di ka anat+sA kA ra bi d+hAn sa na nA ma ma hA yan sU tra/ bod skad du/
1b2(82 tho): 'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
1b3(82 tho): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi
1b4(82 tho): nang na/ ser skya'i gnas shing na gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
1b5(82 tho): 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dra
1b6(82 tho): snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs gsol nas lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs
1b7(82 tho): su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du 'dar nas/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la
2a1(82 tho): gshegs so// de'i tshe na shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal zhes bya ba zhig/ bya ba 'ga' zhig gi/
2a2(82 tho): phyir shing rta la zhon nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas phyir byung ba dang / shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis/
2a3(82 tho): xxx
2a4(82 tho): ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
2a5(82 tho): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan
2a6(82 tho): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das la shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
2a7(82 tho): bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gi pha ma gnyis gnyid log pa dang ma log pa dag la mi ma lags pa rnams rnam par 'che bar
2b1(82 tho): bgyid la/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang gang gi ljongs gzhan du mchi ba'i tshe/ bdag la yang chom rkun pa dag rnam par 'che bar bgyid cing / gcan
2b2(82 tho): gzan dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag
2b3(82 tho): la thugs brtse ba'i slad du ci nas kyang bdag la mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa 'ga' yang rnam par 'che bar mi bgyid pa/
2b4(82 tho): de ltar bdag la legs par bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ bsrung ba'i cho ga yang bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya
2b5(82 tho): gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do//
2b6(82 tho): bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol na shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la
2b7(82 tho): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi kham
2b8(82 tho): nyon mongs pa thams cad skyod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su spyod pa zhes
3a1(82 tho): bya ba da lta bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes te/ gzhon nu khyod bya ba 'ga' zhig gi tshe shar phyogs su 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin
3a2(82 tho): gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing song na khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
3a3(82 tho): de'i tshe ma g.yengs par de yid la byas na khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la tshe tshigs su bcad pa
3a4(82 tho): 'di bka' stsal to// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thub pa che// rje la rab tu phyag 'tshal te// rtag tu de ni mngon byed cing // 'gro na khyod la 'jigs mi 'byung //
3a5(82 tho): gzhon nu lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dbu khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang mun nag gi tshogs bcom pa
3a6(82 tho): zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pa yid la mdzad pa rnam grangs bsgrengs
3a7(82 tho): pa dang bag tsha ba dang bral bas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing bzhes so// gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir
3a8(82 tho): phyogs su 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing kyi/
3b1(82 tho): la sogs pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnam par ma g.yangs pa'i yid la byed pas song na/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod
3b2(82 tho): la 'jigs pa gang nas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// khyim gyi bsam pa rnams
3b3(82 tho): dang ni// kun nas ldang ba kun bral zhing // lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur// gzhan nu nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas
3b4(82 tho): kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yul phebs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs/
3b5(82 tho): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kho na dang rgyags pa rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so// gzhon nu khyod
3b6(82 tho): gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas nas sems kyi
3b7(82 tho): rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing zag pa med pa rnam par g.yengs pa dang / dran pas song na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas
3b8(82 tho): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// chos 'ga' skyes pa yod min zhing // 'ga' yang 'gag par mi 'gyur te// gang
4a1(82 tho): gis chos rnams de ltar shes// de la 'jigs pa ci yang med// gzhon nu byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs
4a2(82 tho): rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spobs pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
4a3(82 tho): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gzugs bkod 'od snang zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so// gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang phyogs su
4a4(82 tho): 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yengs
4a5(82 tho): pa'i yid la byed pas song na/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas
4a6(82 tho): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// rtag tu sems can thams cad la// mnyam pa nyid kyi sems su byos// sems
4a7(82 tho): can de la ma brnyas dang // khyod la 'jigs pa 'bru mi 'gyur// gzhon nu byang shar gyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi
4a8(82 tho): zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bdud kyi sde bcom pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
4b1(82 tho): pa'i sangs rgyas bdud dang yid gnyis kun 'joms rnam par gnon zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub
4b2(82 tho): kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa
4b3(82 tho): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog dar mdzad de/ gzhon nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa'i skyes bu'i
4b4(82 tho): rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no// gzhon nu khyed gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang shar gyi phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran
4b5(82 tho): par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yengs pas song na khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par
4b6(82 tho): 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// gang gri
4b7(82 tho): dang po'i thugs kyis ni// bdud rnams pa ma mdzad sangs rgyas de// dran bzhin du ni khyod song na// khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur// gzhon nu
4b8(82 tho): lce'i phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de
5a1(82 tho): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pas phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor
5a2(82 tho): lo 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes so// gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa des dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ sangs
5a3(82 tho): rgyas pa de nyid kyi bar du bar chad med par sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa kun du bsten/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa/ bsam gtan bsgrubs/
5a4(82 tho): shes rab spyad de/ gzhon nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yino// gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar lho'i phyog
5a5(82 tho): su 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te/ phyis khyim nas song zhig dang / khyod la phyis 'gyod pa 'am/ 'jigs
5a6(82 tho): pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam par ma g.yengs pas yid la byed na/ khyod bya ba gang gis phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas
5a7(82 tho): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// yan lag lngas ni phyag 'tshal te// phyis nas khyim nas song zhig dang // chom rkun
5a8(82 tho): rnams kyis khyod kun tu// zil gyis mi non 'gro bar 'gyur// gzhon nu lho nub kyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum khri
5b1(82 tho): 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/
5b2(82 tho): rgyas rin chen gdugs 'phags snang zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes te/ gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir lho nub kyi phyogs su 'gro
5b3(82 tho): na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yengs
5b4(82 tho): pa'i yid la byed pas seng na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas btso
5b5(82 tho): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// me tog sil ma gtor cig dang // khyod ni
5b6(82 tho): lho nub 'gro ba na// 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhon nu nub byang gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung
5b7(82 tho): drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs dag rab gnas mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
5b8(82 tho): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes so// gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs

7a1(82 tho): sems kyang ma btang dang // khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur// gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
7a2(82 tho): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan legs par bzung bar gyis shig/ legs par bcang bar gyis shig/ legs par kun chub par gyis shig
7a3(82 tho): dang / 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba 'am spu zing zhes byed pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad khyod la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa
7a4(82 tho): dang / bcom ldan 'das la shAkya gzhan nu bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
7a5(82 tho): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan rnams bzung lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mun pa ma
7a6(82 tho): mchis shing / bcom ldan 'das bdag gri 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de
7a7(82 tho): dag kyang dper na de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar 'khor rnams la chos ston pa bzhin du mthong ngo // de nas 'khor de las shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal la sogs
7a8(82 tho): paskye bo phal po che'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i
7b1(82 tho): phyir 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i srog chags stong tshang ba de dag thams cad stan langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas
7b2(82 tho): la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
7b3(82 tho): cag gi don gyi srad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la phyogs de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
7b4(82 tho): de dag kyang mun pa ma mchis par gda' la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang dper na/ da ltar
7b5(82 tho): de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa 'di bzhin du gda'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
7b6(82 tho): gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
7b7(82 tho): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
7b8(82 tho): mtshan rnams thos nas mig rnam par dag cing phyogs bcu dag na 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag mchis pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mdzod
8a1(82 tho): ba de dag gi mig rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams de dag bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshe rabs gzhan du tshe 'phos na yang 'bral bar 'gyur
8a2(82 tho): ram 'on te mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo//
8a3(82 tho): gang dag 'di ltar mig rnam par dag pa de dag ni sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid du 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu khyod kyis srog chags stong tshang ba 'di
8a4(82 tho): mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bu 'di dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis re res kyang 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
8a5(82 tho): sbed dag byed du bcug nas/ srid pa tha ma dang / lus tha ma la byang chub kyi tshogs thams cad rdzogs par byas te/ bskal pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa
8a6(82 tho): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan dag pas brgyan pa zhes bya bar mtshan mthun pa sha stag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
8a7(82 tho): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de rnams lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen
8a8(82 tho): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/
8b1(82 tho): 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ ldeg rab tu ldag/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrugs rab
8b2(82 tho): tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// sa bra'i lha rnams kyis kyang kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung
8b3(82 tho): ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bzung zhing chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas/ don thams cad thugasu chud pa'i de
8b4(82 tho): bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar che ste/ su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par mi 'gyur zhes sgra sgrags so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum
8b5(82 tho): cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris rnams dang /
8b6(82 tho): tshangs rnyis rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams nas 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar gyis sa bra'i lha rnams kyi sgra de thos na/
8b7(82 tho): yi rangs shing rab tu dga' la dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di skad ces kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
8b8(82 tho): mtshan rnams bzung ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bzungs shing chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas don thams
9a1(82 tho): cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar che ste/ su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par mi 'gyur zhes smras so//
9a2(82 tho): de nasom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs
9a3(82 tho): kyi bu rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing gzhan
9a4(82 tho): dag 'ar yang dag par ston par byed pa dang / zan glegs bam la bris te 'chang bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag sangs rgyas kyi byin
9a5(82 tho): gyis 'pho pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin par rig par bya'o// de dag la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar rig par bya'o// de dag
9a6(82 tho): gshis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag la chu dang / chom rkun dang / dug dang / mtshon gyi 'jigs pa sa
9a7(82 tho): 'byung ba ches par bya'o// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsrung ba lung bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di shes/
9a8(82 tho): nas tshe ma grangs 'di bzung ba'i phyir lha'i bu stong chang bas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste byin pa dang /
9b1(82 tho): bcom ldarnam kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang srog chags
9b2(82 tho): stong chang rba dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag la lha'i can dan gyi bye ma
9b3(82 tho): dang / rmaH tog man dA ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po rnams kyis mngon par gtor nas bal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
9b4(82 tho): bcom ldanas bdag gis rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / 'chang bar bgyid pa dang / klog par bgyid
9b5(82 tho): pa dang / chub par bgyid pa de dag la bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag khyim na mchis sam/ dgon pa na
9b6(82 tho): mchis shing drung na mchis sam/ khyim stong pa na mchis sam/ 'brog dgon pa na mchis sam/ lam dang lam gol pa na mchis sam/ gnyid log/
9b7(82 tho): gam/ dam log pa dag na yang de dag la pha rol gyi gnod pas 'gus par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/
9b8(82 tho): tshe dang lnga/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs
10a1(82 tho): te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang /
10a2(82 tho): gnas mal dang / snyun gyi rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed na/ kun dga' bo de tsam gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti byas
10a3(82 tho): par mi 'gyur/ bla mar byas par mi 'gyur/ ri mor byas par mi 'gyur/ mchod par byas par mi 'gyur/ gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag
10a4(82 tho): par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin par byed dam/ 'chang bar byed dam/ klog par byed dam/
10a5(82 tho): kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na/ kun dga' bo de tsam gyis ni de
10a6(82 tho): bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti dam pa dang / bla mar bya ba dam pa dang / ri mo dam pa dang / mchod pa dam pas bkur sti byas pa yin/ bla mar byas pa
10a7(82 tho): yin/ ri mor byas pa yin/ mchod pa byas pa yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
10a8(82 tho): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
10b1(82 tho): gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
10b2(82 tho): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya
10b3(82 tho): bar zungs shig/ de bzhin gshegs mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba dang / dngos po med par rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang / mtshan nyid med par rtogs pa zhes
10b4(82 tho): bya bar yang zungs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / srog chags stong tshang ba de dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / dge slong de dag
10b5(82 tho): dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
10b6(82 tho): mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing
10b7(82 tho): ha dang / lots+tsha ba ban+de rtsangs de ben da rak+Shi tas bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis skad gsar bcad kyis bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// mang+ga laM/
10b8(82 tho): tshe dang ldan pa kun dgu lo dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / shAkya gzho nu bzhin rab gsal dang /
1a1(84 du): // che dpag tu med pa'i snying po che'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rin po che che'i sgrub pa che dpag med thams cad kyi snying po rjes bzhug sa//
1b1(84 du): #/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hri da yA nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa che
1b2(84 du): dpag tu med pa'i snying po che'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
1b3(84 du): 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rigs lnga yang yum rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tshe 'dzin pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// che 'gugs
1b4(84 du): pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// che'i pho nya mo rnams dang / yang sbrul grangs med pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
1b5(84 du): lag na rdo rje thams cad du/ tshe dpag tu med pas khyab par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas tshe
1b6(84 du): dang bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa rab tu 'phel ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po
1b7(84 du): 'di gsungs so// oM a yu pu rtse pu N+ye ma hA pu \u0f7f/ a su puH/ dzA sam+b+ha ru ba tsa ya ka ri Ni swA hA/ oM a mr-i te/ a mr-i te/
2a1(84 du): mr-i te trad b+ha da be ra/ a mr-i te sam+b+ha bA/ a mr-i ta bi kran te/ ga ga ni sarba karma kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri Ni swA hA/ oM rat+ne rat+ne/
2a2(84 du): ma hA rat+ne/ rat+na sam+b+ha ba/ rat+na ka ra na rat+na ma la bi shud+d+he ya/ sarba pA paM hUM 'u t+ya ta phaT/ dza hUM baM ho b+ha ga wan tsa tshar e h+ye hi sa ma sa s+t+waM/
2a3(84 du): sa me yeb+da/ pre ta~M dadu d+hu/ oMs po rtsi mA ti ta / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sring po rigs sngags 'di da kyi smra dang /
2a4(84 du): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM puN+ye puN+ye/ ma hA puN+ye/ a pa ri mi ta puN+ye/ a yu pu N+ye/ dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ru pa tsi te swA hA/
2a5(84 du): oM ting swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po rig pa'o// oM hUM swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM trang swA hA/ snying po yang dag par bskul
2a6(84 du): ba'i rig pa'o// oM traM swA hA/ snying po dam pa'o// oM hriHswA hA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das mgon po che dpag tu
2a7(84 du): med pa la bstod pa/ hriHbcom ldan 'das mgon po che dag med// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba// sku mchog rnam par dag pa'i
2b1(84 du): sku// mnyam nyid rdo rje'i sgrub phyag 'tshal lo// gsung mchog rnam par dag pa'i gsung // gsung rab dam pa spros dang thal// yi ge med cing sgra spangs pa// spros
2b2(84 du): maung gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs nyid rnam par dag pa'i thugs// thugs mchog rnam par rtog pa spangs// chags med ye shes mkhyen pa ste// stong nyid
2b3(84 du): thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// oM bruM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ bum pa yum lo tsa nar bsgoms la sngags 'di brgya 'am nus tshad bzlas so// oM ru ru pu ru dz+wa la sid+d+hi lo can
2b4(84 du): swAhA/ dkar mo'i mdog la 'od 'phro bar// phyag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams// tshe yi dbang mo brgyud 'phel ma// dpal dang gzi brjid 'phel bar mdzod//
2b5(84 du): bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad che dpag med// phyag rgya 'khor lo la sogs pas// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i bdud bcom nas// snang mdzad che stsol srog
2b6(84 du): skyobs shig/ oM bruM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' che dpag med// phyag rgya rdo rje la sogs pas// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i bdud
2b7(84 du): bcom nas// rdo rje che stsol sreg skyobs shig/ hUM bruM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan tshe dpag med// phyag rgya rin chen 'bar ba la
2b8(84 du): sogs pas// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i bdud bcom nas// rin chen stsol srog skyobs shig/ swa bruM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ bcom ldan snang ba mtha
3a1(84 du): yas tshe dpag med// phyag rgya pad+ma la sogs pas// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i bdud bcom nas// snang mdzad che spel sreg skyobs shig/ a
3a2(84 du): bruM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ bcom ldan don yod grub pa tshe dpag med// phyag rgya rgya gram la sogs pas// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i bdud bcom nas// don yod tshe stsol srog
3a3(84 du): skyobs shig/ ha bruM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ bde gshegs lnga yang tshe dpag med// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i bdud bcom nas// bdud dang mu stegs kun bcom nas/ dpal
3a4(84 du): dang gzi brjid 'phel bar mdzod// shar gyi phyogs nas tshe 'dzin ma// rdo rje yum chen sangs rgyas spyan// rin chen shel gyi bum pa ru// rdo rje che yis bkang nas kyang //
3a5(84 du): spyi bo'i gtsug nas dbang bskur bas// tshe dbang thams cad bstan par mdzod// oM ru ru phu ru dz+wa la sid+d+hi si ta na lo tsa ni swA hA/ lce'i phyogs nas tshe 'dzin ma// rin chen
3a6(84 du): yum ni mA ma ki/ rin chen bai DUr+ya yi bum pa la// rdo rje tshe yis bkang nas su// spyi bo'i gtsug nas dbang bskur bas// tshe dbang thams cad rgyas par mdzod// oM shad
3a7(84 du): ka re shang ka re ku ta ni ku ta ne swA hA/ nub kyi phyogs nas tshe 'dzin ma// pad+ma yum chen na bza' dkar// rin chen rA ga'i bum pa la// rdo rje tshe yis bkang nas kyang // spyi
3a8(84 du): bo'i gtsug nas dbang bskur bas// tshe dbang thams cad rgyas par mdzod// oM bi ka ta bi ka te/ ka ta ra ya bi de ya swA hA/ byang gi phyogs nas che 'dzin ma// las ra /
3b1(84 du): yum ni dam tshig sgrol// rin chen in+d+ra nI la'i bum pa la// rdo rje che yis bkang nas kyang // spyi bo'i gtsug nas dbang bskur bas// tshe dbang thams cad rgyas par mdzod//
3b2(84 du): oM tA re tu re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ nam mkha'i dbyings nas tshe 'dzin ma// de bzhin yum ni kun tu bzang // rin chen gser gyi bum pa la// rdo rje che yis bkang nas kyang // spyi
3b3(84 du): po'i gtsug nas dbang bskur bas// tshe dbang thams cad rgyas par shog/ oM sarbakas su de byi rim hA ma re sha ya swA hA/ shar gyi phyogs nas che 'gugs ma// rdo rje lha ma lhan/
3b4(84 du): kyu ma// sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro// phyag mtshan phyag na lcags kyu bsnams// shar phyogs dri za'i lag nas tshe khrag cig/ lho yi phyogs nas che 'gugs ma// chos
3b5(84 du): kyi lha mo zhags pa ma// sku mdog mthing kha 'od zer 'phro// phyag mtshan phyag na zhags pa bsnams// lho phyogs gshin rje'i lag nas che khug cig/ nub kyi phyogs nas
3b6(84 du): tshe 'gugs ma// chos kyi lha mo lcags sgrog ma// sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'phro// phyag mtshan phyag na lcags sgrog bsnams// nub phyogs klu gdon lag nas tshe
3b7(84 du): khrag cig/ byang gi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// las kyi lha mo dril dkrol ma// sku mdog ljang la 'od zer 'phro// phyag mtshan phyag na dril bu bsnams// byang phyogs
3b8(84 du): gnod sbyin lag nas che khrug cig/ tshe thug yu bruM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ tshe 'di sa la gnas srid na// yum chen sangs rgyas spyan gyis che sgrol srog skyobs shig/ tshe 'di tshul
4a1(84 du): gnas srid na// yum chen mA ma ki yis che stsol srog skyobs shig/ tshe 'di me la gnas srid na// yum chen na bza' dkar mos che stsol srog skyobs shig/
4a2(84 du): tshe 'di rlung la gnas srid na// yum chen dam tshig sgrol mas che stsol srog skyobs shig/ tshe 'di nam mkha' la gnas srid na// yum chen kun tu bzang mos che stsol srog sbyong
4a3(84 du): shig/ sa yi snying po gser la bsdu// gser la tshe yi rten mchis so// chu yi snying po chu la bsdu// tshal che yi rten mchis so// shing thog snying po mngar la bsdu// mngaral che/
4a4(84 du): yi rten mchis so// rtsi thog snying po mar la bsdu// mar la che yi rten mchis so// 'bru thog snying po til la bsdu// til la che yi rten mchis so// srog gi snying po nI la bsdu/
4a5(84 du): nI la che yi rten mchis so// bruM g.yu g.yu bruM/ sba'o sba'o che sgra'o// chos kyi dbyings su tshe sbas pas// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang // de la bzung zhing rtag tu
4a6(84 du): med// phyag rgya bdun gyis rgyas 'debs so// dang po chos kyi dbyings kyi rgya// gnyis pa thabs dang shes rab rgya// gsum pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// bzhi pa ye shes bzhi
4a7(84 du): yi rgya// lnga pa sangs rgyas rigs lnga'i rgya// drug pa dpal chen rta mgrir rgya// bdun pa gser gyi zor ba'i rgya// phyag rgya bdun gyi rgyas btab po// spyi gtsug nyi zla'i dkyil 'kho
4a8(84 du): du// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad dang // dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'i kun tu bzang // de yi thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// tshe 'di rab tu brtan par mdzod// bud+d+ha ka la sha a
4b1(84 du): b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ dpral ba zla kham dkyil 'khor du// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'i sangs rgyas spyan// de yi thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// tshe 'di/
4b2(84 du): rab tu brtan par mdzod// badz+ra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ lce yi pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan dang // dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'i mA ma kI/ de yi thug
4b3(84 du): rje'i byin rlabs kyis// tshe 'di rab tu brtan par mdzod// rat+na ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ lte ba gzhal yas dkyil 'khor du// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas dang // dkyil
4b4(84 du): 'khor 'dzin pa'i na bza' dkar// de yi thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// tshe ni rab tu brtan par mdzod// pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hriHrkang mthil nang grol gru gsum du/
4b5(84 du): bcom ldan don yod grub pa dang // dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'i dam tshig sgrol// de yi thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// tshe 'di rab tu brtan par mdzod// karma ka la sha a
4b6(84 du): b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ 'phags pa tshe dpag tu med pa'i snying po che'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
4b7(84 du): rgya gar skad du/ a pa ri mi ta/ bod skad du/ rin po che tshe'i sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tshe dang bsod
4b8(84 du): nams 'aper bar gyur cig/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myur du thob byed pa'i/ babade gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po bzlas// na sor t+na tra/
5a1(84 du): yA sa/ oMn mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yu dz+nyAn su bi ni tsi ta te dzor dz+wa ya ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sam k+Shas+saSh+TA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye praN+ye/ mahApra N+ye/
5a2(84 du): a yu puN+ye/ dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ro pa tsi te a pa ri mi ta A su She/ oM sarba sa skAr pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga nas mu dag te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he/ ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ sangs rgyas
5a3(84 du): snang ba mtha' yas bkra shis tshe yi lha// sna ba mtha' yas sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// pad+ma mkha' 'gro mchi med tshe yi lnga// pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod//
5a4(84 du): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mi 'gyur tshe yi lha// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshe yi lha mo rnams ni g.yung drung che yi lha//
5a5(84 du): tshe yi lha mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// mgon po che dpag med ni rdo rje che yi lha// bcom ldan tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi dus min 'chi ba bzlog tu
5a6(84 du): gsol// mi 'chi che yi dngos grub khyed la zhu// tshe dang bsod nams gnyis kyis bdag la dbang bskur byin gyis brlab du gsol// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa
5a7(84 du): te a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+Sham+bAd+b+ha ya// tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye/ ma hA puN+ye/ a yu pu N+ye/ dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/
5a8(84 du): a pa ri mi ta sa su She/ oM sarba sa swa ri pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga gnas mung ga te swa thA wa bi shrad+d+he ma hA na sa pa ri wA re swA hA// rdo rje sems dpa' bkra shis tshe yi lha/
5b1(84 du): rje sems dpa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'chi med tshe yi lha// rdo rje ma'a' 'gro'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mi 'gyur tshe yi
5b2(84 du): lha// rgyal ba sras bcas sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshe yi lha mo rnams ni g.yung drung tshe yi lha// tshe yi lha mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// mgon po che dpag med ni
5b3(84 du): rdo rje che yi lha// gzi brjid rgyal po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi dus min 'chi ba zlog tu gsol// mi 'chi tshe yi dngos grub khyed la nu// tshe dang bsod nams
5b4(84 du): gnyis kyis bdag la dbang bskur byin gyis brlab tu gsol// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+dza na/ su bi ni tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/
5b5(84 du): thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyaka sam+p+rad+b+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye/ ma hA puN+ye/ a yu puN+ye dz+nyA na sarba ru pa sid+d+hi/ a pa ri mi ta a yu She/ oM sarba saM skA ri pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma /
5b6(84 du): ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha wa bi shud+d+he ma hA ya pa ri wA re swA hA// rin chen 'byung ldan bkra shis tshe yi lha// rin chen 'byung sku la phyag 'tshal bsted// rin chen mkha'
5b7(84 du): 'gro 'chi med che yi lha// rin chen mkha' 'gro'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mi 'gyur tshe yi lha// rgyal ba sras bcas sku la phyag
5b8(84 du): 'tshal bstod// tshe yi lha mo rnams ni g.yung drung che yi lha// tshe yi lha mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// mgon po che dpag med ni rdo rje che yi lha// bcom ldan tshe
6a1(84 du): mi rgyal po'i skul phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi dus min 'chi ba bzlog tu gsol// mi 'chi tshe yi dngos grub khyed la zhu// tshe dang bsod nas/
6a2(84 du): gnyis kyis bdag la dbang bskur byin gyis brlab du gsol// na mo rat+na tra yA ya// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te// a pa ri mi ta/ A yudz+nyA na su bi ni tsi ta te dze rarAH
6a3(84 du): ya ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+Sham+mad+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye/ ma hA puN+ye/ a yu pu N+ye/ dzA na sam+ba ru pa sid+hi/ a pa ri mi ta e yu She/ oM sarba saM skA
6a4(84 du): ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma taM ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hi wa bi shud+d+he/ ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bkra shis tshe yi lha// rnam par snang mdzad sku
6a5(84 du): la phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro 'chi med tshe yi lha// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gre tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mi 'gyur
6a6(84 du): che yi lha// rgyal ba sras bcas sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshe yi lha mo rnams ni g.yung drung che yi lha// tshe yi lha me'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// mgon po che dpag/
6a7(84 du): med ni tshe yi lha// bcom ldan tshe yi bdag po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi dus min 'chi ba bzlog tu gsol// mi 'chi tshe yi dngos grub khyed la zhu//
6a8(84 du): dang bsod nams gnyis kyis bdag la dbang bskur byin gyis brlab du gsol// na mo rat+na tra mA ya/ oM name b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyAn/ su bi ni
6b1(84 du): tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samya kram+mud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puN+ye puN+ye/ ma hA puN+ye/ A su pu N+ye dz+nyA na sarba ru ba si d+hi a pa ri mi ta a yu She/ oM sarba saM skAr/
6b2(84 du): pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mu dag te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA// don yod grub pa bkra shis tshe yi lha// sangs rgyas don yod grub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal/
6b3(84 du): bstod// las kyi mkha' 'gro 'chi med tshe yi lha// las kyi mkha' 'gro'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs mi 'gyur che yi lha// phyogs bcu'i
6b4(84 du): sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshe yi lha mo rnams ni g.yung drung tshe yi lha// tshe yi lha mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshe bdag gzi brjid rgyal po rdo rje che yi lha/
6b5(84 du): bcom ldan mgon po che dpag med la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi dus min 'chi ba zlog tu gsol// mi 'chi che yi dngos grub khyed la zhu// tshe dang bsod nams gnyis
6b6(84 du): kyis bdag la dbang bskur byin gyis brlab du gsol// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta a yudz+nyA na su bi ni tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya// ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te
6b7(84 du): samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye/ ma hA pu N+ye/ A yu pu N+ye/ dz+nyA na sarba ru pa si d+hi/ a pa ri mi ta a yu She/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mudag te swa
6b8(84 du): b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ bcom ldan lha yi dbang phyug gis// sku la bkra shis rdzas brgyad lha mor sprul byas nas// bdag kyang tshe ring nad med bkra shis
7a1(84 du): shog/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dang bsod nams dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni
7a2(84 du): tsi ta te dzor dzA sa/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyakram+bAd+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye puN+ye/ ma hA pu N+ye/ a su pu N+ye/ dz+nyA na sarba ru pa si d+hi/ a pa ri mi ta a yu She/ oM sarba sa skA
7a3(84 du): ri ba ri shud+d+haHrma te ga ga na sa mu ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus da res nas bzung nas mgon po che dpag tu med pa'i
7a4(84 du): skyabs 'og chud par cig/ bdag che ring po'i mchog thob par gyur cig/ tshe srog brag las sra bar gyur cig/ che nyi zla dang mnyam par gyur cig/ me brgyud chu las ring bar
7a5(84 du): gyur cig/ lcags kyi srog pa rtsa 'grub par gyur cig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar gyur cig/ 'chi med che'i g.yung drung thob par gyur cig/ bcom
7a6(84 du): ldan tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+Sha m+bAd+d+hA ya/ taH
7a7(84 du): tha oM pu N+ye pu N+ye/ ma hA puN+ye/ a yu pu N+ye/ dz+nyA na sarba ru pa sid+d+hi/ a pa ri mi ta a yu She/ oM sarba saM skAr pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mu ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma
7a8(84 du): na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ rin po che tshe'i sgrub pa zhes bya ba bkra shis smon lam dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / dge'o//
7b1(84 du): rgya gar skad du/ AH a pa ri mi ta A yur dzA na sarba hrid ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa che dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi snying po'o// bde gsheg
7b2(84 du): rgyal ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tshe dang bsod nams 'phel 'gyur zhing // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myur thob pa'i// bde gshegs kun gyi snying po gsungs/ thun
7b3(84 du): kla ga/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yurdzu na su bi ni tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyaka sam+ba d+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye/ ma hA
7b4(84 du): pu N+ye/ a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye/ a yu pu N+ye/ ma hA puN+ye/ a yur dzA na serba ru pa si d+hi/ A yud dzA na She che bru oM bruM a bruM sA bruM hwa pru tshi bruM/ oM sarba saM ska ri pa ri shud+d+ha
7b5(84 du): d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hI// stong gsum 'jig rten 'di dag kun// gser dngul zangs lcags rin chen dang / nor bu rin
7b6(84 du): chen la byas pa'i// bde gshegs sku gzugs byas pa bas// sngags 'di tshar gcig bzlas pa mchog/ bsod nams brgya yi char mi phod// bskal pa stong du
7b7(84 du): bde gshegs kyi// rir bsrel sku gzugs byas pa bas// sngags 'di tshar gcig bzlas pa mchog/ bde gshegs zhal nas gsungs pa yi// sde snod chos
7b8(84 du): rnams bklag pa bas// sngags 'di tshar gcig bzlas pa mchog/ mi rtog ye shes sgom pa yi// yon tan rgya mtsho ma gtogs pa// 'dus byas dge sbyong mtha'
8a1(84 du): dag kun// rnal 'byor gcig gis byas pa bas// sngags 'di tshar gcig bzlas pa mchog/ sngags 'di bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor la// 'chi ba rnam
8a2(84 du): ba brgyad mi 'byung // sdug bsngal gsum gyi sems mi g.yeng // ltas ngan mtshan ma ngan pa zlog/ ngan sngags mthu dang gnod pa mtha' dag zlog/ 'chi ba rnam pa brgyad
8a3(84 du): po bslu ba'i mchog/ dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku thob gzi brjid byin gyis rlobs// bcu mi thub pas brgya thub 'gyur// gzungs 'di sgrogs
8a4(84 du): pa'i byin rlabs kyis// yul dang sa phyogs thams cad du// bgegs med nad med bkra shis 'byung // gzungs 'di'i yon tan bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas sras
8a5(84 du): dang bcas pas kyang // 'di yi yon tan brjod mi nus// 'di ni chos nyid rang sgra yin// zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa tshe dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi snying po
8a6(84 du): rdzogs so// // / maM ga laM//
1a1(85 de): gtsug tor nag mo bzhugs so// /
1b1(85 de): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kriSh+Na uSh+NI Sha nA pa d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
1b2(85 de): gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs nag mo can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
1b3(85 de): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas/ dam pa
1b4(85 de): chos kyi pho brang na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /
1b5(85 de): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod khams kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa gzugs khams kyi lha rnams dang
1b6(85 de): thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i rig sngags chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
1b7(85 de): snyoms par zhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
2a1(85 de): bos phyag 'tshal te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ logs shig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la
2a2(85 de): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod khams kyi lha rnams dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
2a3(85 de): dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / de rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs gsungs du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
2a4(85 de): kun dga' bo la 'di san+des bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs
2a5(85 de): paM/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung ngo // 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnas/
2a6(85 de): la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi ldog pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad
2a7(85 de): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
2a8(85 de): bcom pa yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la
2b1(85 de): phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
2b2(85 de): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs nag mo can la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhan
2b3(85 de): gyi rig sngags gcod pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor los sgyur ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhan gyi rig sngags kyi 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs pa
2b4(85 de): brgyad dang / gzhan gyi dmod pas 'jigs pa dang / mi yis 'jigs pa dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gdon gyis 'jigs pa dang / dgra'i 'jigs
2b5(85 de): pa dang / nad chen po brgyad kyi 'jigs pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa dang / nad dang 'jigs pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad las thar par mdzad du
2b6(85 de): gsol// rdo rje gtum mi stobs chen mo// rig sngags chen mo gzi brjid can// drag shul chen mo 'bar ba ma// rdo rje mkha' 'gro drag mo che// 'bar ba can
2b7(85 de): dang gzi brjid can// mA ma kI dang 'od zer can// mche ba gtsigs dang rdo rje 'dzin// rig sngags 'dzin dang drag mo che// rig pa'i lha mo stobs mo che// lha mo
2b8(85 de): chen mo nag mo dang // ral gcig ma dang sgrol ma dang // rig sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang // rig pa'i lha mo thams cad dang // gzhan gyi rig sngags kyi gnod
3a1(85 de): pa dang / rims nad thams cad dang / ma rungs pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / mdze dang po la
3a2(85 de): mig dang / dug dang drang srong gi gnod pa dang / gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyi 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag dang rgyu sbyor ba la srung du gsol// oM kr-iSh+Na
3a3(85 de): uSh+NI Sha a na a ba lo ki te/ sarba b+ha d+ha ya/ tshin+ta tshin+ta/ sarba dz+wa ra ma na ya/ nA sa ya nA sa ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM a ka la mi ra tu ni/ b+hai ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba
3a4(85 de): bud+d+ha ni uSh+NI Sha hUM phaT/ oM sarba ha ti uSh+NI Sha ba ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba gra ha Ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba nak+She Ni ba ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba ku so pa Ni hUM phaT/ bcom ldan
3a5(85 de): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs nag mo can/ dam pa chos kyi pho brang la mnga' mdzad ma/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
3a6(85 de): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbang du sdud ma/ zhal bcu gcig ma/ phyag brgya rtsa brgyad mnga' ma/ phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin ma/ drag shul chen
3a7(85 de): mo can/ gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad zlog par mdzad ma khyod la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM a pa ra tsi ta/ sa ha ras sai re/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/
3a8(85 de): sa ha ra sarba dze ma hA tsakra/ tra sa ya trA sa ya/ kam pa ya/ kam pa sa/ pa ra bid d+hA ya/ tshin+d+ha tshin+ta/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT srahA/ de bzhin gshegs
3b1(85 de): pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs nag mo can la phyag 'tshalo// lha ma yin gyis byas pa'i rig sngags rdo rje'i ral gris bcad do// phur bus
3b2(85 de): gdab bo// drag shul can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags rdo rje'i ral gris bcad do// phur bus gdab po// bdud thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags rdo rje'i
3b3(85 de): ral gris bcad do// phur bus gdab po// mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags rdo rje'i ral gris bcad do// phur bus gdab po// tshangs
3b4(85 de): pa dang // khyab 'jug dang / mahA de bas byas pa'i rig sngags rdo rje'i ral gris bcad do// phur bus gdab po// dbang phyug chen po dang / tshogs kyi bdag
3b5(85 de): po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags rdo rje'i ral gris bcad do// phur bus gdab po// klu'i rgyal po dang klu thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags rdo rje
3b6(85 de): ral gris bcad do// phur bus gdab po// srin po thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags rdo rje'i ral gris bcad do// phur bus gdab po// gnod sbyin thams
3b7(85 de): cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags rdo rje'i ral gris bcad do// phur bus gdab po// 'byung po thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags rdo rje'i ral gris bcad do//
3b8(85 de): phur bus gdab po// yi dgas thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags rdo rje'i ral gris bcad do// phur bus gdab po// rig sngags thams cad kyis byas pa'i
4a1(85 de): rig sngags rdo rje'i ral gris bcad do// phur bus gdab bo// lha thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags rdo rje'i ral gris bcad do//
4a2(85 de): phur bus gdab bo// dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags rdo rje'i ral gras btsad do// phur bus gdab po// oM uSh+NI Sha
4a3(85 de): sarba ta thA ga ta a d+h+yeSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Ti he hU~M phaT/ oM sa man tra pra b+hAn dza ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba tsakra ga na sa ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba s+pha ra se ni pra b+han dza ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba sha
4a4(85 de): tAM b+ha uSh+NI Sha ba ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba ti ha ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba sang ha re k+She Ni hUM phaT/ oM ba la ba te hUM phaT/ oM te dze pa ti hUM phaT/ oM dza ti sang kha re hUM phaT/
4a5(85 de): oM ma hA d+ha ra mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM dza li te dza sa na ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM dza ye bi dza ye ma hA tsakra tha re Ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra uSh+NI Sha a pa ra tsi ta hUM phaT/ dza li ti pri
4a6(85 de): kha re hUM phaT/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khan+da khan+da/ sau me sau me/ dzan+ti dzan+te/ pa ra bi d+ha ya/ na sa nI na sa ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba a su b+ha ya/ bir+ya uSh+NI Sha pa ra Ni hUM phaT/
4a7(85 de): oM sarba ma he sa ra bi nA ya ga ku ma ra ya/ ba ha ra Ni hUM phaT/ d+harma ru tA d+ha ra ya ba ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba DA ki bi kro d+ha ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba rak+Sha sarba b+ha ya uSh+NI
4a8(85 de): Sha ba ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM b+he da sa ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba yak+Sha sarba ya/ uSh+NI Sha ba ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba bi ta sa ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba bud+d+ha tra sa ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba b+ha ga
4b1(85 de): tra ha ha ra sa ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba ga ni d+he ba b+ha ya hUM phaT/ pra b+han dza ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba bid+d+ha ma hA kro d+ha ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba ma thi ga ni bi d+hAn sa ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba
4b2(85 de): trai lo kya phra ma tha ni hUM phaT// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs nag mo can dam pa chos kyi pho brang la mnga' mdzad
4b3(85 de): ma gzhan gyi rig sngags kyis gnod pas na ba dang / rims kyis na ba dang / mgo bo na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba dang / lhog pas na
4b4(85 de): ba dang / mdzes na ba dang / rgyu nad kyis na ba dang / lton pa dang / rked pa na ba dang / chu so na pa dang / brlan pa dang / rje ngar na ba dang / mig nad kyis na ba dang /
4b5(85 de): mi ma yin pa'i nad kyis na ba dang / gdon gyis na ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i nad dang / 'byung po'i nad thams cad las bdag la srung du gsol// tad+ya thA/ oM
4b6(85 de): u pi sha a pa ra tsi ta/ mahA kro d+ha mur te/ a tsa le a tse le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bai ra bai ra/ badz+ra d+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/ pa ra bi d+yA ma Ni tsa ra NaM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/
4b7(85 de): gsang sngags chen mo 'di ni gro ga 'am ras sam/ shing shun la bris te lus sam mgul du btags na/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de la rgyal po'i
4b8(85 de): 'jigs pas mi tshugs/ dgrab 'jigs pas mi tshugs/ me'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs/ chub 'jigs pas mi tshugs/ nad chen po brgyad kyi 'jig
5a1(85 de): pas mi tshugs/ gzhan gyi rig sngags kyi dmod pas mi tshugs/ btsan gyi 'jigs pas mi tshugs/ gcan gzan gyi 'jigs
5a2(85 de): bas mi tshugs/ dug gi 'jigs pas mi tshugs/ sbrul gyi 'jigs pas mi tshugs/ 'byung po'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs/ gdon thams cad kyi
5a3(85 de): 'jigs pas pi tshugs/ gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad dang / gnod byed thams cad kyis mi tshugs shing gnod par mi 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ oM uSh+ma
5a4(85 de): bi lo gi te mo'u te/ bi ma le uSh+NI Sha pa ri shud+d+he/ badz+ra badz+ra b+ha dza la ga ra le/ ma hA be ra du d+ha ra Ni/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra uSh+NI Sha bi ma le sarba ya na pa ri/
5a5(85 de): hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ uSh+NI Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dge
5a6(85 de): slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs nag mo can gzung ba
5a7(85 de): 'am/ klog pa 'am/ yongs su 'dzin pa 'am/ gzhan la rgya cher ston pa'am/ de dag thams cad la gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad kyis mi tshugs so//
5a8(85 de): 'byung po'i gdon thams cad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs/ gdon thams cad dang bgegs dang 'jigs pa thams cad
5b1(85 de): kyis mi tshugs/ lha thams cad dang / gdon bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyuraro// rdo rje'i rigs 'bum phrag brgyad
5b2(85 de): cu rtsa bzhis kyang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par 'gyur ro// de nas kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
5b3(85 de): phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas logs shig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/
5b4(85 de): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du gzungs chen mo 'di gsungs pa legs so legs so// rjes su yi rang
5b5(85 de): ngo // de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das
5b6(85 de): kyis gzungs chen po 'di bka' stsal pa dang / lha thams cad dang / dge slong thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang lha ma yin dang / mi dang / gnod sbyin thams cad
5b7(85 de): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
5b8(85 de): gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs nag mo can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// zhus dag// shu b+ha bas+yA sarba dzag taM//
1a1(86 do): gtsug tor lha me rol ma bzhugs so// /
1b1(86 do): rgya gar skad du/ de bI ma hA ka li ha sa uSh+NI Sha na ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ lha mo nag mo chen mo rol
1b2(86 do): bar byed pa'i gtsug tor zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dpal gshin rje gshed nag po la phyag 'tshal lo// gdon chen po 'bum
1b3(86 do): phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i nang nas/ gdon chen po rnams nyung ngu bsdus nas smos pa/ ro langs nag mo'i gdon dang / sha za nag mo'i
1b4(86 do): gdon dang / skem byed nag me'i gdon dang / sgrib byed nag me'i gdon dang / phung byed nag me'i gdon dang / drang srong nag mo'i gdon dang / srin
1b5(86 do): mo nag mo'i gdon dang / rlung lha nag me'i gdon dang / dbang ldan nag mo'i gdon dang / dpal ldan nag mo'i gdon dang / nam gru nag
1b6(86 do): mo'i gdon dang / klu mo nag mo'i gdon dang / nam gru nag mo skyong byed ro langs ma'i gdon dang / nam gru chen mo phung byed seng ge
1b7(86 do): gdong gi gdon dang / nam gru chen me mkha' la rgyu khyung gshog ma'i gdon dang / nam gru chen mo ral gcig ma nyab pa'i gdon dang /
2a1(86 do): nam gru chen mo sa gcig ma'i gdon dang / bong zhon chen mo gur gcig ma'i gdon dang / gur chen mo gnyis la dbang ba'i gdon
2a2(86 do): dang / gur chen po gsum la dbang ba'i gdon dang / gur chen po bzhi la dbang ba'i gdon dang / gur chen po lnga la dbang ba'i gdon dang / gar chen po drug la
2a3(86 do): dbang ba'i gdon dang / gur chen po bdun la dbang ba'i gdon dang / kur chen po brgyad la dbang ba'i gdon dang / gur chen po dgu la dbang ba'i gdon dang / gu
