2a4(86 do): chen po bcu la dbang ba'i gdon dang / gur chen po bcu gcig la dbang ba'i gdon dang / gur chen po bcu gnyis la dbang po'i gdon dang / gur chen po bcu gsum la dbang
2a5(86 do): ba'i gdon dang / rims nad thams cad la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang / de dag kun gyi 'thab mo dang / 'khrug pa la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang / bdud kyi dmag dpung
2a6(86 do): byed pa thams cad dang / nad dang rims la dbang byed pa chen mo dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / rgyu nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma na ba dang / lha gor na ba
2a7(86 do): dang / brlan pa dang / rje ngangan ba dang / chu son pa dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / 'brum bu phra mes na ba dang / bar na ba dang / me dpal dang / ldog pa dang /
2a8(86 do): skem pa dang / dbyig du dang / dug sbyar ma dang / rgyu gzer dang / pho lhang dang / gnyen po dang / rgyu rims la sogs pa thams cad rig sngags kyis bcad do//
2b1(86 do): pur bus gdab po// rig sngags kyi mgon po rnams kyis dngos grub stsal du gsol/ gnod sbyin ro langs legs ldan nag po grong khyer gsum brtsegs 'jigs
2b2(86 do): par byed pa'i rig sngags kyis bcad de// phur bus gdab po/ gnod sbyin spro byed rje zhon dang // gon rgyun la sogs gdon rnams ni// slo byed gdon du za ba ni// shug+sa
2b3(86 do): 'gro byams ma'i rig sngags bcad// mkha' 'gro byams ma'i phung bus gdag// su~M b+hi ni hU~M d+ha b+h+rUM/ dr-iSh+T+ri kI la ye b+h+ya la Ta/ bud med nag mar mngon pa dang //
2b4(86 do): 'byor spyan rtul byed pa dang // sgrib byed nag mo'i gdon yin te// legs ldan dka' thub rig sngags pa nad// dbang phyug gtso bos phur bus gdab// du ru se hU~M dz+dza/
2b5(86 do): pra ma kI la ye b+h+yaHphaT/ skya rims klad pa na ba dang // rkang pa 'khol ba'i nad byung na// 'byung po nag po'i gdon yin pas// dpal chen dbang gi rig sngags bcad//
2b6(86 do): shugs 'gros byams ma'i phur bus gdab/ sha sha d+ha ra hUM dz+ra/ mo d+ha ra kI la ya hUM b+h+yaHphaT/ lci zhing nad ni 'thibs pa dang // gnyid tshe sems la mi dran pa/
2b7(86 do): bud med nag mo'i gdon yin pas// rgyal bar byed pa'i rig sngags bcad// sbrang rtsir byed pa'i phur bus gdab/ me la d+ha ra hU dzA/ sram sra ma sum kI la
2b8(86 do): ye b+h+ya phaT/ bya dgu ye nas mi gtub cing // las su bsam pa mi 'grub na// drang srong gza' yi gdon yin pas// mi yi thod pa can gyi rig sngags bcad//
3a1(86 do): dge sbyong gcer bu'i phur bus gdab/ pa tra pa ta hUM dr-i/ sau me kI la ya/ pa tra rag b+h+yaHphaT/ rnal 'byor spyan rtul byed pa dang /
3a2(86 do): sems ni yeng yeng seng seng po// ro stod mnan pa snyam byed pa// srin po nag po'i gdon yin pas// phyag na rdo rjes rig sngags bcad// rdo rje khrag 'thung ngur
3a3(86 do): bus gdab// b+h+r-i mA d+ha ra ya hU druM/ d+har sha ka ye b+h+yaHphaT/ khro ba dang ni 'tshig pa dang // sgra 'dod skyon thabs 'thab me rgod// rkang lag brkyang bskum bu sbrang
3a4(86 do): byed// dbang ldan nag me'i gdon yin pas// dpal ldan gtso bo'i rig sngags bcad// mgon po nag po'i phur bus gdab/ te rtse ye nan hUM dr-i/ dza lo ka la
3a5(86 do): se b+h+yaHphaT/ nam phyed gung la gnyid med dang // cho 'phrul mang po 'byung ba dang // bong bu phag pa'i gzugs bston na// nam gru nag po'i gdon yin pas/
3a6(86 do): rta mgrin dmar pos rig sngags bcad// khro bo bstang stabs phur bus gdab// ya mAn ta krita hUM druM phaT/ badz+ra kro d+ha ki la ya b+h+yaHphaT/ rkang lag rengs shing na ba
3a7(86 do): dang // yi ga 'chus shing skyug bro ba// gshin rje nag po'i gdon yin pas// 'jam dpal gshin rjes rig sngags bcad// mi pham yum gyis phur bus gdag/
3a8(86 do): ya ma ra dza kro d+ha ki la ya hUM druM/ sa ma rA dza kro d+ha kI la ye b+h+yaHphaT/ gzhigs skams pa dang rengs pa dang // zhwa gram sha lus sngol 'jam// mig nad can dang rkang pa
3b1(86 do): na// mdze dang shu ba g.yan pa ni// kla mo spus 'gro'i gdon yin pas// bye khyung he yis rig sngags bcad// drang srong rgan po'i phur bus gdag/ ho na ga le dzar
3b2(86 do): tsahU dr-i/ hu swA hA yA kI la ya b+h+ya phaT/ sems la yeng yeng seng seng byed// ro stod mnan pa sngam byed cing / kha son pa'i nad rnams ni// gnod sbyin nag po'i
3b3(86 do): gdon yin pas// rnam thos sras kyis rig sngags bcad// bum sna dmar po'i pur bus gdab// he sa baM ma thi kha kha ra ga hUM dr-i/ kha rag ga da ra ta kaM la ye b+h+ya
3b4(86 do): phaT/ shu ba brum bu na ba dang // sha lus na 'am g.yan pa'i nad rnams ni// nam gru skyong byed ro langs gdon yin pas// gshin rje thogs med rig sngags bcad/
3b5(86 do): mgrin bzang dmar po'i phur bus gdag/ nge sa ma ti hUM drA/ pra ta kI la ye b+h+ya phaT/ 'jigs shing bya sangs khyer ba dang // zo rangs bya byo byed pa ni// nam gru he li
3b6(86 do): gdon yin pas// ya ma he yis rig sngags bcad// 'dod pa dmar po'i phur bus gdab// ra du na hA bA da ru na hUM dr-i/ kau ma re kI la ye b+h+yaHphaT/ khrag du na dang lci
3b7(86 do): ba dang // mig la rab rib mi mthong ba// nam gru khyung gshog gden yin pas// khro bo hU~M gis rig sngags bcad// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phur bus gdab// pra ri tra
3b8(86 do): dun b+h+yaHphaT/ pra ma na Na kI la ya hUM druM/ g.yas pa'i lag pa gzir ba dang // dpung mgo g.yas su gzer ba'i nad// lag gcig nyab pa'i gdon yin pas// khro ba
4a1(86 do): dbyings kyis rig sngags bcad// dbang phyug ma yis phur bus gdab// pra dun bra ro tra ya phaT/ pra ma ki la ya hUM d+h+waM/ spros shing khrag
4a2(86 do): tu bshal ba dang // mig sngar sna tshogs gzugs 'ong na// so cig mig cig gdon yin pas// de ni legs ldan nag po'i gdon yin pas// legs ldan phyir 'ong
4a3(86 do): rig sngags bcad// dka' thub gtso bo'i phur bus gdab/ rak+Sha se hUM druM/ rak+Sha mA kI la ye b+h+ya phaT/ rakra la kI la ya hUM phaT/ dar dkar gur gyi nang shed nas// bung
4a4(86 do): med mnga' bdag cho 'phrul che// gza' skar mi bzad sku 'byung ba// gser dang g.yus brgyan dbang mo che// kun tu bzang mo'i cho 'phrul te// dus ngan tha ma khrug pa
4a5(86 do): dang // ser ba than pa mu ge bca'// chos kyi dbyings kyi rig sngags bcad// ting nge 'dzin gyi phur bus gdab// da rmad du b+hu phaT/ sa ma yA ki ti yA kI la ya hUM druM/ gsu
4a6(86 do): gur gnyis la dbang byed pa'i// mthing ga chen mo dbang mo che// pa lang dre'u la zhon pa dang // nam phyed gung la cho 'phrul pa// nam gru mthing ga'i gdon yin pas//
4a7(86 do): dbang chen hUM gis rig sngags bcad// khyab pa dmar po'i phung bus gdab// sarba kan d+he b+h+yaHphaT/ da ru ki la ya hUM druM/ gur nag khrung rus rgyan pa dang // nub nas
4a8(86 do): shar du gnod pa dang // mgul nad sring nad gtong ba ni// 'og gi nag po'i cho 'phrul te// seng gdong drag pa'i rig sngags bcang // dka' thub gca bo'i
4b1(86 do): bus gdab// na ga le rA dza hUM druM phaT/ hUM yA hUM yA kI la ya b+h+ya phaT/ gser gur phra bo'i gur phub nas// mu men gur gyi nang shed na// gzugs med
4b2(86 do): khag pa ston pa dang // gnyid kyis 'thibs pa'i nad byung ba// kha nas khrag tu skyug pa dang // lus la tshad pa skyes pa dang // mig sngar rlung dang mun sros
4b3(86 do): dang // lha mo nag ma'i gdon yin pas// d+hI ti dkar po'i rig sngags bcad // brad ti dmar po'i phur bus gdag/ sa mA yA de ma daM b+hU phaT/ ma mas
4b4(86 do): ma yA tsa hi kI la ya hUM draM/ re lde gur gyi nang shed na// bud med gnam sa sleb pa dang // tshub ma'i gzugs su ston pa dang // kha nas blo khrag 'ong ba dang /
4b5(86 do): ngar snabs rnag tu 'ong ba dang // gri thogs shan pa'i las byed na// bdud kyi bshan pa'i gdon yin pas// khyung gi khrag thogs rig sngags
4b6(86 do): bcad// dug chen tshang 'dor phur bus gdag/ ha hUM ru tri kI la ya hUM druM/ gser gyi gur la dbang byed pa// lhag pa rgyab dang lha gor dang // lto nad
4b7(86 do): skrangs 'brar nad byung na// bya gdong gser 'dab gdon gdan yin pas// 'jam dpal ro thung rig sngags bcang // mi pham dbyings kyis phur bus gdab// sa ma
4b8(86 do): ya ma de hr-i da ra t+na g+ha phaT/ d+ha ra hUM drA/ glang chen ko dron gur nang nas/ bong bu zhon pa'i bud med dang // gdung ba'ang ro sgrogs pa dang // lhog pa blo dang sha ser
5a1(86 do): dang // spangs pa la sogs dal gyi nad// srid pa 'jug byed gdon yin pas// gshin rje hriSh+Ti'i rig sngags bcad// 'bar ma dpal
5a2(86 do): gyi phur bus gdab// ma ma Nan b+h+ya phaT/ ma la dzA tu ra kI la ya hUM dr-i/ gser gur khra bo'i nang shed nas// snga rims dmag gi 'brang sdud ma// phyi ripa dam/
5a3(86 do): gi g.yul zlog cing // dkyus pa'i 'brog la phung bar byed// phung byed khang pa gtib pa dang // spos dang glang thabs na ba dang // stod gzer snying ba sha'i nang byung
5a4(86 do): na// srid pa spyi lugs gdon yin pas// rig 'dzin rgyal po'i rig sngags bcad// 'khor ba rab 'joms phur bus gdab// ma mA nan b+h+ya phaT/ pra ma nan kI
5a5(86 do): lA ya hUM druM/ sa dgu gnam gyi steng shed na// mdze dang shu ba g.yan pa dang // dug sbyor ba dang 'khrug pa dang // gri ru gsod par byed pa ni// klu bdud phung byed gdon
5a6(86 do): yin pas// rnam thos sras kyis rig sngags bcad// mgon po nag po'i phur bris gdab// rA dzA da ra kha rag b+h+ya phaT// ma hUM kI la ya hUM druM/ bcu pa gnam gyi steng
5a7(86 do): shed nas// sgra gcan 'dzin gyi sring me ni// phya bdud nag mo'i bu mo ste// char pa 'od du mi gter ba// ser ba chen po 'byung ba dang // srid pa kun gyi cho 'phrul pa/
5a8(86 do): pa bdud gza' yi gdon yin te// dpal ldan dbyings kyis rig sngags bcang // mdzes mas 'dzin phur bus gdab// pra ma dzA ta ye b+h+ya phaT/ pra hA ki la ye rgya rnarma
5b1(86 do): bcu gcig gnam gyi yar steng na// 'od kyi gur phub srid pa gsal// srid pa ri rab sku mkhar la// dpag bsam shing gi mchog phur btab// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi khyon du
5b2(86 do): rdzogs// legs nyes kun gyi stangs 'dzin can// dam tshig kun gyi gtsad gcod ma// mu kha le ni dbyings ma'i mchog/ 'gro ba kun la sman pa'i phyir// bdud rtsi
5b3(86 do): bcud kyi nang du bzhugs// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ba// 'gro ba kun la gsal gyur cig/ zhi ba shAn ting ku ru ye swA hA// sems can gang zhig spo 'bog byed// sgo
5b4(86 do): byed gdon du za ba'i dbang // bgyis nas bla col mang po smra ba ni// ki kang gza' yi gdon yin pas// shugs 'gros byams pa'i rig sngags bcad// mkha' 'gro
5b5(86 do): byams ma'i phur bus gdab// de ba tad ta badz+ra rak+Sha hUM druM/ 'di lan gsum bzlas na smre byed kyi gdon rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// sgrib byed kyi gdon du za dbang gis//
5b6(86 do): bud med nag mo bong zhon zhing // rnal 'byor spyan ni rtul byed na// logs ldan dka' thub rig sngags bcad// dka' thub gtso bo'i phur bus gdab// lan gsum
5b7(86 do): bzlas na rnal 'byor pa// spyan ni mthong ba dag tu 'gyur// da ru ye hUM druM/ pra ma ye b+h+yaHphaT/ skya rims 'dis ni klad pa na// rkang pa khol ba'i rims rnams la// dpal
5b8(86 do): chen dbang gis rig sngags bcad// shugs 'gro byams ma'i phur bus gdab// btab na de dag zhi 'gyur ro// sha shwa da ra hUM dr-i/ me la da ra kI la ye b+h+ya phaT/ bud byed
6a1(86 do): nag mo'i gdon dbang gis// lci ba dang ni 'thib pa dang // mi dran pa dang gnyid gro ba// rgyal bar byed pa'i rig sngags gcad// sbrang rtsir
6a2(86 do): byed pa'i phur bus gdab// bud med gdon ni ni 'gyur ro// mi d+hA ra d+h+wa ng+ga/ sra sraM b+hA kI la ye b+h+ya maT/ mi phyugs gong ka che ba dang // ci yang bya ru mi 'dud
6a3(86 do): pa da rtag tu lo phyugs nyes na yang // gza' ngan pa la skyes pa yin// gzungs kyi snying po 'di dag ni// byang bre sor gsum la bris te/ sgo yi ru bzhi la gzugs
6a4(86 do): btsugs na de dag zhi 'gyur ro// pra tA pra tA rak+Sha b+h+yaHphaT so me kI la ya hUM druM/ mi'i thod pa can dang dge sbyong gcer bu pa rnams kyis srung du gsol// srung du
6a5(86 do): gsol lo// gal te srin po'i gdon du za ba'i dbang gis/ mig tul zhing yeng yeng seng seng byed na/ snyam mi byed pa'i gdon rnams ni srin mo nag mo sha za ba'i
6a6(86 do): gdon yin pas// sha sha d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ pra ma da ra hUM draM/ phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje khrag 'thung chen po rnams kyis srung du gsol/ srung du gsol lo// dbang
6a7(86 do): ldan gdon du za ba'i dbang gis// khro ba dang ni 'tshig pa dang / sgra 'dod 'thab mo rko ba dang // rkang lag brkyangs bskums mang po byed// de ba tsa te ye nan hUM draM/
6a8(86 do): tsa yed ra kI la ye b+ha phaT/ dpal ldan gtso bo dang rig sngags kyi mgon po rnams kyis srung du gsol/ srung du gsol lo// nam gru gden du za ba'i dang
6b1(86 do): gis// nam phyed dang ni nyin gung la// cho 'phrul mang po 'byung ba dang // bong bu phag pa'i gzugs ston na// ya mAn ta kr-id kro d+ha hUM draM/ badz+ra kro d+ha kI la ye b+h+yaH
6b2(86 do): phaT/ rta mgrin dmar po dang / khro bo'i stang stabs kyis srung du gsol/ srung du gsol lo// gshin rje gdon du za ba'i dbang gis// rkang lag rengs shing yi ga
6b3(86 do): mchus// skyug bro ba yi nad rnams la// ya ma ra dza hUM druM/ ya ma ra dza kro d+ha kI la ye b+haHphaT/ 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rig sngags dang // mi pham ma yis
6b4(86 do): phur bus srang du gsol/ srung du gsol lo/ klu mo spus 'gro ma'i gdon du za ba'i dbang gis// mig na ba dang rkang pa na// mdze dang shu ba g.yan pa la// nA ga
6b5(86 do): le rA dza hUM druM/ hu ya hu ya hUM druM ki li kI la ye b+h+yaHphaT/ bya khyung he dang drang srong rgan pos srung du gsol/ srung du gsol lo// gnod sbyin gdon du za ba'i dbang gis/
6b6(86 do): sems ni yang yeng seng seng byed// ro stod mnan pa snyam byed cing // kha so na ba'i nad rnams la// te ma mA hri ti ka ra hUM dwai/ kha tra ma kI la ye b+h+yaHphaT/ rnam thos sras
6b7(86 do): kyi rig sngags dang // bum sna dmar pos srung du gsol// srung du gsol lo// nam gru skyong byed gdon du za ba'i dbang gis/ shu ba 'brum bu na ba dang // sha lus
6b8(86 do): na'am g.yan pa'i nad rnams la// he ma mA ti hUM dzAM/ pra ti kI la ya hUM b+h+yaH phaT/ gshin rje thogs med rig sngags dang // mgrin bzang dmar pos srung du gsol/
7a1(86 do): srung du gsol/ nam gru ho gdon du za ba'i dbang gis// 'jigs shing phya sangs byed pa dang // tho rangs bco byed pa'i gdon// ratun tri Sh+T+r-iH/
7a2(86 do): kau ro ma ki la ye b+h+ya phaT/ ya ma he dang 'dod pa dmar pos/ srung du gsol/ srung du gsolo// lag gcig nyab pa'i gdon du za ba'i dbang gis// g.yas kyi phyogs
7a3(86 do): su gzer ba dang // g.yon gyi phyogs su 'greng ba dang // dpung mgo ljang lhung byed pa ni// ra tu na pra ma nir so b+h+ya phaT/ pra ma nan ki la ya hUM druM/ khro bo dbyings dang
7a4(86 do): dbang phyug mas srung du gsol/ srung du gsol lo// so gcig gdon du za ba'i dbang gis// myos shing khrag tu bshal ba dang // mig sngar sna tshogs gzugs
7a5(86 do): ston na// rak+Sha sa hUM draM/ kha ra ka ma kI la ye b+h+yaHphaT/ legs ldan phyir zlog pa dang // dka' thub gtso bo rnams kyis srung du gsol/ srung du gsol lo// dar
7a6(86 do): dkar gur phub nang shed na// bud med nag mo'i tshe 'phrul ni// dus ngan dang ni zan pa dang // 'khrug pa dang ni 'thab pa dang // btsa' dang ser ba 'byung ba ni// d+harma d+hA tu/
7a7(86 do): b+h+ya phaT/ sa ma ya ki la ya hUM hUM b+h+yaHphaT/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rig sngags dang // ting nge 'dzin gyi phur pas srung du gsol/ srung du gsol lo// nam grwa mthing nag
7a8(86 do): gdon du za ba'i dbang gis// ba lang dre'u zhon pa la// nam phyed nyin gung cho 'phrul ni// d+ha ru hUM traM/ sarba ka na te ki la ye b+h+yaHphaT/ dpal chen dbang phyug rig
7b1(86 do): sngags dang // khyab pa dmar pos srung du gsol srung du gsol/ rag gi/ ga mo'i gdon du za ba'i dbang gis/ mgul nad dang ni snying nad ni// klu bdud nag po'i
7b2(86 do): gdon yin pas// na ga ni hUM druM b+h+yaHphaT/ hu ma tsa tu ya kI la ya hUM druM/ seng gdong drag po'i rig sngags dang // dka' thub gtso bos srung du gsol srung du gsolo//
7b3(86 do): lha mo nag mo gdon du za ba'i dbang gis// gzugs med lag pa ston pa dang // gnyid kyi 'thibs shing nad byung ba// kha nas khrag tu sprug pa dang // lus la tshad
7b4(86 do): pa skyes pa dang // mig sngar rlung dang mun sros dang // ya ma te hUM b+haHphaT/ ma mA sa mA yA tsa he ki la ya hUM druM/ hr-i sti ma tri dkar po dang // bya tri dmar mo'i tshogs kyis
7b5(86 do): srung du gsol srung du gsol lo// gri thogs bshan pa gdon du za ba'i dbang gis// gang zhig rkyen zin mig sde ru// bud med gnam sa sleb pa dang // tshub ma'i gzug
7b6(86 do): su sten pa dang // kha nas khrag tu skyugs pa dang // ngar snabs rnag tu 'ong ba la// ha he ra hUM ru tri b+h+yaHphaT/ ra hUM ru tri kI la ya hUM druM/ khyung gi khwa thogs rig sngags dang /
7b7(86 do): dug chen tshar 'dor rnams kyis srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ byang gi gser zang gdon du za ba'i dbang gis// lhog pas rgyab dang lho nad dang // lha gor skrangs
7b8(86 do): 'bur nad byung na// gnod sbyin gdon gyis brlag 'gyur na// ya man a ma tan dar hUM b+h+yaHphaT/ da ra da ra hUM draM/ 'jam dpal ro thun rig sngags dang // mi
8a1(86 do): mdzes pa'i phur bras srung du gsol/ srung du gsol lo// srid pa 'jug byed gdon du za ba'i dbang gis/ ldog pa blo dang sha ser dang /
8a2(86 do): srid pa la sogs dal byung na// ba lang dre'u zhon pa dang // gdung ba'i nga ro sgra sgrog pa// ma mA nan b+h+yaHphaT/ ma mA dza dur kI la ya hUM druM/ gshin rje hring gi rig sngags
8a3(86 do): dang // 'bar ma dpal gyi phur pus srung du gsol srung du gsol lo// srid pa spyi lugs gdon du za ba'i dbang gis// phung byed khang pa btib pa dang // sbas da
8a4(86 do): glang thabs na ba dang // stod gzer snying bcu'i nad byung na// pra na ma nan b+h+yaHphaT/ pra ma Na Na kI la ya d+he druM/ rig 'dzin rgyal po'i rig sngags dang // 'khor ba rab
8a5(86 do): 'joms phur pas srung du gsol// srung du gsol lo// klu bdung phung byed gdon du za ba'i dbang gis// mdze dang shu ba g.yan pa dang // dug sbyor ba dang 'khrug pa
8a6(86 do): dang // gri ru gsod par byed pa yin// klu bdud phung byed gdon yin pas// rA dzA bya// ba rag b+h+ya phaT/ ma mA hU~M ya hUM druM/ rnam thos sras kyi rig sngags dang // mgon
8a7(86 do): po nag po'i phur bus srung du gsel/ srung du gsol lo// phya bdud gza' yi gdon dbang gis// char chu dus su mi phebs na// zan pa bcwa dang mu ge dang // ser ba
8a8(86 do): chen po 'byung ba ni// drang srong gza' yi gdon yin pas// pra mA pa tra ye b+ha phaT/ pa Ta kI la ya hUM draM/ dpal ldan dbyings kyi rig sngags dang // mdzes pas
8b1(86 do): 'dzin phur pus srung du gsol// srung du gsol lo// de kun yongs kyi gtso mo ni// mu kha le ni dbyings ma'i mchog/ srid pa kun gyi yum gcig ma// sems
8b2(86 do): can kun la sman pa mdzad// sems can kun la phan 'gyur mdzod// na ma sarba ta thA ga ta swA hA/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs par gyur cig/ swAhA/ lha mo nag mo'i gtsug
8b3(86 do): tor 'di bklags pa tsam gyis rims dang / sri'u mi sos pa dang / gong ka byung ba dang / yas kyi bdud babs pa dang / 'khrug pa chen po byung ba dang / nad rims thos
8b4(86 do): cad dang / gdon rims thams cad dang / rgyal po'i chad pa dang / btsan gyi 'gru srang la thebs pa dang / gnyen po'i rims su byung ba dang / gtsug lag khang du 'dre
8b5(86 do): chen po zhugs pa dang / mi nag gi rtog pa spro 'dres zin pa dang / mi bde ba thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ dpal gshin rje gshed kyi dpal zla gsang nag po las dpal/
8b6(86 do): lha mo nag mo chen po rol par byed pa'i gtsug tor zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / mang+ga laM//
1a1(87 do): // gtsug tor dkar mo'i zlog sbyar bzhugaso// /
1b1(87 do): gtsug ter dkar mo'i zlog sbur 'di la gtor chen gcig bshams la/ de la jo mo sku mdog dkar mo khro
1b2(87 do): gnyer can/ phyag na mtshon cha dang gdugs dkar thogs pa btsugs te/ lha mo dngos su bsams la/ rang yang sgrol mar sgom/
1b3(87 do): gtor chung gcig gam nyer gcig bshams la/ de la oM AHhUM dang sngags drug phyag rgya drug gis byin gyis brlabs la/ de nas
1b4(87 do): 'di skad du/ hUM b+ho chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan shaka thub sku yi sras// dgra bgegs zlog
1b5(87 do): pa'i mthu mo che// gdugs dkar lha tshogs gshegs su gsol// de bzhin rigs kyi gdugs dkar mo// lha gdon bzlog phyir
1b6(87 do): gshegs su gsol// rdo rje rigs kyi gdugs dkar mo// klu gdon zlog phyir gshegs su gsol// rin chen rigs kyi gdugs
1b7(87 do): dkar mo// dbang gdon zlog phyir gshegs su gsol// pad+ma rigs kyi gdugs dkar mo// rgyal gdon bzlog phyir gshegs su
2a1(87 do): gsol// las kyi rigs kyi gdugs dkar mo// rbod stong zlog phyir gshegs su gsol// e e h+ye hi/ uSh+NI Sha ta pa si/
2a2(87 do): ma hA ka ru Ni/ sa ma ya dzaHdzaH/ jo mo gdugs dkar lha tshogs la// me tog dam pa yid 'ong dam pa dang // bdug spos dam pa na bun bzhin du 'thul/
2a3(87 do): snang gsal dam pa 'od 'bar lhab se lhabs// dri chab dam pa yi rang sangs se sangs// zhal zas dam pa ro brgya dam pa dang // rol mo sil snyen rgyun du mi 'a
2a4(87 do): ga// 'gro ba'i don phyir thugs rjes bzhes su gsal// badz+ra pram+ba d+hU be/ a lo kaM/ kaN+Da/ nai bi te/ shang+ka prA dza segs mud tA skar Nas ma ye hU~M/ oM se
2a5(87 do): bcom ldan dregs rtsal thogs pa med// bdud 'dul lha tshogs kun gyi gtso// 'jigs mdzad ma mo bzhad pa'i zhal// dgra dpung zlog pa'i mthu mo che//
2a6(87 do): gzhan gyis mi thub la sogs pa'i// lha mo nyer gcig gshegs su gsol// dgra bgegs zlog phyir gshegs su gsol// jo mo gdugs dkar lha tshogs la/
2a7(87 do): mdzes pa'i ba ling rgyan gyis brgyan// ba ling mchod pa 'di bzhes la// bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la// byin gyis rlob la bar chad sel// rngom
2a8(87 do): gtsug tor gdugs dkar can// mtshan dang dpe byad rgyan gyis brgyan// sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro// sku chen rdzogs pas sa gsum non// jo mo khyod la
2b1(87 do): phyag 'tshal bstod// blo gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che// lha yi gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol// gtum pa chen po stobs chen mo// klu'i gdon tshogs zlog tu
2b2(87 do): gsol// 'bar ba chen mo stabs chen mo// lha min gdon tshegs zlog tu gsol// dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo// rlung lci'i gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol/
2b3(87 do): babang ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo// mkha' lding gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol// 'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can// dri za'i gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol//
2b4(87 do): rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags// mi 'am gdon chog zlog tu gsol// pad+ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rje'i mtshan// lto 'phye'i gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol/
2b5(87 do): gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can// gnod sbyin gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol// rdo rje mkhar bsnams 'joms pa mo// srin po'i gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol/
2b6(87 do): zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod ma// yi dgas gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol// gzugs zhi gzi brjid chen mo can// sha za'i gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol/
2b7(87 do): 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo// 'byung po'i gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol// rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang // grul bum gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol// rdo rje
2b8(87 do): gzhon nu rig 'dzin ma// srul po'i gdon tshogs pa thog tu gsol// lag na rdo rje rigs gser phreng // lus srul gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol// kheb
3a1(87 do): rgan rtsi dang rin chen ma// skem byed gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol// snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor grags// brjed byed gdon tshogs
3a2(87 do): zlog tu gsol// rnam par 'gyings ma rdo rje dang // spro byed gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol// gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma// grib gnon gdon tshogs zlog tu/
3a3(87 do): gsol// rdo rje 'gros dang dkar mo dang // gnon po'i gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol// pad+ma'i spyan dang tha 'od dang // nam gru'i gdon tshogs zlog tu gsol/
3a4(87 do): tad+ya thA/ oM a na le/ a na le/ bi shud d+he bi shud d+he/ b+hai re b+hai re/ sau me sau me/ badz+ra d+ha ra Ni/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ badz+ra pA ni hUM phaT/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM druM ban+d+ha phaT/
3a5(87 do): ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ nad rigs bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bzlog/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu zlog/ ye 'brog sum brgya drug cu klog/ glo bur brgyad bcu rtsa gcig
3a6(87 do): bzlog/ dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad zlog/ rbad 'dre rgod gtong phur kha zlog/ rmi lam mtshan ma ngan pa zlog/ za kha srid khar zhugs pa zlog/ za 'dre phung 'dre
3a7(87 do): langs pa zlog/ mi mthun mi shis pa thams cad zlog/ hUM b+h+yo/ zas su mngal za khrag mthung ba// za su sha tshil za la sogs// rang rang ba ling 'di
3a8(87 do): bzhes la// bzungs bzong la bcings pa khrol// phyin tshad 'khor 'dir gnod ma byed// hUM b+h+yo/ srid pa'i lha 'dre gnyen po kun// glung dang gtor
3b1(87 do): ma 'di long la// bzhud cig bzhud cig da bzhud cig/ gshegs shig gshegs shig da gshegs shig/ song shig song zhig da song zhig/ mi dang gdon gnyis
3b2(87 do): byel song // gal te mi 'gro mi nyan na// gdugs dkar lha tshogs thugs khros nas// mgo bo tshal pa brgya ru 'gas// lus ni dum bu stong du 'gro// de bas rang
3b3(87 do): rang gnas su dengs// 'di yi bka' las ma 'da' shig/ gal te bka' las 'das pa na// ma mo yongs kyis khrag zor rgyob// chos skyong mgon pos mda'
3b4(87 do): bor rgyog/ dpal ldan lha mos skong zor rgyob// phyogs skyod bcu yis hom zor rgyob// rgyal chen bzhi yis rdo zor rgyob// lhas ngan brgyad cu rtsa gcig zlog
3b5(87 do): las kyi bdud du g.yos pa zlog/ mas kyi sri ni langs pa zlog/ rbad 'dre rgod btong thams cad zlog/ pa mes byur 'dre langs bzlog/ yul na yul
3b6(87 do): chags che ba zlog/ grong na grong chags che ba zlog/ skon sgo chags che ba zlog/ khyim na khyim chags che bzlog/ rmi lam mtshan ma ngan pa zlog/ mo ngan ltas
3b7(87 do): ngan thams cad zlog/ srin pa phyung phyung zer ba zlog/ 'ug pa ha zer ba zlog/ dur sar wa mo brgyal ba zlog/ dur khrod sbyang khu ngu bzlog/ pu ru sha po'i ru 'dzings
3b8(87 do): zlog gamada' yi nya mo gshog 'dzings zlog/ bar gyi pho rog sder 'dzings zlog/ grong gi nag mo bya 'dzings zlog/ srod la bya bo 'tsher bzlog/ nam phyed rta po 'chem
4a1(87 do): pa zlog/ po rangs so khyeng ba zlog/ lo skag zla skrag thams cad thog/ po brgya mnga' war gsor ba zlog/ mo brgya la lhar gse
4a2(87 do): bzlog/ hU~M b+h+yo/ za byed nyi shu rtsa gcig zlog/ lha yi gdon la sogs pa yi// gdon rigs nyi shu rtsa gcig zlog/ gnod byed gdon chen bco lnga zlog/ gdon
4a3(87 do): che dngal pa bcu ba'i theg gi gnong byed lnga srin sde brgyad zlog/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad bcu zlog bdag la gnod byed thams cad rtog/ byams pa
4a4(87 do): gnyen gyis bgyis pa zlog/ rgyal khams mi yis gleng bzlog/ mi kha bram mchu ba ba zlog/ sdang dgra gnod byed thams cad zlog/ bsam ngan sbyor chub thams cad
4a5(87 do): legs na mi dga' nyes na dga' ba thams cad zlog/ rig sngags kyis bcang ngo // phung bus gdab ga// ces gong bzhin brjod// rjes la bkra shis brjod/
4a6(87 do): sngo ba smon lam bya/ 'di la gang dgos gzhung bzhin shes te/ rlung rta rgud pa dang / nad ribs 'bar ba dang / kha sbas thug pa dang / glong ba'i byol po dang /
4a7(87 do): dri ldang ba dang / de la sogs pa gang dgos par byas la/ nyams su blang bar bya'o// tshig don yid la bsams shing snying nas brjod do//
4a8(87 do): gtsug tor dkar mo'i zlog sbyar rdzogs so// zhus dag/ mang+ga laM/
1a1(88 ni): phyir zlog pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// he he//
1b1(88 ni): rgya gar skad du/ pa tra gi ra ra man+ta b+hi rba tsakran ma/ bod skad du/ phyir zlog pa ngan sngags kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba// khro/
1b2(88 ni): bo phyir zlog pa rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// gang dag bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa dang / log par lta zhing rnam par sdang ba dang
1b3(88 ni): gnod par sems zhing bsam sbyor ngan pa dang / byed du bcug cing kham la 'debs pa dang / zod gtong byed ci spod ngan slob dang /
1b4(88 ni): mnan gtad byed pa dang / sbyin sreg byed pa dang / thun zor 'phen pa dang / gnod sems byed pa thams cad bsal du gsol// med
1b5(88 ni): par mdzad du gsol// rnam par 'joms du gsol// phyir zlog tu gsol// nyin dang mtshan du bsrung zlog mdzad du gsol// oM
1b6(88 ni): a hri uSh+NI ShAM bi dza sa na tsakra warti/ sarba lo ki bruM bruM druM dr-i/ ti sta ra lo ki skor/ yan+ta man+ta/ bi shad tse ra Na/ tsur+d+ha pr-i yo ga ye na ke na
1b7(88 ni): ma ra ke ta ke ra Ni/ shan+yA te na sarba le ki kaM pa ya ka~M pa ya/ han ha na/ pA tsA pa tsa/ b+hi tsun pra ta pa ta/ bi d+h+waM sa ya/ tshin+d+ha tshin+tu/ Shin+d+ha
2a1(88 ni): bin+d+ha/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/ sad ta sad ta/ a mu ka na sha ya shan+ti d+hu ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ bdag 'khor bcas pa thams
2a2(88 ni): cad la ye shes pa dang 'jig rten pa'i rgod gtong gtong ba dang / gnod pa thams cad srung du gsol lo// phyir zlog tu gsol swA hA/
2a3(88 ni): sarba tsi ta d+he ba b+hi ga na ro myags/ kha tham srog gzir chud nan/ dril dril/ rta phyug sdig/ shig rbad/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la/
2a4(88 ni): lha 'dre thams cad kyis rbod gtong gtong ba dang / rgyan kha g.yos pa dang / dmod zor dang / dal kha g.yos pa dang / gnod pa thams
2a5(88 ni): cad sa ma ya b+h+yo b+h+yo zlog zlog/ oM ya man+ta ka ha ga nan rbad srungs shig/ spyi gtsug krongs yu b+hi bruM/ u sha khog pa nan/ hrig spags
2a6(88 ni): su yig shog/ pra yig kha yig b+hi hi smrig nan/ yag pa ma ra ya dza/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la gshin rje'i 'khor
2a7(88 ni): lo bskor ba dang / zod gtong gtong ba dang / dmod zor byed pa dang / zer kha gnod pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ oM badz+ra ki
2b1(88 ni): li kI lA ya sarba bi g+ha na baM hUM phaT/ sarba du ka shaM du ru rbad nan/ thai ba thai ti ga nan/ tsur bruM hu ra ba nan/ su ru su ru/ kro d+ha ya d+ho ra ka pos pos/ bub sha bub sha/ swa ra
2b2(88 ni): kur du ma de yid/ sho nam klubs klubs/ pe ta li e man dzu/ pa sha la thums/ bubs shu 'ubs shrA/ kha sha rog po rug pa naM/ hu ru hu ru/ ge ro tsa na ma/ ag trang
2b3(88 ni): ag shaM/ rtsi shang ga ta ya nag po pra ti dza/ sha ling zad/ b+ha ma hUM 'ub/ shi b+hi shag rbad na ne tsan+ti sha ri/ tre kre dun b+h+yo ka li ya/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams
2b4(88 ni): cad la phur pa'i zod gtong gtong ba dang / dmong zor spo ba dang / gnod byed sarba b+h+yo zlog rbad/ oM ru ru rag mo ma ma gang shar mar yA nan/ du ru d+hi ri mar ya/
2b5(88 ni): thums thums sa ma ya/ ma hA se na se na/ ha ma tra ru tra ya/ ru ru rag mo a bar b+h+yo na hUr/ smar mo spar mo/ kha long kha long / bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams
2b6(88 ni): cad la ma mo dang / mon mo dang / bal mo dang / sho na mi'i zod gtong gtong ba dang / dmod ngan slo ba dang / gnod pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog rbad/ oM tsakra b+hu ra b+hu rbang
2b7(88 ni): shag b+hI trag shad/ kha trang kha trang / pi ti yug drag rbad/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la bram ze dang / drang srong dang / mkha'agro ma thams cad kyi
2b8(88 ni): dmong zozing dang / zod gtong gtong ba dang / ngan sngags dang gnod pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog rbad/ oM AHhUM hriHha he b+hu haM kaM ka ki rang / khag sa re re hUM hUM phaT phaT
3a1(88 ni): swA hA/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la ru tra pho brgyud thams cad kyi dmod zor dang / thod gtong gtong ba dang / gnod par byed pa thams
3a2(88 ni): cad sarba b+h+yo zlog zad/ oM b+hu sri kha le mu la ka stod ma/ li ti pra ma ta sha sha ma mkhang khang / khong khong / tham tham/ thum thum/ sbugs spags/ sgyogs
3a3(88 ni): spogs/ 'das 'das/ 'dus 'dus/ ru ru rbad drud/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la ru tra mo brgyud thams cad kyi rbod gtong gtong ba dang / dmod
3a4(88 ni): mo dang / gnod pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog zad/ sarba bya byungs lings/ ma lings ma lings/ he he phaT phaT nag pud pa u le shu/ na ga ra tsa mu le shu ba b+ha
3a5(88 ni): ra tsa na ga ni ga/ badz+ra trag tra shra ho rbad/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad las bdag mo dang / klu mo dang / gnyen mo dang / ma mo dang / bsen mo thams
3a6(88 ni): cad kyi gnod pa dang / rbod gtong gtong ba dang / dmod zor dang / bcings pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog rbad/ oM ra tsa snying kha rag rbad tha ma/ rbad rbad ngam sri
3a7(88 ni): thums/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo// rag mo rag mo ta ta kha kha b+h+yo b+h+yo/ hUM traM traM hUM/ pu ka dkar mo dza// khrigs sho khrigs she/ kha dun kha dun rbang / thi haM thi haM/ ram bri/
3a8(88 ni): ram thims tra shi ba ni/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la rgyal po dang / rgyan thar dang / rgyal po thams cad kyi rgod gting gtong ba dang / dmod zor dang /
3b1(88 ni): gnod pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog rbad/ oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya ha sa bya hu sa bya/ tri ka ra sa ya gur gum na yak+Sha phaT/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la gtsang
3b2(88 ni): btsan dang / 'gong po dang / bgong mo dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi zod gtong gtong ba dang / gnod pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog rbad/ oM kha ba shog pa yug shog/
3b3(88 ni): gur shig/ sha long sbrang yar/ spra shag du na kha rbad/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rjid gtong gtong ba dang / gnod pa thams
3b4(88 ni): cad sarba tsab+h+yo zlog rbad/ oM dur trang dur trang / shri s+thi mu ti bi li si kha ma lo ha he ri li bdud pra ma ni/ mu ti yu sha b+hu ru yo na phaT/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa
3b5(88 ni): thams cad la bdud thams cad kyi rgod gtong gtong ba dang / gnod pa thams cad sarba b+he zlog rbad/ oM b+hi l-i ni du yang / me ma la a na na yak+Sha kha long kha'i/
3b6(88 ni): ya ma du ka pra ma bi li ru bshag tshal par rbad/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la sa bdag dang klu gnyan thams cad kyi rgod gtong gtong ba dang /
3b7(88 ni): 'ching ba dang / gnod pa thams cad sarba tsa b+h+yo zlog rbad/ oM de ba bri ti nan/ har thun b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+rUM hUM/ rag mo rag sha tra ti ni ri khrag nyag raM shag
3b8(88 ni): har thun/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la lha ma srin sde brgyad kyi zod gtong gtong ba dang / ngan sngags dang / da mod zor dang / gnod pa
4a1(88 ni): thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog rbad/ oM sid+ha si la/ b+ha tha ra sin d+ha d+hi ra/ mA ra ya rbang / pa ra mes pa d+hu ru b+hi ra ma san/ si d+hi u ra d+haH/
4a2(88 ni): bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la nang pa sangs rgyas pa'i rbod gteng gtong ba dang / drag sngags kyi gnod pa thams cad tsa b+h+yo zlog rbad/ oM sad
4a3(88 ni): ta sad ti/ sa pa gzar khyi li sid ti lings s+phar skur/ par me sa radagu ru b+hai ra pa/ b+ha na si ti u raH/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la byi ba mu ste
4a4(88 ni): pa thams cad kyi rgod gtong gtong ba dang / ngan sngags kyi gnod pa thams cad sarba tsab+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ oM yang te sgyur bar te khrol/ zad de dza zlog/ e
4a5(88 ni): ka du nas zlog/ tsa dur snying nas zlog/ sa ga du nas zlog/ ma hA du nas zlog kha thun rbad nas zlog/ rak+Sha rbad nas zlog/ yak+Sha rbad nas zlog/ ra tsa rbad nas zlog/ su tri
4a6(88 ni): ra tsa sa zlog/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la srid pa pho brgyud kyi lha 'dre mthu bo che thams cad kyi rgod gtong gtong ba dang / rbad 'dre byed pa thams cad
4a7(88 ni): sarba r+Na b+h+yo zlog dgral chad/ oM ma mo ra tsa ya ma dgral b+h+yo sh+log/ shin trag sham mo bzlog/ rak+Sha ma ti sha na mo ru b+ho/ sa ma ya zlog/ rag mo glad tri pa la yA/ e
4a8(88 ni): ka tsa ti pa~M la yA/ mi sha dgra la rbad/ tsadung snying nas/ thus byedakhor dang bcas pa thams cad la srid pa mo brgyud kyi lha 'dre mthu mo che tha
4b1(88 ni): cad kyi chod gtong gtong ba dang / rbad 'dre byed pa thams cadasarba b+h+yo zlog da na dus zlag/ sa gdun drug/ du dunan zlog/ sa dun zlog snying dun zlog/ shadum/
4b2(88 ni): zlog/ nA ga le le/ dum pa le le/ ku ru sod ta ni/ ku ru dza hUM b+h+yo/ na ga tsi ta snying khrag ril/ snying ta tsi ta snying / na ga'i sha la rbad b+h+yo/ bdag 'khor dang bcas paM thams cad la
4b3(88 ni): sa bdag dang / sa srin dang / klu srin dang / klu rigs thams cad kyi rbad 'dre dang / rgod gtong gtong ba thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la zad / klu'i mnan gtad du bcug pa dang
4b4(88 ni): 'ching bar byed pa thams cad sarba b+h+ye zlog dgral rbad/ oM na ma pri hring rtsi/ nyi ma b+hI ta yA kro ta yA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la na ma na ga ra tsa yA/ oM pra dzA la pu ta pu ta/ bdag 'khor dang badz+ra
4b5(88 ni): pa thams cad la sdang bar byed pa thams cad a mu ka mA ra ya hUM phaT/ dgra bo khyod kyi nus pa thams cad zhi b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ bdag mi nor 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad
4b6(88 ni): la srung du gsol// skyabs tu gsol lo// sgrib tu gsol lo// rak+Sha ku ru ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA kA la man+ta sarba lo ka swA hA/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams
4b7(88 ni): cad la mgon po yongs dang / chos skyong po brgyud thams cad kyi rgod gtong gtong ba dang / 'ching ba thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbang / oM ma hA tsa mur+t+ti man+ta sarba lo ki/
4b8(88 ni): ke swA hA/ bdag mi nor 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la lha mo dang / ma mo dang / chos skyong srid pa mo brgyud thams cad kyi rbad 'dre dang / zod gtong byed pa thams
5a1(88 ni): cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ mahA sa na ga man+ta sarba ko ka swA hA/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad sa bdag dang / klu gzhan thams cad kyis rbod gtong
5a2(88 ni): gtong ba thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dag la rjud/ oM pa ra ti man+ta sa man+ti man+ta pa re maM ge long gi bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la/ bram ze dang / drang srong dang /
5a3(88 ni): mtha' mi gdug pa can thams cad kyi ngan sngags dang / dmang zor gtong ba thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la zang / sha tru a mu ka tsi ta na/ man+t+ra dun b+h+yo zlog/ yan+d+ra du nas
5a4(88 ni): zlog/ sa ti du nas zlog mu tra du nas zlog/ sa ma ya du nas zlog/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la bsam pa ngan pa dang / sbyor ba rtsub mo byed pa thams cad sarba
5a5(88 ni): b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ oM badz+ra ga ra badz+ra ka pa la/ badz+ra ma tha tsha pa yid la/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la rbad 'dre dang / rgod gtong gtong ba dang / gnod pa
5a6(88 ni): thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ khro bo'i drag shul byed pa thams cad sarba b+he zlog dgra la rbad/ gshin rje'i 'khor lo bskor ba thams cad sarba b+he zlog dgra la
5a7(88 ni): rbad/ phur pa'i dpal kha 'phen pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad / ma me'i thun zor 'phen pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ lha'i bka' tshod bab pa tham
5a8(88 ni): cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ bdud kyi khram la btab pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ rgyal po'i chad pas bcad pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/
5b1(88 ni): klu'i gtad khram du bcug pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ gza'i byed phur phog pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la zad/ rgyu skar gyi gzer khwa phog pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra
5b2(88 ni): la rbad/ btsan gyi zhags pas 'debs pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ gnod sbyin gyi chud pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad// dmu'i gnam rdo lhung ba thams cad
5b3(88 ni): sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ gnyen gyi dal kha g.yos pa thams cad sarba b+h+ye zlog dgra la zad/ sa bdag gi ngal kha g.yos pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la zad/ mu stegs
5b4(88 ni): kyi ngan sngags byung ba thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la zad/ drang srong gi dmong pa zug pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ ma me'i dal kha g.yos pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo
5b5(88 ni): zlog dgra la rbad/ rgyal 'gong gi cho 'phrul thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ the rang 'byung po'i cho 'phrul thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la zad/ bdag 'khor dang
5b6(88 ni): bcas pa thams cad la rbod gtong gnod pa dang / phur kha gnod cing 'tshe ba thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ sarba ku ru ya myags/ tsi ti ku ru ya myags/ dun tri/
5b7(88 ni): ku ru ya myags/ ma hA sha pa ra tsa spang ka tsa/ ka pa ya phaT/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la rgya gar gyi ngan sngags 'byung ba thams cad b+h+ri zlog dgra la chad/
5b8(88 ni): rgya nag gi sgyur lto byed pa thams cad bye zlog dgra la rbad/ spyad mkhan gyi b+h+yo lho gtong ba thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ bal po'i rku dug gshom pa thams cad b+h+yo
6a1(88 ni): zlog dgra la rbad/ mi nyag gi ca dang bor ba thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ zhang zhung gi co mar 'phen pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ sum pa'i glang /
6a2(88 ni): zor 'phen pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ stag gzig gi zor mnga' zug pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgral zad/ bod kyi dmod zor ngan pa spro ba thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la zad/
6a3(88 ni): ban d+he'i ban zor 'phen pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la zad/ bon po'i bon zor 'phen pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ gyi ma shad dgra gshed bskor ba thams cad b+h+yo
6a4(88 ni): zlog dgra la rbad/ skye bo'i mda' zor drag po 'phen pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ 'bangs mo'i thal zor 'phen pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ bud med mang
6a5(88 ni): po'i dmod zor ngan pa slo ba thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ phur kha zor kha rbad 'dre rbod gtong byed pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ rbad tshal pas ma ya zlog/
6a6(88 ni): b+h+yo brgyad paT sa ma ya zlog/ sgrogs te rmugs ti sa ma ya zlog tse tri ru tri sa ma ya zlog/ smi sha ku ru sa ma ya zlog tsi ta rbad sa ma ya zlog bdag la gnag pa'i dam
6a7(88 ni): nyams dgra bo 'di'i sha long khrag long / dbugs long mda' lam de khye/ a mu ka mA ra ya rbang / bdag mi nor 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la gnod pa sarba b+h+yo
6a8(88 ni): zlog dgral rbad/ yas kyi bdud g.yos pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la nang / mas nas sri langs pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ pha mtshan gyi rgya 'dre langs/
6b1(88 ni): pa thams cad bye zlog dgra la rbad// mtshan gyi byur 'dre langs pa thams cad b+h+yo sgron dgra la rbad/ ngar chen gyi stong 'dre langs pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ yul mi dang /
6b2(88 ni): pa spun gyi byol gtong ba thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ oM badz+ra ya tri ya tri ma ra b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ ni lang bar dar rbad/ tri ma hi r-i hi ri gtubs gtubs/
6b3(88 ni): snying kha rag tu rgya rbad/ srog la rbad/ dbugs la rngubs/ sha rus khrag rtswa la nur nur/ oM sa tsa du trin pa la b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ nad rigs bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i
6b4(88 ni): gnod pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ gdon rigs stong phrag brgyad bcu'i gnod pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ glo bur brgyad bcu rtsa gcig gi gnod pa thams
6b5(88 ni): cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ ye 'brog sum brgya drug cu'i gnod pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnod pa thams cad sarba
6b6(88 ni): b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ lhas ngan brgyad bcu rtsa gcig gi gnod pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la zad/ dus min 'chi ba rnam pa brgyad kyi gnod pa thams cad saH
6b7(88 ni): b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ rkyen dang bar chong byed pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ hUM hI ba ta ya mo ha bA sha yA zlog zlog/ hUM badz+ra ya tri mA ra ya dza/ sbugs cig
6b8(88 ni): sbugs cig thibs phur nan swA hA/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo skag dang / zla sgeg dang / zhag skag dang / za skag dang / bdud skag dang / nad skag dang /
7a1(88 ni): 'chi skrag dang / tshe zad za 'brangs thems pa dang / ki kang dang / bshad bzhi dang / chags che ba thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ za nyes pa
7a2(88 ni): dang / sgrom nyes pa dang / skom 'thung nyes pa dang / gres bya nyes pa dang / ngan pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgral rbang / gza' dang rgyu skar ches grangs nyes pa dang / mi
7a3(88 ni): mthun mi shis pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la zad/ sha ri b+h+yo zlog khrag mam b+h+yo zlog cir snying b+h+rUM zlog dgra la zad/ mi ti thod khrag dza/ khwa ti snying la yA/ ni tri tshong/
7a4(88 ni): mu lo chod/ sha lo tshad/ shal gyid kying / b+h+yo sa ma ya a ti/ tri ma ta ni pau ra ni b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ gdon bgegs thams cad mA ra ya phaT/ bdag 'khor dang
7a5(88 ni): bcas pa thams cad kyi chags che dang / nyam nga ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ ltas ngan yul sdigs thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad//
7a6(88 ni): mo ngan pa dang / bra stags ngan pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ rmi ltas mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ bya ba nyes pa dang / mna'i nyes pa dang /
7a7(88 ni): sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad bye zlog dgra la rbad/ phyogs ngan 'dre lnga bdud gcod thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ pha mes kyi 'dre ngan langs pa thams
7a8(88 ni): cang b+h+yo zlog dgra la zad/ gri sri dang mtshon sriganod pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la zad/ mya ngan gnod grib gnod pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbang / dgra
7b1(88 ni): kha mtshon kha zug pa thams cad b+hu zlog dgra la rbad/ nad kha rims 'azug pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ ngan brjod mi kha zug pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la
7b2(88 ni): rbad/ ngan brjod mi kha gtong ba thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ mi rung mi 'phrod pa mi shis pa thams cad b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ nag po tsi ti pra ma rak+Sha sad ku ru tA/
7b3(88 ni): myags rbad myags rbad/ nag pe tsi ti snying la rbang / thod pa rug po tra ya rbad/ snying la dum bur bud/ snying lo chung thums/ sa ma ya langs te sbyar/ sarba du
7b4(88 ni): yang chud/ ta khug lo ka pram thigs phur sed/ nis phur song/ zod stong pur kha gnod pa thams cad sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la rbad/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa
7b5(88 ni): thams cad la gnod par sems pa dang sdang bar sems pa thams cad kyi rang mthu rang la zug cig/ rang nus rang la bzlog cig/ rang srog rang gis chod cig
7b6(88 ni): dgra bo kho rang gi lha srung kho rang gi gshed du phob cig/ bdud du phob cig/ sarba b+h+yo zlog dgra la mA ra ya rbad/ hUM ban d+he sha ya myogs/ mye lo sha ya rbad/ lho lo
7b7(88 ni): sha ya rbad/ nu la she ya rbad/ ban+d+he brag tshal pa srog rtsa tshod/ snying rtsa chod/ tshol par zad/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad lazod gtong pur kha gnod
7b8(88 ni): pa thams cad dam nyams a mu ka phye mar phur ya/ bdag gis phyir zlog pa ngan sngags 'di brjod pa'i mthus/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / sdang bar sems pa dang /
8a1(88 ni): bsam pa ngan pa dang / sbyor ba rtsub mo byed pa dang / sbyin sreg byed pa dang / gyi ma shar skor ba dang / gnan gtad du bcug pa dang / gnod par byed pa thams
8a2(88 ni): cad kyi mthu dang / nus pa thams cad bcings so// gzir ro// mnan to// gnod byed thams cad sarba b+hi zlog go// phyir zlog pa ngan sngags kyi 'khor lo 'di ni rmi lam
8a3(88 ni): ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / cho 'phrul sna tshogs byung ba dang / nad yams chen po byung ba dang / lha 'dre'i dal 'a g.yos pa dang / rgyan kha g.yos pa dang / spyad mkhan
8a4(88 ni): gyi gyim shang skor ba dang / byol lho gtong ba dang / ban bon gyi mnan gtad du bcug pa dang / sngags pa'i phur pas 'brub pa dang / pur kha drag po gnod pa dang / de rnam
8a5(88 ni): gang byung yang nang nub bam/ dgongs dmar thag chad tshun chod la/ nya stong dus bzhi la drag po'i sngags rgod 'di nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ yang na bcu bzhi 'am/ lan
8a6(88 ni): bdun ton par gyur na/ phur thogs stong gis bsgrubs kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// bzlas pas ri gzar gyi rbab kyang gyen du zlog go// pas kyi zod tong spos ci
8a7(88 ni): dgos zhes gsungs so// bsrung zlog sgrags mi'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags 'bum 'di slob dpon pad+mas gsungs pa'o// 'di las lhag pa'i zlog pa ni
8a8(88 ni): mi gzugs kyis gtums nas su// 'jig rten ma lus btsal gyur kyang // dred par gyur rin kan// de bas 'di nyid kho na'o// zhes gsungs so// mang+ga la// gcig zhus/
1a1(89 ni): gser 'od rnga sgra zhes bya ba'i gzungs bzhugs s+ho// /
1b1(89 ni): #/ rgya gar skad du/ su brda b+hA pa smr-i taM ge na ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ gser 'od rnga sgra zhes bya ba'i gzungs/
1b2(89 ni): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// nub gcig bdag gi rmi lam no// stong gsum thams cad rnga sgras gang // de dag thams
1b3(89 ni): cad gser rnga ste// kun kyang rnga sgra bur du ru// rnga sgra de la phar nyan pas// rnga dbyangs sna tshogs bsgyur zhing 'bar// rnga 'od 'bar ba
1b4(89 ni): nyin bzhin 'char// rnga sgra chen pos steng gsum g.yos// gnams kun kyang 'gul zhing ldeg/ mtsho chen kun kyang 'khrug cing
1b5(89 ni): rnyog/ ri rab kun kyang snyil zhing 'jig/ klu phrug kun kyang nyams mi bde// bar snang kun kyang rab tu 'khrug/ de ltar rnga 'od rnar
1b6(89 ni): mnyan pas// ji ltar mthu cher g.yul g.yo ba// 'jig rten mgon po su yi mthu// phyogs bcu'i khams su par bltas pas/
1b7(89 ni): khams gsum de dag thams cad na// sA la'i shing drang re re na// rin chen stegs bu mtho tshad du// btsun pa sangs rgyas re re bzhag
2a1(89 ni): de bzhin sa la'i phal ga la// btsun pa sangs rgyas re ro bzhugs// sangs rgyas re re'i zhabs drung na/ byang chub
2a2(89 ni): sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas// gnam gyi me tog char bzhin 'bab// gnam sa rim pa'i lha kun gyis// tshig bzang snyan po du mas
2a3(89 ni): bstod// de dag sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// tshig bzhin mtshungs par gsung phyung ba// gsang sngags rnga sgra 'di dag smras// gser
2a4(89 ni): 'od dam parda sgra'i gzungs la// / tad+ya thA/ b+hu ga nam nor ge/ du hu du hu/ ya med can suH a bA b+ha sa te/ ya pad can tra do'u dang
2a5(89 ni): te gaM ka rak+Sha man dan ta bar ma ku ru swA hA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ud
2a6(89 ni): yi tsir tsi ri/ ud tor/ tor nam/ shan to shan to// u to li/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / rgyal po la
2a7(89 ni): sogs pazlog par 'gyur ro// gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ dad+yab+hUM be+e kar thA/ ko'u ra thi/ ke yu re dan ti la swA hA/ bcom ldan
2b1(89 ni): 'das gser bong dam brda sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal la// gzungasashi ri shi ri/ di mi di mi/ di mi di mi ni/ shi ri shi ri ni/ da ri da ri ni/ bi sha la bi sha la/
2b2(89 ni): pa sha ni pa sha ni ba re swA hA/ sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gzungs bya/ tad+ya thA/ hi ri hi ri ni/ tsi ri tsi ri ni/ ka ri ma ma ni/ swa ba su ni/ dzaM ba ni si stAH
2b3(89 ni): ni ma hA ni sa ya sa pre ka swA hA/ rgyal po dang / bar du gcod pa thams cad smyon par 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra yag sha kro d+ha hUM/ rA dza kro ta a~M ku sha dza dzA/ oM badz+ra pA Na
2b4(89 ni): hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha rA dza si ti a mr-i ta hUM phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra bu ru lu bu ru mu hU~M/ oM badz+ra rag shar dza dum bu dum bu bcing / thum ma le zlum ma le de b+h+yodza dza/ oM
2b5(89 ni): yig sha rA dza tsi ta zungs/ kha rag rma sha rbad rbad/ khun dum bu shig/ d+ha ne re nag sha ci 'byung zad/ zlog na rA dza tsi ta zang / gtubs gtubs rA dze tsi ta gtubs
2b6(89 ni): oM suM b+ha na~M suM b+ha hU~M hUM phaT phaT/ gr-ih+Na grih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ gr-ih+NA pA la grih+NA pA sa rbu hU~M phaT/ A na la tsa b+ha ga wan/ bing+ga ra dza hU~M phaT/ oM rag shA nan/ tsakra nan/ 'byu
2b7(89 ni): bo la sha nan/ su mai ti rag shan na/ dam sri thi'i nan// gnod chabs cheni 'den por gsungs// gnod med rnams la bton gyur na// rnam smin 'bras bu rang
2b8(89 ni): 'byung // gzungs 'di gdon par bya'o// na mo rad na tra yA ya/ krang kri ku teg ti ni/ i ri mi ti/ ko sha ni/ i mi non/ oM ni li swA hA/ oM serna dras tan tri/
3a1(89 ni): nan/ oM hur thums dza ma ra ya rbad// rgyal po dang / gnod byed kyi gdon rnams kyi mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra
3a2(89 ni): 'dis/ byol song khams kyi sems can kun// mi dran ngan pa'i sems bor te// shes rab nyi ma 'char bar shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis// yi dgas
3a3(89 ni): khams kyi sems can kun// nyon mongs sna tshogs byed pa dag/ yi dgas bdud rtsi thob par shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis// sreg cing btso ba'i
3a4(89 ni): sems can kun// zil dang ra bsil ba'i char babs te// nyon mongs de kun rang zhi nas// bla med gnas su phyin par shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis//
3a5(89 ni): chags shing sred pa'i sems can kun// shes rab nyi ma'i 'od byung ste// nyon mongs thams cad zhi bar shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis// gcad cing
3a6(89 ni): gtub pa'i sems can kun// gcing gtubs thams cad zhi gyur te// bdud rtsi btab cing sos par shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis// thig nag
3a7(89 ni): btab pa'i sems can kun// nyon mongs sna tshogs yongs zhi ste// bla med rgyas pa'i sgyid spyong shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis// mun nag 'khod
3a8(89 ni): pa'i sems can kun// yid bzhin rin chen 'od byung ste// nyes sding // dems nyes mthong bar shog/ gser bong dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis/ lcags sdong 'dzeg
3b1(89 ni): pa'i sems can kun// mi bde thams cad yongs bral te// byang chub shing 'dzeg par shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis// mtshon gyi char 'be sems can
3b2(89 ni): kun// chos kyi yul khams 'dir skyes te// bsil dang chos kyis snum par shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis// 'khor ba de dag thams cad las//
3b3(89 ni): kun kyang 'jig rten las 'das pa// khams gsum nang na btsun par shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis// stong gsum khams kyi sems can dang /
3b4(89 ni): de bzhin mtha' med sems can rnams// gshin rdzob khams kyi mya ngan dang // ngan par 'gro ba'i mya ngan dang // dbul por 'gro ba'i mya ngan dang // 'jig rten
3b5(89 ni): khams kun zhi bar shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis// sems can 'jigs pa'i skyabs byas te// khams gsum mya ngan gdung ba dang // byang chub sangs
3b6(89 ni): rgyas thugs rje yis// bsil dang 'jam pa'i char phab ste// nyon mongs kun kyang bde bar shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis// bgegs kyi ngan sems
3b7(89 ni): kun zhi nas// sangs rgyas byang chub myur thob ste// / mgon po'i chos kun thob par shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis// mtha' 'khor skye ba'i skal
3b8(89 ni): dman kun// yul gyi dbus skyes zin pa des// chos byed rgyal por 'phrad par shog/ sdig can snying rjes phyi ma thob// gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis/
4a1(89 ni): 'ad thugs grud pa'i sems can dag/ de dag bgags yul gar skyes kyang // shes rang byang chub sems thob ste// bla me yang dag gnas su
4a2(89 ni): shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis// dbus long 'joms pa'i sems can kun// snang gsal chos kyi lam grub nas chos mig gtsang dang 'phrad
4a3(89 ni): par shog/ gas bad das pa'i dusgra 'dis// yod par lta ba'i me dag kun/ drin 'dzin rang sems ma g.yos te// bshes gden byang chub sems
4a4(89 ni): 'grogs shing // don kun dge 'byed par shog/ gsung 'dadas pa'i nga ste 'dis// mthangs brgyan pa'i sang skyes dang sa// bdun skyes pa'i sems ca/
4a5(89 ni): dge/ sgrib pa de dag kunags pa te// bla med chos kyi zhi ba 'thob// gsor 'od dam pa'i rdzan 'das// khams gsum pa tan yongs bral te// 'tsha/
4a6(89 ni): ba'i mngan rgyun kun ba shig/ bdud kyi sde kun bshig bral te// bla med yang dag gnas su shog/ gsar 'od dam pa'i rngaH/ 'dis// sems can thams/
4a7(89 ni): cad thos sa cig/ byang sems spyong rjes mi g.yos te// kun la khyab pa'i brtse ba yis// 'jig rten pa ma byed par shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dri/
4a8(89 ni): sems can thams cad thos so cog/ bla ma'i bka' bzhin byengad pa dang // seng ge'i sgra dbyangs 'byin par shog/ gser 'ong dab pa'i rnga sgra 'dis//
4b1(89 ni): sems can thams cad thos so cog/ grangs med sdig kyi la sogs pa// zangs gcig thos pas kun byung ste/ bla med yang dang // gnas su shog/ gser 'ong
4b2(89 ni): dam pa'i rnga sgra 'dis// dug gsum spyod pa'i sems can dag/ byang chub spyod pa'i thabs legs te// khams gsum ka snying rje char bzhin 'bebs/
4b3(89 ni): gser 'od dam pa'i rnga ste 'dis// s+m+R+YuM zan khams kyi sems can kun// rgyags dregs drag pa'i sems bor te// nga rgyal btung snyoms rmugs
4b4(89 ni): rnyed pas// 'dres rtog ting 'dzin mi gso sbyong// gser 'od dam pa'i rngam 'des// mi yul khams kyi bcan phyug dag/ 'gro pa lnga yi sems bong gi// sdom
4b5(89 ni): pa gsum gyi chos la spyod// mya ngan rgya mtsho zhig par shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i dzasgra 'dis// sems can nyon mongs med par byed// sdug bsngal gsum
4b6(89 ni): gyi mdud pa bcad// khams gsum btson 'dra bas na/ de phyir khyod ming 'jig rten mgon// gser 'od dam pa'i rnga skrag/ des// bdud sde log pa'i 'am
4b7(89 ni): kun ni// lnga phung dum pa khyod kyis bshig/ da pyid khyod meng bcom ldan 'das// khyod kyi me yang ye shes kyis// ma shes mi mthong yi nas med// de kyi
4b8(89 ni): khyod ming thams cad brtson// gsang bang dam pa'i dza sgra 'dis// khyod ma mi tshan cig kyang med// rnam sa cig gis pasod nams 'thog// gleng rgya kun kyang

1a1(90 nu): dag pa gser gyi mdo thig bzhugs so// /
1b1(90 nu): rgyas sa
1b2(90 nu): rgya dag skad du/ gtsug lag 'phrul gyi 'gyur rtsis srid pa lha'i skad du/ kong tse ling tse mer ma rol ma zhes bya ba/
1b3(90 nu): bod skad du/ gza' skar gsang ba'i zu tse bskol gyi mdo zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ thams cad kun 'dus ma lus 'byung ba'i phyir/
1b4(90 nu): 'byung ba lnga la dbang sgyur 'byung ba lnga yi bdag/ thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad yongs kyi rje// nyon mongs ma lus 'dul mdzad
1b5(90 nu): pa/ nyon mongs dug lnga kun 'dul tshegs/ thams cad byang zhing gnas su dag mdzad pa'i// byang sems sangs rgyas shes rab lnga
1b6(90 nu): ldan pa// lha dang lha mo thams cad bzhugs pa kun// thugs rje'i sbrul skus 'gro don mdzad pa'i phyir// yid 'ongs mdzes ldan
1b7(90 nu): po zang gnas 'dir gshegs// chags med gsal mdzad 'ja' tshon lha yi gnas// rnam dag pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/
1b8(90 nu): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ji snyed bzhugs pa la// lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// sems can nyon mongs
2a1(90 nu): bag chags sdig sgrib dang // las ngan 'khrul pa'i dug gsum rtsad gcad phyir// byang sems nyon mongs dug
2a2(90 nu): lnga 'dul mdzad pa// ston pa bla med 'gro ba yongs kyi mgon// de dag thams cad bzhugs pa'i spyan lam du// 'khrul pa'i
2a3(90 nu): las dang dug lnga 'khrul/ bsang bcad brdung brdeg rku 'phrog dang // rdzun dang phra ma g.yan dang gcugs// ci bgyis thams cad
2a4(90 nu): mthol lo bshags// 'jig rten lha tshogs 'gro ba'i mgon// 'gro ba'i mgon mdzad lha yi dpal// dregs pa can dang gdug
2a5(90 nu): pa can// nga rgyal can dang pra dog can// las dang las ngan las skyes pa'i// bar snang mkha' la rgyu ba'i rje// drang srong chen po
2a6(90 nu): gza' chen brgyad// rgyu skar lha mo nyi shu brgyad// sum cu rtsa gsum lha yi gnas// kun du rgyu dang kun du 'khor ba'i tshogs//
2a7(90 nu): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams gnas pa'i bdag/ drang srong rgyal po sprul pa'i 'khor// suM cu rtsa gsum lha yi pho brang du// ji
2b1(90 nu): ltar gdan bzhugs yin par bar snang mkha' la 'khor// ri rab ri bo'i mkha' la bzhugs pa kun// drang srong rgyal ba kun mgon lha yi bu// srid pa'i srid rtsi
2b2(90 nu): 'byung ba'i bcud sdud pa// thams cad ma lus 'khor zhing gnas pa'i bdag/ gnya' shing 'dzin la sogs pa gser gyi ri bdun skor// rgyal chen rigs bzhi
2b3(90 nu): bang rims bzhi la gnas// lha srin sde brgyad 'khor na gnas pa'i gtso// lha chen klu dang gnod sbyin chen po dang // mi min mkhri' la rgyu ba'i 'phrul lag sgron khyed/
2b4(90 nu): tshogs// sprul pa 'bum 'byin rdzu 'phrul mtha' dag ston// ha la 'bar ba gdug pa can gyi tshogs// ha 'dzin gdug pa gser gyi me sgron tshogs// gnod sbyin
2b5(90 nu): gdug pa can dang rgyal po'i tshogs// sangs rgyas bka' 'dzin ston pa'i bka' mnyan pa'i// bdud dang srin po btsan tshogs rmu yi rje// rtsub can 'khor dang ldan pa'i
2b6(90 nu): 'khor lo can// ston pa'i bka' ni 'gyur ba med pa'i don// sra ba'i go gyon gti mug mun pa sel// bgegs 'dul nyon mongs tshar yang gcod// drang srong lnga
2b7(90 nu): lnga dbang du btsugs// 'gro ba'i don du dkyil 'khor bcas// rgyan dang yo byad mchod pa bshams// me tog gcal bkram chu gtsang sbyar// dri dang tsan dan gla
2b8(90 nu): rtsi sbyar// gur gum rgya spos spos me sbyar// 'gro ba'i don du byams sems bskyed// nyon mongs mtha' dag snying rje sgom// 'gyur ba med pa'i pho brang nas//
3a1(90 nu): // drang srong 'gyur med spyan yang drangs// 'byung ba lnga yi bshul yang mtshon// shar phyogs skyed byed shing gi lha lho phyogs gso byed me yi lha// nub phyogs
3a2(90 nu): brtan pa lcags kyi lha// byang phyogs kun gso chu yi lha// mtshams bzhi 'gyur med sa yi lha// lha lnga'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// gdug pa 'dul byed rdzu 'phrul
3a3(90 nu): can// sku yi cha lugs bsam mi khyab// sprul pa'i sku mnga' mkha' la 'gro ba'i dpal khros pa'i cha byad 'gying dag brkyang bskum mdzad// bgrang pa'i zha
3a4(90 nu): kyis thams cad gnon// thams cad dbang sdud 'byung ba'i lha// 'byung ba'i ngang du ma 'dus gang yang med// dang po srid nas bar du chags// mtha' ma 'jig
3a5(90 nu): kyang 'byung bas 'jig/ 'byung ba bya ba'i dbang po che// 'gro ba rigs drug sems can gyi// rkyen dang rgyu dang sa bon rnams// 'byung ba'i 'od gsal 'byung ba
3a6(90 nu): lnga yi 'ong// 'byung ba lnga yi lha chen rnams de bzhin de dang ldan pa'i dpal// dpal ldan lha chen tshangs pas bshad// tshangs pa'i gnas nas sgra sgrogs pa'i//
3a7(90 nu): drang srong lha chen rnams kyis gsungs// 'byung ba lnga la thams cad ldan// thams cad bskyed pas 'byung ba'i lha// cha lugs sna tshogs 'od zer bkra/ 'byung ba
3a8(90 nu): sku la 'od mdangs gsal// thabs kyi sprul pa thabs kyis mdzad// mi mngon rgya mtsho'i rus sbal ltar// ston pa sku sbrul sangs rgyas spyan// 'das dang
3b1(90 nu): 'ongs thams cad gzigs// lha chen lngar sbrul 'byung ba'i klong // klong lnga yangs pa'i mkha' dbyings nas/ thams cad 'dul ba'i thig le 'chang // phyag stong
3b2(90 nu): rnams kyis mtshon cha 'dzin// shes rab ral gris thams cad sgrol// ye shes mnga' gzhus sdug bsngal 'joms// thar lam 'byed pa'i stobs po che//
3b3(90 nu): dbyings dang ye shes 'gyur ba med// mdzes sdug mdangs ston 'byung ba'i lha// dug lnga spangs pa 'byung ba'i sku// sra brtan 'gyur med sku banga' ba'i/
3b4(90 nu): nyi ma lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba'i// rang byung gsang ba 'byung ba'i lha/ thams cad 'dul zhing bgegs rnams 'joms// sa yi dug dang me yi dug/ shing la gnas
3b5(90 nu): pa'i dug 'dul ba// chu dang lcags ni de bzhin du gcod 'dral mi mthun 'byung ba'i dug/ thams cad ma lus zhi byed shog/ phyogs bcur khyab pa'i bde
3b6(90 nu): gshegs byang chub sems// de dag la mchod me tog la/ sogs 'byung ba'i gter// rgyu la mdzes pa'i rin po che// sems can sdug bsngal bsgrub pa'i
3b7(90 nu): phyir// kong rtse lha yi gsol ba btab// yi dam 'byung ba'i lha lnga mchod// lha lnga mchod pas bde ba thob// bde ba chen po bde ba'i ngang // de nas rdzogs
3b8(90 nu): pa'i sangs rgyas dang // byang chub ye shes tshogs dang ni// sems can spyi mthun smon lam rgyu// smon lam rang bzhin grub pa'i mchog/ mchog ldan sems
4a1(90 nu): // can kun gyi gter// bsod nams kun la rje yi rang // byang chub lam du sngas bstan nas// rim pa bzhin du tshangs pa'i gnas/ bzhi po yang ni kun du
4a2(90 nu): 'brel// kun du 'brel ba kun du gnas// 'byung ba'i rgyu las rgyu bstan pa// rgyu med pas ni mtshan ma med// rang bzhin dgra gi dngos po rnams// de la de bzhin
4a3(90 nu): ngang gis 'brel// bsod nams tshogs bsags 'byung ba'i lha// sku gsung thugs kyi khyad par las// thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu 'bras 'brel// nges pa
4a4(90 nu): 'bras bu srid pa'i rgyu// 'byung ba lnga snang srid pa'i phugs// g.yu yi gnam yol kun gyi pa// gser gyi sa gzhi kun gyi ma// ri rab lhun po dngos grub ri// rgya
4a5(90 nu): mtsho'i mching rnam bdud rtsi'i snod// kha le stong 'jam smon lam shing // nam mkha' khyung chen dbang gis phug/ nyi zla gza' skar rdzu 'phrul lha// bar snang mkha
4a6(90 nu): la yod par lhang nge gsal// gnas yin 'khor ba 'byung bas btsal// 'byung ba lnga yi 'khor lo sgyur// rlung lnga 'byung ba'i snying pos bzung // 'byung ba'i sa
4a7(90 nu): bon rlung gis bskyed// 'byung ba'i lha lnga rlung gis grub// rlung gis rlung chags 'byung ba'i rgyu// thams cad rlung gi klong du yangs// klong yangs rlung gi char chen pog/
4a8(90 nu): rlung lnga pad+ma'i 'khor lo nges// rdo rje rgya gram rlung gi sgra yis sprul// 'byung ba'i snying po de las bskyed// rlung gis thams cad ma lus 'gyogs// rlung gi rgyal po lnga
4b1(90 nu): yi mchog/ sems can ma lus mtha' dag gi// dbugs kyi khwa 'byed dbang po'i kha mdangs sel// dngas snyigs 'byed pa rlung gi mchog/ du gu sel ba rlung gis skyob//
4b2(90 nu): 'dres gsal bas rlung lnga rdzogs// las mtha' grub pa rlung gis bskyed// rlung gi lha lnga pya las skyob pa ste// bde ba'i 'bras sam rlung gis bskyed// rlung lha gar
4b3(90 nu): mkhan lha yi lha// lha yi rgyal pos thams cad mdzad// rlung lha bde ba chen po'i 'khor// sna tshogs gzugs med mkha' la rgyu// dang po rlung gi ngang las 'byung ba
4b4(90 nu): chags// 'byung ba'i rten pur rlung gis grub// rlung gi lha chen khyab pa che// thams cad kun du khyab pa'i dpal// sems can nyon mongs mtha' dag gi/ ma lus
4b5(90 nu): sgrib pa sel ba dang // rlung las gyur pa'i nad yams dang // bar chad sdug bsngal rkyen dang byung // lus 'jig tshe nyams dbang thang 'phrog/ bgegs kyi bar chod lta
4b6(90 nu): ngan than// gdug pa'i las ngan rlung 'khrugs dang // rlung las rlung phar rlung 'bud pa'i// thams cad ma lus de dag gis// gcod dang dbugs ni nyam pa yi// 'khor
4b7(90 nu): lo bskor dang gdug pa ston// bar du gcod cing sdug bsngal 'bebs/ 'byung ba log pa bdud dang gshed// bdud kyi bar chod sel phyir du// rgong rtse lha yi rgyal po yis//
4b8(90 nu): bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor bcas// ting 'dzin g.yo med rab tu bsgoms// shes rab byams pa'i sems bskyed de// dag pa gser gyi mdo thig 'di brtsams pas
5a1(90 nu): // sdug bsngal ma lus thams cad byang // sngags dang snying po 'di skad brjod// yaM yaM sa la sal ge re du// yaM te khru te che yang phaT// zhi zhi yi ge g+hu ma hA/
5a2(90 nu): de skad snying po brjod pa yis// sems can thams cad mdangs dang ldan// kha dog legs shing sha bkrag rgyas// bar tshad bgegs dang lhas dran zhi// 'byung ba
5a3(90 nu): rlung gi sdug bsngal byang // rlung gis sems can ma lus gso// thams cad bskyed cing thams cad skyob// rlung gis snying po mdo thig 'di// gser bzhin bcang
5a4(90 nu): shing bklags pa yis// thams cad nad dang sdug bsngal zhi// mi bde sdug bsngal dag par nus// nus mthu de dag 'di las byung // rgong rtse'i rgyal pos 'di
5a5(90 nu): bklags pas// rang la bar chod bgegs mi tshugs// kun gyis 'khur zhing yongs kyi skyob// de bas 'di bklag yon tan che// de tshe 'byung ba rlung gi 'od las
5a6(90 nu): 'byung ba me yi pad ma 'phros// me las 'od yod pas na me zhes bya// thar thugs gsal bas me zhes bya// ci yang med pas me zhes bya// thams cad smin grol
5a7(90 nu): me yi mchog/ nyon mongs 'bar 'bur me yis sreg/ me yis las byed thams cad gso// gnyis med gnyis su med par 'khrigs// 'byung ba me yis tham
5a8(90 nu): cad 'gyogs// 'byung ba mtha' dag dug rtsub sel// stong nyid bde ba'i ngang la 'dus// theg chen me yis thams cad gso// 'byung ba'i drod 'byin me yi mchog/
5b1(90 nu): me yi kun mtha' kun 'byung mchog/ me yi lha lnga 'gro ba'i mgon// thugs rjes rgyud ldan sprul pas khyab// nyon mongs sgrib sel dug lnga 'dul// me yi las la 'byung
5b2(90 nu): ba 'gyegs// stobs chen me yis rdzu 'phrul 'gyed// kun ldan 'byung ba me yi gtso// gtso bo lnga 'dus me yi lha// gso byed me yi phung po gso// skyed byed me yis
5b3(90 nu): che sreg skyed// mdangs ston me yis lus mdangs bskyed// me lce'i rgyal po ag ne de// a ram 'phrul gyi khril bzhugs// cha cha 'phro ba'i stobs po che// stong /
5b4(90 nu): pa las byung 'byung ba me// kun la khyab pa'i 'byung ba me// snang dang nyi ma'i 'od chen 'bebs// 'jig rten khams gsum drod ston pa'i// thams cad drod kyi ngang lA
5b5(90 nu): grol// ri rab rgya mtsho gser gyis// de dag thams cad drod las 'tsho// chags pa chen po me yi drod// kun du snang byed me yi 'od// thams cad kun du khyab pa'i
5b6(90 nu): mchog/ sems can nyon mongs mtha' dag gi/ ma lus bag chags sel ba dang // skyon sgrib sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i 'dam// me las gyur pa'i nang rnams dang //
5b7(90 nu): chad pa'i nang dang 'khru nang dang // bar chad sdug bsngal rkyen dang byung // mi 'phrod pa yi 'jigs pa dang // mi yi tsha de nad 'khor ba'i dug/ me dug me nad tsha ba'i
5b8(90 nu): nang / lus 'jig phung po 'khor ba'i bdud// tshe nyams dbang zad rku ba'i bgegs// bgegs dang bgegs chen las kyi bdud// nyon mongs 'dod chags
6a1(90 nu): 'khor ba'i gshed// gshed bdud nyon mongs lhas ngan than// gdug pa'i las ngan tsha ba g.yob// tsha dang sreg dang 'phar ba'i nad// skem byed spyod spyod byed/
6a2(90 nu): ba'i nad// sdug bsngal mtha' dge stong pa'i bdud// me las gyur pa'i nad sel ba// rgong rtse lha yi rgyal po yis// kun ldan 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor bcas// ting
6a3(90 nu): 'dzin 'khrul med rab tu bsgoms// snying rje ldan pa'i sems bskyed de// dag pa gser gyi mdo thig 'di brtsams pas// nyon mongs mtha' dag sdug bsngal byang /
6a4(90 nu): snying po sngags chen 'di dag brjod// raM raM sting phur raM ge re 'du/ tsa ba phaT/ ma ma raM te nye phur/ ge g+ha d+ha sang zhi ba 'dul// de skad snying po brjod pa des// sems can
6a5(90 nu): thams cad drod dang ldan// dbang po gsal zhing bde ba thob// nyon mongs sdug bsngal dag las thar// ltas ngan than dang bar chod zhi// 'byung ba me yi sdug bsngal
6a6(90 nu): byang // me yis sems can ma lus bskyed// thams cad bskyed pa me yi mthu// me yi snying po mdo thig 'di// gser bzhin bcangs shing bklag par 'os/
6a7(90 nu): thams cad sdug bsngal mi dge bas// nad dang skyon gyis bsdus pa'i bgegs// de dag thams cad dag par nus// nus mthu thams cad de las 'byung //
6a8(90 nu): rkeng rtse'i rgyal pos 'di bklags pas// rang la bar chod bgegs mi tshugs// 'byung ba me yi lha yis skyob// bsod nams dbang thang rgyas par nus/
6b1(90 nu): se las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal zhi// las ngan bdud kyi bgegs rigs 'dul// des na klags pa'i yon tan che// de tshe mo yi cha dang las// 'byung ba chu yi 'khor lo
6b2(90 nu): chags// thams cad chub pas chu zhes bya// chu yis thams cad kun du khyab// khyab pa chen po chu yis phul// sprul pa'i las la grub pa'i chu// sna tshogs bzhi
6b3(90 nu): ldan bdud rtsi'i klong // bdud rtsi grub pa chu yi lha// du mar gsal ba chu yi mchog/ 'byung ba chu yi shugs las grub// lcags drag dar chen chu yi rgyu// shugs
6b4(90 nu): ldan chu yi kha dog las// sems ldan 'khor ba'i sha khrag bskyed// lus dang sems su gnas byed chu// chu yi bdud rtsi chu yi dang // 'khor lo shugs ldan
6b5(90 nu): chu yi rlan// rlan byed chu yi 'byung ba gso// rtsal gsum rdzogs pa'i thig le can// zad pa med pa'i thig le 'chang // thig le 'gyur med me la brten//
6b6(90 nu): yi snying po rlung gi sa bzung // chu yis thams cad bskyed pas chu// g.yo ba'i rang bzhin dang du 'dus// 'dus pa'i chu rgyun zad pa med// rgya mtsho lta bu chu
6b7(90 nu): yi dang // ngang las g.yo 'gul med pa'i rten// chu yang lha chen du ma brten// ri rab gser gyi gling chen bzhi// de bzhin de yi rlan gyis brtsas// 'gyel ba
6b8(90 nu): med pa sra brtan theg/ rol pa'i mtsho bdun de ltar chags// ma ngo rgyas mdo 'phel 'byung ba de ltar chags// 'byung ba chu yi lha chen gtso// chu las bdud rtsi
7a1(90 nu): // rang 'khyil che// 'khyil zhing spogs pa rang bzhin shugs// rlan byed chu yis phung po bskyed// bdud rtsi chu yis phung po gso// kun grub chu yis 'bras
7a2(90 nu): bu 'tshal// 'dod byed chu yis gti mug sbyong // chu lha'i rgyal po 'khor lo can// 'khor lo lnga ldan phyag las 'grems// ye shes lnga'i sdong po rgyas// @/
7a3(90 nu): rol phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid// rnam shes drug ldan phung po'i bcud// bcud ldan bcud 'phel 'byung ba chu// chu yi ngar ldan 'khyag cing grang // zla ba'i 'od ldan
7a4(90 nu): de bzhin gsal// 'jig rten khams gsum gso bskyed mdzad// khams gsum thams cad chu yis gso// de ldan de bzhin chu dang ldan// chu yi 'byung ba
7a5(90 nu): chu la rdzogs// de bzhin gnyis 'brel thams cad 'byung // kun du grub pa chu yi lha// bag chags sgrib sel chu yi mthu// mthu stobs de yis nyon mongs
7a6(90 nu): 'dul// dga' ba grub pa kun gyi mgon// mgon mdzad mgon gyis thams cad skyob// thams cad re ba skyabs kyi mchog/ de bzhin 'byung ba chu las 'od
7a7(90 nu): sems can nyon mongs mtha' dag gis// ma lus sdug bsngal sbyong ba dang // skyon dang bag chags sdig sgrib dang // bar chod rkyen dang 'byung ba'i dgra
7a8(90 nu): chu las gyur pa'i gdon dang bgegs// grang ba chu las gyur pa'i nad// ma zhu ba dang rdol nang dang // rgyu khris rgyu nad chu yi dug/ zas zos dug du gyur pa yi//
7b1(90 nu): rmu chu rngus khyer chu dgra dang // chu g.yos chu dgra 'gul ba zlog/ gdug pa'i than lhas ngan pa zlog/ mi yi lus la nyams bsod dang // gzugs kyi phung po/
7b2(90 nu): bshig pa dang // tshe srog bar du gcod pa zlog/ khar rje dbang thang dag la rku ba dang // 'byung po las ngan bgegs dang bdud// bdud dang las la
7b3(90 nu): 'khor ba'i gshed// 'jig rten spyi mthun bsod nams 'phrog/ kun la 'tshe ba byed pa rnams// de dag thams cad zhi bar mdzod// rkeng rtse lnga yi
7b4(90 nu): rgyal po yis// bsod nams rab 'phel dkyil 'khor bcas// yi dam lnga gsal 'gyur med ting 'dzin bsgoms// tshad med bzhi ldan byams pa'i sem
7b5(90 nu): bskyed de// dag pa gser gyi mdo thig 'di brtsams pas// sdug bsngal phra dog dug lnga'i sgrib pa byang // snying po sngags tshig 'di dag brjod// maM maM sa maM
7b6(90 nu): du ye maM 'du// pra ha ra hUM du phaT/ maM d+ha ke sha khaM ra du/ de skad snying po brjod pa des// sems can thams cad sha lus rgyas// dbang po'i dang ma kun kyang
7b7(90 nu): gsal// 'khrul pa med cing g.yo ba med// rang bzhin lhun grub bde ba thob// byams pa ldan zhing snying rje che// sems can mi la gnod pa skyel ba de// zan
7b8(90 nu): ngan la nye ngan pa dang // thams cad 'di yis thar par 'gyur// 'byung ba chu yi sdug bsngal byang // chu 'di sems can kun gyi gsos su che// thams
8a1(90 nu): // cad gsebachu yi mthu// chu yi snying po mdo bag 'di// gser bzhin bcang zhing bklag par bya// sdug bsngal bag chags sgrib pa dang // dri zhugs dri ma
8a2(90 nu): ngan pa dang // nang ngan mi gtsang la sogs dang // de dag thams cad dag par 'gyur// nus mthu de dag 'di las 'byung // rkong rtse'i rgyal pos 'di bklags pas//
8a3(90 nu): bar chod bgegs kyis mi tshugs dang // 'byung ba chu yis lha yi skyob// za thang bsod nams rgyas par 'gyur// chu las gyur pa'i nang rnams dang // de dag
8a4(90 nu): myur du zhi bar lta// des na 'di bklags yon tan che// sngon tshe chu yi rba rlabs las// rin chen gser gyi sa gzhi grub// 'gyur ba med cing g.yo ba med/
8a5(90 nu): rang bzhin khang dang rim gyis chags// sa gzhi rin po che yi dang // thams cad mdzes pa'i gser dang ldan// gser gyi ngo bo kha dog las// sa yi snying po
8a6(90 nu): rab tu bzang // 'bar ba med pa gser gyi brjid// rang bzhin gnas pas yi mthu// 'byung ba sa las rin po che// lnga ldan 'byung ba lnga yi shugs// gang 'dod
8a7(90 nu): thams cad de las 'byung // sems can 'dod pa de yis skong // bla med ston pa'i thugs rje dang // sangs rgyas byang sems rab rdzogs pa'i// dge ba'i
8a8(90 nu): rtsa ba de bzhin 'grub// de ldan sems can nyon mongs spangs// de bzhin mthong med 'gyur mi srid// de bzhin de ldan 'byung ba'i ngang // ngang las ma g.yos
8b1(90 nu): rin chenas// bde ba bkod pa gser gyi phugs// thams cad rten la thams cad gnas// 'pho med 'gyur med sre zhing brtan// 'gro ba rigs drug de bzhin gnas//
8b2(90 nu): thams cad gnas pa sa'i gzhal yas mchog/ 'byung ba sa yi dkyil 'khor rgyas// kun du khyab pa'i sde brgyad rin po che// kun la dgos pa de bzhin yod// dang ldan
8b3(90 nu): mos pa'i sems dang phrad// gti mug mun pas bsgribs pa yi// nga rgyal can de mi yi 'khor// sa las spyod pas yi dang // thams cad de bzhin sa las grol//
8b4(90 nu): byams sems ldan pa ye shes che// lha mo bstan ma sa yi lha// rdzu 'phrul gzugs 'chang sa yi bcud// sa las grol bas kun gzhi rgyas// rgyas pa rab ldan
8b5(90 nu): rab kyi gzugs// sa chen gsum po 'gro ba'i don// 'byung ba'i gzugs can de ru rdzogs// skye shi med pas yi khams// khams brgyad rnam shes sprul pa yi//
8b6(90 nu): sprul skus khyab pas khams gsum dbyings// sa chen 'byung ba sa yi bcud// bcud du rdzogs pa ri rab yin// kha dog 'byung ba lnga las grub// rin po che yi
8b7(90 nu): 'od lnga 'bar// sna tshogs gzugs can 'byung ba'i gzugs// thams cad de la gnas shing 'khor// 'byung ba lnga las grub pa'i mchog/ mchog tu ldan pa lnga
8b8(90 nu): yi gnas// sa yi lha lngas thams cad skyed// khyab byed sa yis gzugs phung bskyed// de ldan sa yis bkrag mdangs 'byin// gsal ldan sa yis 'od mdang
9a1(90 nu): // gter// kun ldan sa yis dran pa sbyor// sa yi lha lngas thams cad gso// bde ba dran pas yis byed// sa yis bya ba thams cad 'grub// skal ldan 'byung /
9a2(90 nu): ba'i gter la spyod// bag chags byang bas byang chub gter// kun du spyod pas yi bcud // de bzhin 'byung ba sa yi rtsi// bdud rtsi bya bas yi bcung // de las lhag/
9a3(90 nu): pa'i bdud rtsi ming// gso bskyed 'byung ba de yis thams cad gso// sems can nyon mongs mtha' dag la// ma rig 'khrul pa'i sdug bsngal dang // ma rig sem
9a4(90 nu): kyi zhen chags dang // rtog pa med pa'i bying rmugs dang // le lo btang snyoms nad dang skyon// shi zhing chad dang brlag pa dang // sa las gyur pa'i gdon dang bgeg
9a5(90 nu): lci zhing 'thib pa'i nad dag dang // spro dang 'bog dang rmugs dang non// sa gzhi sa g.yos sa 'gul zlog/ sa nad sa yi cho 'phrul gshed// tshe la gnod dang bar du
9a6(90 nu): gcong // dus min 'chi dang sgra ngan sgrog/ gdug pa'i cho 'phrul ston pa'i tshogs// de dag thams cad zhi bar mdzod// rkong rtse lha yi rgyal po yis// 'byung ba'i
9a7(90 nu): mdo thig 'di brtsams pas// 'khrul pa ma rig mgo ba'i// nyon mongs bying rmugs sgrib pa byang // snying po sngags chen 'di dag brjod// khe ra sil ma du ma yi/
9a8(90 nu): du ma ye// khaM ke ma hA a mu du// de skad snying po brjod pa des// sems can thams cad dga' ba bskyed// lus rgyas bcud 'phel sha khrag gsal// gdug
9b1(90 nu): pa can gyi gnod pa zhi// mi gdug cho 'phrul mtha' nas sangs// legs pa'i yon tan thams cad 'phel// byams sems dang ni snying rjer ldan// thar pa'i bde la
9b2(90 nu): thob par 'gyur// sa yi sdug bsngal nyon mongs sgrib pa byang // sa la gnas pa'i sems can bgegs// thams cad 'gegs pa sa yi stobs// sa yi
9b3(90 nu): snying po mdo thig 'di// gser bzhin bcang zhing bklag pa yis// mi mthun rkyen dang sdug bsngal than// las kyis mnar ba'i sems can nyon mongs bdud//
9b4(90 nu): nus mthu 'di yis dag par nus// rkong rtse'i rgyal pos 'di bklags pas// lha srin sde brgyad gdug pa dang // sa bdag sa las mi ldang dang // sa gdon
9b5(90 nu): gdug pa can gyis nyams mi song // 'byung ba'i lha yis rtag tu khur// sems can nyon mongs skyob par nus// sa las gyur pa'i gdug pa zhi// 'di bkran
9b6(90 nu): yon tan mtha' dag 'phel// de tshe 'byung ba bzhi g.yos pas// nam mkha' me tog bzhin du ni// gsal ba'i 'od 'bar lhang nge gsal// gdod nas ma skye
9b7(90 nu): stong pa'i ngang // ci yang med pa stong pa'i ngang // dang po stong pa'i ngang nyid las// mkha' la 'od chags nam mkha'i klong // 'gyur ba med pa nam mkha'i
9b8(90 nu): dbyings// nam mkha'i dang ni log pa ste// 'byung ba lnga po de las 'dus// de nyid ngobo sems kyi yul// sems nyid la yang ngo bo med// sems kyi mtshan
10a1(90 nu): nyid sems su rdzogs// sems nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin no// stong pa skye ba med pa'i dbyings// rang gis ma g.yos ngang gis 'brel// dbyer med 'pho
10a2(90 nu): 'gyur med pa'i ngang // dngos po med pa stong pa'i ngang // mtshan ma brjod bral stong pa'i ngang // g.yo med skye med dngos po med// ci yang med pa nam mkha'i dang //
10a3(90 nu): nam mkha'i ngang la dbyings nyid rdzogs// nam mkha'i dang la ci yang med// 'byung ba'i kha dog mtshan ma med// stong nyid stong pa'i de bzhin gnas// nam mkha'
10a4(90 nu): 'byung ba'i ngo bor rdzogs// 'byung ba byas pa med pa'i ngang // phyogs dang mtshan ma de bzhin med// kha dog ngo bo med pa sems kyi rtsal// sems la bzung du
10a5(90 nu): med de ci yang med// nan ltar ltas na gang yang mi gnas pa// sems kyi dpe ni nam mkha' 'dra// dpe yi dpe rtsal 'khrul pa med// 'khrul med sems dang //
10a6(90 nu): nam mkha'i klong // rdzogs pa chen po de la yod// chos nyid dbye ba med pa thig ler 'dus// sems dang 'gyur med nam mkha' gnyis// sgrub byar yod pa ngo
10a7(90 nu): mtshar che// rtsal ldan rdzogs pa sems kyi rtsal// nyon mongs spangs pas rang sems bde// sems kyi gnang du 'khrul pa med// 'khrul pa'i rtsa ba ma rig
10a8(90 nu): pa/ ma rig pa yang 'khrul pa yin// rnam par rtog pa sems kyi dug/ nam mkha'i dngos po mi 'gyur yang // glo bur char sprin khug sna dang // rmugs pas
10b1(90 nu): sgribs pa lta bu'o// skyon dang 'grogs pa nam mkha'i ngos// nam mkha' rdzu 'phrul sangs rgyas bka'// byas pa med par kun tu shes// byang chub bzhi ldan/
10b2(90 nu): kun du shes// byang chub bzhi ldan de bzhin dbyings// lha rnams rig pa de bzhin gnas// 'khor ba gnas lngar spangs byas te// thams cad rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i
10b3(90 nu): sa// bde ldan bde ba thob pa'i sa// nam mkha' sems kyi 'khor lo skor// 'khor lo lnga ldan ye shes lnga// ye shes lha lngas thams cad khyab// srid pa 'gre
10b4(90 nu): ba'i 'byung ba che// 'byung ba bzhi 'dus nam mkha'i mkha'// mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong // rtogs na rang sems sangs rgyas te// ma rtogs pa
10b5(90 nu): la gtsug lag dgos// ma rig 'khrul snang gtsug lag pa// g.yo med nam mkhas gzugs phung skyed// dpal ldan nam mkhas sha khrag 'byin// grub
10b6(90 nu): pa'i nam mkhas thams cad skong // thams cad ma lus bskyed pa de// 'byung ba nam mkha'i klong du 'dus// rang bzhin lhun rdzogs grags pa che// dpal
10b7(90 nu): ldan gsal ba de la 'dus// gsal bden sgrib pa med pa lam gyi mchog/ 'khrul med brtan pa gnas kyi mchog/ mchog dang ldan pa de la 'dus// de bzhin
10b8(90 nu): gnas pa de yi ma// sems can nyon mongs mtha' dag gi/ las ngan sdug pa'i bag chags sdig sgrib dang // nyon mongs las kyi bar chod dang // gdug pa
11a1(90 nu): // ston pa'i bgegs rigs stong // cho 'phrul ston dang than ngan 'bebs// lus gnod srog la rku dang 'che ba byed// tshe la glo bur gtong ba'i tshogs// nam
11a2(90 nu): mkha'i gdon dang lcags kyi gshed// lcags las gyur pa'i nang yams dang // skran nad dang ni rus nad dang // lcags 'khrug glo bur drag shul dang // gri
11a3(90 nu): dang mda' mtshon 'khor ba dang // ye 'grog sum brgya drug cu dang // nad rigs brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang // lcags las gyur pa'i gri yi tshegs// gdug pa'i
11a4(90 nu): thog dang rnam thal dang // de dag thams cad zhi bar mdzod// rkong rtse lha yi rgyal po yis// ye shes lnga ldan dkyil 'khor bcas// thabs ldan shes rab
11a5(90 nu): 'phrul gyi ting 'dzin bsgoms// lta ba mtha' dag nyams su myong ba'i sems bskyed de// dag pa gser gyi mdo thig 'di brtsams pas// sdug bsngal
11a6(90 nu): las kyi nyon mongs sgrib pa byang // sngags ni oM a mer ti ba rom khrer duM ma a ri kher na yu// a hUM kle nya ma hUM// de skad snying po brjod pa des// sems
11a7(90 nu): can thams cad dran pa rnyed// gsal ldan sems dang ldan par 'gyur// dbang po rgyas pas kun gzhi bde// sku gsung thugs kyi phung po rten// 'jigs
11a8(90 nu): med 'gyel med brlag pa med// 'byung ba lcags kyi gdug pa dang // bcod 'bigs rgyag pa'i gdug pa zhi// 'byung ba lcags kyi sems can rten/
11a9(90 nu): thams cad rten pa lcags kyi stobs// lcags kyi snying po mdo thig 'di// gser zhing bcang zhing klag par 'os// nyon mongs ma rig 'khrul pa'i bdud
