2a7(96 pu): cad zhi nas dga' ba rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// lnga pa li mchi ma zhes pa'i skar ma'o// de'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ni 'di yin no//
2b1(96 pu): 'brug gi lo pa'i mi dang spre'u lo pa'i mi dag skar ma'i di'i ris su skyes pa'o// mchod pa'i zas ni gtso ma'i 'bras bu'o// gdon dang bar du gcod pa byung na chos 'di la/
2b2(96 pu): mchod nas bsrung ba 'di gdags par bya'o// bar chad thams cad zhi nas dga' ba rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// drug pa lcu gu zhes pa'i skar ma'o// de'i bsrung ba'i khar
2b3(96 pu): ni 'di'o// lug gi lo pa dang sbrul gyi lo pa'i mi dag skar ma 'di'i ris su skyes pa'o// mchod pa'i zas mi sran ma nag po'o// gdon dang bar du gcod pa byung na
2b4(96 pu): chos 'di la mchod nas bsrung ba 'di gdags par bya'o// bar chad thams cad zhi nas dga' ba rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// bdun pa bu gu zhes pa'i skar ma'o//
2b5(96 pu): de'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ni 'di yin no// rta'i lo pa'i mi dag skar ma 'di'i ris su skyes pa'o// 'di'i mchod pa'i zas ni sran chung ngo // gdon dang bar du gcod pa byung na
2b6(96 pu): tshes 'di mchod nas bsrung ba 'di gdags par bya'o// gdon dang bar du gcod pa thams cad zhi nas dga' ba rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// phyag 'tshal da ni bdag cag
2b7(96 pu): tam lang zhes pa'i skar ma yi// go 'phang la'o khyod ni shar gyi phyogs// kun nas 'phags pa'i 'jig rten dag tu rgyal ba ni// blo gros dbang gis yon tan rdzogs pa'i sprul
2b8(96 pu): pa'o// de yi gzungs ni 'di yin no// nam sa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/ oM a mi d+ha yA ya swA hA// phyag 'tshal bdag cag ku min zhes pa'i skar ma yi go 'phang la 'o khyod ni shar
3a1(96 pu): phyogs rmad byung ba'i// rin po che yi 'jig rten dag tu rgyal ba ni// gsal ba'i dbyangs kyi dbang po zhes bya'i sprul pa'o// de yi gzungs ni 'di
3a2(96 pu): yin no// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nan/ oM tshin+d+ra hU~M ni swA hA// bdag cag phyag 'tshal lu sun zhes pa'i skar ma yi// go 'phang la'o khyod ni shar phyogs 'jig rten gang // zla ba
3a3(96 pu): 'dra'i zhing du gser gyi kha dog ni// yongs su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa'o// de yi gzungs ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nan/ oM ni mi ri ni la ka ha na
3a4(96 pu): par ma ru tu su swA hA/ phyag 'tshal dag ni lhun gu zhes pa'i skar ma yi// go 'phang la'o khyod ni shar phyogs 'jig rten gang // 'gyod pa dang ni smre sngags med par rgyal ba
3a5(96 pu): ni// kun las 'phags pa'i bsod nams go 'phang sprul pa'o// de yi gzungs ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAn/ oM we ha swA hA// phyag 'tshal bdag ni lim
3a6(96 pu): chen zhes pa'i skar ma yi// go 'phang la'o khyod ni shar phyogs 'jig rten gang // gtsang mar ldan pa'i zhing du blo dang shes rab ni// mkhyen pa thogs med rgyas pa rgyal ba'i sbru
3a7(96 pu): pa'o// de yi gzungs ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/ oM pa ra ti tsar ma ra Na swA hA// phyag 'tshal bdag ni hu gu zhes pa'i skar ma yi// go 'phang la'o khyod na
3a8(96 pu): shar phyogs 'jig rten gang // chos la mos par chos kyi rgya mtshor dgyes pa yi// thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa khyod yin no// de yi sngags ni 'di'o// nam
3b1(96 pu): sa man+ta bud d+ha nan/ oM sarba d+hA ra sa ma ye swA hA// phyag 'tshal bdag ni pho gun zhes pa'i skar ma yi// go 'phang la'o khyod ni shar phyogs 'jig rten gang /
3b2(96 pu): rin chen bai DU rI las grub pa'i zhing du ni// bai DUr+ya 'od sman pa'i rgyal po'i sprul pa'o// de yi sngags ni 'di'o// na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/ oM sa pa ta pa ra ma ni
3b3(96 pu): tsa swA hA/ gang su dag rang gi lo'i 'gros la bar chad byung bar gyur na/ de nas mi de chos rin po che 'di la lan bdun du phyag 'tshal lo// bar chad thams cad zhi zhing bde
3b4(96 pu): bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe lha'i lha sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ngas bshad pa'i chos kyi mdo 'di ni/ chos
3b5(96 pu): kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ 'od du gyur pa/ stobs dang ldan pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi nor ba'i nyes pa las skyob pa'i rten par gyur pa'o// sdig pa dang sgrib pa
3b6(96 pu): thams cad dang / gdon gyi lan chags thams cad de nges par byed pa dang zhi bar byed pa'o// dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ sbyin bdag po mo 'am/ khyim bdag
3b7(96 pu): pho mo 'am/ me dang grags pa dang ldan pa'i dam par gyur pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ bkur bar 'os pa dang / bkur bar 'os pa ma yin pa chen po dang
3b8(96 pu): chung ngu gang su dag skar ma sme bdun 'di'i ris su skyes pa'o// gang su dag chos 'di thos nas slob pa dang / khong du chud cing rang gi lus kyis mchos pa dang / rim
4a1(96 pu): bar yang grogs sam/ gnyen 'dun dag la bskul nas 'dzin du bcug na/ bsod nams 'di'i drin dang 'bras bu tshe 'di nyid la rnyed par
4a2(96 pu): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/ dmyal bar skyes nas sdug bsngal sna tshogs rtsub mo myong bar gyur pa dag gi don du chos 'di
4a3(96 pu): la yi rang ba'i bsam pas/ bkur sti dang mchod pa byas na/ de nas de dag gi shes pa dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las grol zhing srang bar gyur nas/ bde can
4a4(96 pu): gyi 'jig rten du 'od dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su dag gdon dang / 'byung po dag gis
4a5(96 pu): zil gyis non pa 'am/ bdud drag pos sdug bsngal bar byas pa 'am/ rmi lam ngan pa rmis pa 'am/ ltas ngan pa mthong bar gyur tam/ rang gi sems dang ngas skrag par
4a6(96 pu): gyur na/ chos 'di mnyan nas brlabs shing / khong du chud par byas te mchod na/ bar chad de dag las grol zhing srabs nas/ de'i blo dang sems bde bar 'gyur/ de'i skrag
4a7(96 pu): ba dang / dngangs pa thams cad du zad par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su dag ji ltar rang gi rje dpon dang lhan cig tu 'grogs nas/ mnyes shing gces par
4a8(96 pu): 'gyur bar 'dod nas spyod pa'i dus su 'am/ yang mngag gzhug byed par gyur na mi de chos 'di dang phrad nas rje su yi rang ba'i sems kyis bkur zhing mchod na/ de nas rje dpon
4b1(96 pu): de la gnyen zhing gces par de'i mi dang / grags pa spel zhing grags par gyur nas/ dga' ba chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su dag nang
4b2(96 pu): drag pos thebs nas mnar zhing / nad de las grol bar 'dod pa dag gnas gtsang mar spos bsregs shing chos 'di la mchod pa phul nas klog tu bcug na/ de la zhen pa'i na
4b3(96 pu): de dag thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su dag lam du zhugs te ring por song nas nye tshong byed pa dag rnyed pa'i nor gyis tshim par 'dod
4b4(96 pu): nas/ drin dang 'bras bu phan yon yangs shing rgyas par 'dod na chos 'di la yid ches pa'i bsam pas bkur zhing mchod na/ de'i 'dod don gang yin pa bsams pa bzhin du
4b5(96 pu): tshim par 'gyur ro// phyi rol du 'gro ba dang nang du 'jug pa'i dus su dga' ba rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su dag zhing la lo
4b6(96 pu): tog dang shing thog gi 'bras bu ma rnyed pa dang / phyugs kyi nad byung bar gyur na/ de nas gnas gtsang mar spos bsregs te/ chos rin po che 'di la mchod na lo tog thams
4b7(96 pu): cad legs par 'gyur/ phyags 'phel bar 'gyur ro// yang gdon dang bar chod 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// yang rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig mngal du bu chags nas bar chad dang
4b8(96 pu): ldan pa'i zla ba dang 'dzom na/ chos 'di la yis ches pa'i sems kyis bkur zhing mchod na/ bar chad de dag las nad med par grol bar 'gyur ro// btsas pa'i bu
5a1(96 pu): dang bu mo de dag kyang bsod nams dang bkra shis dang tshe ring ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang skyes pa'i mi thams cad
5a2(96 pu): sme bdun gyi skar mas shes shing bdag gir byed pa'o// ji srid mtsho'i bar du tshe gcig la ji tsam du bar chad dang / don med pa'i rtsod pa dang / de la sogs pa ltas ngan pa
5a3(96 pu): brgya phrag thams cad sme bdun zhes pa'i skar ma bdag por gyur pa'o// zhes shes nas chos 'di bkur zhing yid ches par byas nas mchod na/ gdon dang par du gcod pa
5a4(96 pu): gang yang gnod pa byed mi nus so zhes bshad pa yin no// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa 'khor bzhi po de dag 'dus te/ chos kyi ka' 'di bkur
5a5(96 pu): zhing bsti stang du byas/ kun chub par byas nas yan lag lngas phyag byas te song ngo // na mo rat+na tsir dza de ma hA te dza tsir a ba pra a ki swA hA/ lha'i lha sangs rgyas kyis
5a6(96 pu): gsungs pa'i smre bdun zhes bya ba'i skar mas tshe ring por byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi mdo'i le'u'o// / dpal ldan gser gyi mi ni gzugs dkar po// dpa
5a7(96 pu): ldan shing gi mi ni gzugs sngon po// dpal ldan chu yi mi ni gzugs nag po// dpal ldan me yi mi ni gzugs dmar po// dpal ldan sa yi mi ni gzugs ser po//
5a8(96 pu): sme bdun zhes pa'i skar ma la gsol ba 'debs pa'i bstod pa ni 'di yin no// sa yi snying po'i steng las dpag tshad brgyad khri 'phags pa lhun po'i rtsar gnas pa//
5b1(96 pu): gling bzhi pa yi 'jig rten 'dir ni dbang dang ldan pa khyod nyid bdag gi lha// skye gnas bzhi dang las lnga dang ldan sems can skabs dang skyob pa khyod yin te/ phreng ba
5b2(96 pu): brgyus ltar lha yi rgyal po brgya byin gyis ni dbu rgyan gyur pa nyid// nyi zla gza' bdun rgyu skar rnams dang dung phyur khri khrag sum cu'i skar mas mchod // dag gi lha khyod che
5b3(96 pu): rab 'dir ni 'dod pa'i don kun 'grub par byed pa ste// des nas gang 'dod don kun bsams dang ji ltar 'dod bzhin bdag yid tshim par mdzod// gdon dang bar chad rgya
5b4(96 pu): phrag zhi zhing med par mdzad pa khyod yang bdag gi lha// tshe ring bar yang mdzad pa khyod lags bdag gi bzang po'i tshig kun 'grub par mdzod// sme bdun zhes pa'i skar
5b5(96 pu): ma la mar me 'bul ba'i nyi ma dag bshad par bya'o// dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes bdun dang / dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes bzhi dang / dpyid zla tha ma'i tshes gnyis dang / dbyar
5b6(96 pu): zla ra ba'i nyi shu bdun dang / dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes lnga dang / dbyar zla tha mi'i nyi shu gsum dang / ston zla dang po'i tshes nyi shu dang / ston zla 'bring po'i tshes bcu
5b7(96 pu): bdun dang / ston zla tha ma'i tshes nyi shu dang / dgun zla ra ba'i tshes bcu gcig dang / dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes bco lnga dang / dgun tha ma'i tshes brgyad rnams la
5b8(96 pu): mar me 'bul bar bya'o// sme bdun zhes pa'i skar ma'i mdo rdzogs so// // ston pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i// smre bdun zhes
6a1(96 pu): ba'i skar ma'i mdo sde'i'ang // bstan pa'i sems kyis dran zhing gang mchod pa// de la phan pa 'byung zhes rab shes nas// u rug po ga'i ming can za
6a2(96 pu): gur che// chung ngu'i dus nas rtag par chos 'di la// yid ches ldan pas rgyun du klog cing mchod// rang gi go 'phang tshol zhing gsol 'debs pas// mthun par skyob pa'i
6a3(96 pu): bdag po bsod nams can// grol mdzad ston pa sangs rgyas sprul pa gang // the mur rgyal bu yun du tshe ring zhing // thug can rgyal bu chen por 'gyur bar 'dod// blo ldan
6a4(96 pu): byang chub sems dpa' bdag po de// sleb nas se chen rgyal po'i gdan sar bzhugs// bdag gi yid la 'dod pa tshem gyur pas// the tshom med par chos 'dir nges shes
6a5(96 pu): skyes// yu gur yi ger chos kyi mdo sde 'di// sngon chad gzhan gyis bsgyur ba med pas na// mang po'i hor nams dad pas mchod gyur ces// bdag gis hor gyis skad du bsgyur/
6a6(96 pu): ba yin// nga yis ji ltar bsam pa 'grub 'gyur na// sems can khri khrag stong phrag 'dod pa kun// bdag nyid ji bzhin tshim par gyur ga ces// stong phrag par du btab
6a7(96 pu): nas kun la bkye// 'di yi bsod nams drin gyi 'bras bu'i mthus// bdag po rgyal po dpon mo brgyud par bcas// yun sku tshe ring zhing bso nams 'phel// mtha
6a8(96 pu): thug sangs rgyas go 'phang rnyed gyur cig brgyal khams dgra dang 'khrug pa zhi ba dang // gdon dang bar chang rims med pade gyur cig/ char rlung dus babs mu ge med 'gyur zhing // 28
6b1(96 pu): gis smras dang bsam don 'grub gyur cig/ gdag dang pham bu sogs gnyen rnams dang // 'tsho ba'i spun dang sems can mang por bcas// 'jig rten 'dir
6b2(96 pu): yang chos kyis 'dod pa chom// bde ba can zhing rtag par phyin gyur cig/ thin li dang po'i lo 'brug gi zla ba bcu pa'i tshes gcig la bar du btab pa yin// mdo 'di
6b3(96 pu): rgya gar gyi yul nas rgya gar gyi panI ta gcig dang // zang zas tshang gis khyer te rgya'i yul du bsgyur ro// rgya chen po'i yul du rgyas par gyur cing // gnas pa las rgyal po chen
6b4(96 pu): po'i blon po byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su byung ba dad pa dang / shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa gim rtse gong lu ta'i hu'i g.yu'i shri tha'i u dug po yis bskul te
6b5(96 pu): yu gure gyi bstan pa'i bdag po pradz+nyA shrIs hor gyi skad dang yi ger bsgyur nas stong phrag gnyis par du btab/ a lin thi mur ta'i se dus yu gur gyi skad du bsgyur te/
6b6(96 pu): stong phrag gcig par du btab nas/ chos kyi sbyin pa byas te tor dang yu gur la rgyas par byas shing // ta'i hu nyid kyang sngan chang sog po'i chos lugs 'dzin pa la/ chos
6b7(96 pu): 'di'i byin rlabs kyis kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs shing rab tu byung ste 'di'i yon tan rnams nyis su myong bar gyur ro// srad kyis me mo glang gi lo la/ lo tsA ba
6b8(96 pu): mahA pa la dang / shrI Anan+ta badz+ras gung thang gi gtsug lag khang du 'od kyi skad dang yi ger bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// zhus dag satha mang+ga la/ shra d+haM/
1a1(97 pe): sdig sgrib kun 'joms zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
1b1(97 pe): #// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dab
1b2(97 pe): phyag la phyag 'tshal lo// sdig sgrib ku 'joms kyi gzungs 'di ni// thugs rje chen pos 'khor ba dong spyugs kyi rgyud le'u lnga bcu
1b3(97 pe): rtsa brgyad pa'i 'phrin las kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa nas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
1b4(97 pe): med kyis mkha' 'gro ma gar gyi dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa/
1b5(97 pe): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de nags pa'i sems can rnams nyon mongs pa rags pa bgrang bar
1b6(97 pe): dka' ba/ gdul dka' ba// mi dge ba bcu la spyod pa/ mtshams med pa lnga la spyod pa/ bslab pa gsum yal bar dor ba/
1b7(97 pe): dkon chog gi dkor la bab col du spyod pa'i sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ khyod kyis sdig sgrib kun 'joms
2a1(97 pe): kyi gzungs 'di gzungs shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ sdig pa can la ston cig/ 'di la gces sbas gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das de
2a2(97 pe): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ni/
2a3(97 pe): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
2a4(97 pe): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan shin tu brtan pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag
2a5(97 pe): gis ris sngags 'di grub par gyur cig/ oM bi su la gar+b+he ma Ni pra b+he// ta thA ga ta d+ha ri sha ni// ma Ni ma Ni su pra b+he bi ma la saM ga ra gam bI rahUM hUM dza la dza la/ bud+d+ha
2a6(97 pe): bi kho ki te gu h+ya/ a d+hiSh+Thi te gar+b+he swA hA/ pad+ma d+ha ra a mo ga dza ya ti tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas che 'khor ba thog mtha' med pa nas bsags pa'i sde
2a7(97 pe): pa dang sgrib pa dang / las ngan pa'i rnams par smin pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang // bag chags ngan pa'i tshogs thams cad byang zhing dag nas/
2a8(97 pe): sangs rgyas kyi go 'ayang myur du thob par gyur cing / bde bar gshegs pa khyed sku co 'dra ba// 'khor dang sku tshe tshad dang zhing khams dang // khyed kyi mtshan mchog
2b1(97 pe): bzang po ci 'dra ba// de 'dra kho nang bdag kyang 'gyur bar shog/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ 'gro ba gang yang rung ste/ sdig sgrib kun 'joms kyi gzugs/
2b2(97 pe): 'di ni nyin re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bton na/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcu gsum 'jigs pa'i nus pa yod do// bcu gsum po gang zhe na/ mes mi tshugs/ chus mi tshugs/
2b3(97 pe): g.yang la mi ltung / thog rje ba mi 'gro// rlung gyis mi 'dod/ dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ gza'i gnod pas mi tshugs/ byang sde gyis mi
2b4(97 pe): tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi mi tshugs/ rims drag pos mi tshugs/ rgyal po'i chad pas phog ste
2b5(97 pe): 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yon tan bcu gsum thob ste/ bcu gsum gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de nyid gzugs bzang bar
2b6(97 pe): 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin khyad par can rgyud la skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can gyi don dpag med nus par 'gyur ro// 'phrin las
2b7(97 pe): thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
2b8(97 pe): longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// bstan bcos thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
3a1(97 pe): cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sras su 'gyur ro// yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/
3a2(97 pe): ro// de ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcu gsum 'jig cing / phan yon bcu gsum thob ste/ skye ba 'di yi 'og rol tu bde ba can du 'jig rten gyi khams su skyes
3a3(97 pe): nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// de ltar yon tan bcu gsum thob par ma gyur na// nga nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bslus
3a4(97 pe): par 'gyur ro// 'di'i cho ga ni rang nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tu bskyed la/ thog mar sangs rgyas gsum gyi mtshan brjod la/ sangs
3a5(97 pe): rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mi d+he wa hrIHsangs rgyas ma tshogs pad+ma can la phyag 'tshal lo// oM b+h+yA a yu hUM Ni dzA/ sangs
3a6(97 pe): rgyas thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ der rjes hri sa ya cig/ de tsam gyi bcu cha cig yi ge drug pa bzlas// de'i bcu cha cig sdig sgrib
3a7(97 pe): kun 'joms bzlas/ smon lam dang gsol ba btab/ tshes brgyad dang tshes bcwo lnga dang / nyi shu gsum gnam gang rnams la rig sngas 'di stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/
3a8(97 pe): gcig bsrungs cing / zas dkar gsum la rten nas sangs rgyas gsum gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bya'o// 'di rnams kyi gong du gnyen pa 'bum bya'o// de nas zla ba
3b1(97 pe): byung ngo cog la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas nang re bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad gton na/ gong du bshad pa'i phan yon rnams ba par 'gyur ro// the tshom byed pa rnams ni
3b2(97 pe): ma rtogs so// rig sngags lhas 'bum gyi gnyen pa song na/ gang zag de nyid kyi lus kyi sgo nas nyon mongs pa dang / brdeg pa dang / lus kyi sgo nas mi sdug
3b3(97 pe): bar snyan pa thams cad ngan song las thar 'gyur ro// ngag gi sgo nas sgo ba dang / mi snyan par brjod pa dang / tshang nas 'bru pa thams cad 'khor ba las thar 'gyur ro//
3b4(97 pe): yid kyi sgo nas gnod sems dang / brnabs sems dang / log lta skyes pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyang thar pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nyid lus kyi dri ma chu la phog na/ chu la
3b5(97 pe): gnas pa'i sems can rnams ngar song las thar par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi dri tshor ba'i sems can rnams kyang song las thar par 'gyur ro// gzugs mthong ba dang
3b6(97 pe): skad thos pa rnams lta ci smos/ shi ba'i rus pa la sngags nyer gcig btab na/ ngan song las thar par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba 'chi kham rnams kyi rna khung du lan 'dun
3b7(97 pe): brjod na/ ngan song gsum du ltung bar mi srid do// 'di'i bsnyen pa'i skabs su sha chang / rgog pa dang / byi dro'i kha zas dang / 'phags pa dang / 'khrig pa spong bar bya'o//
3b8(97 pe): bsnyen pa rang dus bzhi la ma grub ni/ nang de bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad kyi 'grub bo// stong gsum thams cad me 'ogs kyi gang yang de la rgal la chos 'di btsal bar bya'o//
4a1(97 pe): // phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi bkor la 'bags te/ sangs rgyas stong gir bshags par mi gnang ba yang gzugs 'di stong rtsa brgyad kyi 'dag par 'gyur ro//
4a2(97 pe): 'di ni sdig pa can gyi gang zag la bstan par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs 'di la bsnyems byas nas sdig pa spyod du yong ba'i phyir ro// 'di'i phan
4a3(97 pe): yon ni bskal par brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor ba dong sbugs kyi rgyud las sdig sgribs kun
4a4(97 pe): 'joms kyi le'u nyi shu bdun pa nas gsungs pa rdzogs so// // dge'o//
1a1(98 pe): nyes pa kun sel zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
1b1(98 pe): #/ Ta swa swa a phyag tsha tag+maHna mo gu ru de ba Da ki ni hUM/ spyi don grub pa nyes pa kun sel byin rlabs kyi sgron me ni/ gza' skar
1b2(98 pe): ngan pa la bab pa'i tshe bya ba byas pa la sogs pa/ bya ba bzang ngan 'bring sogs gang byas laM du ma song zhing / nyes pa can du gyur nas/
1b3(98 pe): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mgron rnam bzhi la sogs pa snang srid kyi lha 'dre rnams la gtor ma gser skyems dang /
1b4(98 pe): chab gtor rngon cha la sogs pa 'bul gyi/ rang nyid pags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ de'i g.yas phyogs dang g.yon du 'phag
1b5(98 pe): pa 'jam dpal dang phyag na rdo rje b+hi zhing / thugs zhi ba mnyam nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang nas/ 'di ltar bklag par bya'o// 'phag
1b6(98 pe): bu bad+d+he pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag cag yon mchod dpon g.yog mi nor 'khor 'bangs srid dang bcas pa thams cad mi mthun
1b7(98 pe): pa'i phyogs ngan pa thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ man tro yang d+hi ka naM ta thA ta naM sarba tra a pra ti ha ta pA pa ti/ d+harma pA li
3a1(98 pe): skong bar shog/ rang gzhan kun nas rtsod gyur pa// bsam pa ngan dang sbyor ba dang // rmi lam ngan pa kun zhi nas// rgyal khams kun tu bde gyur cig/
3a2(98 pe): nad yams 'khrug rtsod med pa dang // lo nyes sad ser med pa dang // 'jig rten khams kun bde gyur cig/ rgyal ba can gyi 'phags pa yis// kun nas bdag
3a3(98 pe): cag sgrub du gsal// gshin po gnas ngan spangs nas kyang // mthe rigs bde ba thob gyur cig/ gson po che dang ldan pa rnams// chos dang mthun pa'i dbang
3a4(98 pe): byas nas// kun kyang byang chub lam zhugs shing // 'bras bu gsum pa grub par shog/ 'phags pa'i zhal bzang mthong nas kyang // myur bar rjes su gzung
3a5(98 pe): du gsol// gsung thos thugs kyi brtse dgongs nas// khyed dang dbyer med cig par shogaHces smon lam dang bcas pa lan gsum brjod pas/ nyes
3a6(98 pe): pa byung ba thams cad sor chud nas nam du'ang bde legs kyi dpal la spyod par 'gyur roHd+ha thimaHnyes pa kun sel byin rlabs kyi sgren me zhes bya baHda
3a7(98 pe): ltar mnga' bdag yab sras dang // ma 'ongs rjes 'jug rnams kyi don du bdag pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis bkod paHskal ldan las 'phro can dang phrad par shog/
3a8(98 pe): thams cad mkhyen pa ma hA gu ru yi// dus gsum kun ston sgrol ma drug bskor 'diHbdag 'dra ye shes mtsho rgyal zud kyis gzung // ma spel gsang rgya
3b1(98 pe): rin chen gter du sbasaHlan cig bskal pa dus kyi tha ma laHsmon lam las can gcig dang phrad par gyuraHdus der bdi spyod 'gro ba bsod nams ldanaH
3b2(98 pe): de phyir g.yang dam sems kyi bur du chongasaHsa mA yAHrgya rgya rgyaHgtang rgyaHgter rgya thimaHdge legs 'phel/
3b3(98 pe): zhus dge// // mAng+ga laM//
3b4(98 pe): bkra zhis/
8a1(99 po): brgyad 'di brjod pas/ sa 'ogs steng bar snang la gnas pa ka dang klu gzhan rnams yon bdag dang mthun par gyur cig/ gzhan yang shing gi lha
8a2(99 po): gzi brjid 'od ldang ma dang / sman gyi lha mo grub pa'i blo gros dang / sa'i lha ma bstan pa mo dang / sa 'dzin lag pa chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po rab brjid dang / mnga' bdas
8a3(99 po): chen po 'di lnga la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang thab dang gzhob ma stsol cig/ khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde legs su gyur cig/ dge stobs che bar
8a4(99 po): mdzad du gsol/ 'phags pa snang brgyad kyi mdo sde 'di rgya cher ston la sngags par bgyis so// yang dag par ston no// gsal bar brjod do// gsung 'di bsgrags pa'i
8a5(99 po): byin rlabs kyis sa bdag lha klu kun dga' zhing yi rang nas/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas zhi ba dang bde legs su gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
8a6(99 po): bka' stsal pa dang / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa la sogs pa/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa 'khor
8a7(99 po): thams cad rjes su yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// shus/ bdag/ bkra shis/
1a1(100 phi): bkre shis brtsegs pa bzhugs so// /
1b1(100 phi): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mang+ga la kuT na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bkra shis brtsegs
1b2(100 phi): pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
1b3(100 phi): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri bo mchog gi gnas/ bkra shis brtsegs pa'i pho brang / me tog brtsegs pa'i
1b4(100 phi): tshal// rdo rje brtsegs pa'i gur khang / rin chen spungs pa'i khri/ ge sar pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs te/ bkra shis pa'i 'khor
1b5(100 phi): mang po dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong rtsa brgyad kyis bskor ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
1b6(100 phi): dpa' bkra shis mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' bkra shis sdud dang / byang chub sems dpa' bkra shis rgyan dang / byang chub
1b7(100 phi): sems dpa' bkra shis kun du gzigs dang / byang chub sems dpa' bkra shis yongs su khyab dang / bkra shis byang chub sems
2a1(100 phi): bkris byang chub seMs dpa' rlung gi snying po dang /
2a2(100 phi): dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / bkra shis byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / bkra shis byang chub
2a3(100 phi): sems dpa' me'i snying po dang / bkra shis byang chub sems dpa' chu'i snying po dang / bkra shis byang chub sems dpa' rdo'i snying po
2a4(100 phi): dang / bkra shis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snying po dang / bkra shis byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa mtha' yas dang /
2a5(100 phi): de bzhin du rnam par gzigs dang / blo gros mchog dang / 'od dpag med dang / tshe dpag med dang / sangs rgyas 'od srungs dang /
2a6(100 phi): bkra shis dam pa'i tog can dang / bkra shis mthu stobs dang ldan pa lag na rdo rje dang / bkra shis mkhyen pa dang ldan pa 'jam dpal
2a7(100 phi): dang / bkra shis thugs rje dang ldan pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / sha ri'i bu dang / rab 'byor la sogs pa bkra shis pa'i
2a8(100 phi): 'khor stong rtsa brgyad dang / gzhan yang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang grul bum dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i tshogs rab
2b1(100 phi): tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la bla mang du mdzad de/ pus
2b2(100 phi): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bkra shis dang ldan pa'i 'khor mang po bzhugs pa'i skabs
2b3(100 phi): 'dir thog mar bkra shis shing dge ba/ bar du bkra shis shing dge ba/ tha mar bkra shis shing dge ba/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ bkra shes pa thams
2b4(100 phi): cad yongs su 'du bar byed pa/ nyes skyon sel ba legs pa'i yon tan thams cad yongs su 'du bar byed pa/ dpal dang skal pa bzang por byed pa'i mdo cig
2b5(100 phi): bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal gzhan yang bkra shis dang
2b6(100 phi): ldan pa'i 'khor rnams nyon cig/ ngas sngon bram ze'i lus kyis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir che lo stong thub pa'i tshe/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
2b7(100 phi): rgyas bkra shis thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal gzi brjid ces bya ba la bkra shis brtsegs pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// yon tan stong ldan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
2b8(100 phi): rnam grangs 'di thos te/ bzung zhing bcangs te bklags shing bshad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las legs nyes kyi dbang gis bkra bi shis rtags mang du byung ste/ dus
3a1(100 phi): chod nyes pa dang / skye banyes pa dang / lo zla mi shes pa la sogs pa dang / las bya nyes pa dang / zas zanyes pa dang / gos bcomanyes pa dang /
3a2(100 phi): khyim dbubs nyes pa dang / grogs btsal nyes pa dang / nor bsrel nyes pa dang / rta phyugs bsrel nyes pa dang / na nyes pa dang / shi shes pa dang / lam du'aju/
3a3(100 phi): nyes pa dang / ro drangs nyes pa dang / gshing bya nyes pa dang / dur gdab nyes pa la sogs te bkra mi shis pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ bkra shis pa thams cad ra
3a4(100 phi): tu 'du bar byed pa/ nyes skyon thams cad rab tu sel ba/ legs pa'i yon tan thams cad yongs su 'du bar byed pa/ dpal dang skal pa bzang por gyur pa/ thog
3a5(100 phi): mtha' bar du dge ba/ bsod nams thams cad yongs su sdud pa/ bkra shis kyi tshogs thams cad 'char zhing shes pa/ sdig sgrib thams cad med par 'phags pa/
3a6(100 phi): bkra shis brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo ngas khyod la bstan gyis/ 'di zos sam brtsams shing brjod pa tsam gyis/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ mo
3a7(100 phi): ngan pa dang / dmigs ltas ngan pa dang / pra rtags ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad zlog par byed pa'i mdo sde sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sman pa
3a8(100 phi): dang bde ba'i phyir khod la ngas bstan gyis/ rab tu nyon la yid la chongs shig ces bka' stsal to// de la 'jam dpal gyis legs so legs so// bcom
3b1(100 phi): ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi bkra mi shis pa thams cad zlog par byed pa'i don du/ bkra shis brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po
3b2(100 phi): chos kyi phung po de bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang bkra shis dang ldan
3b3(100 phi): pa'i 'khor dag skye 'gro mtha' dag la las dang / bsod nams 'phel shugs kyis bkra shis pa dang bkra mi shis pa gnyis su byung ste/ sems can gyi nang nas kyang mi
3b4(100 phi): rigs su gyur pa la/ bkra mi shis pa'i rtags ni klag nyes pa dang / bri zhes pa dang / bshad nyes pa dang / sgom nyes pa dang / skyes ma thag tu 'chi ba dang / dmus
3b5(100 phi): long can dang / sha bkra can dang / glang sha sha ro dang / sho re dA skal zhar skur dang / gzi mig drug lag gdong sme can/ lba ba sha lhag sha mtshan dang / gtsug ngan pa dang sha
3b6(100 phi): 'dzer can/ yan lag chad lhag byung ba rnams bkra mi shis pa'i skyon yin te/ de bzhin phyugs dang sgo khyi dang zhing khang nor rdzas kun la yang / bkra mi shis pa'i skyon mang
3b7(100 phi): du byung ste/ de'i mtshan ma ngan pa dang rtags sogs bkra mi shis pa kun/ thams cad bzlog cing bsgyur ba ste/ nyes skyon med par bya ba'i phyir bkra shis don gyi lha lnga la/
3b8(100 phi): phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shis mchog gi lnga phyogs skyong mgon po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shis par byed pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o// s+yAd ya the dan b+hi
4a1(100 phi): ye b+hi dzA ye/ ug ge ug gi swasti kra pa ti/ u mu khI pra swa ra dra/ swa sti swa sti bru bruM bruM pra hak+She/ mu ne mu ne/ gu ra ne gur ne/ a khe mu khe/ mu
4a2(100 phi): ra ke mu ra ke/ a ma ti gu ra na ya/ swasti swasti swasti/ gu le mu le/ ke she ke she/ tsu ra na tsu ra na/ b+hi ra ma le swA hA/ ces tshig 'di rab tu brjod do// sangs rgyas chos dang dge
4a3(100 phi): 'dun la// phyag 'a la skyab gsam shes gyur cig/ byi nang gsang ba'i bkra shes rnams// deng 'dir 'byung zhing 'ba' gyur cig/ byi ru bkra shis nam mkha' dag pa'i/
4a4(100 phi): mkha'// nang du bkra shis sems nyid dag pa'i klong // gsang ba'i bkra shis chos nyid dag pa'i dbyings// mkha' klong dbyings gsum bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra
4a5(100 phi): shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ gnam la bkra shis nyi zla gnyis// gza' skar mang po'i tshogs kyis bskor// sa la bkra shis 'byung ba lnga// me chu sa rlung
4a6(100 phi): tshogs kyis bskor// bar na bkra shis dkon mchog gsum// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshogs kyis bskor// dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra
4a7(100 phi): shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ na mo bud d+ha ya/ na mo d+harma ya/ na ma sAd+hA ya/ gnam sa bar gyi bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde
4a8(100 phi): legs shog/ dbus na bkra shis don gyi lha// rnam par snang mdzad bkra shis don gyi lha// rnam par snang mdzad bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng
4b1(100 phi): 'dir bde legs shog/ shar na bkra shis don gyi lha// rdo rje sems dpa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ lho na bkra
4b2(100 phi): shis don gyi lha// rin chen 'byung gnas bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ nub na bkra shis don gyi lha// snang ba mtha' yas
4b3(100 phi): bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ byang na bkra shis don gyi lha// don yod grub pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis nges
4b4(100 phi): kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ oM bud d+hA ya d+hu/ oM badz+rA ya d+hu/ oM rat+na ya d+hu/ oM pad+ma ya d+hu/ oM kar+m+ma ya d+hu/ bdag dang skal ldan rigs kyi bu// deng gi rgyu/
4b5(100 phi): sbyor yon gyi bdag/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin brlabs nas// bkra shis dam pa'i mdo sde 'di// nga yis brjod pa'i bsod nams kyis// nam mkha' lta
4b6(100 phi): bur kun khyab cing // nyi zla lta bur kun gsal te// skar tshogs lta bur grangs mang zhing // sprin tshogs lta bur lhun grub ste// 'ja' tshon lta bur mdzes sdug cing /
4b7(100 phi): ri rab lta bur brtan brjid che// sa gzhi lta bur kun bskyed cing // rgya mtsho lta bur gting zab pa'i// ljon shing lta bur 'dab rgyas te// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen
4b8(100 phi): ltar// dgos 'dod bkra shis char ltar 'bab gyur cig/ oM AHhUM/ rat+na bruM ni a/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ dmigs pa med pa sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// sbyin
5a1(100 phi): pa chen po'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ 'chal pa med pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin// tshul khrim
5a2(100 phi): gas gang yin pa// \u0f89\u0fa4mas des pang rnye // rgyu ma med pa med pa gyu y-i// bzod pa chen pa ma ma na
5a3(100 phi): bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ le lo med pa brtson 'grus pha rol byin// brtson 'grus chen po'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir
5a4(100 phi): bde legs shog/ 'gyur ldog med pa bsam gtan pha rol phyin// bsam gtan chen po'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ gang /
5a5(100 phi): yang ma 'gags thabs kyi pha rol phyin// thabs chen mchog gi bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ ma chags thogs med
5a6(100 phi): stobs kyi pha rol phyin// stobs chen shugs kyi bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ re dogs med pa smon lam pha rol phyin// smon
5a7(100 phi): lam chen po'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ 'khrul pa med pa shes rab pha rol phyin// shes rab chen po'i bkra shis
5a8(100 phi): gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ pha rol phyin bcu'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ bde
5b1(100 phi): legs thams cad myur thob shog/ oM sAsti/ tad+ya thA/ ga te ga te/ pA ra ga te/ pA ra sang+ga te bo d+hi swA hA/ ma chags thogs med 'khor lo rin po che// 'khor
5b2(100 phi): lo rin chen bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ theg chen stobs ldan glang po rin po che// glang po rin chen bkra shis bkra
5b3(100 phi): shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des dang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ cang shes shugs ldan rta mchog rin po che// rta mchog rin chen bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra
5b4(100 phi): shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ kun la dbang sgyur blon po rin po che// blon po rin chen bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs
5b5(100 phi): shog/ log rtog dpung 'joms dmag dpon rin po che// dmag dpon rin chen bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ thams
5b6(100 phi): cad kun bskyed btsun mo rin po che// btsun mo rin chen bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ de ma thag tu bdag cag bde legs
5b7(100 phi): shog/ bsam 'phel don grub nor bu rin po che// nor bu rin chen bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ oM b+he shi ti/ rat+na na
5b8(100 phi): b+he shi ti/ sam mud ga ti se swA hA/ oM bar+ya su le b+h+ra ma khri tse/ smA rats+tshe da nany+tsa swA hA/ na mo dbu la bkra shis gdugs ltar skyob// sku la bkra shis mi nub rgyal
6a1(100 phi): mtshan mchog/ gsung la bkra shis chos dung g.yas su 'khyil// thugs la bkra shis dpal gyi be'u gsal// spyan la bkra shis rin chen
6a2(100 phi): gser gyi nya// ljags la bkra shis pad+mo lo 'dab rgyas// mgul la bkra shis rin chen bum pa 'khyil// phyag la bkra shis yon tan nor bu mchog/ zhabs la bkra
6a3(100 phi): shis 'phrin las 'khor lo wa// bkra shis rdzas brgyad dngo sma dam pa'i mchog/ rdzas mchog brgyad kyi bkra shis gang yin pa// deng 'dir bdag cag rnams bkra
6a4(100 phi): shis phog/ bkra shis des kyang rtag tu bde legs shog/ oM sarba A yudz+nyA na ra ta na ha mu ki/ bruM bruM bruM/ hUM hUM hUM/ swasti/ sangs rgyas zhal nas gsungs pa yi//
6a5(100 phi): bkra shis brtsegs pa'i smon lam mdo// tshe 'dir bde skyid tshe ring zhing // bkra shis dpal dang longs spyod thob// bsod nams phun sum tshogs ldan 'thob// byi
6a6(100 phi): ma bla med rdzogs sangs rgyas/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / bkra shis dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
6a7(100 phi): pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yid rangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la 'jam
6a8(100 phi): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom 'das kyis mdo sde 'di'i ji ltar la chog dang ldan par bgyi/ de'i cho ga ni ji ltar bgyi zhes gsol pa dang /
6b1(100 phi): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'di'i cho ga ni dkon mchog gi pho brang bzhed pa dang / lha khang bzhed pa dang gtsug lag khang bzhed pa dang /
6b2(100 phi): mchod rten bzhed pa dang / 'bum pa bzhed pa dang / sku gdung dang / gsung rab dang / glegs bam la rab gnas byed pa dang // yul mkhar gang du rtsig pa dang /
6b3(100 phi): khang khyim gsar pa 'bubs pa dang / bu khye'u bcas pa dang / bag ma gtong len byed pa dang / ro 'don pa dang / gshing byed pa dang / dur gdab pa dang / bkra mi shis
6b4(100 phi): pa dang ltas ngan pa dag zlog par byed pa/ sgyur bar byed pa/ 'di ni kha zas gtsang zhing ro bro bar byed pa 'am/ nas 'bras til la sogs pa'i 'bru sna lnga 'am/ shing
6b5(100 phi): thog gam/ 'bru bcud dam/ sbrang rtsi 'am/ 'brang rgyas lta bu la brjod par bya'o// de'i phan yon ni bkra mi shis pa thams cad rab tu zhi nas/ tshe 'dir bkra shis
6b6(100 phi): kun ldan zhing / bla med 'bras bu thob ces bka' stsal to// sku yi bkra shis skye med chos kyi sku// gsung gi bkra shis dam chos bdud rtsi'i sgra// thugs kyi bkra
6b7(100 phi): shes mnyam nyid 'khrul pa med// yon tan bkra shis 'gro drug gnas nas 'dren// 'phrin las bkra shis rtsol med lhun gyis grub// nyin yang bkra shis mtshan yang
6b8(100 phi): bkra shis shog gzhin mtshan rtag tu bkra shis bde legs shog/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ da ltar byung rnam
7a1(100 phi): bde legs shog/ kun kyang bde skying mchog thob shog/ oM gam kar ska ma kar ni gdas ta/ oM sa ste/ 'phags pa bkra shis brtsegs
7a2(100 phi): pa chen po'i mdo las cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / @// shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa// dkon mchog gsum la
7a3(100 phi): phyag 'tshal lo// lha yi bkra shis don grub cing // phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des// khyed kyi don rnams grub gyur cig/ thams cad myur du mthun par shog/
7a4(100 phi): phreng ba mgo la 'dug pa ltar// lag pa g.yas na dpal yod shog/ g.yon na'ang dpal ni gnas gyur cig/ yan lag kun la'ang dpal yod shog/ tshong pa dag
7a5(100 phi): ni nor tshol zhing // phyogs bcu dag tu 'gro ba rnams// rnyed pa chen po rnyed gyur cig/ de dag bde ba skyid par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// shar phyogs
7a6(100 phi): su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi// rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ smin drug dang ni snar ma dang // mgo dang lag dang nam so dang // rgyal dang /
7a7(100 phi): skag ces bya ba ste// de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// shar phyogs logs na yod ces
7a8(100 phi): bstan/ de dag khyed la kun tu bsrung // de ba bdag po rgyal po ni// yul 'khor srung zhes grags pa ste// de ni dri za kun gyi bdag/ nyi ma lhan cig srung bar
7b1(100 phi): sa na da / 'as tshas 'das can # cha ma ba sa tha
7b2(100 phi): shog/ de la bu ni mang yod la// mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang // dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de rnams khyed la
7b3(100 phi): nad med cing // shis pa lhag par spyong gyur cig/ shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs can// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang // de
7b4(100 phi): zlabs dang mi 'as dang // dga' tshogs dang dga' ba de dang // shes pa lhag par spyod gyur cig/ phyugs na khyed cag bde bar 'o// khyed ceg sdig par sa kyu
7b5(100 phi): sku rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// ne rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ dkris pa las gang gi byed// thugs suni 'thob na// yang ngas byams
7b6(100 phi): gnas pa yi// rgyu skar byed la skyeng gyur cig/ mchu dang gre dang dpo dang ni// me bzhinag pa lnga po yin/ sa dang ni sa ga ste// de dag rnams ni lce phyogs pa// rgyum/
7b7(100 phi): bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten stong 'grags ldan pa// lho phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun tu srungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/
7b8(100 phi): 'phags skyes po zhes bya bar brjod// de ni grul bus kun gyi bdag/ gshin rje lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod la// mkhas shing ming yang mthun
7b9(100 phi): pa ze// dgu bcun gcig zang par yang // dbang po zhes bya slobs pa'i// de rnams kyid la nad med cing // shes pa lhag par spyong gyur cig/ mu phyogs logs/
8a1(100 phi): kyi phyogs chan// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ dpal ldan ma dang grags ldan ma// grags pa thob dang grags 'dzin dang // legs
8a2(100 phi): par langs dang rab snga dang // legs par sad dang bde sgrub ma// de dag khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag par skyong bar shog/ lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs
8a3(100 phi): chan// pad+ma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod// rtag tu gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar// rtag tu thams cad gsal bar byed// de yang khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag
8a4(100 phi): par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldeg par shog
8a5(100 phi): dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// nub phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi// rgyu skar khyed skyong gyur cig/ lha mtshams dang ni snron dang yang // brtson
8a6(100 phi): 'grus brtan ldan snrubs dang ni// chu stong chu spang byi bzhin dang // gro bzhin de ni bdun pa yin// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// nub
8a7(100 phi): phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun du bsrungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// mig mi bzang zhes bya bar shes// de ni klu rnams kun gyi bdag/
8a8(100 phi): chu lha lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod la// mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang // dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ de
8b1(100 phi): dag khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag par skyong gyur cig/ nub byed/ sa kyi phyogs chan// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rna cha sra mkhregs ma dang ni// pad+ma
8b2(100 phi): dkar dang skya rengs dang // cha med gcig dang dgu pa dang // rol dang gnag dang stabs myur srid// de dag khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag par skyong bar shog/ nub
8b3(100 phi): phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// nub ces bya ba'i ri bo yod// nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka'ang nub// nub pa'ang khyed la nor sbyin 'gyur// de yang khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag
8b4(100 phi): par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ dgos
8b5(100 phi): pa la la gang gi phyir// byang phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi// rgyu skar khyed la skyeng gyur cig/ mon gru dang ni mon gre dang // khrum stong dang ni khrum
8b6(100 phi): smad dang // nam gru dang ni tha skar dang // bra nye dang ni bdun pa yin// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// byang phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/
8b7(100 phi): de dag khyed la kun du srungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// mi la zhon pa lus ngan po// gnod sbyin kun gyi bdag po ste// nor bzangs lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la
9a1(100 phi): bu ni mang yod la// mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang // dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de dag khyed la nad med
9a2(100 phi): cing // shis pa lhag par skyong gyur cig/ byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rab chags lha mo stong lha mo// sa dang de bzhin pad+ma can/
9a3(100 phi): rgyal po che la nye gnas dang // re dang khre yod dpal ldan ma// de dag khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag par skyong bar shog/ byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs can// smos
9a4(100 phi): dang ldan pa'i ri bo yod// gnod sbyin 'byung po kun gyi gnas// rtse mo sna tshogs lta na sdug/ de yang khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag par skyong gyur cig
9a5(100 phi): phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ rgyu skar nyi shu
9a6(100 phi): rtsa brgyad po// phyogs bzhi dag na bdun bdun / lha yi bu mo sum cu gnyis// phyogs bzhi dag na brgyad brgyad gnas// dge sbyong brgyad dang bram ze brgyad/
9a7(100 phi): yul rnams na ni grong rdal brgyad// dbang por ba brgyad rnams// de dag khyed la kun du srungs// khyed cag 'gro na'ang bkra shis gyur// ldog pa na yang
9a8(100 phi): bkra shis sheg/ gnyen la lta ba bkra shis blta ba'ang bkra shis shog/ dbang bcas gnod sbyin rgyal chen dang // dgra bcom pa dgra snying
9b1(100 phi): ngas/ nana'i shos dang / nges pa dang ni nga bzhin nor rgyas dang // zag pa med pa rnam pa krol rnams
9b2(100 phi): ra cig/ nub phyer
9b3(100 phi): kA dang ga na rtag tu spangs// par tshe nisheg/ 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa'i mdo'i// tshong dben \u0f7f gon dang bzang ba
9b4(100 phi): // rol bya
9b5(100 phi): le'u las byung ba/ shis pa brjod pa'i tshigasardzogs so// zhu dag meng+ga laM//
1a1(101 phu): 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo bzhugs so// /
1b1(101 phu): #/ rgya gar skad du// Ar+yA bi pu le pra be sha ma nA su tan/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i
1b2(101 phu): grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
1b3(101 phu): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na/ gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs
1b4(101 phu): te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer
1b5(101 phu): ga la bar 'dong ngo // btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
1b6(101 phu): mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das yul li bri dzar rgyu zhing gshegs te// yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/ yangs
1b7(101 phu): pa'i grong khyer gyi a smra bsrung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
2a1(101 phu): #// stsal pa// kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la phyin nas sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag
2a2(101 phu): dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smros shig/ bi sar ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa rata/ bi sar ta/ sangs rgyas 'dzin rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka
2a3(101 phu): sprul to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa// rang sangs rgyas thams dacad kyi bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyi bsam pa/ slong pa thams cad kyi
2a4(101 phu): bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyi bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyi bsams pa/ chos kyi bsams pa/ tshangs pa'i bsams pa/
2a5(101 phu): tshangs pa so so'i bsams pa/ 'dod dbang phyug gi dmas pa/ dbang po'i bsams pa/ lnga'i bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i bsams pa/ lnga
2a6(101 phu): ma yin thams cad kyi bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pa'i bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bsam pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sar ta/ bi sa raH/
2a7(101 phu): bi sa rata/ sangs rgyas 'dzin rten lo thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ muny+dzaH/ muny+dzata/ ma 'du gcig yams kyi nad rnam par zhi bar gyur cig
2a8(101 phu): ninastaH/ nin n+naH/ nirga stAta/ nirgastAta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po/ lha'i yang lba/ lha'i tha ma ga shes shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
2b1(101 phu): tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag
2b2(101 phu): kyang 'ong / lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / sku ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon
2b3(101 phu): par dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum zag du ma dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed pa
2b4(101 phu): 'gyur du 'ong gis/ narga ts+tsha ta/ nin r+b+bad/ nir gats+tshaH/ nirgats+tshaH/ myur du byer cig/ khyed cag las gang sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar
2b5(101 phu): gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing shes par mi 'dod la/ srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa dag ni 'khod cing / lus la yang 'jug par gyis
2b6(101 phu): shog/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu su mu su mu/ su mu ru su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/
2b7(101 phu): su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mur+ra/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mai ri me/ rai mi re me re mi ri mi re me ri mi/ ri mi re/ mu ru/ me re/
2b8(101 phu): mur+ra/ ri mau/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mu ru/ dwe mi/ mu ru/ r-i mi/ mu ru/ mi re/ mu mu ri mi/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mai re mur/
3a1(101 phu): pu ri pu ri pu/ ri pu ri pu/ nA b+hU/ nA nA thA tha/ ri phu ri pu/ nA thA thA/ ninats+tsha ta/ ri pu ri pu/ nirgats+tsha te/ pA la ya ta/ ri pu ri pu/ pA la ya ta/
3a2(101 phu): sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan byams pa la gnas pa/ thus rje dang ldan
3a3(101 phu): pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyi/ k+Shi pr-i na ninats+tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang chos nyid kyis/ lha thams
3a4(101 phu): cad dang 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub po// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser sna rnam
3a5(101 phu): chags pa// rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad cing // thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba
3a6(101 phu): rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'jud mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad ston pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten//
3a7(101 phu): sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gi bde ba mnga' mdzad des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// zugs kyis 'gro
3a8(101 phu): 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bA yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing /
3b1(101 phu): glengs dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing bslab mi mnga' la// gsung
3b2(101 phu): gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa// bur sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing // don grub tshogs
3b3(101 phu): kyang grub pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pa'i sa rnams ni// nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing // sems can thams
3b4(101 phu): cad rab dga' des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chubo snying por gshegs pa na/ sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid mi bder
3b5(101 phu): gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur chos kyi 'khor lo bkor ba na// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byud des// khyed la/
3b6(101 phu): bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing // tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des// khyed la bde
3b7(101 phu): legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang // 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu
3b8(101 phu): sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lha rnams kyi ni bsams pa yis// khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa// ngor de de ring grub gyur cing // dang /
4a1(101 phu): bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan 'de legs/

4a3(101 phu): mdzad kyis sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden
4a4(101 phu): tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'dir ni stong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba'
4a5(101 phu): zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nang rdzas med par shog/ kun gyi bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags
4a6(101 phu): gyur te// sa dang bar snang dag na gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
4a7(101 phu): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos// btsun pa de zhin bgyi'o zhes gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas// yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste// sgo'i them pa la
4a8(101 phu): rkang pa bzhag nas/ gsang sngas kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas
4b1(101 phu): 'dzin rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsams pa// dgra bcom pa thams cad kyi
4b2(101 phu): bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyi bsams pa/ nyan thos thas cad kyi bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thas cad kyi bsams pa/ chos kyi bsams pa/ tshangs pas
4b3(101 phu): bsams pa/ tshangs pa so so'i bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi bsams pa/ dbang po'i bsams pa/ lha'i bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i bsams pa/ lha
4b4(101 phu): ma yin thams cad kyi bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyi bsam pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pa'i bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/
4b5(101 phu): bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// muny+tsa ta/ muny+dza ta/ yams kyi nang thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ nirgats+tsha
4b6(101 phu): ta ni rgan+na ta/ ni rgan+na ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
4b7(101 phu): dbang dag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha stong phrag du ma dag dang lha ma yin gyi

5a8(101 phu): swa/ ri gu ri yu ri pra/ ri pra/ re bu/ ri pra/ raM pra/ raM pra/ nanaH/ nan ga/ ri bu phu/ nAn ga nin N+ya ta/ ri pu re pra nin NAH/ pA la ya ta/ ri pu pra/ pA la sa ta/
5b1(101 phu): sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang
5b2(101 phu): ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyi/ kI bran ninats+tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang
5b3(101 phu): 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser sna rnam

5b7(101 phu): thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi//
5b8(101 phu): sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang /
6a1(101 phu): zhing bslu ba mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes
6a2(101 phu): ga pa da bang zug dang smras sa na
6a3(101 phu): chel bcas pa rab g.yos shing // sems can thams cad rab dga' des/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ byang chub snying por gshegs pa na/ sa
6a4(101 phu): dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags pa'i
6a5(101 phu): bden pa rnams gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos
6a6(101 phu): kyis 'pham mdzad cing // tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas
6a7(101 phu): bde legs dang // 'byung po kun gyi bde logs ni// khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lha rnams kyi ni bsams pa yis/
6a8(101 phu): khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro bde leg/
6b1(101 phu): shog/ phyir ldog dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing // khyed cag rtag tu bde leg
6b2(101 phu): shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad cing // sdang sems ldan pa nas
6b3(101 phu): byer cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong
6b4(101 phu): khyer 'dir ni stong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams
6b5(101 phu): med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te// sa dang bar snang dag la gnas
6b6(101 phu): pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo rdzogs
6b7(101 phu): so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+da bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / dag
1a1(102 phe): rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba bzhugs so// /
1b1(102 phe): bod skad du/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
1b2(102 phe): 'tshal lo// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten sman slang du// byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur dang da ltar gyi/ rang byung thub dbang thugs rje ldan
1b3(102 phe): rnams la// bdag gis bdag kun btud nas phyag 'tshal lo// chags dang zhe sdang gti mug gis dbang ni// bdag gi lus
1b4(102 phe): dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// srid pa nyam ngar sdig pa ci bsags pa// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// de bzhin/
1b5(102 phe): gshegs kyi bsod nams mdzad gang dang // byang chub sems dpa' las byung bsod nams dang // gang yang nyan thos rkyen gyi theg
1b6(102 phe): chen dang // 'jig rten bsod nams de la yi rang ngo // byang chub snying por thogs mar gang sangs rgyas// pad+ma rgyas pa'i spyan 'dra spyan
1b7(102 phe): mnga' ga/ sangs rgyas zla med mtha' yas de dag la// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar bskul// phung po ma lus mya ngan
2a1(102 phe): 'das dbyings su// gshegs par gang bzhed mi dang lha yi lha// mgon po de dag ji snyed sman slad du// bzhugs dang sangs rgyas sku don mdzad pa
2a2(102 phe): gsol// phyag 'tshal ba dang gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang // bskul ba dang ni gsol ba btab pa dang // de bzhin yid rang song nams ci bsags pa// byang chub
2a3(102 phe): dam pa mchog tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag gi bsod nams dam pa 'dis rtag tu// byang chub sems ni brjed par ma gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub sems
2a4(102 phe): dpa' dang // dge ba'i bshes rnams mnyes par byed gyur cig/ mi khom gnod pa brgyad spong bar shog/ bzod dang ldan zhing mtshan gyis lus brgyan dang // rtag tu skye dran
2a5(102 phe): sems ni mi rmongs dang // rab des pha rol phyin pa brtson gyur cig/ dbang phyug mi rdzi chos kyi dbang phyug dang // yon tan 'byung gnas nyid ni 'gyur med shog/ g.yog 'khor
2a6(102 phe): mang po mthun par ldan pa dang // bsam pa mthun zhing rgya cher dag gyur cig/ bsod nams mi zad rnam dag bro dang ldan// cho ga yon tan dag la dga' bar shog/ bsam
2a7(102 phe): gtan mngon shes so so yang dag rig/ dbang bcu dag la dag dbang byed gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la ma rdzogs pa// de dag sangs rgyas go 'phang
2a8(102 phe): myur thob shog/ de la gang dag lam kun ma rdzogs pa// de dag tshogs kyi rnyed pa rnyed gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tha na med pa yi// byang chub tu ni smon lam myur
2b1(102 phe): 'debs shog/ de la dam bcas pa ni brtan gyur cing // byang chub thob min don gzhan byed ma gyur// lus kun dbang po dag pas rab rgyas shing // nad med rim
2b2(102 phe): nad med cing mya ngan bral// tshe ring zhi dang sgra ni yid 'ong ldan// sdig las zlog cing dag las 'jug gyur cing // ser sna bral zhing zang zing med chos
2b3(102 phe): kyis// rtag tu phan tshun 'dogs byed par shog/ gzhan du snying rje che dang ldan gyur nas// 'dod pa mi mnga' bde bar gshegs gyur cin
2b4(102 phe): 'gro ba sdug bsngal bying la phan bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med mchog tu// rdo rje rgyal mtshan yongs bsngo rgyal po la/
2b5(102 phe): des ni rang gi bsod nams yongs su bsngo// bde gshegs kun tu bzang dang mkhyen pa dag/ kun tu bzang po bsngo dge ji lta
2b6(102 phe): bar// de bzhin bdag kyang kun tu bzang spyod dang // rgyal ba dam pa kun tu bzang por shog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan
2b7(102 phe): gyi yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so// dgo//
1a1(103 pho): de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis sogs bzhugs so//
1b1(103 pho): #/ rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa ta thA ga ta mang+ga la gA za/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis kyi
1b2(103 pho): tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan/ zla ba
1b3(103 pho): 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa// dgongs pa mtha' dge rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni
1b4(103 pho): skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam sbyong ba// mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzog
1b5(103 pho): pa'i bkra shis pa// dge mnyam pasam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
1b6(103 pho): shog sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad pa// yang dag bden pa'i 'byo ba sbyin mdzad mi bslu ba// rin chen
1b7(103 pho): 'byung gnas zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ bsam gtan ting 'dzin
2a1(103 pho): dab pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas/ ye shes pad+ma'i steng bzhugs dpag med che ldan zhing /
2a2(103 pho): tshe grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'i bkra shis gang / bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ sems can don gyi las la thugs
2a3(103 pho): ni skyer mdzad cing // 'gro ba kun gyi 'ching ba'i bcings las grol mdzad pa/
2a4(103 pho): thub mchog don yod grub kyi bkra shis gang yin pa/ bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog
2a5(103 pho): de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// /
2a6(103 pho): dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan po brang dam pa ru/ mi pham mgon la rgyal tshab dam par dbang bskur zhing /
2a7(103 pho): 'dzam gling nyid du glang chen thal kar ltar gshegs gang /
2a8(103 pho): bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dam par zas gtsang sras/
2b1(103 pho): bud med sbyin bral g.yo sgyu spangs pa lnga mdzes yum/ lhums su zla bcur blo gros ldan pa shAkya'i rigs/
2b2(103 pho): bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde leg shog/
2b3(103 pho): lum pa'i tshal ni dben zhing nyams dga' pa la sha'i/ yal gnas bzung bltams gyur tshangs dang brgya byin 'dud/
2b4(103 pho): mkha' la gshegs te phyogs bcur pad ma byung 'gyur gang /
2b5(103 pho): bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/
2b6(103 pho): gzhal med khang mdzes drang srong dam pa'i
3a1(103 pho): mdun bzhag nas// mtshar ltas shis pa brjod de ston pa 'byung gyur pa// shAka rigs bud med 'khor ldan kun 'dus brgyan btags
3a2(103 pho): gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang dang 'dir bde legs shog/ gzhon nu'i stobs ni sgyu rtsal yig rtsis 'phongs las ni// kun las mthar byung
3a3(103 pho): lha mi la sogs kun pas mchog/ shAkya'i rigs khrungs log cog bsal phyir btsun mo'i 'khor// bkra shis dam pa nges kyang deng 'dir bde legs
3a4(103 pho): shog/ pho zang nas byung rga nad 'chi ba las byung gzigs// mi rnams rmongs mdzad lha yi mdun bdar mkha' la ni// srid gsum dag las brgal
3a5(103 pho): phyir mthon mthing dbu skra bregs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ lha rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis lcags ngur smrig gos rnams phul//
3a6(103 pho): nar 'dza ra'i chu bor dka' thub ma lus rdzogs// thub pa bsam gtan nas bzheng sa bkra shis 'o thug gsol// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir
3a7(103 pho): bde legs shog/ pad mo las byung khyu mchog byang chub shing drung du// dkyil mo krung bcas mi g.yo mchog gis bdud btul nas// tho rangs bdud rtsi
3a8(103 pho): mi 'gyur phun tshegs sangs rgyas pa// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ ba ra NA ser chos kyi 'khor lo mgon pos bskor//
3b1(103 pho): kun shes la sogs bden bzhi lnga sde bzang la bstan// lba klu lha min la sogs mi min bdun gyur gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde
3b2(103 pho): legs shog/ nga rgyal bsdams par ldan pa'i ston pa drug btul zhing // glang chen rab myos mi bzang lhas byin gyis zad brtul// drang srong mchog la
3b3(103 pho): sde'u rgyal cang shes sbrang rtsis mchod// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ pad+mo gzhon nu lta lha'i mtshan ldan shAkya'i rigs/
3b4(103 pho): zas gtsang sras su rgyal rigs 'khor los sgyur rgyal bltams// bltams pa nas gzungasA la'i tshal du ma lus rdzogs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir
3b5(103 pho): bde legs shog/ byams pa'i stobs kyis 'gro ba ma lus sgrol mdzad cing // sems can mtha' yas zhi ba de'i lam la rab bkod nas// grong khyer rtsa mchog
3b6(103 pho): dam par dgongs pa yongs rdzogs gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ bcom ldan rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gzid brjid
3b7(103 pho): can// tshe lo brgyad khri'i dus na grong khyer nye ldan du// pa la yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkris phun sum tshogs gyur cig
3b8(103 pho): bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can// tshe lo bdun khri'i dus na ka ni grong khyer du// shing mchog sen 'da'i shing drung mngon par sangs
4a1(103 pho): rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ rgyal ba thams cad skyob pa rgyal rigs tho gros can// tshe lo drug khri'i
4a2(103 pho): 5/ dus na grong khyer mnyam med du// shing mchogs la'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs kra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig / thub pa
4a3(103 pho): 'khor ba 'jig ni stobs ldan bram ze rigs// tshe lo ba'i khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du// shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde
4a4(103 pho): gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ 'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigs// tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/
4a5(103 pho): u dum 'bar ba'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ skyob pa 'od srungs rgyal rigs bla med
4a6(103 pho): yon tan can// tshe lo nyi khri'i dus na grong khyer ran se ru// n+ya gro d+ha yi shing drang mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs
4a7(103 pho): gyur cig/ 'gro mgon shAkya thub pargyal rigs brtson 'grus can// tshe lo brgya pa'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du// a shwa ta yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas
4a8(103 pho): pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ phan sum mtshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi 'o 'dra// 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma
4b1(103 pho): gsum spangs pa// sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba// bkra shis des ni skye dgu'i zhi byed dang po'o// de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab
4b2(103 pho): mi g.yo ba// 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa// chos mchog dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa// 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shes gnyis pa'o//
4b3(103 pho): dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyugami dang lnga dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas// tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi zhing /
4b4(103 pho): 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o// che ba'i tshe mchog ston mchog bla na med// chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyis// bgegs dang bdud ris/
4b5(103 pho): gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na med dam chos bdud rtsi'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis//
4b6(103 pho): nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba// rgyal sras phan mdzad
4b7(103 pho): bden pa'i byini rlabs kyis// nyes pa'i skyon zhi dge tshogs rnam par 'phel// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ tshangs dang lha dbang srung ma'i byin
4b8(103 pho): rlabs kyis// phan mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te// bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin grub pa dang // tshe ring nad med bde skyed ldan par shog/
5a1(103 pho): oM swa ste/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas gcol yon tan mchog mnga' zhing
5a2(103 pho): dgus mchod cing smon lam sprin tshogs 'dus// go 'phang ston pa chos kyi char 'bebs pa// bkra shis/
5a3(103 pho): des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ skyob pa'i chos la legs pa'i tshogs mnga' zhing // shin tu
5a4(103 pho): dang bde dang des gsungs pa// 'khor ba rtag pa de mya ngan med 'thob pa'i// bkra shis des kyang skye dgu
5a5(103 pho): rnams la zhi byed shog/ dge 'dun che la thu rtsal rmad mnga' zhing // bslab gzhi legs bcas brtson
5a6(103 pho): pa'i rnal 'byor can// bdag gzhan don chen sgrub pa'i lam zhugs pa// bkra shis des kyang
5a7(103 pho): skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ zhu dag/ bkra shis/ dge'o// sarba mang+ga lam/
5b1(103 pho): xxx
1a1(104 pho): // oM swa sti/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas gcol yon tan mchog mnga' zhing che dgus mchod cing smon lam sprin tshogs 'dus// go 'phang ston
1a2(104 pho): pa chos kyi char 'bebs pa// bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la'i byed shog/ skyob pa'i chos la legs pa'i tshogs mnga' zhing // shin tu phan dang bde dang des
1a3(104 pho): gsungs pa// 'khor ba rtag bde mya ngan med 'thob pa'i// bkra shes des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ dge 'dun chel thu rtsal rmad mnga' zhing // bas
1a4(104 pho): gzhi legs bcas brtson pa'i rnal 'byor can// bdag gzhan don cher sgrub po'i lam zhugs pa// bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog
1a5(104 pho): zhus dag/
